BIBLIOTHECA AUGUSTANA

<p>Heliand</p>
<p>um 830</p>

  <tr>
	<td width="50">&nbsp;</td>
	<td  width="600">
<h1>Heliand</h1>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h2>Fitte I</h2>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="650" colspan="2" >
<p style="color:#996699;">______________________________________________________________________________</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="50">&nbsp;</td>
	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="600">
<h4><img src="hel_hf01.jpg" width="350" height="453" /></h4>
<h2 style="text-align:center;letter-spacing:0pt;">Die Evangelisten (Book of Kells, um 800)</h2>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;"><span class="f_ruberi">M</span>anega uu&acirc;ron,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>the sia iro m&ocirc;d gesp&ocirc;n,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2.3</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[that sia bigunnun reckean] that gir&ucirc;ni,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that thie r&icirc;ceo Crist</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">undar mancunnea<span class="f_canusg">| </span>m&acirc;ri{d}a gifrumida</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">mid uuordun endi mid uuercun.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>That uuolda th&ocirc; uu&icirc;sara filo</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">liudo barno lo{b}on,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>l&ecirc;ra Cristes,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;lag uuord godas,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi mid iro handon scr&icirc;{b}an</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">berehtl&icirc;co an buok,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>hu&ocirc; sia [is gibodscip scoldin]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">frummian, firiho barn.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Than uu&acirc;run thoh sia fiori te thiu</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>10</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">under thera menigo,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thia habdon maht godes,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">helpa fan himila,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>h&ecirc;lagna g&ecirc;st,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">craft fan Criste, -<span class="f_canusg">| </span>sia uur{d}un gicorana te thio,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that sie than &ecirc;uangelium<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[&ecirc;nan scoldun]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an buok scr&icirc;{b}an<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endo [s&ocirc;] manag gibod godes,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>15</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;lag himilisc uuord:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>sia ne muosta heli{d}o than m&ecirc;r,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">firiho barno frummian,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>neuan that sia fiori te thio</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thuru craft godas<span class="f_canusg">| </span>gecorana uur{d}un,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Matheus endi Marcus,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ndash; s&ocirc; uu&acirc;run thia man h&ecirc;tana -</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Lucas endi Iohannes;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>sia uu&acirc;run [gode lie{b}a,]</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>20</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuir{d}iga ti them giuuirkie.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Habda im uualdand god,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">them heli{d}on an iro hertan<span class="f_canusg">| </span>h&ecirc;lagna g&ecirc;st</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fasto bifolhan<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi ferahtan hugi,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&ocirc; manag uu&icirc;sl&icirc;k uuord<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi giuuit mikil,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that sea scoldin ahebbean<span class="f_canusg">| </span>h&ecirc;lagaro stemnun</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>25</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">godspell that guoda,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that ni ha{b}it &ecirc;nigan gigadon huergin,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thiu uuord an thesaro uueroldi,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that io uualdand m&ecirc;r,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">drohtin diurie<span class="f_canusg">| </span>eftho der{b}i thing,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">firinuuerc fellie<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[eftho f&icirc;undo n&icirc;{d}],</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[str&icirc;d uui{d}erstande] &ndash; ,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>huand hie habda starkan hugi,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>30</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">mildean endi guodan,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thie the m&ecirc;ster uuas,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[a{d}alordfrumo<span class="f_canusg">| </span>alomahtig].</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">That scoldun sea fiori thuo<span class="f_canusg">| </span>fingron scr&icirc;{b}an,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">settian endi singan<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi seggean for{d},</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that sea fan Cristes<span class="f_canusg">| </span>crafte them mikilon</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>35</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gis&acirc;hun endi gih&ocirc;rdun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thes hie sel{b}o gisprac,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">giuu&icirc;sda endi giuuarahta,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uundarl&icirc;cas filo,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&ocirc; manag mid mannon<span class="f_canusg">| </span>mahtig drohtin,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">all so hie it fan them anginne<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thuru is [&ecirc;nes] craht,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uualdand gisprak,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thuo hie &ecirc;rist thesa uuerold giscuop</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>40</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">endi thuo all bifieng<span class="f_canusg">| </span>mid &ecirc;nu uuordo,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">himil endi er{d}a<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi al that sea bihlidan &ecirc;gun</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">giuuarahtes endi giuuahsanes:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that uuar{d} thuo all mid uuordon godas</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fasto bifangan,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi [gifrumid] after thiu,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">huilic than liudscepi<span class="f_canusg">| </span>landes scoldi</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>45</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&icirc;dost giuualdan,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>eftho [huar] thiu [uueroldaldar]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[endon scoldin].<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&Ecirc;n uuas iro thuo noh than</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[firiho] barnun biforan,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi [thiu] f&icirc;{b}i uu&acirc;run agangan:</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">scolda thuo that sehsta<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&acirc;ligl&icirc;co</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">cuman thuru craft godes<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi Cristas giburd,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>50</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;landero [bestan],<span class="f_canusg">| </span>h&ecirc;lagas g&ecirc;stes,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an thesan middilgard<span class="f_canusg">| </span>managon te helpun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">firio barnon ti frumon<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uui{d} f&icirc;undo n&icirc;{d},</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uui{d} dernero duualm.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Than habda thuo drohtin god</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">R&ocirc;manoliudeon farliuuan<span class="f_canusg">| </span>r&icirc;keo m&ecirc;sta,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>55</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">habda them heriscipie<span class="f_canusg">| </span>herta gisterkid,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that sia habdon bithuungana<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thiedo gihuilica,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">habdun fan R&ucirc;muburg<span class="f_canusg">| </span>r&icirc;ki giuunnan</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">helmgitr&ocirc;steon,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&acirc;ton iro heritogon</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an lando gihuem,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>habdun liudeo giuuald,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>60</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">allon elitheodon.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Erodes uuas</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an Hierusalem<span class="f_canusg">| </span>o{b}er that Iudeono folc</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gicoran te kuninge,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; ina thie k&ecirc;ser tharod,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fon R&ucirc;muburg<span class="f_canusg">| </span>r&icirc;ki thiodan</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">satta undar that gis&icirc;{d}i.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Hie ni uuas thoh mid sibbeon [bilang]</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>65</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">a{b}aron Israheles,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>e{d}iligiburdi,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">cuman fon iro [cnuosle],<span class="f_canusg">| </span>neuan that hie thuru thes k&ecirc;sures thanc</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fan R&ucirc;muburg<span class="f_canusg">| </span>r&icirc;ki habda,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that im uu&acirc;run s&ocirc; gih&ocirc;riga<span class="f_canusg">| </span>hildiscalcos,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">a{b}aron Israheles<span class="f_canusg">| </span>elleanruo{b}a:</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>70</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">su&icirc;{d}o unuuanda uuini,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>than lang hie giuuald &ecirc;hta,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Erodes thes r&icirc;keas<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi [r&acirc;dburdeon held]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[Iudeo liudi].<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Than uuas thar &ecirc;n gigamalod mann,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that uuas fruod gomo,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>habda ferehtan hugi,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuas fan them liudeon<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Levias cunnes,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>75</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Iacobas [suneas],<span class="f_canusg">| </span>guodero thiedo:</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Zacharias uuas hie h&ecirc;tan.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>That uuas s&ocirc; s&acirc;lig man,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">huand hie simblon gerno<span class="f_canusg">| </span>gode theonoda,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuarahta after is uuilleon;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>deda is uu&icirc;f s&ocirc; self</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&ndash; uuas iru gialdrod idis:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ni muosta im er{b}iuuard</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>80</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an iro iugu{d}h&ecirc;di<span class="f_canusg">| </span>gi{b}i{d}ig uuer{d}an -</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">libdun im far&ucirc;ter laster,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuaruhtun lof goda,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&acirc;run s&ocirc; gih&ocirc;riga<span class="f_canusg">| </span>he{b}ancuninge,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">diuridon &ucirc;san drohtin:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ni uueldun der{b}eas uuiht<a name="0085">&nbsp;</a></h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">under mancunnie,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>m&ecirc;nes gifrummean,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>85</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ne saca ne sundea.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Uuas im thoh an sorgun hugi,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that sie er{b}iuuard<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ecirc;gan ni m&ocirc;stun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ac uu&acirc;run im barno l&ocirc;s.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Than scolda he gibod godes</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thar an Hierusalem,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; oft s&ocirc; is gigengi gist&ocirc;d,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that ina torhtl&icirc;co<span class="f_canusg">| </span>t&icirc;di gimanodun,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>90</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&ocirc; scolda he at them uu&icirc;ha<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uualdandes geld</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;lag bihuuer{b}an,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>he{b}ancuninges,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">godes iungarskepi:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>gern uuas he su&icirc;{d}o,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that he [it] thurh ferhtan hugi<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[frummean] m&ocirc;sti.</h3>
   </td>
  </tr>
</table>
</div>

<h1>Heliand</h1>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h2>Fitte II</h2>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="650" colspan="2" >
<p style="color:#996699;">______________________________________________________________________________</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="50">&nbsp;</td>
	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="600">
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;"><span class="f_ruberi">T</span>h&ocirc; uuar{d} thiu t&icirc;d cuman, &ndash;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[that] thar gitald habdun</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>95</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&icirc;sa man mid uuordun, &ndash;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that scolda thana uu&icirc;h godes</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Zacharias bisehan.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; uuar{d} thar gisamnod filu</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thar te Hierusalem<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[Iudeo] liudi,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuerodes te them uu&icirc;ha,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thar sie uualdand god</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">suu&icirc;{d}o theol&icirc;co<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thiggean scoldun,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>100</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;rron is huldi,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that sie he{b}ancuning</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">l&ecirc;{d}es al&ecirc;ti.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thea liudi st&ocirc;dun</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">umbi that h&ecirc;laga h&ucirc;s,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi geng im the [gih&ecirc;rodo] man</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an thana uu&icirc;h innan.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>That uuerod &ocirc;{d}ar b&ecirc;d</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">umbi thana alah &ucirc;tan,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Ebreo liudi,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>105</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[huuan &ecirc;r] the fr&ocirc;do man<span class="f_canusg">| </span>gifrumid habdi</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uualdandes uuilleon.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>S&ocirc; he th&ocirc; thana uu&icirc;r&ocirc;c dr&ocirc;g,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[ald] aftar them alaha,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi umbi thana altari geng</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">mid is r&ocirc;cfatun<span class="f_canusg">| </span>r&icirc;kiun thionon,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&ndash; [fremida] ferhtl&icirc;co<span class="f_canusg">| </span>fr&acirc;on s&icirc;nes,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>110</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">godes iungarskepi<span class="f_canusg">| </span>gerno suu&icirc;{d}o</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">mid hluttru hugi,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; man h&ecirc;rren scal</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[gerno] fulgangan &ndash;,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[grurios qu&acirc;mun] im,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">egison an them alahe:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>hie gisah thar aftar thiu &ecirc;nna engil godes</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an them uu&icirc;he innan,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[the] sprac im mid is uuordun tuo,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>115</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hiet that fruod gumo<span class="f_canusg">| </span>foroht ni uu&acirc;ri,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hiet that hie im ni andriede:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;th&icirc;na d&acirc;di sind&raquo;, qua{d} he,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;uualdanda uuer{d}e<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi th&icirc;n uuord s&ocirc; self,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">th&icirc;n thionost is im an thanke,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that thu sulica gith&acirc;ht ha{b}es</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an is &ecirc;nes craft.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Ic is engil bium,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>120</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Gabriel bium ic h&ecirc;tan,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>the gio for goda standu,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">anduuard for them alouualdon,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ne s&icirc; that he me an is [&acirc;rundi huarod]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sendean uuillea.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Nu hiet he me an thesan s&icirc;{d} faran,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hiet that ic thi [thoh] gic&ucirc;{d}di,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that thi kind giboran,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fon th&icirc;nera alderu idis<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ocirc;dan scoldi</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>125</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuer{d}an an thesero uueroldi,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuordun sp&acirc;hi.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">That ni scal an is li{b}a gio<span class="f_canusg">| </span>l&icirc;{d}es [anb&icirc;tan],</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&icirc;nes an is uueroldi:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; ha{b}ed im uurdgiscapu,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">metod gimarcod<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi maht godes.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">H&ecirc;t that ic thi thoh sagdi,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that it scoldi gis&icirc;{d} uuesan</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>130</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">he{b}ancuninges,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>h&ecirc;t that [git] it heldin uuel,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">tuhin thurh treuua,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>qua{d} that he im t&icirc;ras s&ocirc; filu</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an godes r&icirc;kea<span class="f_canusg">| </span>forge{b}an uueldi.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">He qua{d} that the g&ocirc;do gumo<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Iohannes te namon</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hebbean scoldi,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[gib&ocirc;d] that [git it] h&ecirc;tin s&ocirc;,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>135</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that kind, than it qu&acirc;mi,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>qua{d} that it Kristes gis&icirc;{d}</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an thesaro uu&icirc;dun uuerold<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuer{d}an scoldi,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">is sel{b}es sunies,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi qua{d} that [sie sliumo] herod</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an is [bodskepi]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>b&ecirc;{d}e qu&acirc;min.&raquo;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Zacharias th&ocirc; gimahalda<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi uui{d} [sel{b}an] sprac</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>140</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">drohtines engil,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi im thero d&acirc;deo bigan,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uundron thero uuordo:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;huu&ocirc; mag that giuuer{d}an s&ocirc;&raquo;, qua{d} he,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;aftar an aldre?<span class="f_canusg">| </span>it is unc al te lat</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&ocirc; te giuuinnanne,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; thu mid th&icirc;nun uuordun [gisprikis].</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Huuanda uuit habdun aldres &ecirc;r<span class="f_canusg">| </span>efno tu&ecirc;ntig</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>145</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuintro an uncro uueroldi,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ecirc;r than qu&acirc;mi [thit] uu&icirc;f te mi;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">than uu&acirc;run uuit nu atsamna<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[antsi{b}unta] uuintro</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gibenkeon endi gibeddeon,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>si{d}or ic sie mi te br&ucirc;di gec&ocirc;s.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">S&ocirc; uuit [thes] an uncro iugu{d}i<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[gigirnan] ni mohtun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that uuit er{b}iuuard<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ecirc;gan m&ocirc;stin,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>150</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">f&ocirc;dean an uncun flettea,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>nu uuit sus gifr&ocirc;dod sint</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&ndash; ha{b}ad unc eldi binoman<span class="f_canusg">| </span>elleand&acirc;di,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that uuit sint an uncro siuni gislekit<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi an uncun s&icirc;dun lat;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fl&ecirc;sk is unc [antfallan],<span class="f_canusg">| </span>fel unsc&ocirc;ni,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">is unca [lud] gili{d}en,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>l&icirc;k [gidrusnod],</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>155</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sind unca andb&acirc;ri<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ocirc;{d}arl&icirc;caron,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">m&ocirc;d endi megincraft &ndash;,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; uuit giu s&ocirc; managan dag</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&acirc;run an thesero uueroldi,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; mi thes uundar thunkit,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[huu&ocirc;] it s&ocirc; giuuer{d}an mugi,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; thu mid th&icirc;nun uuordun [gisprikis].&raquo;</h3>
   </td>
  </tr>
</table>

<h1>Heliand</h1>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h2>Fitte III</h2>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="650" colspan="2" >
<p style="color:#996699;">______________________________________________________________________________</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
    </td>

  <tr>
	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="50">&nbsp;</td>
	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="600">
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;"><span class="f_ruberi">T</span>h&ocirc; uuar{d} that he{b}encuninges bodon<span class="f_canusg">| </span>harm an is m&ocirc;de,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>160</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that he is giuuerkes s&ocirc;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uundron scolda</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">endi that ni uuelda gihuggean,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that ina [mahta h&ecirc;lag] god</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&ocirc; alaiungan,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; he fon &ecirc;rist uuas,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sel{b}o giuuirkean,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[of] he s&ocirc; uueldi.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Skerida im th&ocirc; te uu&icirc;tea,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that he ni mahte &ecirc;nig uuord [sprekan],</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>165</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gimahlien mid is m&ucirc;{d}u,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;&ecirc;r than thi magu uuir{d}id,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fon th&icirc;nero aldero idis<span class="f_canusg">| </span>erl af&ocirc;dit,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">kindiung giboran<span class="f_canusg">| </span>cunnies g&ocirc;des,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&acirc;num te thesero uueroldi.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Than scalt thu eft uuord sprekan,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hebbean th&icirc;naro stemna giuuald;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ni tharft thu stum uuesan</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>170</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">lengron hu&icirc;la.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; uuar{d} it s&acirc;n gil&ecirc;stid s&ocirc;,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">giuuor{d}an te uu&acirc;ron,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; thar an them uu&icirc;ha gisprak</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">engil thes alouualdon:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuar{d} ald gumo</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">spr&acirc;ca bil&ocirc;sit,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thoh he sp&acirc;han hugi</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">b&acirc;ri an is breostun.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Bidun allan dag</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>175</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that uuerod for them uu&icirc;ha<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi uundrodun alla,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">bihuu&icirc; he thar s&ocirc; lango,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>lofs&acirc;lig man,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">suu&icirc;{d}o fr&ocirc;d gumo<span class="f_canusg">| </span>fr&acirc;on s&icirc;nun</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thionon thorfti,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; thar &ecirc;r &ecirc;nig thegno ni deda,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">than sie thar [at] them uu&icirc;ha<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uualdandes geld</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>180</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">folmon frumidun.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; quam fr&ocirc;d gumo</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&ucirc;t fon them alaha.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Erlos thrungun</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">n&acirc;hor mikilu:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuas im niud mikil,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">huat he im s&ocirc;{d}l&icirc;kes<span class="f_canusg">| </span>seggean uueldi,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&icirc;sean te uu&acirc;ron.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>He ni mohta th&ocirc; &ecirc;nig uuord [sprecan],</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>185</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">giseggean them gisi{d}ea,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[b&ucirc;tan] that he mid is su&icirc;{d}ron hand</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&icirc;sda them uueroda,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that sie &ucirc;ses uualdandes</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">l&ecirc;ra l&ecirc;stin.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thea liudi forst&ocirc;dun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that he thar habda gegnungo<span class="f_canusg">| </span>godcundes [huat]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">forsehen sel{b}o,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thoh he is ni mahti giseggean uuiht,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>190</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">giuu&icirc;sean te uu&acirc;ron.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; habda he &ucirc;ses uualdandes</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">geld gil&ecirc;stid,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>al s&ocirc; is gigengi uuas</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gimarcod mid mannun.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; uuar{d} s&acirc;n aftar thiu maht godes,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gic&ucirc;{d}id is craft [mikil]:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuar{d} thiu [qu&acirc;n] &ocirc;can,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">idis an ira eldiu:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>scolda im er{b}iuuard,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>195</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">su&icirc;{d}o godcund gumo<span class="f_canusg">| </span>gi{b}i{d}ig uuer{d}an,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">barn an [burgun].<span class="f_canusg">| </span>B&ecirc;d aftar thiu</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that uu&icirc;f [uurdigiscapu].<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Skr&ecirc;d the uuintar for{d},</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">geng [thes] g&ecirc;res gital.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Iohannes quam</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an liudeo lioht:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>l&icirc;k uuas im sc&ocirc;ni,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>200</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuas im fel fagar,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>fahs endi naglos,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuangun [uu&acirc;run] im uulitige.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; f&ocirc;run thar uu&icirc;se man,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">snelle tesamne,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thea su&acirc;sostun m&ecirc;st,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uundrodun thes [uuerkes],<span class="f_canusg">| </span>bi[hu&icirc;] it gio mahti giuuer{d}an s&ocirc;,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that [undar] s&ocirc; aldun tu&ecirc;m<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ocirc;dan uur{d}i</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>205</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">barn an [giburdeon],<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ni uu&acirc;ri that it gibod godes</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sel{b}es uu&acirc;ri:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[afsuo{b}un] sie garo,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that it elcor s&ocirc; uu&acirc;nl&icirc;c<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuer{d}an ni mahti.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Th&ocirc; sprak thar &ecirc;n gifr&ocirc;dot man,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>the s&ocirc; filo consta</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&icirc;saro uuordo,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>habde giuuit mikil,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>210</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fr&acirc;gode niudl&icirc;co,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>huuat is namo scoldi</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuesan an thesaro uueroldi:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;mi thunkid an is uu&icirc;su gil&icirc;c</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">iac an is gib&acirc;rea,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that he s&icirc; betara than uui,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&ocirc; ic [uu&acirc;niu], that ina &ucirc;s gegnungo<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[god] fon himila</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[sel{b}o] sendi&raquo;.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; sprac s&acirc;n [aftar]</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>215</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[thiu] m&ocirc;dar thes kindes,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thiu thana magu habda,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that barn an ire barme:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;h&ecirc;r quam [gibod] godes&raquo;, qua{d} siu,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;fernun g&ecirc;re,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>furmon uuordu</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[gib&ocirc;d], that he Iohannes<span class="f_canusg">| </span>bi godes l&ecirc;run</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;tan scoldi.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>That ic an m&icirc;numu hugi ni gidar</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>220</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuendean mid uuihti,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>of ic is giuualdan m&ocirc;t&raquo;.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Th&ocirc; sprac &ecirc;n g&ecirc;lhert man,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>the ira gaduling uuas:</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;ne h&ecirc;t &ecirc;r giouuiht s&ocirc;&raquo;, qua{d} he,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;a{d}alboranes</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&ucirc;ses cunnies eftho cn&ocirc;sles.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Uuita kiasan im &ocirc;{d}rana</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">niudsamna namon:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>he [niate] of he m&ocirc;ti&raquo;.</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>225</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Th&ocirc; sprac eft the fr&ocirc;do man,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>the thar consta filo mahlian:</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;ni gi{b}u ic that te r&acirc;de&raquo;, qua{d} he,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;rinco neg&ecirc;nun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that [he] uuord godes<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuendean biginna;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ac [uuita] is thana fader fr&acirc;gon,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>the [thar] s&ocirc; gifr&ocirc;dod sitit,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&icirc;s an is uu&icirc;nseli:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thoh he ni mugi &ecirc;nig uuord [sprecan],</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>230</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thoh mag he bi b&ocirc;csta{b}on<span class="f_canusg">| </span>br&ecirc;f geuuirkean,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">namon giscr&icirc;{b}an&raquo;.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; he n&acirc;hor geng,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">legda im &ecirc;na b&ocirc;c an barm<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi [bad gerno]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uur&icirc;tan uu&icirc;sl&icirc;co<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuordgimerkiun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">huat sie that h&ecirc;laga barn<span class="f_canusg">| </span>h&ecirc;tan scoldin.</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>235</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Th&ocirc; nam he [thia b&ocirc;k an hand]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi an is hugi th&acirc;hte</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">su&icirc;{d}o gerno te gode:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Iohannes namon</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&icirc;sl&icirc;co giuur&ecirc;t<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi [&ocirc;c] aftar mid is uuordu gisprac</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">su&icirc;{d}o sp&acirc;hl&icirc;co:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>habda im eft is spr&acirc;ca giuuald,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">giuuitteas endi [uu&icirc;sun].<span class="f_canusg">| </span>That uu&icirc;ti uuas th&ocirc; agangan,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>240</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hard harmscare,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[the] im h&ecirc;lag god</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">mahtig [macode],<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that he [an is] m&ocirc;dse{b}on</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">godes ni forg&acirc;ti,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>than he im eft sendi is iungron t&ocirc;.</h3>
   </td>
  </tr>
</table>

<h1>Heliand</h1>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h2>Fitte IV</h2>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
    </td>

  <tr>

    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="50">&nbsp;</td>
	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="600">
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;"><span class="f_ruberi">T</span>h&ocirc; ni uuas lang aftar thiu,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ne it al s&ocirc; gil&ecirc;stid uuar{d},</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&ocirc; he mancunnea<span class="f_canusg">| </span>managa hu&icirc;la,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>245</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">god alomahtig<span class="f_canusg">| </span>forge{b}en habda,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that he is himilisc barn<span class="f_canusg">| </span>herod te uueroldi,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">si sel{b}es sunu<span class="f_canusg">| </span>sendean [uueldi],</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">te thiu that he h&ecirc;r al&ocirc;sdi<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[al liudstamna],</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuerod fon uu&icirc;tea.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[Th&ocirc;] uuar{d} is [uuisbodo]</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>250</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an Galilealand,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Gabriel cuman,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">engil thes alouualdon,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thar he &ecirc;ne idis uuisse,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">munil&icirc;ca maga{d}:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Maria uuas siu h&ecirc;ten,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuas iru thiorna githigan.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Sea &ecirc;n thegan habda,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Ioseph gimahlit,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>g&ocirc;des cunnies man,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>255</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thea Dauides dohter:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that uuas [s&ocirc;] diurl&icirc;c uu&icirc;f,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">idis anth&ecirc;ti.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thar sie the engil godes</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[an] Nazarethburg<span class="f_canusg">| </span>bi namon sel{b}o</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gr&ocirc;tte [geginuuarde]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi sie fon gode quedda:</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;H&ecirc;l uuis thu, Maria&raquo;, qua{d} he,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;thu bist th&icirc;nun h&ecirc;rron liof,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>260</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uualdande uuir{d}ig,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>huuand thu giuuit ha{b}es,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">idis enstio fol.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thu scalt [for] allun uuesan</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&icirc;{b}un giuu&icirc;hit.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Ne ha{b}e [thu] uu&ecirc;can hugi,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ne forhti thu th&icirc;nun ferhe:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ne quam ic thi te &ecirc;nigun fr&ecirc;son herod,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ne dragu ic &ecirc;nig [drugithing].<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thu scalt &ucirc;ses drohtines uuesan</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>265</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">m&ocirc;dar mid mannun<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi scalt thana magu f&ocirc;dean,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thes [h&ocirc;hon he{b}ancuninges suno].<span class="f_canusg">| </span>The scal H&ecirc;liand te namon</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&ecirc;gan mid eldiun.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[Neo] endi ni kumid,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thes uu&icirc;don r&icirc;keas [giuuand,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>the] he giuualdan scal,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">m&acirc;ri theodan.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; sprac im [eft] thiu maga{d} angegin,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>270</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uui{d} thana engil godes<span class="f_canusg">| </span>idiso sc&ocirc;niost,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">allaro uu&icirc;{b}o uulitigost:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;hu&ocirc; mag that giuuer{d}en s&ocirc;&raquo;, [qua{d}] siu,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;that ic magu f&ocirc;die?<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Ne ic gio mannes ni uuar{d}</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&icirc;s an m&icirc;nera uueroldi.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; habde eft is uuord garu</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">engil thes alouualdon<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thero idisiu tegegnes:</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>275</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;an thi scal h&ecirc;lag g&ecirc;st<span class="f_canusg">| </span>fon he{b}anuuange</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">cuman thurh craft godes.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[Thanan] scal thi kind &ocirc;dan</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuer{d}an an thesaro uueroldi.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Uualdandes craft</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">scal thi fon them h&ocirc;hoston<span class="f_canusg">| </span>he{b}ancuninge</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">scadouuan mid [skimon].<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Ni uuar{d} sc&ocirc;niera giburd,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>280</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ne s&ocirc; m&acirc;ri mid mannun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>huand siu kumid thurh maht godes</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an [these] uu&icirc;don uuerold.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; uuar{d} [eft] thes uu&icirc;bes hugi</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">aftar them &acirc;rundie<span class="f_canusg">| </span>al gihuor{b}en</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an godes uuilleon.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;[Than] ic h&ecirc;r garu standu&raquo;, qua{d} siu,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;te sulicun ambahtskepi,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; he mi &ecirc;gan uuili.</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>285</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Thiu bium ic theotgodes.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Nu ik [theses] thinges gitr&ucirc;on;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuer{d}e mi aftar th&icirc;nun uuordun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>al s&ocirc; is uuilleo s&icirc;,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;rron m&icirc;nes;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>nis mi hugi tu&icirc;fli,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ne uuord ne uu&icirc;sa.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>S&ocirc; gifragn ik, that that uu&icirc;f antfeng</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that godes &acirc;rundi<span class="f_canusg">| </span>gerno su&icirc;{d}o</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>290</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">mid leohtu hugi<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi mid [gil&ocirc;{b}on] g&ocirc;dun</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">endi mid hluttrun treuun.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[Uuar{d}] the h&ecirc;lago g&ecirc;st,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that barn [an] ira b&ocirc;sma;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi siu ira breostun [forst&ocirc;d]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">iac an ire se{b}on sel{b}o,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>sagda them siu uuelda,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that sie habde gi&ocirc;cana<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thes alouualdon craft</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>295</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;lag fon himile.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; uuar{d} hugi Iosepes,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">is m&ocirc;d [giuuorrid],<span class="f_canusg">| </span>the im &ecirc;r thea maga{d} habda,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thea idis anth&ecirc;ttea,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>a{d}alcn&ocirc;sles uu&icirc;f</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">giboht im te br&ucirc;diu.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>He afs&ocirc;f [that] siu habda barn undar iru:</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ni uu&acirc;nda thes mid uuihti,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[that] iru that uu&icirc;f habdi</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>300</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">giuuardod s&ocirc; [uuarol&icirc;co]:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ni [uuisse] uualdandes th&ocirc; noh</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">bl&icirc;{d}i gibodskepi.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Ni uuelda sia imo te br&ucirc;di th&ocirc;,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">halon imo te h&icirc;uuon,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ac bigan im th&ocirc; [an] hugi thenkean,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hu&ocirc; he sie [s&ocirc;] forl&ecirc;ti,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; iru thar nu uur{d}i l&ecirc;des [uuiht],</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&ocirc;dan [ar{b}ides].<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Ni uuelda sie aftar thiu</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>305</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">meldon for menigi:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>antdr&ecirc;d that sie manno barn</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">l&icirc;{b}u bin&acirc;min.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>S&ocirc; uuas [than] thero liudeo thau</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thurh then aldon &ecirc;u,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Ebreo folkes,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&ocirc; huilik s&ocirc; thar an unreht<span class="f_canusg">| </span>idis gih&icirc;uuida,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that siu simbla thana bedskepi<span class="f_canusg">| </span>buggean scolda,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>310</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fr&icirc; mid ira ferhu:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ni uuas gio thiu f&ecirc;mea s&ocirc; g&ocirc;d,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that siu [mid] them liudun leng<span class="f_canusg">| </span>libbien m&ocirc;sti,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuesan undar them uueroda.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[Bigan] im the uu&icirc;so mann,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">su&icirc;{d}o g&ocirc;d gumo,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Ioseph an is m&ocirc;da</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thenkean thero thingo,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>hu&ocirc; he thea thiornun th&ocirc;</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>315</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">listiun forl&ecirc;ti.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; ni uuas lang te thiu,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that im thar an dr&ocirc;ma quam<span class="f_canusg">| </span>drohtines engil,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">he{b}ancuninges bodo,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi h&ecirc;t sie ina haldan uuel,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">minnion sie an is m&ocirc;de:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;Ni uuis thu&raquo;, qua{d} he, &laquo;Mariun uur&ecirc;{d},</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thiornun th&icirc;naro;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>siu is [githungan] uu&icirc;f;</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>320</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ne forhugi thu sie te hardo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thu scalt sie haldan uuel,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuardon ira an thesaro uueroldi.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>L&ecirc;sti [thu] inca uuinitreuua</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">for{d} s&ocirc; thu d&acirc;di,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[endi hald] incan friundskepi uuel!</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Ne l&acirc;t thu sie thi thiu l&ecirc;{d}aron,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thoh siu [undar] ira li{d}on &ecirc;gi,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">barn an [ira] b&ocirc;sma.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>It cumid thurh gibod godes,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>325</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;lages g&ecirc;stes<span class="f_canusg">| </span>fon he{b}anuuanga:</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that is [I&ecirc;su] Krist,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>godes &ecirc;gan barn,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uualdandes sunu.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thu scalt sie uuel [haldan],</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;lagl&icirc;co.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Ne l&acirc;t thu [thi] th&icirc;nan hugi tu&icirc;flien,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">merrean th&icirc;na m&ocirc;dgith&acirc;ht.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; uuar{d} eft thes mannes hugi</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>330</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[giuuendid] aftar them uuordun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that he im te them uu&icirc;{b}a genam,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">te thera maga{d} minnea:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>antkenda maht godes,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uualdandes gibod.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Uuas im uuilleo mikil,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that he [sia] s&ocirc; h&ecirc;lagl&icirc;co<span class="f_canusg">| </span>haldan m&ocirc;sti:</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">bisorgoda sie an is [gis&icirc;{d}ea],<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi [siu] s&ocirc; s&ucirc;{b}ro [dr&ocirc;g]</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>335</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">al te huldi godes<span class="f_canusg">| </span>h&ecirc;lagna g&ecirc;st,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[g&ocirc;dl&icirc;can] gumon,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>antthat sie [godes] giscapu</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">mahtig gimanodun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that [siu ina] an manno lioht,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">allaro barno bezt,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>brengean scolda.</h3>
   </td>
  </tr>
</table>

<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h2>Fitte V</h2>

	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="50">&nbsp;</td>
	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="600">
<h4><img src="hel_hf05.jpg" width="274" height="433"></h4>
<h2 style="text-align:center;letter-spacing:0pt;">Christi Geburt (Book of Kells, um 800)</h2>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;"><span class="f_ruberi">T</span>h&ocirc; uuar{d} fon R&ucirc;muburg<span class="f_canusg">| </span>r&icirc;kes mannes</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>340</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">o{b}ar alla thesa irminthiod<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Octaui&acirc;nas</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ban endi bodskepi<span class="f_canusg">| </span>o{b}ar thea is br&ecirc;don giuuald</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">cuman fon them k&ecirc;sure<span class="f_canusg">| </span>cuningo gihuilicun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;msitteandiun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; uu&icirc;do s&ocirc; is heritogon</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">o{b}ar al that landskepi<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[liudio] giuueldun.</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>345</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[Hiet man] that [alla] thea elilendiun man<span class="f_canusg">| </span>iro &ocirc;{d}il s&ocirc;htin,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[heli{d}os] iro handmahal<span class="f_canusg">| </span>angegen iro h&ecirc;rron bodon,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">qu&acirc;mi te them cn&ocirc;sla gihue,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thanan he cunneas uuas,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">giboran fon them burgiun.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>That gibod uuar{d} gil&ecirc;stid</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">o{b}ar thesa uu&icirc;don uuerold.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Uuerod samnoda</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>350</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[te] allaro burgeo gihuuem.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>F&ocirc;run thea bodon o{b}ar all,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thea fon them k&ecirc;sura<span class="f_canusg">| </span>cumana uu&acirc;run,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">b&ocirc;ksp&acirc;ha uueros,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[endi] an br&ecirc;f [scri{b}un]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[su&icirc;{d}o] niudl&icirc;co<span class="f_canusg">| </span>namono gihuilican,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ia land ia liudi,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that im ni [mahti alettian] mann</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>355</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gumono sulica gambra,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; [im] scolda geldan gihue</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">heli{d}o fon is h&ocirc;{b}da.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; giuu&ecirc;t im &ocirc;c [mid] is h&icirc;uuisca</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Ioseph the g&ocirc;do,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; it god mahtig,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uualdand uuelda:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc;hta im [thiu uu&acirc;namon] h&ecirc;m,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thea burg an Bethleem,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thar iro bei{d}ero uuas,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>360</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thes heli{d}es handmahal<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi &ocirc;c thera h&ecirc;lagun thiornun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Mariun thera g&ocirc;dun.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thar uuas thes m&acirc;reon st&ocirc;l</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an &ecirc;rdagun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>a{d}alcuninges,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Dauides thes g&ocirc;don,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>than [langa] the he thana druhtskepi thar,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">erl undar Ebreon<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ecirc;gan m&ocirc;sta,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>365</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">haldan h&ocirc;hgisetu.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[Sie] uu&acirc;run is h&icirc;uuiscas,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">cuman fon is cn&ocirc;sla,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>cunneas g&ocirc;des,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">b&ecirc;{d}iu bi giburdiun.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thar gifragn ic, that [sie thiu] berhtun giscapu,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Mariun gimanodun<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi maht godes,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that iru an [them] s&icirc;{d}a<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[sunu &ocirc;dan uuar{d}],</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>370</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">giboran an Bethleem<span class="f_canusg">| </span>barno strangost,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">allaro cuningo craftigost:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>cuman [uuar{d}] the m&acirc;reo,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">mahtig [an] manno lioht,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; is [&ecirc;r] managan dag</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">bili{d}i uu&acirc;run<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi [b&ocirc;cno] filu</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">giuuor{d}en an thesero uueroldi.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; uuas it all giuu&acirc;rod s&ocirc;,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>375</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&ocirc; it &ecirc;r sp&acirc;ha man<span class="f_canusg">| </span>gisprocan habdun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thurh huilic &ocirc;dm&ocirc;di<span class="f_canusg">| </span>he thit er{d}r&icirc;ki herod</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thurh is sel{b}es craft<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc;kean uuelda,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">managaro mundboro.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; ina thiu m&ocirc;dar nam,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">biuuand ina mid uu&acirc;diu<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uu&icirc;{b}o [sc&ocirc;niost],</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>380</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fagaron [fratahun],<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi ina mid [iro] folmon tuu&ecirc;m</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">legda lio{b}l&icirc;co<span class="f_canusg">| </span>luttilna man,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that kind an &ecirc;na cribbiun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thoh he habdi craft godes,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">manno drohtin.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thar [sat] thiu m&ocirc;dar biforan,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&icirc;f uuacogeandi,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuardoda sel{b}o,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>385</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">held that h&ecirc;laga barn:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ni uuas ira hugi tuu&icirc;fli,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thera maga{d} ira m&ocirc;dse{b}o.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; uuar{d} [that] managun c&ucirc;{d}</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">o{b}ar thesa uu&icirc;don uuerold,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[uuardos] antfundun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thea thar ehuscalcos<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ucirc;ta uu&acirc;run,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uueros an uuahtu,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuiggeo [g&ocirc;mean],</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>390</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fehas aftar felda:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>gis&acirc;hun finistri an tuu&ecirc;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">tel&acirc;tan an lufte,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi quam lioht godes</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&acirc;num thurh thiu uuolcan<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi thea uuardos thar</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">bifeng an them felda.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Sie [uur{d}un] an forhtun th&ocirc;,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thea [man] an [ira] m&ocirc;da:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>gis&acirc;hun thar mahtigna</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>395</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">godes engil cuman,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>the im tegegnes sprac,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;t that im thea uuardos<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuiht ne antdr&ecirc;din</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">l&ecirc;{d}es fon them liohta:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;ic scal eu&raquo;, qua{d} he, &laquo;lio{b}ara thing,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">su&icirc;{d}o uu&acirc;rl&icirc;co<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuilleon seggean,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">c&ucirc;{d}ean craft mikil:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>nu is Krist geboran</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>400</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an thesero sel{b}un naht,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&acirc;lig barn godes,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an [thera] Dauides burg,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>drohtin the g&ocirc;do.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">That is mendislo<span class="f_canusg">| </span>manno cunneas,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">allaro firiho fruma.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thar gi ina [f&icirc;{d}an] mugun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an [Bethlemaburg]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>barno r&icirc;kiost:</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>405</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hebbiad that te [t&ecirc;cna],<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that ic [eu gi]tellean mag</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&acirc;run uuordun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that he thar biuundan ligid,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that kind an &ecirc;nera cribbiun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thoh he s&icirc; cuning o{b}ar al</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">er{d}un endi himiles<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi o{b}ar [eldeo barn],</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uueroldes uualdand&raquo;.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Reht s&ocirc; he th&ocirc; that uuord gisprac,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>410</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&ocirc; uuar{d} thar engilo te them &ecirc;nun<span class="f_canusg">| </span>unr&icirc;m cuman,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;lag heriskepi<span class="f_canusg">| </span>fon he{b}anuuanga,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fagar folc godes,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi filu spr&acirc;kun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">lofuuord manag<span class="f_canusg">| </span>liudeo h&ecirc;rron.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Afh&ocirc;{b}un th&ocirc; h&ecirc;lagna sang,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>th&ocirc; sie eft te he{b}anuuanga</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>415</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uundun thurh thiu uuolcan.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thea uuardos h&ocirc;rdun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hu&ocirc; thiu engilo craft<span class="f_canusg">| </span>alomahtigna god</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">su&icirc;{d}o [uuer{d}l&icirc;co]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuordun lo{b}odun:</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;diuri{d}a s&icirc; nu&raquo;, qu&acirc;{d}un sie,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;drohtine sel{b}un</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an them h&ocirc;hoston<span class="f_canusg">| </span>himilo r&icirc;kea</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>420</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">endi fri{d}u an er{d}u<span class="f_canusg">| </span>firiho barnun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">g&ocirc;duuilligun gumun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[them the] god antkennead</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thurh [hluttran] hugi.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thea hirdios forst&ocirc;dun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that sie mahtig thing<span class="f_canusg">| </span>gimanod habda,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[bl&icirc;{d}l&icirc;c bod]skepi:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>giuuitun im te Bethleem thanan</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>425</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">nahtes s&icirc;{d}on;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuas im niud mikil,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that sie [sel{b}on] Krist<span class="f_canusg">| </span>gisehan [m&ocirc;stin].</h3>
   </td>
  </tr>
</table>

<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h2>Fitte VI</h2>
