  <tr>
	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="50">&nbsp;</td>
	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="600">
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;"><span class="f_ruberi">H</span>abda im the engil godes<span class="f_canusg">| </span>al giuu&icirc;sid</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">torhtun t&ecirc;cnun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that sie [im t&ocirc;] sel{b}un,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">te them godes barne<span class="f_canusg">| </span>gangan mahtun,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>430</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">endi fundun s&acirc;n<span class="f_canusg">| </span>folco drohtin,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">liudeo [h&ecirc;rron].<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Sagdun th&ocirc; lof goda,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uualdande mid iro uuordun<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi uu&icirc;do [c&ucirc;{d}dun]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">o{b}ar thea berhtun burg,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>huilic im thar [bili{d}i] uuar{d}</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fon he{b}anuuanga<span class="f_canusg">| </span>h&ecirc;lag git&ocirc;git,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>435</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fagar an felde.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>That [fr&icirc;] al biheld</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an ira hugiskeftiun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>h&ecirc;lag thiorna,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thiu maga{d} an ira m&ocirc;de,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; huat s&ocirc; siu gih&ocirc;rda thea mann sprecan.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">F&ocirc;dda ina th&ocirc; fagaro<span class="f_canusg">| </span>fr&icirc;ho sc&acirc;niosta,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thiu m&ocirc;dar thurh minnea<span class="f_canusg">| </span>managaro drohtin,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>440</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;lag himilisc barn.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Heli{d}os gispr&acirc;cun</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an them ahtodon daga<span class="f_canusg">| </span>erlos managa,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">su&icirc;{d}o glauua gumon<span class="f_canusg">| </span>mid thera godes thiornun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that he H&ecirc;leand te namon<span class="f_canusg">| </span>hebbean scoldi,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&ocirc; it the godes engil<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Gabriel gisprac</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>445</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&acirc;ron uuordun<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi them uu&icirc;{b}e gib&ocirc;d,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">bodo drohtines,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>th&ocirc; siu &ecirc;rist that barn antfeng</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&acirc;num te thesero uueroldi.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Uuas iru uuilleo mikil,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that siu ina s&ocirc; [h&ecirc;lagl&icirc;co]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>haldan m&ocirc;sti,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fulgeng im th&ocirc; s&ocirc; gerno.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>That g&ecirc;r fur{d}or skr&ecirc;d</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>450</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">untthat that fri{d}ubarn godes<span class="f_canusg">| </span>fiartig habda</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">dago endi nahto.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; scoldun sie thar &ecirc;na d&acirc;d frummean,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that sie ina te Hierusalem<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[forge{b}an] scoldun</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uualdanda te them uu&icirc;ha.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[S&ocirc;] uuas iro uu&icirc;sa than,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thero liudeo landsidu,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that that ni m&ocirc;sta forl&acirc;tan neg&ecirc;n</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>455</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">idis undar Ebreon,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ef iru [at &ecirc;rist] uuar{d}</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sunu af&ocirc;dit,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ne siu ina simbla tharod</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">te them godes uu&icirc;ha<span class="f_canusg">| </span>forge{b}an scolda.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Giuuitun im th&ocirc; thiu g&ocirc;dun tuu&ecirc;,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Ioseph endi Maria</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">b&ecirc;{d}iu fon Bethleem:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>habdun that barn mid im,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>460</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;lagna Krist,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc;htun im h&ucirc;s godes</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an Hierusalem;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thar scoldun sie is geld frummean</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uualdanda [at] them uu&icirc;ha<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uu&icirc;sa l&ecirc;stean</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Iudeo folkes.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thar fundun sea &ecirc;nna g&ocirc;dan man</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">aldan [at] them alaha,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>a{d}alboranan,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>465</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">the habda [at] them uu&icirc;ha s&ocirc; filu<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuintro endi sumaro</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gilibd an them liohta:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>oft uuarhta he thar lof goda</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">mid hluttru hugi;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>habda im h&ecirc;lagna g&ecirc;st,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[s&acirc;ligl&icirc;can] se{b}on;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Simeon uuas he h&ecirc;tan.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Im habda giuu&icirc;sid<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uualdandas craft</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>470</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">langa hu&icirc;la,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that he ni m&ocirc;sta [&ecirc;r] thit lioht age{b}an,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuendean af thesero uueroldi,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ecirc;r than im the uuilleo gist&ocirc;di,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that he [sel{b}an] Krist<span class="f_canusg">| </span>gisehan m&ocirc;sti,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;lagna he{b}ancuning.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; uuar{d} im is hugi su&icirc;{d}o</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">bl&icirc;{d}i an is briostun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>th&ocirc; he gisah that [barn] cuman</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>475</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an thena uu&icirc;h innan.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; sagda hie uualdande thanc,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">almahtigon gode,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thes he ina mid is &ocirc;gun gisah.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Geng im th&ocirc; tegegnes<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi ina gerno antfeng</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ald mid is armun:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>al antkende</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">b&ocirc;can endi bili{d}i<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi &ocirc;c that barn godes,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>480</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;lagna he{b}ancuning.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;Nu ic thi, [h&ecirc;rro], scal&raquo;, qua{d} he,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;gerno biddean,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>nu ic sus gigamalod bium,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that thu th&icirc;nan holdan scalc<span class="f_canusg">| </span>nu hinan huer{b}an l&acirc;tas,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an [th&icirc;na fri{d}uuu&acirc;ra] faran,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thar &ecirc;r m&icirc;na for{d}run dedun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uueros fon thesero uueroldi,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>nu mi the uuilleo gist&ocirc;d,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>485</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">dago [lio{b}osto],<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that ic m&icirc;nan drohtin gisah,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">holdan h&ecirc;rron,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; mi gih&ecirc;tan uuas</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">langa hu&icirc;la.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thu bist lioht mikil</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">allun elithiodun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thea &ecirc;r thes alouualdon</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">craft ne antkendun.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&icirc;na cumi sindun</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>490</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">te d&ocirc;ma endi te diur{d}on,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>drohtin fr&ocirc; m&icirc;n,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">a{b}arun Israhelas,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ecirc;ganumu folke,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">th&icirc;nun lio{b}un liudiun.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Listiun talde th&ocirc;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">the aldo man an them alaha<span class="f_canusg">| </span>idis thero g&ocirc;dun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sagda s&ocirc;{d}l&icirc;co,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>hu&ocirc; iro sunu scolda</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>495</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">o{b}ar thesan middilgard<span class="f_canusg">| </span>managun uuer{d}an</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sumun te falle, sumun te fr&ocirc;{b}ru<span class="f_canusg">| </span>firiho barnun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">them liudiun te leo{b}a,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>the is l&ecirc;run gih&ocirc;rdin,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">endi them te harma,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>the h&ocirc;rien ni [uueldin]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Kristas l&ecirc;ron.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;Thu scalt noh&raquo;, qua{d} he, &laquo;cara thiggean,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>500</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">harm an th&icirc;numu herton,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>than ina heli{d}o barn</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&acirc;pnun uu&icirc;tnod.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>That uuir{d}id thi uuerk mikil,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thrim te githolonna.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thiu thiorna al forst&ocirc;d</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&icirc;sas mannas uuord.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; quam thar &ocirc;c &ecirc;n uu&icirc;f gangan</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ald innan them alaha:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Anna uuas siu h&ecirc;tan,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>505</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">dohtar Fanueles;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>siu habde ira drohtine uuel</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">githionod te thanca,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuas iru [githungan] uu&icirc;f.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Siu m&ocirc;sta aftar ira maga{d}h&ecirc;di,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&icirc;{d}or siu mannes uuar{d},</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">erles [an &ecirc;hti]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>e{d}ili thiorne,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&ocirc; m&ocirc;sta siu mid ira br&ucirc;digumon<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[b&ocirc;dlo] giuualdan</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>510</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">si{b}un uuintar [samad].<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; gifragn ic that iru thar sorga gist&ocirc;d</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that [sie] thiu mikila maht<span class="f_canusg">| </span>metodes ted&ecirc;lda,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uur&ecirc;{d} uurdigiscapu.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; uuas siu uuidouua aftar thiu<a name="0514">&nbsp;</a></h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[at] them fri{d}uuu&icirc;ha<span class="f_canusg">| </span>fior endi [antahtoda]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuintro an iro uueroldi,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; siu nia thana uu&icirc;h ni forl&ecirc;t,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>515</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ac siu thar ira drohtine [uuel]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>dages endi nahtes,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gode thionode.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Siu quam thar &ocirc;c gangan t&ocirc;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an thea sel{b}un t&icirc;d:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&acirc;n antkende</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that [h&ecirc;lage] barn godes<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi them heli{d}on c&ucirc;{d}de,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">them uueroda aftar them uu&icirc;ha<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuilspel mikil,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>520</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">qua{d} that im neriandas ginist<span class="f_canusg">| </span>gin&acirc;hid uu&acirc;ri,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">helpa he{b}encuninges:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;nu is the h&ecirc;lago Krist,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uualdand sel{b}o<span class="f_canusg">| </span>an thesan uu&icirc;h cuman</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">te al&ocirc;sienne thea liudi,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>the h&ecirc;r nu lango bidun</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an thesara middilgard,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>managa huu&icirc;la,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>525</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thurftig thioda,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; nu thes thinges mugun</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">mendian mancunni.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Manag fagonoda</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuerod aftar them uu&icirc;ha:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>gih&ocirc;rdun uuilspel mikil</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fon gode seggean.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>That geld habde th&ocirc; gil&ecirc;stid</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thiu idis an them alaha,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[al] s&ocirc; it im an ira &ecirc;uua gib&ocirc;d</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>530</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">endi [at thera berhtun] burg<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[b&ocirc;k] giuu&icirc;sdun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;lagaro handgiuuerk.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Giuuitun im th&ocirc; te h&ucirc;s thanan</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fon Hierusalem<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Ioseph endi Maria,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;lag h&icirc;uuiski:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>habdun im he{b}enkuning</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">simbla te gis&icirc;{d}a,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>sunu drohtines,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>535</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">managaro mundboron,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; it gio m&acirc;ri ni uuar{d}</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">than uu&icirc;dor an thesaro uueroldi,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[b&ucirc;tan] s&ocirc; is uuilleo geng,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">he{b}encuninges hugi.<span class="f_canusg">| </span></h3>
   </td>
  </tr>
</table>

<p>Heliand</p>
<p>um 830</p>

	<td width="50">&nbsp;</td>
	<td  width="600">
<h1>Heliand</h1>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h2>Fitte VII</h2>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="650" colspan="2" >
<p style="color:#996699;">______________________________________________________________________________</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="50">&nbsp;</td>
	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="600">
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:200px;"><span class="f_canusg">| </span><span class="f_ruberi">T</span>hoh thar than [gihuilic] h&ecirc;lag man</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Krist antkendi,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thoh ni uuar{d} it gio te thes kuninges ho{b}e</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">them mannun gim&acirc;rid,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thea im an iro m&ocirc;dse{b}on</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>540</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">holde ni uu&acirc;run,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ac uuas im s&ocirc; bihalden for{d}</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">mid uuordun endi mid uuerkun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>antthat thar uueros &ocirc;stan,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">su&icirc;{d}o glauua gumon<span class="f_canusg">| </span>gangan qu&acirc;mun</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">threa te thero thiodu,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thegnos snelle,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[an] langan uueg<span class="f_canusg">| </span>o{b}ar that land tharod:</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>545</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">folgodun &ecirc;nun berhtun [b&ocirc;kne]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi s&ocirc;htun that barn godes</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">mid hluttru hugi:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uueldun im hn&icirc;gan t&ocirc;,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[gean] im te iungrun:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>dri{b}un im godes giscapu.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Th&ocirc; si [Erodesan] thar<span class="f_canusg">| </span>r&icirc;kean fundun</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an is seli sittien,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[sl&icirc;{d}uurdean] kuning,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>550</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">m&ocirc;dagna mid is mannun:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ndash; simbla uuas he [mor{d}es] gern &ndash;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">th&ocirc; quaddun sie ina c&ucirc;sco<span class="f_canusg">| </span>an cuning[uu&icirc;sun],</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fagaro an is flettie,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi he fr&acirc;goda s&acirc;n,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">huilic sie &acirc;rundi<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ucirc;ta [gibr&acirc;hti],</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uueros an thana uuracs&icirc;{d}:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;huue{d}er l&ecirc;diad gi uundan gold</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>555</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">te ge{b}u huilicun gumuno?<span class="f_canusg">| </span>te hu&icirc; gi [thus] an ganga kumad,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gifaran an f&ocirc;{d}iu?<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Huat, gi n&ecirc;thuuanan ferran sind</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">erlos fon &ocirc;{d}run thiodun.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Ic gisiu that gi sind e{d}iligiburdiun</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">cunnies fon cn&ocirc;sle g&ocirc;dun:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>nio h&ecirc;r &ecirc;r sulica cumana ni uur{d}un</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&ecirc;ri fon &ocirc;{d}run thiodun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&icirc;{d}or ik m&ocirc;sta thesas erlo folkes,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>560</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">giuualdan thesas uu&icirc;don r&icirc;keas.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Gi sculun mi te uu&acirc;run seggean</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">for thesun liudio folke,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>bihuu&icirc; gi s&icirc;n te thesun lande [cumana]&raquo;.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Th&ocirc; spr&acirc;cun im eft tegegnes<span class="f_canusg">| </span>gumon &ocirc;stronea,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuordsp&acirc;he uueros:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;uui thi te uu&acirc;run mugun&raquo;, qu&acirc;{d}un sie,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;&ucirc;se &acirc;rundi<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ocirc;{d}o [gitellien],</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>565</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">giseggean s&ocirc;{d}l&icirc;co,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>bihuu&icirc; uui qu&acirc;mun an thesan si{d} herod</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fon [&ocirc;stan] thesaro er{d}u.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Giu uu&acirc;run thar a{d}alies man,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[g&ocirc;dspr&acirc;kea] gumon,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thea &ucirc;s g&ocirc;des s&ocirc; filu,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">helpa gih&ecirc;tun<span class="f_canusg">| </span>fon he{b}encuninge</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&acirc;rum uuordun.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Than uuas thar &ecirc;n [uuittig] man,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>570</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fr&ocirc;d endi filuuu&icirc;s<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ndash; forn uuas that giu &ndash;,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&ucirc;se aldiro &ocirc;star hinan,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ndash; thar ni uuar{d} s&icirc;{d}or &ecirc;nig man</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">spr&acirc;kono s&ocirc; sp&acirc;hi; &ndash;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[mahte] rekkien spel godes,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">huuand im habde forliuuan<span class="f_canusg">| </span>liudio h&ecirc;rro,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that he mahte fon er{d}u<span class="f_canusg">| </span>up gih&ocirc;rean</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>575</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uualdandes uuord:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>bithiu uuas is giuuit mikil,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thes thegnes gith&acirc;hti.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; he thanan scolda,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[afge{b}en] gardos,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>gadulingo gimang,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">forl&acirc;ten liudio dr&ocirc;m,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc;kien lioht &ocirc;{d}ar,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">th&ocirc; he [im] iungron h&ecirc;t<span class="f_canusg">| </span>gangan n&acirc;hor,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>580</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">er{b}iuuardos,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi is erlun th&ocirc;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sagde s&ocirc;{d}l&icirc;co:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ndash; that al s&icirc;{d}or quam,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">giuuar{d} an thesaro uueroldi &ndash;:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[th&ocirc; sagda he] that h&ecirc;r scoldi cuman &ecirc;n uu&icirc;scuning</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">m&acirc;ri endi mahtig<span class="f_canusg">| </span>an thesan middilgard</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thes bezton giburdies;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>qua{d} that [it] scoldi uuesan barn godes,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>585</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">qua{d} that he thesero [uueroldes]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uualdan scoldi</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gio te &ecirc;uuandaga,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>er{d}un endi himiles.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">He qua{d} that an them sel{b}on daga,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>the ina s&acirc;ligna</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an thesan middilgard<span class="f_canusg">| </span>m&ocirc;dar gidr&ocirc;gi,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&ocirc; qua{d} he that &ocirc;stana<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[&ecirc;n] scoldi sk&icirc;nan</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>590</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">himiltungal hu&icirc;t,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>sulic s&ocirc; uui h&ecirc;r ne habdin &ecirc;r</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">undartuisc [er{d}a] endi himil<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ocirc;{d}ar huerigin,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ne sulic barn ne sulic b&ocirc;can.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>H&ecirc;t that thar te bedu f&ocirc;rin</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">threa man fon thero thiodu,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>h&ecirc;t sie thenkean uuel,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">huan &ecirc;r sie gis&acirc;uuin &ocirc;stana<span class="f_canusg">| </span>up s&icirc;{d}ogean,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>595</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that godes b&ocirc;can gangan,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>h&ecirc;t sie garuuuian s&acirc;n,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;t that uui im folgodin,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; it furi uur{d}i,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuestar o{b}ar thesa [uueroldi].<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Nu is it al giuu&acirc;rod s&ocirc;,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">cuman thurh craft godes:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>the cuning is gif&ocirc;dit,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">giboran bald endi strang:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uui gis&acirc;hun is b&ocirc;can sk&icirc;nan</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>600</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;dro fon himiles tunglun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; ic uu&ecirc;t, that it h&ecirc;lag drohtin,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">marcoda [mahtig] sel{b}o.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Uui gis&acirc;hun morgno gihuilikes</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">bl&icirc;can thana berhton sterron,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi uui gengun aftar them b&ocirc;cna herod</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuegas endi uualdas huu&icirc;lon.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[That uu&acirc;ri &ucirc;s] allaro uuilleono m&ecirc;sta,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that uui ina [sel{b}on gisehan m&ocirc;stin],<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuissin, huar uui [ina] s&ocirc;kean scoldin,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>605</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thana cuning [an] thesumu k&ecirc;surd&ocirc;ma.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Saga &ucirc;s, undar huilicumu he s&icirc; thesaro cunneo af&ocirc;dit.&raquo;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Th&ocirc; uuar{d} Erodesa<span class="f_canusg">| </span>innan briostun</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">harm uui{d} herta,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>bigan [im] is hugi uuallan,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">se{b}o mid sorgun:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>gih&ocirc;rde seggean th&ocirc;,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that he thar [o{b}arh&ocirc;{b}don]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ecirc;gan [scoldi],</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>610</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[craftagoron] cuning<span class="f_canusg">| </span>cunnies g&ocirc;des,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[s&acirc;ligoron] undar them gis&icirc;{d}ea.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; he samnon h&ecirc;t,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&ocirc; huuat s&ocirc; an Hierusalem<span class="f_canusg">| </span>g&ocirc;daro manno</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">allaro sp&acirc;hoston<span class="f_canusg">| </span>spr&acirc;cono uu&acirc;run</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">endi an iro brioston<span class="f_canusg">| </span>b&ocirc;kcraftes m&ecirc;st</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>615</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuissun te uu&acirc;run,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi he sie mid [uuordun] fragn,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">su&icirc;{d}o niudl&icirc;co<span class="f_canusg">| </span>n&icirc;{d}hugdig man,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">cuning thero liudio,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>huar Krist giboran</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an uueroldr&icirc;kea<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuer{d}an scoldi,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fri{d}ugumono bezt.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; sprak im eft [that folc] angegin,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>620</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that uuerod uu&acirc;rl&icirc;co,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>qu&acirc;{d}un that sie uuissin garo,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that he scoldi an Bethleem giboran uuer{d}an:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;s&ocirc; is an [&ucirc;sun] b&ocirc;kun giscri{b}an,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&icirc;sl&icirc;co giuuritan,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; it uu&acirc;rsagon,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">suu&icirc;{d}o glauua gumon<span class="f_canusg">| </span>bi godes crafta</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[filuuu&icirc;se] man<span class="f_canusg">| </span>furn gispr&acirc;cun,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>625</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that scoldi fon Bethleem<span class="f_canusg">| </span>burgo hirdi,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">liof landes uuard<span class="f_canusg">| </span>an thit lioht cuman,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">r&icirc;ki r&acirc;dge{b}o,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>the rihtien scal</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Iudeono gumskepi<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi [is ge{b}a uuesan]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">mildi o{b}ar middilgard<span class="f_canusg">| </span>managun thiodun.&raquo;</h3>
   </td>
  </tr>
</table>

<h1>Heliand</h1>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h2>Fitte VIII</h2>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
    </td>

  <tr>
	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="650" colspan="2" >

    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="50"><h6>630</h6></td>
	<td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;">
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;"><span class="f_ruberi">T</span>h&ocirc; gifragn ic that s&acirc;n aftar thiu<span class="f_canusg">| </span>sl&icirc;{d}m&ocirc;d cuning</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thero uu&acirc;rsagono uuord<span class="f_canusg">| </span>them uurekkiun sagda,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thea thar an [elilendi]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>erlos uu&acirc;run</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ferran gifarana,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi he fr&acirc;goda aftar thiu,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">huan sie an &ocirc;staruuegun<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ecirc;rist [gis&acirc;hin]</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>635</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thana cuningsterron [cuman],<span class="f_canusg">| </span>cumbal luihtien</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;dro fon himile.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Sie ni uueldun is im th&ocirc; helen [eouuiht],</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ac sagdun it im s&ocirc;{d}l&icirc;co.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; h&ecirc;t he sie an thana s&icirc;{d} faran,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;t that sie ira &acirc;rundi<span class="f_canusg">| </span>al undarfundin</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">umbi thes kindes cumi,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi the cuning sel{b}o gib&ocirc;d</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>640</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">su&icirc;{d}o hardlico,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>h&ecirc;rro Iudeono,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">them uu&icirc;sun mannun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ecirc;r than sie f&ocirc;rin [uuestan] for{d},</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that sie im eft gic&ucirc;{d}din,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>huar he thana cuning scoldi</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&ocirc;kean [at] is [sel{d}on];<span class="f_canusg">| </span>qua{d} that he thar uueldi mid is gis&icirc;{d}un t&ocirc;,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">bedan te them barne.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Than hogda he im te banon uuer{d}an</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>645</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&acirc;pnes eggiun.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Than eft uualdand god</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">th&acirc;hte uui{d} them thinga:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[he] mahta [athengean] m&ecirc;r,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gil&ecirc;stean an thesum liohte:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that is noh lango sk&icirc;n,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gic&ucirc;{d}id craft godes.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; gengun eft thiu cumbl for{d}</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&acirc;num undar [uuolcnun].<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; uu&acirc;run thea uu&icirc;son man</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>650</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">f&ucirc;sa te faranne:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>giuuitun [im] for{d} thanan</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">balda an bodskepi:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uueldun that barn godes</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[sel{b}on] s&ocirc;kean.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Sie ni habdun thanan gis&icirc;{d}eas m&ecirc;r,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[b&ucirc;tan] that sie thrie uu&acirc;run:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuissun im thingo gisk&ecirc;{d},</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&acirc;run im glauue gumon,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>the thea ge{b}a l&ecirc;ddun.</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>655</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Than s&acirc;hun sie s&ocirc; uu&icirc;sl&icirc;co<span class="f_canusg">| </span>undar thana uuolcnes skion,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">up te them h&ocirc;hon himile,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>hu&ocirc; f&ocirc;run thea huu&icirc;ton sterron</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&ndash; antkendun sie [that] cumbal godes &ndash;,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[thiu] uu&acirc;run thurh [Krista] herod</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">giuuarht te thesero uueroldi.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thea uueros aftar gengun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">folgodun ferahtl&icirc;co<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ndash; sie frumide the mahte &ndash;</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>660</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">antthat [sie] gis&acirc;hun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&icirc;{d}uu&ocirc;rige man,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">berht b&ocirc;can godes,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>bl&ecirc;c an himile</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">stillo gistanden.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>The [sterro] liohto sk&ecirc;n</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">huu&icirc;t o{b}ar them h&ucirc;se,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thar that h&ecirc;lage barn</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuonode an uuilleon<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi ina that uu&icirc;f biheld,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>665</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thiu thiorne githiudo.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; uuar{d} [thero] thegno hugi</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">bl&icirc;{d}i an iro briostun:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>bi them b&ocirc;cna forst&ocirc;dun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that sie that fri{d}ubarn godes<span class="f_canusg">| </span>funden habdun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;lagna he{b}encuning.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; sie an that h&ucirc;s innan</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">mid iro ge{b}un gengun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>gumon &ocirc;stronea,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>670</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&icirc;{d}uu&ocirc;rige man:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&acirc;n antkendun</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thea uueros uualdand Krist.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thea uurekkion fellun</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">te them kinde an kneobeda<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi ina an cuninguu&icirc;sa</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">g&ocirc;dan gr&ocirc;ttun<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi im thea ge{b}a dr&ocirc;gun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gold endi uu&icirc;hr&ocirc;c<span class="f_canusg">| </span>bi godes t&ecirc;cnun</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>675</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">endi myrra thar mid.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thea man st&ocirc;dun garouua,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">holde for iro h&ecirc;rron,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thea it mid iro handun s&acirc;n</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fagaro antfengun.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; giuuitun im thea ferahton man,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">seggi te sel{d}on<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&icirc;{d}uu&ocirc;rige,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gumon an gastseli.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thar im godes engil</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>680</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sl&acirc;pandiun an naht<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[suue{b}an] git&ocirc;gde,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gidrog [im] an dr&ocirc;me,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>al so it drohtin self,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[uualdand] uuelde,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[that im th&ucirc;hte] that man im mid uuordun gibudi,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that sie im thanan &ocirc;{d}ran uueg,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>erlos f&ocirc;rin,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">li{d}odin sie te lande<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi thana l&ecirc;{d}an man,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>685</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Erodesan<span class="f_canusg">| </span>eft ni s&ocirc;htin,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">m&ocirc;dagna cuning.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; uuar{d} morgan cuman</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&acirc;num te thesero uueroldi.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; bigunnun thea uu&icirc;son man</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">seggean iro sue{b}anos;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>sel{b}on antkendun</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uualdandes uuord,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>huuand sie giuuit mikil</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>690</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">b&acirc;run an iro briostun:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>b&acirc;dun alouualdon,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[h&ecirc;ron] he{b}encuning,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that sie m&ocirc;stin is huldi for{d},</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">giuuirkean is uuilleon,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>qu&acirc;{d}un that sea [ti] im habdin giuuendit hugi,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[iro] m&ocirc;d [morgan gihuuem].<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; f&ocirc;run eft thie man thanan,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">erlos &ocirc;stronie,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>al s&ocirc; im the engil godes</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>695</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuordun giuu&icirc;sde:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>n&acirc;mun im uueg &ocirc;{d}ran,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fulgengun godes l&ecirc;run:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ni uueldun themu Iudeo cuninge</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">umbi thes barnes giburd<span class="f_canusg">| </span>bodon &ocirc;stronie,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&icirc;{d}uu&ocirc;rige man<span class="f_canusg">| </span>seggian [giouuiht],</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ac uuendun im eft an iro uuillion.<span class="f_canusg">| </span></h3>
   </td>
  </tr>
</table>
</div>

	<td  width="600">
<h1>Heliand</h1>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h2>Fitte IX</h2>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="650" colspan="2" >
<p style="color:#996699;">______________________________________________________________________________</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="50"><h6>&nbsp;</h6></td>
	<td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;">
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:200px;"><span class="f_canusg">| </span><span class="f_ruberi">T</span>h&ocirc; uuar{d} s&acirc;n aftar thiu uualdandes,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>700</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">godes engil cumen<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Iosepe te spr&acirc;cun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sagde im an suuefne<span class="f_canusg">| </span>sl&acirc;pandium an naht,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">bodo drohtines,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that that barn godes</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sl&icirc;{d}m&ocirc;d cuning<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc;kean uuelda,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&acirc;htean is aldres;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;nu scaltu ine an Aegypteo</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>705</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">land [antl&ecirc;dean]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi undar them luidiun uuesan</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">mid thiu godes barnu<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi mid theru g&ocirc;dan thiornan,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uunon undar themu uuerode,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>untthat thi uuord [cume]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;rron th&icirc;nes,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that thu that h&ecirc;lage barn</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">eft te thesum landscepi<span class="f_canusg">| </span>l&ecirc;dian m&ocirc;tis,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>710</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">drohtin th&icirc;nen.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; fon them dr&ocirc;ma ansprang</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Ioseph an is gestseli,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi that godes gibod</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&acirc;n antkenda:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>giuu&ecirc;t im an than s&icirc;{d} thanen</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">the thegan mid theru thiornon,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc;hta im thiod &ocirc;{d}ra</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">o{b}ar br&ecirc;dan berg:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuelda that barn godes</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>715</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">f&icirc;undun antf&ocirc;rian.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; gifrang aftar thiu</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Erodes the cuning,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thar he an is r&icirc;kea sat,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[that] uu&acirc;run thea uu&icirc;son man<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuestan gihuuor{b}an</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&ocirc;star an iro &ocirc;{d}il<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi f&ocirc;run im &ocirc;{d}ran uueg:</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuisse that sie [im] that &acirc;rundi<span class="f_canusg">| </span>eft ni uueldun</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>720</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">seggian an is sel{d}on.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; [uuar{d}] im [thes] an sorgun hugi,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">m&ocirc;d mornondi,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>qua{d} that it [im] thie man [dedin],</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">heli{d}os te h&ocirc;n{d}un.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; he [s&ocirc;] hriuuig sat,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">balg ina an is briostun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>qua{d} that he is mahti [betaron] r&acirc;d,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[&ocirc;{d}ran] githenkien:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;nu ic is aldar can,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>725</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&ecirc;t is [uuintergitalu]:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>nu ic giuuinnan mag,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that he [io] o{b}ar thesaro er{d}u<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ald ni uuir{d}it,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;r undar thesum heriscepi.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; he s&ocirc; hardo gib&ocirc;d,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Erodes o{b}ar is riki,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>h&ecirc;t th&ocirc; is rinkos faran</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">cuning thero liudio,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>h&ecirc;t that sie kinda s&ocirc; filo</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>730</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thurh iro handmagen<span class="f_canusg">| </span>h&ocirc;{b}du bin&acirc;min,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&ocirc; manag barn umbi Bethleem,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; filo s&ocirc; thar giboran uur{d}i,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an tu&ecirc;m [g&ecirc;run atogan].<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Tionon frumidon</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[thes] cuninges gis&icirc;{d}os.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; scolda thar s&ocirc; manag kindisc man</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[sueltan] sundiono l&ocirc;s.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Ni uuar{d} si{d} nog &ecirc;r</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>735</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gi&acirc;marl&icirc;cara forgang<span class="f_canusg">| </span>iungaro manno,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">arml&icirc;cara d&ocirc;{d}.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Idisi uuiopun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">m&ocirc;dar managa,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>gis&acirc;hun iro megi spildian:</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ni mahte siu im [nio] giformon,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thoh siu mid iro fa{d}mon tu&ecirc;m</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">iro &ecirc;gan barn<span class="f_canusg">| </span>armun bifengi,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>740</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">liof endi luttil,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thoh scolda is [simbla] that l&icirc;f [ge{b}an],</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">the magu for theru m&ocirc;dar.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>M&ecirc;nes ni s&acirc;hun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&icirc;ties thie uuamsca{d}on:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uu&acirc;pnes eggiun</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fremidun firinuuerc mikil.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Fellun managa</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">maguiunge man.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thia m&ocirc;dar uuiopun</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>745</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">kindiungaro qualm.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Cara uuas an Bethleem,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hofno hl&ucirc;dost:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thoh man [im] iro herton an tu&ecirc;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sni{d}i mid suerdu,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thoh ni mohta im gio s&ecirc;rara d&acirc;d</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuer{d}an an thesaro uueroldi,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uu&icirc;{b}un managun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">br&ucirc;diun an Bethleem:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>gis&acirc;hun iro barn biforan,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>750</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">kindiunge man,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>qualmu sueltan</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[bl&ocirc;dag] an iro barmun.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thie banon uu&icirc;tnodun</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">unsculdige scole:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ni biscri{b}un giouuiht</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thea man umbi m&ecirc;nuuerk:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uueldun mahtigna,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Krist sel{b}on aquellian.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Than habde ina craftag god</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>755</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[gineridan] uui{d} iro n&icirc;{d}e,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that inan nahtes thanan</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an Aegypteo land<span class="f_canusg">| </span>erlos [antl&ecirc;ddun],</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gumon mid Iosepe<span class="f_canusg">| </span>an thana [gr&ocirc;neon] uuang,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an er{d}ono beztun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thar &ecirc;n aha fliutid,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">N&icirc;lstr&ocirc;m mikil<span class="f_canusg">| </span>nor{d} te s&ecirc;uua,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>760</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fl&ocirc;do fagorosta.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thar that fri{d}ubarn [godes]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuonoda an uuilleon,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>antthat uurd fornam</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Erodes thana cuning,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that he forl&ecirc;t eldeo barn,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">m&ocirc;dag manno dr&ocirc;m.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; scolda thero marca giuuald</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&ecirc;gan is er{b}iuuard:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>the uuas Archel&acirc;us</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>765</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;tan, heritogo<span class="f_canusg">| </span>helmberandero:</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">the scolda umbi Hierusalem<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Iudeono folkes,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuerodes giuualdan.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; uuar{d} uuord cuman</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thar an Egypti<span class="f_canusg">| </span>e{d}iliun manne,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that [he] thar te Iosepe,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>godes engil sprac,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>770</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">bodo drohtines,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>h&ecirc;t ina eft that barn thanan</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">l&ecirc;dien te lande.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;nu ha{b}a{d} thit lioht [afge{b}en]&raquo;, qua{d} he,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;Erodes [the] cuning;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>he uuelde is &acirc;htien giu,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fr&ecirc;son is ferahas.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Nu maht thu [an fri{d}u] l&ecirc;dien</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that kind undar euua cunni,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>nu the cuning ni li{b}od,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>775</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">erl o{b}arm&ocirc;dig.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Al antkende</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Iosep godes t&ecirc;can:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>geriuuide ina sniumo</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">the thegan mit thera thiornun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>th&ocirc; sie thanan uueldun</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">b&ecirc;{d}iu mid thiu barnu:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>l&ecirc;stun thiu berhton giscapu,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uualdandes uuillion,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>al s&ocirc; he im [&ecirc;r] mid is uuordun gib&ocirc;d.</h3>
   </td>
  </tr>
</table>

	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="50"><h6>780</h6></td>
	<td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;">
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;"><span class="f_ruberi">G</span>iuuitun im th&ocirc; eft an [Galilealand]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Ioseph endi Maria,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;lag h&icirc;uuiski<span class="f_canusg">| </span>he{b}encuninges,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&acirc;run im an Nazarethburg.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thar the neriondio Krist</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&ocirc;hs undar them uuerode,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[uuar{d}] giuuitties ful,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an uuas imu anst godes,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>he uuas allun liof</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>785</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">m&ocirc;darm&acirc;gun:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>he ni uuas &ocirc;{d}run mannun gil&icirc;c,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[the] gumo an s&icirc;nera g&ocirc;di.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; he [g&ecirc;rtalo]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">tuueli{b}i habde,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>th&ocirc; uuar{d} thiu t&icirc;d cuman,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that [sie] thar te Hierusalem,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Iu{d}eo liudi</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">iro thiodgode<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thionon scoldun,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>790</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuirkean is uuilleon.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; uuar{d} thar an thana uu&icirc;h innan</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thar te Hierusalem<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Iudeono gisamnod</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">mancraft mikil.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thar Maria uuas</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">self an gis&icirc;{d}ea<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi iru sunu habda,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">godes [&ecirc;gan] barn.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; sie that geld habdun,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>795</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[erlos an them alaha,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; it an iro &ecirc;uua gib&ocirc;d],</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gil&ecirc;stid te iro landuu&icirc;sun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>th&ocirc; f&ocirc;run im eft thie liudi thanan,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uueros an iro uuillion<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi thar an them uu&icirc;ha afst&ocirc;d</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">mahtig barn godes,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; ina thiu m&ocirc;dar thar</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ni uuissa te uu&acirc;ron;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ac siu uu&acirc;nda that he mid them uueroda for{d},</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>800</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">f&ocirc;ri mit iro friundun.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Gifrang aftar thiu</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">eft [an] &ocirc;{d}run daga<span class="f_canusg">| </span>a{d}alcunnies uu&icirc;f,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&acirc;lig thiorna,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that he undar them gis&icirc;{d}ia ni uuas.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Uuar{d} Mariun th&ocirc;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>m&ocirc;d an sorgun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hriuuig umbi iro herta,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>th&ocirc; siu that h&ecirc;laga barn</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>805</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ni fand undar them folca:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>filu [gornoda]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thiu godes thiorna.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Giuuitun im th&ocirc; eft te Hierusalem</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">iro sunu s&ocirc;kean,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>fundun ina sittean thar</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an them uu&icirc;ha innan,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thar the [uu&icirc;sa] man,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">suu&icirc;{d}o glauuua gumon<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[an] godes &ecirc;uua</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>810</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">l&acirc;sun ende l&icirc;nodun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>hu&ocirc; sie lof scoldin</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuirkean mid iro uuordun<span class="f_canusg">| </span>them, the thesa uuerold gisc&ocirc;p.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Thar sat undar middiun<span class="f_canusg">| </span>mahtig barn godes,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Krist alouualdo,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; is thea ni mahtun antkennian uuiht,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">the thes uu&icirc;hes thar<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuardon scoldun,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>815</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">endi fr&acirc;goda sie<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[firiuuitl&icirc;co]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&icirc;sera uuordo.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Sie uundradun alle,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[bihuu&icirc;] gio s&ocirc; kindisc man<span class="f_canusg">| </span>sulica quidi mahti</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[mid is m&ucirc;{d}u gim&ecirc;nean].<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thar ina thiu m&ocirc;dar fand</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sittean under them [gis&icirc;{d}ea]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi iro sunu [gr&ocirc;tta],</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>820</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&icirc;san undar them uueroda,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>sprac [im mid] ira uuordun [t&ocirc;]:</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;huu&icirc; uueldes thu th&icirc;nera m&ocirc;dar,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>manno lio{b}osto,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gisidon [sulica sorga],<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that ic thi s&ocirc; s&ecirc;ragm&ocirc;d,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">idis armhugdig<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ecirc;scon scolda</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">undar thesun burgliudiun?&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; sprac iru eft that barn angegin</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>825</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&icirc;sun uuordun:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;huuat, thu uu&ecirc;st garo&raquo;, [qua{d} he],</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;that ic thar gir&icirc;su,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thar ic bi rehton scal</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuonon an uuilleon,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thar giuuald ha{b}ad</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">m&icirc;n mahtig fader.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thie man ni forst&ocirc;dun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thie uueros an them uu&icirc;ha,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>bihuu&icirc; he s&ocirc; that uuord gisprac,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>830</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gim&ecirc;nda mid is m&ucirc;{d}u:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Maria al biheld,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gibarg an ira breostun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; huuat s&ocirc; siu gih&ocirc;rda ira barn sprecan</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuisaro uuordo.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Giuuitun im th&ocirc; eft [thanan]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fon Hierusalem<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Ioseph endi Maria,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">habdun im te gis&icirc;{d}ea<span class="f_canusg">| </span>sunu drohtines,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>835</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">allaro barno [bezta],<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thero the io [giboran] uur{d}i</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">magu fon m&ocirc;dar:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>habdun im thar minnea t&ocirc;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thurh hluttran hugi,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi he s&ocirc; gih&ocirc;rig uuas,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">godes &ecirc;gan barn<span class="f_canusg">| </span>gadulingm&acirc;gun</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thurh is &ocirc;dm&ocirc;di,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>aldron s&icirc;nun:</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>840</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ni uuelda an is kindiski th&ocirc; noh<span class="f_canusg">| </span>is craft mikil</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">mannun m&acirc;rean,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that he sulic megin &ecirc;hta,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">giuuald an thesaro uueroldi,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ac he im an is uuilleon b&ecirc;d</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">githiudo undar thero thiodu<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thr&icirc;tig g&ecirc;ro,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&ecirc;r than he thar t&ecirc;can &ecirc;nig<span class="f_canusg">| </span>t&ocirc;gean uueldi,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>845</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">seggean them gis&icirc;{d}ea,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that he sel{b}o uuas</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an thesaro middilgard<span class="f_canusg">| </span>manno drohtin.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Habda [im s&ocirc; bihalden]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>h&ecirc;lag barn godes</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuord endi uu&icirc;sd&ocirc;m<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ende allaro giuuitteo m&ecirc;st,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">tulgo sp&acirc;han hugi:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ni mahta [man is] an is spr&acirc;cun uuer{d}an,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>850</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an is uuordun [giuuar],<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that he sulic giuuit &ecirc;hta,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[thegan] sulica gith&acirc;hti,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ac he im s&ocirc; githiudo b&ecirc;d</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">torhtaro t&ecirc;cno.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Ni uuas noh than thiu t&icirc;d cuman,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that he ina o{b}ar thesan middilgard<span class="f_canusg">| </span>m&acirc;rean [scolda],</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">l&ecirc;rian thie liudi,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>huu&ocirc; sie [scoldin] iro gil&ocirc;{b}on haldan,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>855</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuirkean uuilleon godes.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Uuissun that thoh managa</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">liudi aftar them landa,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that he uuas an thit lioht cuman,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thoh sie ina c&ucirc;{d}l&icirc;co<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ankennian ni mahtin,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&ecirc;r than he ina sel{b}o<span class="f_canusg">| </span>seggean uuelda.</h3>
   </td>
  </tr>
</table>
</div>

<h1>Heliand</h1>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h2>Fitte XI</h2>
