    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="50"><h6>&nbsp;</h6></td>
	<td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;">
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;"><span class="f_ruberi">T</span>han uaas im Iohannes<span class="f_canusg">| </span>fon is iugu{d}h&ecirc;di</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>860</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">auuahsan an &ecirc;nero uu&ocirc;stunni;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thar ni uuas uuerodes than m&ecirc;r,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[b&ucirc;tan] that he thar &ecirc;ncora<span class="f_canusg">| </span>alouualdon gode,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thegan thionoda:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>forl&ecirc;t thioda gimang,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">manno gim&ecirc;n{d}on.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thar uuar{d} im mahtig cuman</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an thero uu&ocirc;stunni<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuord fon himila,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>865</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">g&ocirc;dl&icirc;c stemna [godes],<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi Johanne gibod,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that he Cristes cumi<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi is craft mikil</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">o{b}ar thesan middilgard<span class="f_canusg">| </span>m&acirc;rean scoldi;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;t ina uu&acirc;rl&icirc;co<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuordun seggean,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that uu&acirc;ri he{b}anriki<span class="f_canusg">| </span>heli{d}o barnun</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>870</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an them landscepi,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>liudiun gin&acirc;hid,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuelono uunsamost.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Im uuas th&ocirc; uuilleo mikil,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that [he] fon sulicun s&acirc;ldun<span class="f_canusg">| </span>seggean m&ocirc;sti.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Giuu&ecirc;t im th&ocirc; gangan,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>al s&ocirc; Jordan fl&ocirc;t,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuatar an uuilleon,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi them uueroda allan dag,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>875</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">aftar them landscepi<span class="f_canusg">| </span>them liudiun c&ucirc;{d}da,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that sie mid fastunniu<span class="f_canusg">| </span>firinuuerc manag,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">iro sel{b}oro<span class="f_canusg">| </span>sundia b&ocirc;ttin,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;that gi uuer{d}an hr&ecirc;nea&raquo;, qua{d} he.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;He{b}anriki is</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gin&acirc;hid manno barnun.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Nu l&acirc;tad [eu] an euuan m&ocirc;dse{b}on</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>880</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[euuar sel{b}oro]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>sundea hreuuan,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[l&ecirc;das] that gi an thesun liohta [fremidun],<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi m&icirc;nun l&ecirc;run h&ocirc;read,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuendeat aftar m&icirc;nun uuordun.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Ic eu an uuatara scal</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gid&ocirc;pean diurl&icirc;co,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thoh ic euua d&acirc;di ne mugi,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[euuar] sel{b}aro<span class="f_canusg">| </span>sundea al&acirc;tan,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>885</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that gi thurh m&icirc;n handgiuuerc<span class="f_canusg">| </span>hluttra uuer{d}an</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">l&ecirc;{d}aro gil&ecirc;sto:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ac the is an thit lioht cuman,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">mahtig te mannun<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi undar eu middiun st&ecirc;d,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&ndash; thoh gi ina sel{b}un<span class="f_canusg">| </span>gisehan ni [uuillean] &ndash;,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">the eu [gid&ocirc;pean] scal<span class="f_canusg">| </span>an euues drohtines namon</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>890</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an thana [h&acirc;lagon] g&ecirc;st.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>That is h&ecirc;rro o{b}ar al:</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">he mag allaro manno gihuuena<span class="f_canusg">| </span>m&ecirc;ngith&acirc;hteo,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sundeono sicoron,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; huene s&ocirc; s&ocirc; s&acirc;lig m&ocirc;t</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuer{d}en an thesaro uueroldi,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that thes uuilleon ha{b}ad,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that he s&ocirc; gil&ecirc;stea,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; he thesun liudiun uuili,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>895</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gibioden barn godes.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Ic bium an is [bods]kepi herod</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an thesa uuerold cumen<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi scal im thana uueg r&ucirc;mien,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">l&ecirc;rean thesa liudi,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>huu&ocirc; sea [sculin] iro gil&ocirc;{b}on haldan</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thurh hluttran hugi,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi that sie an hellea ni thur{b}in,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">faran an fern that h&ecirc;ta.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thes uuir{d}id s&ocirc; fagan an is m&ocirc;de</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>900</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">man te s&ocirc; managaro [stundu],<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; huue s&ocirc; that m&ecirc;n forl&acirc;tid,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gerno thes gramon anbusni,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ndash; s&ocirc; mag im thes g&ocirc;don giuuirkean,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">huldi he{b}encuninges,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ndash; s&ocirc; huue s&ocirc; ha{b}ad hluttra treuua</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">up te them alomahtigon gode.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Erlos managa</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">bi them l&ecirc;run th&ocirc;,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>liudi uu&acirc;ndun,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>905</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uueros uu&acirc;rl&icirc;co,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that that uualdand Krist</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">selbo uu&acirc;ri,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>huuanda he s&ocirc; filu s&ocirc;{d}es gisprac,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&acirc;roro uuordo.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; uuar{d} that s&ocirc; uu&icirc;do c&ucirc;{d}</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">o{b}ar that forge{b}ana land<span class="f_canusg">| </span>gumono gihuuilicum,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">seggiun [at] iro sel{d}un:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>th&ocirc; qu&acirc;mun ina s&ocirc;kean tharod</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>910</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fon Hierusalem<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Iudeo [liudio]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">bodon fon theru [burgi<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi fr&acirc;godun], ef he uu&acirc;ri that barn godes,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;that h&ecirc;r lango giu&raquo;, qua{d}un sie,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;liudi sagdun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uueros uu&acirc;rl&icirc;co,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that he scoldi an thesa uuerold cuman&raquo;.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Iohannes th&ocirc; gimahalde<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi tegegnes sprac</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>915</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">them bodun baldl&icirc;co:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;ni bium ic&raquo;, qua{d} he, &laquo;that barn godes,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&acirc;r uualdand Krist,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ac ic scal im thana uueg r&ucirc;mien,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;rron m&icirc;numu.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thea heli{d}os frugnun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thea thar an them &acirc;rundie<span class="f_canusg">| </span>erlos uu&acirc;run,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">bodon fon [thero burgi]:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;ef thu [nu] ni bist that barn godes,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>920</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">bist thu than thoh Elias,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>the h&ecirc;r an &ecirc;rdagun</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuas undar thesumu uuerode?<span class="f_canusg">| </span>He is [uuiscumo]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[eft an] thesan middilgard.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Saga &ucirc;s huuat thu manno s&icirc;s!</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Bist thu &ecirc;nig [thero],<span class="f_canusg">| </span>the h&ecirc;r [&ecirc;r] uu&acirc;ri</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[uu&icirc;saro] uu&acirc;rsaguno?<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Huuat sculun uui them uuerode fon thi</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>925</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">seggean te s&ocirc;{d}on?<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Neo h&ecirc;r [&ecirc;r sulic] ni uuar{d}</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an [thesun] middilgard<span class="f_canusg">| </span>man [&ocirc;{d}ar] cuman</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">d&acirc;diun s&ocirc; m&acirc;ri.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Bihuu&icirc; thu h&ecirc;r [d&ocirc;pisli]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[fremis] undar thesumu folke,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ef thu tharo forasagono</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&ecirc;nhuuilic [ni] bist?&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; habde eft garo</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>930</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Iohannes the g&ocirc;do<span class="f_canusg">| </span>glau anduuordi:</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;Ic bium forabodo<span class="f_canusg">| </span>fr&acirc;on m&icirc;nes,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">lio{b}es h&ecirc;rron;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ic scal thit land recon,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thit [uuerod] aftar is uuillion.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Ic hebbiu fon is uuorde mid mi</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">stranga stemna,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thoh sie h&ecirc;r ni uuillie forstandan filo</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>935</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuerodes an thesaro uu&ocirc;stunni.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Ni bium ic mid uuihti gil&icirc;h</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">drohtine m&icirc;numu:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>he is mid is d&acirc;diun s&ocirc; strang,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&ocirc; m&acirc;ri endi s&ocirc; mahtig<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ndash; that uuir{d}id managun c&ucirc;{d},</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuerun aftar thesaro uueroldi<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ndash; that ic thes uuir{d}ig ni bium,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that ic m&ocirc;ti an is giscuoha,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thoh ic s&icirc; is [scalc &ecirc;gan],</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>940</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an s&ocirc; r&icirc;kiumu drohtine,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thea reomon antbindan:</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&ocirc; mikilu is he betara than ic.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Nis thes [bodon] gimaco</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&ecirc;nig o{b}ar er{d}u,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ne nu aftar ni scal</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuer{d}an an thesaro uueroldi.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Hebbiad euuan uuillion tharod,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">liudi euuan gil&ocirc;{b}on:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>than eu [lango scal]</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>945</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[uuesan] euua hugi hr&ocirc;mag;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[than] gi [helligithuuing],</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">forl&acirc;tad l&ecirc;{d}aro dr&ocirc;m<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[endi] s&ocirc;kead eu lioht godes,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">up&ocirc;des h&ecirc;m,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[&ecirc;uuig] r&icirc;ki,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ocirc;han he{b}enuuang.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Ne l&acirc;tad euuan hugi tuu&icirc;flien!&raquo;</h3>
   </td>
  </tr>
</table>
</div>

BIBLIOTHECA AUGUSTANA

<div class="titulus2">
<p>Heliand</p>
<p>um 830</p>
</div>
<!--  finis tituli  -->

<!-- contentus -->
<div class="contentus">
<table width="650" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
  <tr>
	<td width="50">&nbsp;</td>
	<td  width="600">
<h1>Heliand</h1>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h2>Fitte XII</h2>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="650" colspan="2" >
<p style="color:#996699;">______________________________________________________________________________</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="50"><h6>&nbsp;</h6></td>
	<td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;">
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;"><span class="f_ruberi">S</span>&ocirc; sprac th&ocirc; iung gumo<span class="f_canusg">| </span>bi godes l&ecirc;run</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>950</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">mannun te m&acirc;r{d}u.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Manag [samnoda]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[thar] te Bethania<span class="f_canusg">| </span>barn Israheles;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">qu&acirc;mun thar te Iohannese<span class="f_canusg">| </span>cuningo gis&icirc;{d}os,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">liudi te l&ecirc;run<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi iro gil&ocirc;{b}on antfengun.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">He d&ocirc;pte sie dago gihuuilikes<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi im iro d&acirc;di l&ocirc;g,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>955</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uur&ecirc;{d}aro uuillion,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi lo{b}ode im uuord godes,<a name="0958">&nbsp;</a></h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;rron s&icirc;nes:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;He{b}enr&icirc;ki uuir{d}id&raquo;, qua{d} he,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;garu gumono s&ocirc; huuem,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; ti gode thenkid</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">endi an thana [h&ecirc;leand uuili]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>hluttro gil&ocirc;{b}ean,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">l&ecirc;stean is l&ecirc;ra&raquo;.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; ni uuas lang [te] thiu,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>960</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that im fon Galilea giuu&ecirc;t<span class="f_canusg">| </span>godes &ecirc;gan barn,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[diurl&icirc;c drohtines sunu,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>d&ocirc;pi s&ocirc;kean.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Uuas im th&ocirc; an is uuastme<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uualdandes barn],</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">al s&ocirc; he mid thero thiodu<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thr&icirc;tig habdi</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuintro an is uueroldi.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; he an is uuilleon [quam],</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>965</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thar Iohannes<span class="f_canusg">| </span>an [Iordana] str&ocirc;me</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">allan [langan] dag<span class="f_canusg">| </span>liudi manage</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">d&ocirc;pte diurl&icirc;co.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[Reht] s&ocirc; he th&ocirc; is drohtin gisah,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">holden h&ecirc;rron,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; uuar{d} im is hugi bl&icirc;{d}i,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thes im the uuilleo gist&ocirc;d,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi sprac [im th&ocirc;] mid is uuordun t&ocirc;,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>970</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[suu&icirc;{d}o g&ocirc;d gumo,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Iohannes te Kriste:]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;nu cumis thu te m&icirc;nero d&ocirc;pi,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>drohtin fr&ocirc; m&icirc;n,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thiod[gumono bezto]:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; scolde ic te th&icirc;nero duan,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">huuand thu bist allaro cuningo craftigost.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Krist sel{b}o gib&ocirc;d,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uualdand uu&acirc;rl&icirc;co,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that he ni spr&acirc;ki thero uuordo than m&ecirc;r:</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>975</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;uu&ecirc;st thu, that &ucirc;s [s&ocirc;] gir&icirc;sid&raquo;, qua{d} he,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;allaro rehto gihuuilig</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">te gifulleanne<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[for{d}]uuardes nu</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an godes uuilleon&raquo;.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Iohannes st&ocirc;d,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">d&ocirc;pte allan dag<span class="f_canusg">| </span>druhtfolc mikil,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuerod an uuatere<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi &ocirc;k uualdand Krist,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>980</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[h&ecirc;ran] he{b}encuning<span class="f_canusg">| </span>handun s&icirc;nun</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an allaro ba{d}o them [bezton]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi im thar te bedu gihn&ecirc;g<a name="0983">&nbsp;</a></h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an cneo craftag.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Krist up giuu&ecirc;t</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fagar fon them fl&ocirc;de,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>fri{d}ubarn godes,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">liof liudio uuard.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>S&ocirc; he th&ocirc; that land [ofst&ocirc;p],</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>985</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&ocirc; anthlidun th&ocirc; himiles doru,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi quam the h&ecirc;lago g&ecirc;st</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fon them alouualdon<span class="f_canusg">| </span>o{b}ane te Kriste:</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&ndash; uuas im an gil&icirc;cnissie<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[lungres] fugles,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">diurl&icirc;cara d&ucirc;{b}un<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ndash; endi sat im uppan &ucirc;ses drohtines [ahslu],</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[uuonoda] im o{b}ar them uualdandes barne.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Aftar quam thar uuord fon himile,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>990</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hl&ucirc;d fon them [h&ocirc;hon] radura<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[en] gr&ocirc;tta thane h&ecirc;leand sel{b}on,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[Krist], allaro cuningo bezton,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>qua{d} that he ina gicorana habdi</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sel{b}o fon s&icirc;nun r&icirc;kea,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>qua{d} that im the sunu [l&icirc;codi]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">bezt allaro giboranaro manno,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>qua{d} that he im uu&acirc;ri allaro barno <br />lio{b}ost.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">That m&ocirc;ste Iohannes [th&ocirc;],<span class="f_canusg">| </span>al s&ocirc; it god uuelde,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>995</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gisehan endi gih&ocirc;rean.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>He gideda it s&acirc;n aftar thiu</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">mannun [m&acirc;ri],<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that sie thar mahtigna</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;rron habdun:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[&laquo;thit] is&raquo;, qua{d} he, &laquo;he{b}encuninges sunu,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&ecirc;n [alouualdand:]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thesas uuilleo ic urcundeo</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuesan an thesaro uueroldi,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[huuand] it sagda mi uuord godes,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1000</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">drohtines stemne,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>th&ocirc; he mi d&ocirc;pean h&ecirc;t</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uueros an uuatare,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; huuar s&ocirc; ic gis&acirc;hi uu&acirc;rl&icirc;co</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thana [h&ecirc;lagon] g&ecirc;st<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[fan he{b}anuuange</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an thesan middilgard<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ecirc;nigan man uuaron,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">cuman mid craftu;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that qua{d}, that scoldi Crist uuesan,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1005</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">diurl&icirc;c drohtines suno.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>He d&ocirc;pean scal</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an thana h&ecirc;lagan g&ecirc;st]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi h&ecirc;lean managa</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">manno m&ecirc;nd&acirc;di.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>He ha{b}ad thia maht fon gode,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that he al&acirc;tan mag<span class="f_canusg">| </span>liudeo gihuuilicun</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">saca endi sundea.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thit is sel{b}o Krist,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1010</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">godes &ecirc;gan barn,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>gumono bezto,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fri{d}u uui{d} f&icirc;undun.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Uuala that eu thes mag fr&acirc;hm&ocirc;d hugi</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuesan an thesaro uueroldi,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thes eu the uuilleo gist&ocirc;d,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that gi s&ocirc; [libbeanda]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thana landes uuard</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sel{b}on gis&acirc;hun.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Nu m&ocirc;t [sliumo] sundeono l&ocirc;s</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1015</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">manag g&ecirc;st faran<span class="f_canusg">| </span>an godes uuilleon</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">tionon at&ocirc;mid,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>the mid treuuon uuili</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uui{d} is uuini uuirkean<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi an uualdand Krist</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fasto gil&ocirc;{b}ean.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>That scal te [frumun] uuer{d}en</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gumono s&ocirc; huuilicun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; that gerno d&ocirc;t&raquo;.</h3>
   </td>
  </tr>
</table>
</div>

<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">lo{b}oda them liudiun<span class="f_canusg">| </span>l&ecirc;ra Kristes,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;rron sines,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi he{b}enr&icirc;ki</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">te giuuinnanne,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuelono thane m&ecirc;ston,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&acirc;lig sinl&icirc;f.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; he [im] sel{b}o giuu&ecirc;t</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1025</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[aftar them d&ocirc;pislea,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>drohtin the g&ocirc;do],</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an &ecirc;na uu&ocirc;stunnea,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uualdandes sunu;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuas im thar an thero &ecirc;n&ocirc;di<span class="f_canusg">| </span>erlo drohtin</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">lange huu&icirc;la;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ne habda liudeo than m&ecirc;r,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">seggeo te gis&icirc;{d}un,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>al s&ocirc; he im sel{b}o gic&ocirc;s:</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1030</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuelda is thar l&acirc;tan coston<span class="f_canusg">| </span>craftiga uuihti,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sel{b}on Satanasan,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>the gio an sundea spenit,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">man an m&ecirc;nuuerk:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>he consta is m&ocirc;dse{b}on,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uur&ecirc;{d}an uuilleon,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>huu&ocirc; he thesa uuerold &ecirc;rist,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an them anginnea<span class="f_canusg">| </span>irminthioda</h3>

<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&Acirc;daman endi &Ecirc;uan,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thurh untreuua</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">forl&ecirc;dda [mid] luginun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that liudo barn</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">aftar iro hinferdi<span class="f_canusg">| </span>hellea s&ocirc;htun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gumono g&ecirc;stos.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; uuelda that god mahtig,</h3>

<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ocirc;h himilr&icirc;ki:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>bethiu he herod h&ecirc;lagna bodon,</h3>

<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[manno cunnie]:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuelda th&ocirc; mahtigna</h3>

<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[them] he &Acirc;daman<span class="f_canusg">| </span>an &ecirc;rdagun</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">darnungo bidr&ocirc;g,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that he uuar{d} is drohtine l&ecirc;{d},</h3>

</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1055</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">than [langa] ni gidorstun im<span class="f_canusg">| </span>dernea uuihti,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">n&icirc;{d}hugdig f&icirc;und,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>n&acirc;hor gangan,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gr&ocirc;tean ina geginuuar{d}an:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uu&acirc;nde that he [god] &ecirc;nfald,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">for&ucirc;tar mancunnies uuiht<span class="f_canusg">| </span>mahtig uu&acirc;ri,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;leg himiles uuard.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>S&ocirc; he ina th&ocirc; gehungrean l&ecirc;t,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1060</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that ina bigan bi thero mennisko<span class="f_canusg">| </span>m&ocirc;ses lustean</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">aftar them fiuuartig dagun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>the f&icirc;und n&acirc;hor geng,</h3>

<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&acirc;ri uuissungo,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>sprac im th&ocirc; mid is uuordun t&ocirc;,</h3>

</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1065</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;behuu&icirc; ni h&ecirc;tis thu than uuer{d}an,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ef thu giuuald ha{b}es,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">allaro barno bezt,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>br&ocirc;d af thesun st&ecirc;nun?</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[Geh&ecirc;li] th&icirc;nna hungar.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; sprac [eft] the h&ecirc;lago Crist:</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;ni mugun [eldibarn]&raquo;, qua{d} he,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;&ecirc;nfaldes br&ocirc;des,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">liudi libbien,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ac sie sculun thruh l&ecirc;ra godes</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1070</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuesan an thesero uueroldi<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi sculun thiu uuerc frummien,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thea thar uuer{d}ad ahl&ucirc;did<span class="f_canusg">| </span>fon thero h&ecirc;logun tungun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fon them galme godes:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that is gumono l&icirc;f</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">liudeo s&ocirc; [huilicon],<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; that l&ecirc;stean uuili,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that fon uualdandes<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuorde gebiudid.&raquo;</h3>

<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">unhiuri f&icirc;und<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[&ocirc;{d}ru] s&icirc;{d}u,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fandoda is fr&ocirc;han.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>That fri{d}ubarn tholode</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uur&ecirc;{d}es uuilleon<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi [im] giuuald forgaf,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that he umbi is craft mikil<span class="f_canusg">| </span>coston [m&ocirc;sti],</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1080</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">l&ecirc;t ina th&ocirc; l&ecirc;dean<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thana liudsca{d}on,</h3>

</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1085</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;scr&icirc;d [thi te] er{d}u hinan.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Gescri{b}an uuas it giu lango,</h3>

<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that sie thi at [uuege] gehuuem<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuardos sin{d}un,</h3>

<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an hardan st&ecirc;n.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[Th&ocirc;] sprac eft the h&ecirc;lago Crist,</h3>

<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;that thu te hardo ni scalt<span class="f_canusg">| </span>h&ecirc;rran th&icirc;nes,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fandon th&icirc;nes fr&ocirc;han:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that nis thi allaro frumono neg&ecirc;n.&raquo;</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1095</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">L&ecirc;t ina th&ocirc; an thana thriddean s&icirc;{d}<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thana thiodsca{d}on</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gibrengen uppan [&ecirc;nan berg then] h&ocirc;hon:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thar ina the [balouu&icirc;so]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[l&ecirc;t] al o{b}arsehan<span class="f_canusg">| </span>irminthiode,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuonodsaman uuelon<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi uueroldr&icirc;ki</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">endi all sulic &ocirc;des,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; thius er{d}a [biha{b}ad]</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1100</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fagororo frumono,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi sprac im th&ocirc; the f&icirc;und angegin,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">qua{d} that he im that al s&ocirc; g&ocirc;dl&icirc;c<span class="f_canusg">| </span>forge{b}en uueldi,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ocirc;ha herid&ocirc;mos,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;ef thu uuilt hn&icirc;gan te mi,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fallan te m&icirc;nun f&ocirc;tun<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi mi [for] fr&ocirc;han ha{b}as,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">bedos te m&icirc;nun barma.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Than l&acirc;tu ic thi br&ucirc;can uuel</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1105</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">alles [thes] &ocirc;duuelon,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thes ic thi hebbiu gi&ocirc;git h&icirc;r.&raquo;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Th&ocirc; ni uuelda thes l&ecirc;{d}an uuord<span class="f_canusg">| </span>lengeron huu&icirc;le</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ocirc;rean the h&ecirc;lago Crist,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ac he ina [fon] is huldi fordr&ecirc;f,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Satanasan forsuu&ecirc;p,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi s&acirc;n aftar sprac</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">allaro barno bezt,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>qua{d} that man bedon scoldi</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1110</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[up] te them alomahtigon gode<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi [im &ecirc;num thionon]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">suu&icirc;{d}o thiolico<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thegnos managa,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">heli{d}os aftar is huldi:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;thar ist thiu helpa gelang</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">manno gehuuilicun.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; giuu&ecirc;t im the m&ecirc;nsca{d}o,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">suu&icirc;{d}o s&ecirc;ragm&ocirc;d<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Satanas thanan,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1115</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">f&icirc;und undar [fern]dalu.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Uuar{d} thar folc mikil</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fon them alouualdan<span class="f_canusg">| </span>o{b}ana te Criste</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">godes engilo cumen,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thie im s&icirc;{d}or iungard&ocirc;m,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">scoldun ambahtscepi<span class="f_canusg">| </span>aftar l&ecirc;stien,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thionon thiol&icirc;co:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; [scal] man thiodgode,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1120</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;rron [aftar] huldi,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>he{b}ancuninge.</h3>
   </td>
  </tr>
</table>
</div>
<!--  finis contentus  -->

BIBLIOTHECA AUGUSTANA

<div class="titulus2">
<p>Heliand</p>
<p>um 830</p>

<!-- contentus -->
<div class="contentus">
<table width="650" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
  <tr>
	<td width="50">&nbsp;</td>
	<td  width="600">
<h1>Heliand</h1>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h2>Fitte XIV</h2>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="650" colspan="2" >
<p style="color:#996699;">______________________________________________________________________________</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="50"><h6>&nbsp;</h6></td>
	<td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;">
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;"><span class="f_ruberi">U</span>uas im [an] them sinuueldi<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&acirc;lig barn godes</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">lange hu&icirc;le,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>untthat im th&ocirc; [lio{b}ora] uuar{d},</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that he is craft mikil<span class="f_canusg">| </span>c&ucirc;{d}ien uuolda</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uueroda te uuillion.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; forl&ecirc;t he uualdes hl&ecirc;o,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1125</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&ecirc;n&ocirc;dies ard<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi s&ocirc;hte im eft erlo gemang,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">m&acirc;ri meginthiode<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi manno dr&ocirc;m,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">geng im th&ocirc; bi [Iordanes] sta{d}e:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thar ina Iohannes antfand,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that fri{d}ubarn godes,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>fr&ocirc;han s&icirc;nan,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;lagana he{b}encuning,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi them heli{d}un sagda,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1130</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Iohannes is iungurun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>th&ocirc; he ina gangan gesah:</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;thit is that lamb godes,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that thar l&ocirc;sean scal</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">af thesaro uu&icirc;don uuerold<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uur&ecirc;{d}a sundea,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">mancunneas m&ecirc;n,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>m&acirc;ri drohtin,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">cuningo craftigost.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Krist im for{d} giuu&ecirc;t</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1135</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an Galileo land,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>godes &ecirc;gan barn,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">f&ocirc;r im te them friundun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thar he af&ocirc;dit uuas,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">t&icirc;rl&icirc;co atogan,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi talda mid uuordun</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Krist undar is cunnie,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>cuningo r&icirc;keost,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">huu&ocirc; sie scoldin iro sel{b}oro<span class="f_canusg">| </span>sundea b&ocirc;tean,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1140</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;t that sie im iro harmuuerc manag<span class="f_canusg">| </span>hreuuan l&ecirc;tin,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[feldin] iro firind&acirc;di:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;nu is it all gefullot s&ocirc;,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&ocirc; h&icirc;r alde man<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ecirc;r huuanna spr&acirc;cun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">geh&ecirc;tun eu te helpu<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[he{b}enr&icirc;ki]:</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">nu is it [giu] gin&acirc;hid thurh thes neriandan craft:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thes m&ocirc;tun gi neotan for{d},</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1145</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&ocirc; huue s&ocirc; gerno uuili<span class="f_canusg">| </span>gode theonogean,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuirkean aftar is uuilleon.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; uuar{d} thes uuerodes [filu],</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thero liudeo an lustun:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uur{d}un im thea l&ecirc;ra Cristes,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&ocirc; su&ocirc;tea them gis&icirc;{d}ea.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>He bigan im samnon th&ocirc;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[gumono] te iungoron,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>g&ocirc;doro manno,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1150</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuordsp&acirc;ha uueros.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Geng im th&ocirc; bi &ecirc;nes uuatares sta{d}e,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that [thar] habda Iordan<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ane{b}an Galileo land</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&ecirc;nna s&ecirc; geuuarhtan.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thar he sittean fand</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Andreas endi Petrus<span class="f_canusg">| </span>bi them ahastr&ocirc;me,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">b&ecirc;{d}ea thea gebr&ocirc;{d}ar,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thar sie an br&ecirc;d uuatar</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1155</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">suu&icirc;{d}o niudl&icirc;co<span class="f_canusg">| </span>netti thenidun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fiscodun im an them fl&ocirc;de.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thar sie that fri{d}ubarn godes</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">bi thes s&ecirc;es sta{d}e<span class="f_canusg">| </span>sel{b}o [gr&ocirc;tta],</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;t that sie im folgodin,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>qua{d} that he [im] s&ocirc; filu uuoldi</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">godes r&icirc;keas forge{b}en;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;[al] s&ocirc; git h&icirc;r an [Iordanes] str&ocirc;me</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1160</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fiscos [f&acirc;hat],<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; sculun git noh firiho barn</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">halon te incun handun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that sie an he{b}enr&icirc;ki</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thurh inca l&ecirc;ra<span class="f_canusg">| </span>l&icirc;{d}an m&ocirc;tin,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">faran folc manag.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; uuar{d} fr&ocirc;m&ocirc;d hugi</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">b&ecirc;{d}iun them gibr&ocirc;{d}run:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>antkendun that barn godes,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1165</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">lio{b}an h&ecirc;rron:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>forl&ecirc;tun al [saman]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Andreas endi Petrus,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; huuat s&ocirc; sie bi theru ahu habdun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[geuunstes] bi them uuatare:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuas im uuilleo mikil,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that sie mid them godes barne<span class="f_canusg">| </span>gangan m&ocirc;stin,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">samad an is gis&icirc;{d}ea,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>scoldun s&acirc;ligl&icirc;co</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1170</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">l&ocirc;n antf&acirc;han:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; d&ocirc;t liudeo so huuilic,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&ocirc; thes h&ecirc;rran uuili<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[huldi] githionon,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">geuuirkean is uuilleon.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; sie bi thes uuatares sta{d}e</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fur{d}or qu&acirc;mun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>th&ocirc; fundun sie [thar] &ecirc;nna fr&ocirc;dan man</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sittean bi them s&ecirc;uua<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi is suni tuu&ecirc;ne,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1175</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Iacobus endi Iohannes:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uu&acirc;run im iunga man.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">S&acirc;tun im th&acirc; gesunfader<span class="f_canusg">| </span>an &ecirc;numu sande uppen,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">brugdun endi b&ocirc;ttun<span class="f_canusg">| </span>b&ecirc;{d}ium handun</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thiu netti niudl&icirc;co,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thea sie habdun nahtes &ecirc;r</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">forsliten an them s&ecirc;uua.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thar sprac im sel{b}o t&ocirc;</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1180</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&acirc;lig barn godes,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>h&ecirc;t that sie an thana s&icirc;{d} mid im,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Iacobus endi Iohannes,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>gengin b&ecirc;{d}ie,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">kindiunge man.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; uu&acirc;run im Kristes uuord</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&ocirc; [uuir{d}ig] an thesaro uueroldi,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that sie bi thes uuatares sta{d}e</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">iro aldan fader<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ecirc;nna forl&ecirc;tun,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1185</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fr&ocirc;dan bi them fl&ocirc;de,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi al that sie thar fehas &ecirc;htun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">nettiu endi neglitskipu,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>gecurun [im] thana neriandan Krist,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;lagna te h&ecirc;rron,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuas im [is helpono] tharf</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[te githiononne:]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; is allaro thegno gehuuem,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuero an thesero uueroldi.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; giuu&ecirc;t im the uualdandes sunu</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1190</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">mid them fiuuariun for{d},<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi im th&ocirc; thana f&icirc;fton gic&ocirc;s</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Krist an &ecirc;nero c&ocirc;pstedi,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>cuninges iungoron,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">m&ocirc;dsp&acirc;hana man:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Mattheus uuas he h&ecirc;tan,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuas im ambahteo<span class="f_canusg">| </span>e{d}ilero manno,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">scolda thar te is h&ecirc;rron<span class="f_canusg">| </span>handun antf&acirc;han</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1195</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">tins endi [tolna];<span class="f_canusg">| </span>treuua habda he g&ocirc;da,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&acirc;{d}alandb&acirc;ri:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>forl&ecirc;t al [saman]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gold endi silu{b}ar<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi ge{b}a managa,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">diurie m&ecirc;{d}mos,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi uuar{d} im &ucirc;ses drohtines man;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">c&ocirc;s im the cuninges [thegn]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Crist te h&ecirc;rran,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1200</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[milderan m&ecirc;{d}om]ge{b}on,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>than &ecirc;r is [mandrohtin]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[un&acirc;ri] an thesero uueroldi:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>feng im uu&ocirc;{d}era thing,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">langsamoron r&acirc;d.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; uuar{d} it allun them liudiun c&ucirc;{d},</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fon allaro burgo gihuuem,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>huu&ocirc; that barn godes</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">samnode ges&icirc;{d}os<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi sel{b}o gesprac</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1205</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&ocirc; manag uu&icirc;sl&icirc;c uuord<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi uu&acirc;res s&ocirc; filu,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">torhtes git&ocirc;gde<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi t&ecirc;can manag</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">geuuarhte an thesero uueroldi.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Uuas that an is uuordun sc&icirc;n</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">iac an is d&acirc;diun s&ocirc; same,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that he drohtin uuas,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">himilisc h&ecirc;rro<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi te helpu quam</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1210</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an thesan middilgard<span class="f_canusg">| </span>manno barnun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">liudiun te thesun liohta.<span class="f_canusg">| </span></h3>
   </td>
  </tr>

<div class="bibliotheca">
BIBLIOTHECA AUGUSTANA
</div>
<div class="titulus1">
<p>&nbsp;</p>
</div>
<div class="titulus2">
<p>Heliand</p>
<p>um 830</p>
</div>
<!--  finis tituli  -->

<!-- contentus -->
<div class="contentus">
<table width="650" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
  <tr>
	<td width="50">&nbsp;</td>
	<td  width="600">
<h1>Heliand</h1>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h2>Fitte XV</h2>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="650" colspan="2" >
<p style="color:#996699;">______________________________________________________________________________</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="50"><h6>&nbsp;</h6></td>
	<td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;">
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:200px;"><span class="f_canusg">| </span><span class="f_ruberi">O</span>ft gededa he that an them lande sc&icirc;n,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">than he thar [torhl&icirc;co<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; manag] t&ecirc;can giuuarhte,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thar he h&ecirc;lde mid is handun<span class="f_canusg">| </span>halte endi [blinde],</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">l&ocirc;sde af theru l&ecirc;fh&ecirc;di<span class="f_canusg">| </span>liudi manage,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1215</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">af sulicun suhtiun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; than allaro su&acirc;roston</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an firiho [barn]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>f&icirc;und biuurpun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">tulgo langsam legar.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; f&ocirc;run thar thie liudi t&ocirc;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">allaro dago gehuuilikes,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thar &ucirc;sa drohtin uuas</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sel{b}o undar them gis&icirc;{d}ie,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>untthat thar gesamnod uuar{d}</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1220</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">meginfolc mikil<span class="f_canusg">| </span>managero thiodo,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thoh sie thar [alle be gel&icirc;cumu<span class="f_canusg">| </span>gel&ocirc;{b}on ni qu&acirc;min.]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uueros thurh &ecirc;nan uuilleon:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>sume s&ocirc;htun sie that uualdandes barn,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">armoro manno filu<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ndash; uuas [im] &acirc;tes tharf &ndash;,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that sie im thar [at] theru menigi<span class="f_canusg">| </span>mates endi drankes,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1225</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[thigidin at] theru thiodu;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>huuand thar uuas manag thegan s&ocirc; g&ocirc;d,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thie ira alamosnie<span class="f_canusg">| </span>armun mannun</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gerno g&acirc;{b}un.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Sume uu&acirc;run sie im eft Iudeono cunnies,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">f&ecirc;gni folcskepi:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uu&acirc;run [thar] gefarana te thiu,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that sie &ucirc;ses drohtines<span class="f_canusg">| </span>d&acirc;dio endi uuordo</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1230</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">f&acirc;ron [uuoldun],<span class="f_canusg">| </span>habdun im [f&ecirc;gnien] hugi,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uur&ecirc;{d}en uuillion:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuoldun uualdand Crist</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">al&ecirc;dien them liudiun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that sie is l&ecirc;ron ni h&ocirc;rdin,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ne [uuendin] aftar is uuillion.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Suma uu&acirc;run sie im eft s&ocirc; uu&icirc;se man,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&acirc;run [im] glauuue gumon<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi gode uuer{d}e,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1235</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">alesane undar them liudiun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>qu&acirc;mun im [tharod] be them l&ecirc;ron Cristes,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that sie is h&ecirc;lag uuord<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[h&ocirc;rien] m&ocirc;stin,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">l&icirc;non endi l&ecirc;stien:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>habdun mid iro gel&ocirc;{b}on te im</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fasto [gefangen],<span class="f_canusg">| </span>habdun im ferhten hugi,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuur{d}un is thegnos te thiu,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that he sie an thioduuelon</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1240</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">aftar iro &ecirc;ndagon<span class="f_canusg">| </span>up gebr&acirc;hti,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an godes [r&icirc;ki].<span class="f_canusg">| </span>He s&ocirc; gerno antfeng</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">mancunnies manag<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi mundburd gih&ecirc;t</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">te langaru hu&icirc;lu,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[endi] mahta s&ocirc; gil&ecirc;stien uuel.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Th&ocirc; uuar{d} thar megin s&ocirc; mikil<span class="f_canusg">| </span>umbi thana [m&acirc;rion] Crist,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1245</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">liudio gesamnod:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>th&ocirc; [gisah he] fon allun landun cuman,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fon allun uu&icirc;dun uuegun<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuerod tesamne</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[lungro] liudio:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>is lof uuas s&ocirc; uu&icirc;do</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">managun gem&acirc;rid.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; giuu&ecirc;t im mahtig self</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an &ecirc;nna berg uppan,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>barno r&icirc;kiost,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1250</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sundar gesittien,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi im sel{b}o gec&ocirc;s</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">tuueli{b}i getalda,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>treuuafta man,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">g&ocirc;doro gumono,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thea he im te iungoron for{d}</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">allaro dago gehuuilikes,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>drohtin uuelda</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an is ges&icirc;{d}skepea<span class="f_canusg">| </span>simblon hebbean.</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1255</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Nemnida sie th&ocirc; bi naman<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi h&ecirc;t sie [im th&ocirc;] n&acirc;hor gangan,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Andreas endi Petrus<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ecirc;rist s&acirc;na,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gebr&ocirc;{d}ar tuu&ecirc;ne,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi b&ecirc;{d}ie mid im,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Iacobus endi Iohannes:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>sie uu&acirc;run gode [uuer{d}e];</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">mildi uuas he [im] an is m&ocirc;de;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>sie uu&acirc;run &ecirc;nes mannes suni</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1260</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">b&ecirc;{d}ie bi geburdiun;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>sie [c&ocirc;s] that barn godes</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">g&ocirc;de te iungoron<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi gumono filu,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">m&acirc;riero manno:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Mattheus endi Thomas,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Iudasas tuu&ecirc;na<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi Iacob &ocirc;{d}ran,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">is sel{b}es suuiri:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>sie uu&acirc;run fon [gisustruonion] tuu&ecirc;m</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1265</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">cn&ocirc;sles cumana,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Krist endi Iacob,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">g&ocirc;de gadulingos.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; habda thero gumono thar</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">the neriendo Krist<span class="f_canusg">| </span>niguni getalde,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">treuuafte man:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>th&ocirc; h&ecirc;t he &ocirc;c thana tehandon gangan</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[sel{b}o] mid them gis&icirc;{d}un:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>S&icirc;mon uuas he h&ecirc;tan;</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1270</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;t &ocirc;c Bartholomeus<span class="f_canusg">| </span>an thana berg uppan</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">faran [fan] them folke &acirc;{d}rum<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi Philippus mid im,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">treuuafte man.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; gengun sie tuueli{b}i samad,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">rincos te theru r&ucirc;nu,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thar [the] r&acirc;dand sat,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">managoro mundboro,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>the allumu mancunnie</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1275</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uui{d} hellie gethuuing<span class="f_canusg">| </span>helpan uuelde,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">formon uui{d} them ferne,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; huuem s&ocirc; frummien uuili</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&ocirc; lio{b}l&icirc;ka l&ecirc;ra,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; he them liudiun thar</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thurh is giuuit mikil<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[uu&icirc;sean] hogda.</h3>
   </td>
  </tr>
</table>
</div>

<div class="bibliotheca">
BIBLIOTHECA AUGUSTANA
</div>
<div class="titulus1">
<p>&nbsp;</p>
</div>
<div class="titulus2">
<p>Heliand</p>
<p>um 830</p>
</div>
