<!-- contentus -->
<div class="contentus">
<table width="650" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
  <tr>
	<td width="50">&nbsp;</td>
	<td  width="600">
<h1>Heliand</h1>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h2>Fitte XVI</h2>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="650" colspan="2" >
<p style="color:#996699;">______________________________________________________________________________</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="50"><h6>&nbsp;</h6></td>
	<td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;">
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;"><span class="f_ruberi">T</span>h&ocirc; umbi thana [neriendon] Krist<span class="f_canusg">| </span>n&acirc;hor gengun</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1280</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sulike ges&icirc;{d}os,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; he im sel{b}o gec&ocirc;s,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uualdand undar them uuerode.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>St&ocirc;dun uu&icirc;sa man,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gumon umbi thana godes sunu<span class="f_canusg">| </span>gerno suu&icirc;{d}o,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uueros an uuilleon:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuas im thero uuordo niud,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">th&acirc;htun endi thagodun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>huuat im [thero] thiodo drohtin,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1285</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uueldi uualdand self<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuordun c&ucirc;{d}ien</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thesum liudiun te [lio{b}e].<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Than sat im the landes hirdi</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">geginuuard for them gumun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>godes &ecirc;gan barn:</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[uuelda] mid is spr&acirc;cun<span class="f_canusg">| </span>sp&acirc;huuord manag</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">l&ecirc;rean thea liudi,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[huu&ocirc;] sie lof gode</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1290</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an thesum uueroldr&icirc;kea<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuirkean scoldin.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Sat im th&ocirc; endi suu&icirc;goda<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi sah sie an lango,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuas im hold an is hugi<span class="f_canusg">| </span>h&ecirc;lag drohtin,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">mildi an is m&ocirc;de,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi th&ocirc; [is] mund antl&ocirc;c,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&icirc;sde [mid] uuordun<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uualdandes sunu</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1295</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">manag m&acirc;rl&icirc;c thing<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi them [mannum sagde]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sp&acirc;hun uuordun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>them the he te theru spr&acirc;cu [tharod],<a name="1299">&nbsp;</a></h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Krist alouualdo,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>gecoran habda,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">huuilike uu&acirc;rin allaro<span class="f_canusg">| </span>irminmanno</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gode uuer{d}oston<span class="f_canusg">| </span>gumono cunnies;</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1300</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sagde im th&ocirc; te [s&ocirc;{d}an],<span class="f_canusg">| </span>qua{d} that thie s&acirc;liga uu&acirc;rin,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">man an thesoro middil[gardun],<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thie h&ecirc;r an iro m&ocirc;de uu&acirc;rin</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;"> hurh &ocirc;dm&ocirc;di:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;them is that [&ecirc;uuana] r&icirc;ki,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">suu&icirc;{d}o h&ecirc;lagl&icirc;c<span class="f_canusg">| </span>an he{b}anuuange</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sinl&icirc;f farge{b}en.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Qua{d} that &ocirc;c s&acirc;lige uu&acirc;rin</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1305</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">m&acirc;{d}mundie man:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;thie m&ocirc;tun thie m&acirc;rion er{d}e,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[ofsittien] that sel{b}e r&icirc;ki.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Qua{d} [that] &ocirc;c s&acirc;lige uu&acirc;rin,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thie h&icirc;r [uuiopin] iro uuammun d&acirc;di;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;thie m&ocirc;tun eft uuillion geb&icirc;dan,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fr&ocirc;fre [an iro fr&acirc;hon r&icirc;kia].<span class="f_canusg">| </span>S&acirc;lige sind &ocirc;c, the sie h&icirc;r frumono [gilustid],</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">rincos, that [sie] rehto ad&ocirc;mien.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thes m&ocirc;tun sie uuer{d}an an them r&icirc;kia drohtines</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1310</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gifullit thurh iro ferhton d&acirc;di:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>sul&icirc;coro m&ocirc;tun sie frumono bicn&ecirc;gan</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thie rincos, thie h&icirc;r rehto [ad&ocirc;miad],<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ne uuilliad an [r&ucirc;nun] besuu&icirc;can</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">man, thar sie [at] mahle [sittiad].<span class="f_canusg">| </span>S&acirc;lige sind &ocirc;c them h&icirc;r mildi uuir{d}it</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hugi an heli{d}o briostun:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>them uuir{d}it the h&ecirc;lego drohtin,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">mildi mahtig sel{b}o.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>S&acirc;lige sind &ocirc;c undar thesaro managon thiodu,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1315</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[thie] hebbiad iro herta [gihr&ecirc;nod]:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thie m&ocirc;tun thane he{b}enes uualdand</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sehan an s&icirc;num r&icirc;kea.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Qua{d} [that &ocirc;c] s&acirc;lige uu&acirc;rin,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;thie [the] fri{d}u[sama] undar thesumu [folke] libbiad<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi ni uuilliad &ecirc;niga fehta geuuirken,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">saca mid iro sel{b}oro [d&acirc;diun]:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thie m&ocirc;tun uuesan suni drohtines [genemnide],</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">huuande he im [uuil] gen&acirc;dig uuer{d}en;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thes m&ocirc;tun sie niotan lango</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1320</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sel{b}on [thes] s&icirc;nes r&icirc;kies.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Qua{d} that &ocirc;c s&acirc;lige uu&acirc;rin</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thie rincos, the rehto uueldin,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;endi thurh that tholod r&icirc;kioro manno</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">heti endi harmquidi:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>them is &ocirc;c an [himile eft]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[godes] uuang forge{b}en<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi g&ecirc;stl&icirc;c l&icirc;f</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">aftar te &ecirc;uuandage,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; [is] io endi ni cumit,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1325</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[uuelan uunsames].&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>S&ocirc; habde th&ocirc; uualdand Crist</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">for them erlon thar<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ahto getalda</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&acirc;lda gesagda;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>mid them scal simbla gihuue</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">himilr&icirc;k [gehalon],<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ef he it hebbien uuili,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[ettho] he scal te &ecirc;uuandaga<span class="f_canusg">| </span>aftar thar{b}on</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1330</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuelon endi uuillion,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&icirc;{d}or he these uuerold agi{b}id,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">er{d}[l&icirc;bi]giscapu,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi s&ocirc;kit im &ocirc;{d}ar lioht</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&ocirc; liof s&ocirc; l&ecirc;{d},<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; he mid thesun liudiun h&ecirc;r</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">giuuercod an thesoro uueroldi,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>al s&ocirc; it thar th&ocirc; mid is uuordun sagde</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Crist alouualdo,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>cuningo r&icirc;kiost</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1335</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">godes &ecirc;gen barn<span class="f_canusg">| </span>iungorun s&icirc;nun:</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;Ge uuer{d}at &ocirc;c [s&ocirc;] s&acirc;lige&raquo;, qua{d} he,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;thes iu saca [biodat]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">liudi aftar theson lande<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi l&ecirc;{d} [sprecat],</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hebbiad iu te [hosca]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi harmes filu</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">geuuirkiad an thesoro uueroldi<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi uu&icirc;ti gefrummiad,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1340</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">felgiad iu firinspr&acirc;ka<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi f&icirc;undscepi,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[l&acirc;gniad] iuuua l&ecirc;ra,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>d&ocirc;t iu l&ecirc;{d}es [filu],</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">harmes thurh [iuuuen] h&ecirc;rron.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thes l&acirc;tad gi euuan hugi [simbla],</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">l&icirc;f an lustun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>huuand iu that l&ocirc;n stendit</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an godes r&icirc;kia garu,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>g&ocirc;do gehuuilikes,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1345</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">mikil endi managfald:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that is iu te m&ecirc;du farge{b}en,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">huuand gi h&ecirc;r &ecirc;r biforan<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ar{b}id tholodun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&icirc;ti an thesoro uueroldi.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Uuirs is them &ocirc;{d}run,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[gi{b}i{d}ig] grimmora thing,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>them the h&ecirc;r g&ocirc;d &ecirc;gun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[uu&icirc;dan] uuorolduuelon:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thie forsl&icirc;tat iro uunnia h&ecirc;r;</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1350</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">geniudot sie gen&ocirc;ges,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>sculun eft narouuaro thing</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">aftar iro hinferdi<span class="f_canusg">| </span>heli{d}os [tholoian].</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Than [uu&ocirc;pian] thar uuanscefti,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thie h&ecirc;r &ecirc;r an uunnion [s&icirc;n],</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">libbiad an [allon] lustun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ne uuilliad thes farl&acirc;tan uuiht,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">m&ecirc;nigith&acirc;htio,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thes sie an iro m&ocirc;d spenit,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1355</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">l&ecirc;{d}oro gil&ecirc;stio.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Than im that l&ocirc;n cumid,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">u{b}il ar{b}etsam,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>than sie is thane endi sculun</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sorgondi gesehan.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Than uuir{d}id im s&ecirc;r hugi,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[thes sie] thesero uueroldes s&ocirc; filu<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuillean fulgengun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">man an iro m&ocirc;dse{b}on.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Nu sculun gi im that m&ecirc;n lahan,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1360</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuerean mid uuordun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>al s&ocirc; ic giu nu geuu&icirc;sean mag,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">seggean s&ocirc;{d}l&icirc;co,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ges&icirc;{d}os m&icirc;ne,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&acirc;run uuordun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that gi thesoro uueroldes nu [for{d}]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[sculun salt uuesan,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>sundigero manno],</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[b&ocirc;tian] iro balud&acirc;di,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that sie [an] betara thing,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1365</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">folc farf&acirc;han<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi forl&acirc;tan f&icirc;undes giuuerk,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">diu{b}ales ged&acirc;di,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi s&ocirc;kean iro drohtines r&icirc;ki.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">S&ocirc; sculun gi mid iuuuon l&ecirc;run<span class="f_canusg">| </span>liudfolc manag</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuendean aftar m&icirc;non uuilleon.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Ef iuuuar than auuir{d}id huuilic,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">farl&acirc;tid thea l&ecirc;ra,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thea he l&ecirc;stean scal,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1370</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">than is im s&ocirc; them salte,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[the] man bi s&ecirc;es sta{d}e</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&icirc;do teuuirpit:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>than it te uuihti ni d&ocirc;g,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ac it firiho barn<span class="f_canusg">| </span>f&ocirc;tun spurnat,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gumon an greote.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>S&ocirc; uuir{d}id them, the that godes uuord [scal]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">mannum m&acirc;rean:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ef he im than l&acirc;tid is m&ocirc;d tuuehon,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1375</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[that hi ne uuillea mid hluttro hugi<span class="f_canusg">| </span>te] he{b}enr&icirc;kea</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">spanen mid is spr&acirc;cu<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi seggean spel godes,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ac uuenkid thero uuordo,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>than uuir{d}id im uualdand gram,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">mahtig m&ocirc;dag,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi s&ocirc; samo manno barn;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuir{d}id allun [than]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>irminthiodun,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1380</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">liudiun al&ecirc;{d}id,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ef [is] l&ecirc;ra ni [dugun].&raquo;</h3>
   </td>
  </tr>
</table>

<p>Heliand</p>
<p>um 830</p>

<div class="contentus">
<table width="650" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
  <tr>
	<td width="50">&nbsp;</td>
	<td  width="600">
<h1>Heliand</h1>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h2>Fitte XVII</h2>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="650" colspan="2" >
<p style="color:#996699;">______________________________________________________________________________</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="50"><h6>&nbsp;</h6></td>
	<td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;">
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;"><span class="f_ruberi">S</span>o sprac he [th&ocirc;] sp&acirc;hl&icirc;co<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi sagda spel godes,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">l&ecirc;rde the landes uuard<span class="f_canusg">| </span>liudi s&icirc;ne</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">mid hluttru hugi.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Heli{d}os st&ocirc;dun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gumon umbi thana godes sunu<span class="f_canusg">| </span>gerno su&icirc;{d}o,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1385</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uueros an uuilleon:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuas im thero uuordo niud,</h3>

<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">huuer{b}e mid s&ocirc; h&ecirc;lun<span class="f_canusg">| </span>an helligrund.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Than m&ecirc;nid thiu [l&ecirc;fh&ecirc;d],<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that &ecirc;nig liudeo ni scal</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">farfolgan is friunde,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ef he ina an firina spanit,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">su&acirc;s man an saca:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[than ne s&icirc; he imu eo s&ocirc; suu&icirc;{d}o an sibbiun bilang],</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1495</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[ne] iro m&acirc;gskepi s&ocirc; mikil,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ef he ina an mor{d} spenit,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">b&ecirc;did baluuuerco;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>betera is imu than &ocirc;{d}ar,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that he thana friund fan imu<span class="f_canusg">| </span>fer faruuerpa,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">m&icirc;{d}e thes m&acirc;ges<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi ni hebbea thar &ecirc;niga [minnea] t&ocirc;,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that he m&ocirc;ti &ecirc;no<span class="f_canusg">| </span>up gest&icirc;gan</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1500</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ocirc; himilr&icirc;ki,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>than sie [helligethuing],</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">br&ecirc;d baluuu&icirc;ti<span class="f_canusg">| </span>b&ecirc;{d}ea gis&ocirc;kean,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">u{b}il ar{b}idi.<span class="f_canusg">| </span></h3>
   </td>
  </tr>
</table>
</div>

<table width="650" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
  <tr>
	<td width="50">&nbsp;</td>
	<td  width="600">
<h1>Heliand</h1>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h2>Fitte XVIII</h2>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="650" colspan="2" >
<p style="color:#996699;">______________________________________________________________________________</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="50"><h6>&nbsp;</h6></td>
	<td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;">
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:200px;"><span class="f_canusg">| </span><span class="f_ruberi">&Ocirc;</span>c is an them &ecirc;o gescri{b}an</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&acirc;run uuordun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; gi uuitun alle,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that m&icirc;{d}e m&ecirc;n&ecirc;{d}os<span class="f_canusg">| </span>mancunnies gehuuilic,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1505</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ni forsuerie ina sel{b}on,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[huuand] that is sundie te mikil,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">farl&ecirc;did [liudi]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>an l&ecirc;{d}an uueg.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Than uuilleo ic iu eft seggean,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>than s&acirc;n ni suerea neoman</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&ecirc;nigan &ecirc;{d}staf<span class="f_canusg">| </span>eldibarno,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ne bi himile themu h&ocirc;hon,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>huuand that is thes h&ecirc;rron st&ocirc;l,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1510</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ne bi er{d}u thar undar,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>huuand that is thes alouualdon</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fagar f&ocirc;tscamel,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>nec &ecirc;nig firiho barno</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ne suuerea bi is sel{b}es h&ocirc;{b}de,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>huuand he ni mag thar ne suuart ne huu&icirc;t</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&ecirc;nig h&acirc;r geuuirkean,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[b&ucirc;tan] s&ocirc; it the h&ecirc;lago god,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gemarcode [mahtig];<span class="f_canusg">| </span>bethiu sculun [m&icirc;{d}an] filu</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1515</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">erlos &ecirc;{d}uuordo.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>S&ocirc; huue s&ocirc; it ofto d&ocirc;t,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&ocirc; uuir{d}id is simbla uuirsa,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>huuand he [imu] giuuardon ni mag.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Bithiu scal ic iu nu te uu&acirc;run<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuordun gibeodan,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that gi neo ne suerien<span class="f_canusg">| </span>suu&icirc;{d}oron &ecirc;{d}os,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">m&ecirc;ron met mannun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[b&ucirc;tan] s&ocirc; ic iu mid m&icirc;nun h&ecirc;r</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1520</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">suu&icirc;{d}o [uu&acirc;rlico]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuordun [gebiudu]:</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ef man huuemu saca s&ocirc;kea,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[biseggea] that uu&acirc;re,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">que{d}e i&acirc;, gef it s&icirc;,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>geha thes thar uu&acirc;r is,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">que{d}e n&ecirc;n, af it nis,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[l&acirc;ta] im gen&ocirc;g an thiu;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&ocirc; huat s&ocirc; is m&ecirc;r o{b}ar that<span class="f_canusg">| </span>man gefrummiad,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1525</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&ocirc; cumid it [al] fan u{b}ile<span class="f_canusg">| </span>eldibarnun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that erl thurh untreuua<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ocirc;{d}res ni uili</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[uuordo] gel&ocirc;{b}ian.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Than seggio ic iu te uu&acirc;ron &ocirc;c,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[huu&ocirc;] it thar an them aldon<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ecirc;o gebiudit:</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&ocirc; hue s&ocirc; &ocirc;gon genimid<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ocirc;{d}res mannes,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1530</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">l&ocirc;sid af is l&icirc;chaman,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ettha is li{d}o huilican,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that he it eft mid is sel{b}es scal<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&acirc;n antgelden</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">mid gel&icirc;cun li{d}ion.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Than uuillio ic iu l&ecirc;rian nu,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that gi s&ocirc; ni [uurecan]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uur&ecirc;{d}a d&acirc;di,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ac [that] gi thurh &ocirc;dm&ocirc;di<span class="f_canusg">| </span>al gethologian</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1535</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&icirc;ties endi uuammes,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; huat s&ocirc; man iu an thesoro uueroldi ged&ocirc;e.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">D&ocirc;e alloro [erlo] gehuilic<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ocirc;{d}rom manne</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">frume endi gef&ocirc;ri,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; he uuillie, that im firiho barn</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">g&ocirc;des angegin d&ocirc;en.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Than uuir{d}it im god mildi,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">liudio s&ocirc; huilicum,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; that l&ecirc;stien uuili.</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1540</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&Ecirc;rod gi [arme man],<span class="f_canusg">| </span>d&ecirc;liad iuuan &ocirc;duuelon</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">undar thero thurftigon thiodu;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ne r&ocirc;kead, huue{d}ar gi [is &ecirc;nigan thanc antf&acirc;han]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[eftho l&ocirc;n an thesoro l&ecirc;hneon uueroldi,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ac huggeat te iuuuomu leo{b}on h&ecirc;rran]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thero ge{b}ono te gelde,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that sie iu god l&ocirc;no,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">mahtig mundboro,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; huuat s&ocirc; gi is thurh is minnes [gid&ocirc;t].</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1545</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Ef thu than ge{b}ogean uuili<span class="f_canusg">| </span>g&ocirc;dun mannun</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fagare fehoscattos,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thar thu [eft] frumono hugis</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">m&ecirc;r antf&acirc;han,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>te huu&icirc; ha{b}as thu thes &ecirc;niga m&ecirc;da fon gode</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ettha l&ocirc;n an [themu] is liohte?<span class="f_canusg">| </span>huuand [that] is l&ecirc;hni feho.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">S&ocirc; is thes alles gehuuat,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[the] thu &ocirc;{d}run geduos</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1550</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[liudeon] te leo{b}e,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thar [thu] hugis eft gel&icirc;c neman</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thero uuordo endi thero uuerco:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>te huu&icirc; uu&ecirc;t thi thes [&ucirc;sa] uualdand thanc,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thes thu th&icirc;n s&ocirc; bifilhis<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi [antf&acirc;his] eft than thu uuili?</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[Iuuuan &ocirc;{d}uuelon<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ge{b}an gi them armun mannun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">the ina iu an thesoro uueroldi ne l&ocirc;non<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi r&ocirc;mot te iuuues uualdandes r&icirc;kea.]</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1555</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Te hl&ucirc;d ni d&ocirc; thu [it],<span class="f_canusg">| </span>than thu mid th&icirc;nun handun bifelhas</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">th&icirc;na alamosna themu armon manne,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ac [d&ocirc;] im thurh &ocirc;dm&ocirc;dien</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gerno thurh godes thanc:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>than m&ocirc;st thu eft geld niman,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">suu&icirc;{d}o liofl&icirc;c l&ocirc;n,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thar thu is lango bitharft,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fagaroro frumono.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>S&ocirc; huuat s&ocirc; thu is s&ocirc; thurh ferhtan hugi</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1560</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">darno [ged&ecirc;leas],<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ndash; so is &ucirc;sumu drohtine uuer{d} &ndash;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ne [galpo] thu far th&icirc;nun ge{b}un te suu&icirc;{d}o,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[noh] &ecirc;nig gumono ne scal,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that siu im thurh &icirc;dale hr&ocirc;m<span class="f_canusg">| </span>eft ni uuer{d}e</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">l&ecirc;{d}l&icirc;co farloren.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[Thanna] thu scalt l&ocirc;n nemen</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fora godes &ocirc;gun<span class="f_canusg">| </span>g&ocirc;dero uuerco.</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1565</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&Ocirc;c scal ic iu gebeodan,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>than gi uuilliad te bedu hn&icirc;gan</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">endi uuilliad te iuuuomu h&ecirc;rron<span class="f_canusg">| </span>helpono biddean,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that he iu al&acirc;te<span class="f_canusg">| </span>l&ecirc;{d}es thinges,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thero sacono endi thero [sundeono],<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thea gi iu sel{b}on h&icirc;r</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uur&ecirc;{d}a geuuirkead,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that gi it than for &ocirc;{d}rumu uuerode ni duad:</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1570</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ni m&acirc;read it far menigi,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that iu [thes] man ni lo{b}on,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ni diurean thero [d&acirc;deo],<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that gi iuuues drohtines gibed</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thurh that &icirc;dala hr&ocirc;m<span class="f_canusg">| </span>al ne farleosan.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Ac than [gi] uuillean te iuuuomo h&ecirc;rron<span class="f_canusg">| </span>helpono biddean,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thiggean theol&icirc;co,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ndash; thes iu is tharf mikil &ndash;</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1575</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that iu sigidrohtin<span class="f_canusg">| </span>sundeono t&ocirc;mea,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">than [d&ocirc;t] gi that s&ocirc; darno:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[thoh] uu&ecirc;t it iuuue drohtin self</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;lag an himile,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>huuand imu nis biholan neouuiht</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ne uuordo ne uuerco.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>He l&acirc;tid it than [al] geuuer{d}an s&ocirc;,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&ocirc; gi ina than biddiad,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>than gi te [thero] bedo hn&icirc;gad</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1580</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">mid hluttru hugi.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Heli{d}os st&ocirc;dun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gumon umbi thana godes sunu<span class="f_canusg">| </span>gerno suu&icirc;{d}o,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uueros an uuilleon:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuas im thero uuordo [niud],</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">th&acirc;htun endi thagodun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuas im tharf mikil,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that sie that eft gehogdin,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[that] im that h&ecirc;laga barn</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1585</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an thana forman si{d}<span class="f_canusg">| </span>filu mid uuordun</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">torhtes getalde.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; sprac im [eft] &ecirc;n thero tuueli{b}io angegin,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">glauuuoro gumono,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>te [them] godes barne:</h3>
   </td>
  </tr>
</table>
</div>

<div class="contentus">
<table width="650" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
  <tr>
	<td width="50">&nbsp;</td>
	<td  width="600">
<h1>Heliand</h1>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h2>Fitte XIX</h2>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="650" colspan="2" >
<p style="color:#996699;">______________________________________________________________________________</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="50"><h6>&nbsp;</h6></td>
	<td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;">
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;<span class="f_ruberi">H</span>&ecirc;rro the g&ocirc;do&raquo;, qua{d} he,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;&ucirc;s is th&icirc;noro huldi tharf,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">te giuuirkenne th&icirc;nna uuilleon,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi [&ocirc;c] th&icirc;noro uuordo s&ocirc; self,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1590</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">allaro barno bezt,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that thu &ucirc;s bedon l&ecirc;res,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[iungoron] th&icirc;ne,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; Iohannes duot,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">diurl&icirc;c d&ocirc;peri,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>dago gehuuilicas</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">is uuerod [mid] uuordun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>huu&icirc; sie uualdand sculun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">g&ocirc;dan gr&ocirc;tean.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>D&ocirc; [th&icirc;na] iungorun s&ocirc; self:</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1595</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gerihti &ucirc;s that ger&ucirc;ni.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; habda eft the r&icirc;keo garu</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&acirc;n aftar thiu,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>sunu drohtines,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[g&ocirc;d uuord angegin]:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;Than gi [god] uuillean&raquo;, [qua{d} he],</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;uueros mid iuuuon uuordun<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uualdand gr&ocirc;tean,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">allaro cuningo craftigostan,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>than que{d}ad gi, s&ocirc; ic iu l&ecirc;riu:</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1600</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[Fadar &ucirc;sa]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>firiho barno,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[thu bist] an them h&ocirc;hon<span class="f_canusg">| </span>himila r&icirc;kea,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">geuu&icirc;hid s&icirc; th&icirc;n namo<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[uuordo] gehuuilico.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[Cuma] th&icirc;n<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[craftag] r&icirc;ki.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Uuer{d}a th&icirc;n uuilleo<span class="f_canusg">| </span>o{b}ar thesa uuerold [alla],</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1605</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&ocirc; sama an er{d}o,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; thar uppa ist</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an them h&ocirc;hon<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[himilo r&icirc;kea].</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Gef &ucirc;s dago gehuuilikes r&acirc;d,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>drohtin the g&ocirc;do,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">th&icirc;na h&ecirc;laga [helpa],<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi al&acirc;t &ucirc;s, he{b}enes uuard,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">managoro m&ecirc;nsculdio,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>al s&ocirc; uue &ocirc;{d}rum mannum d&ocirc;an.</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1610</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Ne l&acirc;t &ucirc;s farl&ecirc;dean<span class="f_canusg">| </span>l&ecirc;{d}a uuihti</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&ocirc; for{d} an iro uuilleon,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; uui uuir{d}ige sind,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ac help &ucirc;s uui{d}ar allun<span class="f_canusg">| </span>u{b}ilon d&acirc;diun.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">S&ocirc; sculun [gi] biddean,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>than gi te bede hn&icirc;gad</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uueros mid iuuuom uuordun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that iu uualdand god</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1615</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">l&ecirc;{d}es al&acirc;te<span class="f_canusg">| </span>an leutcunnea.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Ef gi than uuilliad al&acirc;tan<span class="f_canusg">| </span>liudeo gehuuilicun</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thero sacono endi thero sundeono,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>the sie uui{d} iu sel{b}on h&icirc;r</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uur&ecirc;{d}a geuuirkeat,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>than al&acirc;tid iu uualdand god,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fadar alamahtig<span class="f_canusg">| </span>firinuuerk mikil,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1620</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">managoro m&ecirc;nsculdeo.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Ef iu than uuir{d}id iuuua m&ocirc;d te starc,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that gi ne uuileat &ocirc;{d}run<span class="f_canusg">| </span>erlun al&acirc;tan,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uueron uuamd&acirc;di,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>than ne uuil iu &ocirc;c uualdand god</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">grimuuerc farge{b}an,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ac gi sculun is geld niman,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">su&icirc;{d}o l&ecirc;{d}lic l&ocirc;n<span class="f_canusg">| </span>te languru huu&icirc;lu,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1625</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">alles thes unrehtes,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thes gi &ocirc;{d}rum h&icirc;r</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gil&ecirc;stead an thesumu liohte<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi than uui{d} liudeo barn</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thea saca ni [gis&ocirc;nead],<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ecirc;r gi an thana s&icirc;{d} faran,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uueros fon thesoro uueroldi.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Oc scal [ic] iu te uu&acirc;run seggean,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">huu&ocirc; gi l&ecirc;stean sculun<span class="f_canusg">| </span>l&ecirc;ra m&icirc;na:</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1630</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">than gi iuuua fastonnea<span class="f_canusg">| </span>frummean uuillean,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">minson iuuua m&ecirc;nd&acirc;di,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>than ni duad gi that te managom c&ucirc;{d},</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ac m&icirc;{d}ad is far &ocirc;{d}rum mannun:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thoh uu&ecirc;t mahtig god,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uualdand iuuuan uuillean,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thoh iu uuerod &ocirc;{d}ar,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">liudio barn ne lo{b}on.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>He gildid [is] iu l&ocirc;n aftar thiu,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1635</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">iuuua h&ecirc;lag fadar<span class="f_canusg">| </span>an himilr&icirc;kea,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thes ge im mid sulicum &ocirc;dm&ocirc;dea,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>erlos theonod,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&ocirc; ferhtl&icirc;co undar thesumu folke.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Ne uuilleat feho uuinnan</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">erlos an unreht,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ac uuirkead up te gode</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">man aftar m&ecirc;du:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that is m&ecirc;ra thing,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1640</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">than man h&icirc;r an er{d}u<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ocirc;dag libbea,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uueroldscattes geuuono.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Ef gi uuilliad m&icirc;nun [uuordun] h&ocirc;rean,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">than ne samnod gi h&icirc;r sinc mikil<span class="f_canusg">| </span>silo{b}res ne goldes</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an thesoro middilgard,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>m&ecirc;{d}omhordes,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">huuand it rotat h&icirc;r an roste,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi regintheo{b}os farstelad,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1645</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uurmi auuardiad,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuir{d}id that giuu&acirc;di farslitan,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">tigangid the [golduuelo].<span class="f_canusg">| </span>L&ecirc;stead iuuua g&ocirc;don uuerc,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">samnod iu an himile<span class="f_canusg">| </span>hord that m&ecirc;ra,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fagara fehoscattos:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that ni mag iu &ecirc;nig f&icirc;und beniman,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[neuuiht] anuuendean,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>huuand the uuelo standid</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1650</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">garu [iu] tegegnes,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; [huat] s&ocirc; gi g&ocirc;des tharod,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an that himilr&icirc;ki<span class="f_canusg">| </span>hordes gesamnod,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">heli{d}os thurh iuuua handge{b}a,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi hebbead tharod iuuuan hugi fasto;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">huuand thar ist alloro manno gihuues<span class="f_canusg">| </span>m&ocirc;dgeth&acirc;hti,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hugi endi herta,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thar is hord ligid,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1655</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sinc gesamnod.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Nis eo s&ocirc; s&acirc;lig man,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that mugi an thesoro br&ecirc;don uuerold<span class="f_canusg">| </span>b&ecirc;{d}iu [anthengean],</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ge that hi an thesoro er{d}o<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ocirc;dog libbea,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an allun uueroldlustun uuesa,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ge [thoh] uualdand gode</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">te thanke getheono:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ac he scal alloro thingo gihuues</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1660</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">simbla [&ocirc;{d}arhuue{d}ar<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ecirc;n farl&acirc;tan]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ettho [lusta] thes l&icirc;chamon<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ettho l&icirc;f &ecirc;uuig.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Bethiu ni gornot gi umbi iuuua gegaruuui,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ac huggead te gode fasto,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ne [mornont] an iuuuomu m&ocirc;de,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>huuat gi eft an morgan sculin</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">etan eftho drinkan<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ettho an hebbean</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1665</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uueros te geuu&ecirc;dea:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>it uu&ecirc;t al uualdand god,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">huues thea bithur{b}un,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thea im h&icirc;r thionod uuel,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">folgod iro fr&ocirc;han uuilleon.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Huuat, gi that bi thesun fuglun mugun</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&acirc;rl&icirc;co undaruuitan,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thea h&icirc;r an thesoro uueroldi sint,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">farad an fe{d}arhamun:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>sie ni cunnun &ecirc;nig feho uuinnan,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1670</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thoh gi{b}id im drohtin god<span class="f_canusg">| </span>dago gehuuilikes</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">helpa uui{d}ar hungre.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&Ocirc;c mugun gi an iuuuom hugi marcon,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uueros umbi iuuua geuu&acirc;di,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>huu&ocirc; [thie] uurti sint</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fagoro gefratoot,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thea h&icirc;r an felde st&acirc;d,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">berhtl&icirc;co gebl&ocirc;id:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ne mahta the [burges] uuard,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1675</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Salomon the suning,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>the habda sinc mikil,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">m&ecirc;{d}omhordas m&ecirc;st,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thero the [&ecirc;nig] man &ecirc;hti,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuelono geuunnan<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi allaro geuu&acirc;deo cust, &ndash;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thoh ni mohte he an is l&icirc;{b}e,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thoh he habdi alles theses landes geuuald,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">auuinnan sulic geuu&acirc;di,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; thiu uurt ha{b}ad,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1680</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thiu h&icirc;r an felde st&acirc;d<span class="f_canusg">| </span>fagoro gegariuuit,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">lilli mid s&ocirc; liofl&icirc;cu bl&ocirc;mon:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ina uu&acirc;dit the landes uualdand</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;r fan he{b}enes uuange.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>M&ecirc;r is im thoh umbi thit heli{d}o cunni,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">liudi sint im lio{b}oron mikilu,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thea he im an [thesumu] lande [geuuarhte],</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uualdand an uuilleon s&icirc;nan.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Bethiu ne thur{b}on gi umbi iuuua geuu&acirc;di sorgon,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1685</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ne [gornot gi] umbi iuuua gegariuui te suu&icirc;{d}o:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>god [uuili] is alles r&acirc;dan,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">helpan fan he{b}enes uuange,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ef gi uuilliad aftar is [huldi] theonon.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Gerot gi simbla &ecirc;rist thes godes r&icirc;keas,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi than duat aftar them is g&ocirc;dun uuercun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">r&ocirc;mod gi rehtoro thingo:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>than uuili iu the r&icirc;keo drohtin</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ge{b}on mid alloro g&ocirc;du gehuuilicu,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ef gi im thus fulgangan uuillead,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1690</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&ocirc; ic iu te uu&acirc;run h&icirc;r<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuordun seggeo.</h3>
   </td>
  </tr>
</table>
</div>

BIBLIOTHECA AUGUSTANA

<div class="titulus2">
<p>Heliand</p>
<p>um 830</p>

<!-- contentus -->
<div class="contentus">
<table width="650" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
  <tr>
	<td width="50">&nbsp;</td>
	<td  width="600">
<h1>Heliand</h1>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h2>Fitte XX</h2>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="650" colspan="2" >
<p style="color:#996699;">______________________________________________________________________________</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="50"><h6>&nbsp;</h6></td>
	<td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;">
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;"><span class="f_ruberi">N</span>e sculun gi &ecirc;nigumu manne<span class="f_canusg">| </span>unrehtes uuiht,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">der{b}ies ad&ecirc;lean,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>huuand the d&ocirc;m eft cumid</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">o{b}ar thana sel{b}on man,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thar [it] im te sorgon scal,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuer{d}an them te uu&icirc;tea,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>the h&icirc;r mid is uuordun gesprikid</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1695</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">unreht &ocirc;{d}rum.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Neo that iuuuar &ecirc;nig ne dua</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gumono an thesom gardon<span class="f_canusg">| </span>geldes ettho c&ocirc;pes,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that hi unreht gimet<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ocirc;{d}rumu manne</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">m&ecirc;nful maco,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>huuand it simbla m&ocirc;tean scal</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">erlo gehuuilicomu,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[sulic s&ocirc; he] it &ocirc;{d}rumu ged&ocirc;d,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1700</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&ocirc; cumid it [imu] eft tegegnes,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thar he gerno ne uuili</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gesehan is sundeon.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&Ocirc;c scal ic iu seggean noh,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">huuar gi iu uuardon sculun<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[uu&icirc;teo] m&ecirc;sta,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">m&ecirc;nuuerc manag:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>te huu&icirc; scalt thu &ecirc;nigan man besprekan,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">br&ocirc;{d}ar th&icirc;nan,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that thu undar is br&acirc;hon gesehas</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1705</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">halm an is &ocirc;gon,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi gehuggean ni uuili</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thana su&acirc;ran balcon,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>the thu an th&icirc;noro siuni ha{b}as,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hard [trio] endi he{b}ig.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>L&acirc;t thi that an th&icirc;nan hugi fallan,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">huu&ocirc; thu thana &ecirc;rist al&ocirc;seas:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>than sk&icirc;nid thi lioht beforan,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&ocirc;gun uuer{d}ad [thi] geoponot;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>than maht thu aftar thiu</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1710</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">su&acirc;ses mannes gesiun<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&icirc;{d}or geb&ocirc;tean,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">geh&ecirc;lean an is h&ocirc;{b}de.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>S&ocirc; mag that [an] is hugi m&ecirc;ra</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an thesoro middilgard<span class="f_canusg">| </span>manno gehuuilicumu,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuesan an thesoro uueroldi,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that hi h&icirc;r uuammas geduot,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">than hi [ahtogea]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ocirc;{d}res mannes</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1715</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">saca endi sundea,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi ha{b}ad im sel{b}o m&ecirc;r</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">firinuuerco gefrumid.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Ef he uuili is fruma l&ecirc;stean,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">than scal hi ina sel{b}on &ecirc;r<span class="f_canusg">| </span>sundeono [at&ocirc;mean],</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[l&ecirc;{d}uuerco] l&ocirc;son:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&icirc;{d}or mag hi mid is l&ecirc;run uuer{d}an</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">heli{d}un te helpu,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&icirc;{d}or hi ina hluttran uu&ecirc;t,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1720</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sundeono sicoran.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Ne sculun gi su&icirc;num teforan</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">iuuua meregr&icirc;ton macon<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ettho m&ecirc;{d}mo gestriuni,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;lag halsmeni,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>huuand siu it an horu spurnat,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[suluuiad an] sande:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ne uuitun s&ucirc;{b}reas gesk&ecirc;{d},</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[fagaroro] fratoo.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Sulic sint h&icirc;r folc manag,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1725</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">the iuuua h&ecirc;lag uuord<span class="f_canusg">| </span>h&ocirc;rean ne uuillead,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fulgangan godes l&ecirc;run:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ne uuitun g&ocirc;des gesk&ecirc;{d},</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ac sind im [l&acirc;ri] uuord<span class="f_canusg">| </span>leo{b}oron mikilu,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">umbithar{b}i thing,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thanna theotgodes</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuerc endi [uuilleo].<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Ne sind sie uuir{d}ige than,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1730</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that sie geh&ocirc;rean iuuua h&ecirc;lag uuord,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ef sie is ne uuillead an iro hugi thenkean,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ne l&icirc;non ne l&ecirc;stean.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Them ni seggean gi [iuuuoro] l&ecirc;ron uuiht,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that gi [thea] spr&acirc;ca godes<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi spel [managu]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ne [farleosan] an them liudiun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[thea] thar ne [uuillean] gil&ocirc;{b}ean t&ocirc;,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&acirc;roro uuordo.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&Ocirc;c sculun gi iu uuardon filu</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1735</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">listiun undar thesun liudiun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thar gi aftar thesumu lande farad,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that iu thea luggeon ne mugin<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[l&ecirc;ron] besu&icirc;can</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ni mid uuordun ni mid uuercun.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Sie cumad an sulicom geuu&acirc;deon te iu,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fagoron fratoon:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thoh hebbead sie f&ecirc;cnan hugi:</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thea mugun [gi] s&acirc;n antkennean,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; gi sie cuman gesead:</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1740</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sie sprecad uu&icirc;sl&icirc;c uuord,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thoh iro uuerc ne dugin,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thero thegno geth&acirc;hti.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Huuand gi uuitun, that eo an thorniun ne sculun</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&icirc;nberi uuesan<span class="f_canusg">| </span>eftha uuelon eouuiht,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fagororo fruhteo,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>nec &ocirc;c f&icirc;gun ne lesad</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">heli{d}os an hiopon.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>That mugun gi undarhuggean uuel,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1745</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that eo the u{b}ilo b&ocirc;m,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thar he an er{d}u st&acirc;d,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">g&ocirc;den uuastum ne gi{b}id,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>nec it [&ocirc;c] god ni gesc&ocirc;p,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that the g&ocirc;do b&ocirc;m<span class="f_canusg">| </span>gumono barnun</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">b&acirc;ri bittres uuiht,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ac cumid fan alloro b&acirc;mo gehuilicumu</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sulic uuastom te thesero uueroldi,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; im fan is uurteon gedregid,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1750</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ettha berht ettha bittar.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[That] m&ecirc;nid thoh breosthugi,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">managoro m&ocirc;dse{b}on<span class="f_canusg">| </span>manno cunnies,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">huu&ocirc; alloro erlo gehuilic<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ocirc;git sel{b}o,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">meldod mid is m&ucirc;{d}u,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>huilican he m&ocirc;d ha{b}ad,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hugi umbi is herte:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thes ni mag he farhelan eouuiht,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1755</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ac [cumit] fan them u{b}ilan man<span class="f_canusg">| </span>inuuidr&acirc;dos,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[bittara] baluspr&acirc;ca,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>sulic s&ocirc; hi an is breostun ha{b}ad</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">geheftid umbi is herte:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>simbla is hugi c&ucirc;{d}id,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">is uuilleon mid is uuordun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi [farad] is uuerc aftar thiu.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">S&ocirc; [cumit] fan themu g&ocirc;dan manne<span class="f_canusg">| </span>glau anduuordi,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1760</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&icirc;sl&icirc;c [fan] is geuuittea,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that hi simbla mid is uuordu gesprikid,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">man mid is m&icirc;{d}u<span class="f_canusg">| </span>sulic, s&ocirc; he an is m&ocirc;de ha{b}ad</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hord umbi is herte.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thanan cumad thea h&ecirc;lagan l&ecirc;ra,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">suu&icirc;{d}o uunsam uuord,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi sculun is uuerc aftar thiu</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[theodu] geth&icirc;han,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thegnun managun</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1765</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuer{d}an te uuilleon,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>al s&ocirc; it uualdand self</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">g&ocirc;dun mannun fargi{b}id,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>god alomahtig,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">himilisc h&ecirc;rro,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>huand sie &acirc;no is helpa ni mugun</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ne mid uuordun ne mid uuercun<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuiht athengean</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">g&ocirc;des an thesun gardun.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Bethiu sculun gumono barn</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1770</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an is &ecirc;nes craft<span class="f_canusg">| </span>alle gil&ocirc;{b}ean.</h3>
   </td>
  </tr>
</table>
</div>
<!--  finis contentus  -->

BIBLIOTHECA AUGUSTANA
