</div>
<div class="titulus2">
<p>Heliand</p>
<p>um 830</p>
</div>
<!--  finis tituli  -->

<!-- contentus -->
<div class="contentus">
<table width="650" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
  <tr>
	<td width="50">&nbsp;</td>
	<td  width="600">
<h1>Heliand</h1>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h2>Fitte XXI</h2>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="650" colspan="2" >
<p style="color:#996699;">______________________________________________________________________________</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="50"><h6>&nbsp;</h6></td>
	<td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;">
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;"><span class="f_ruberi">&Ocirc;</span>c scal ic iu [uu&icirc;sean],<span class="f_canusg">| </span>huu&ocirc; h&icirc;r uuegos tu&ecirc;na</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">liggead an thesumu liohte,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thea farad [liudeo barn],</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">al irminthiod.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thero is &ocirc;{d}ar s&acirc;n</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&icirc;d str&acirc;ta endi br&ecirc;d,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ndash; farid sie uuerodes filu,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1775</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">mancunnies manag,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>huand sie tharod iro m&ocirc;d spenit,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uueroldlusta [uueros] &ndash;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thiu an thea uuirson hand</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">liudi l&ecirc;did,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thar sie te farlora uuer{d}ad,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">heli{d}os an [helliu],<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thar is h&ecirc;t endi suart,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">egisl&icirc;c an innan:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[&ocirc;{d}i is] tharod te faranne</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1780</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">eldibarnun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thoh it im [at] themu endie ni dugi.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Than ligid eft &ocirc;{d}ar<span class="f_canusg">| </span>engira mikilu</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uueg an thesoro uueroldi,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ferid ina uuerodes [l&ucirc;t],</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">f&acirc;ho folcskepi:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ni uuilliad ina firiho barn</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gerno gangan,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thoh he te godes r&icirc;kea,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1785</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an that &ecirc;uuiga l&icirc;f,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>erlos l&ecirc;dea.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Than nimad gi iu thana engean:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thoh he s&ocirc; &ocirc;{d}i ne s&icirc;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">firihon te faranne,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thoh scal hi te frumu uuer{d}an</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&ocirc; [huuemu] s&ocirc; ina thurhgengid,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; scal is geld niman,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">suu&icirc;{d}o langsam l&ocirc;n<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi l&icirc;f &ecirc;uuig,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1790</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">diurl&icirc;can dr&ocirc;m.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Eo gi thes [drohtin sculun],</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uualdand biddien,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that gi thana uueg m&ocirc;tin</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fan foran antf&acirc;han<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi for{d} [thurh gigangan]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an that godes r&icirc;ki.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>He ist garu simbla</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uui{d}ar thiu te ge{b}anne,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>the man ina gerno bidid,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1795</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fergot firiho barn.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>S&ocirc;kead fadar iuuuan</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[up te] themu [&ecirc;uuinom] r&icirc;kea:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>than m&ocirc;tun gi ina aftar thiu</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">te iuuuoru frumu f&icirc;{d}an.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>C&ucirc;{d}ead iuuua fard tharod</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">at iuuuas [drohtines] durun:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>than uuer{d}ad iu and&ocirc;n aftar thiu,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[himilportun] anthlidan,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that gi an that h&ecirc;lage lioht,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1800</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an that godes r&icirc;ki<span class="f_canusg">| </span>gangan m&ocirc;tun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[sinl&icirc;f] sehan.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&Ocirc;c scal ic iu seggean noh</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">far thesumu uuerode allun<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uu&acirc;rl&icirc;c bili{d}i,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that alloro liudeo s&ocirc; huilic,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; thesa m&icirc;na l&ecirc;ra uuili</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gehaldan an is herton<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi uuil iro an is hugi [athenkean],</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1805</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">l&ecirc;stean sea an thesumu lande,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>the gil&icirc;co duot</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&icirc;sumu manne,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>the giuuit ha{b}ad,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">horsca hugiskefti,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi h&ucirc;sstedi kiusid</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an fastoro foldun<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi an [felisa] uppan</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&ecirc;gos uuirkid,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thar im uuind ni mag,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1810</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ne uu&acirc;g ne uuatares str&ocirc;m<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuihtiu getiunean,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ac mag im thar uui{d} ungiuuidereon<span class="f_canusg">| </span>allun standan</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an themu felise uppan,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>huand it s&ocirc; fasto uuar{d}</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gistellit an themu st&ecirc;ne:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>antha{b}ad it thiu stedi ni{d}ana,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uure{d}id uui{d}ar uuinde,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that it uu&icirc;can ni mag.</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1815</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">S&ocirc; duot eft manno s&ocirc; huilic,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; thesun m&icirc;nun ni uuili</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">l&ecirc;run h&ocirc;rien<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[ne] thero l&ecirc;stien uuiht,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[s&ocirc; duot the] unuu&icirc;son<span class="f_canusg">| </span>erla gel&icirc;co,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ungeuuittigon [uuere,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>the] im be uuatares sta{d}e</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an sande uuili<span class="f_canusg">| </span>selih&ucirc;s uuirkean,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1820</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[thar] it uuestrani uuind<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi [uu&acirc;go] str&ocirc;m,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[s&ecirc;es &ucirc;{d}eon] tesl&acirc;ad;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ne mag im sand endi greot</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">geuure{d}ien uui{d} themu uuinde,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ac uuir{d}id teuuorpan [than],</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[tefallen] an themu fl&ocirc;de,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>huand it an [fastoro nis]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[er{d}u] getimbrod.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>S&ocirc; scal allaro [erlo gehues]</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1825</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuerc geth&icirc;han<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uui{d}ar thiu, [the] hi [thius m&icirc;n] uuord frumid,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[haldid] h&ecirc;lag gebod.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; bigunnun an iro hugi uundron</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">meginfolc mikil:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>geh&ocirc;rdun mahtiges godes</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">liofl&icirc;ca l&ecirc;ra;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ne uu&acirc;run an themu lande geuuno,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that sie eo fan sulicun &ecirc;r<span class="f_canusg">| </span>seggean geh&ocirc;rdin</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1830</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuordun ettho uuercun.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Farst&ocirc;dun uu&icirc;se man,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that he s&ocirc; l&ecirc;rde,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>liudeo drohtin,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&acirc;run uuordun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; he geuuald habde,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">allun them ungel&icirc;co,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>the thar an &ecirc;rdagun</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">undar them liudskepea<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[l&ecirc;reon] uu&acirc;run</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1835</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">acoran undar themu cunnie:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ne habdun thiu Cristes uuord</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gemacon mid mannun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[the] he far thero menigi [sprac],</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">geb&ocirc;d uppan themu berge.<span class="f_canusg">| </span></h3>
   </td>
  </tr>
</table>
</div>

<div class="bibliotheca">
BIBLIOTHECA AUGUSTANA
</div>
<div class="titulus1">
<p>&nbsp;</p>
</div>
<div class="titulus2">
<p>Heliand</p>
<p>um 830</p>

<div class="contentus">
<table width="650" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
  <tr>
	<td width="50">&nbsp;</td>
	<td  width="600">
<h1>Heliand</h1>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h2>Fitte XXII</h2>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="650" colspan="2" >
<p style="color:#996699;">______________________________________________________________________________</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="50"><h6>&nbsp;</h6></td>
	<td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;">
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:200px;"><span class="f_canusg">| </span><span class="f_ruberi">H</span>e im th&ocirc; b&ecirc;{d}iu befal</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[ge te seggennea]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&icirc;nom uuordun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">huu&ocirc; man himilr&icirc;ki<span class="f_canusg">| </span>gehalon scoldi,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1840</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&icirc;dbr&ecirc;dan uuelan,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>gia he im geuuald fargaf,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that sie m&ocirc;stin h&ecirc;lean<span class="f_canusg">| </span>halte endi blinde,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">liudeo l&ecirc;fh&ecirc;di,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>legarbed manag,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">su&acirc;ra suhti,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>giac he im sel{b}o geb&ocirc;d,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that sie at &ecirc;nigumu manne<span class="f_canusg">| </span>m&ecirc;de ne n&acirc;min,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1845</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">diurie m&ecirc;{d}mos:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;gehuggead gi&raquo;, qua{d} he, &ndash; &laquo;huand iu is thiu d&acirc;d cuman,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that geuuit endi [the] uu&icirc;sd&ocirc;m,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi iu thea geuuald fargi{b}id</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">alloro firiho fadar,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; gi sie ni thur{b}un mid [&ecirc;nigo] feho c&ocirc;pon,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">m&ecirc;dean mid &ecirc;nigun m&ecirc;{d}mun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ndash; s&ocirc; uuesat gi iro mannun for{d}</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an iuuuon hugiskeftiun<span class="f_canusg">| </span>helpono mildea,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1850</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">l&ecirc;read gi liudio barn<span class="f_canusg">| </span>langsamna r&acirc;d,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fruma for{d}uuardes;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>firinuuerc lahad,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">su&acirc;ra sundeo.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Ne l&acirc;tad iu silo{b}ar [nec] gold</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuihti thes uuir{d}ig,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that it [eo] an iuuua geuuald cuma,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fagara fehoscattos:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>it ni mag iu te &ecirc;nigoro frumu huuergin,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1855</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuer{d}an te &ecirc;nigumu uuilleon.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Ne sculun gi geuu&acirc;deas than m&ecirc;r</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">erlos &ecirc;gan,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[b&ucirc;tan] s&ocirc; gi than an hebbean,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gumon te [gareuuea],<span class="f_canusg">| </span>than gi gangan sculun</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an that gimang [innan].<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Neo [gi] umbi iuuuan meti [ni] sorgot,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">leng umbi iuuua l&icirc;fnare,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>huand thene l&ecirc;reand sculun</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1860</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">f&ocirc;dean that folcskepi:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[thes sint thea fruma] uuer{d}a,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">leo{b}l&icirc;kes l&ocirc;nes,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>the [hi] them liudiun sagad.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Uuir{d}ig is the uurhteo,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that man ina uuel f&ocirc;dea,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thana man mid m&ocirc;su,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>the s&ocirc; managoro scal</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">seola bisorgan<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi an thana s&icirc;{d} spanen,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1865</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">g&ecirc;stos an godes uuang.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>That is gr&ocirc;tara thing,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that man bisorgon scal<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[seolun] managa,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hu&ocirc; man thea [gehalde]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>te he{b}enr&icirc;kea,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">than man thene l&icirc;chamon<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[liudibarno]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">m&ocirc;su bimorna.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Bethiu man [sculun]</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1870</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">haldan thene holdl&icirc;co,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>the im te he{b}enr&icirc;kea</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thene uueg uu&icirc;sit<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi [sie] uuamsca{d}un,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">feondun uuitf&acirc;hit<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi firinuuerc lahid,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[su&acirc;ra] sundeon.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Nu ic iu sendean scal</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">aftar thesumu landskepie<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; lamb undar uul{b}os:</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1875</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&ocirc; sculun gi undar iuuua f&icirc;und faren,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>undar filu theodo,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">undar misl&icirc;ke man.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Hebbead iuuuan m&ocirc;d uui{d}ar them</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&ocirc; glauuan tegegnes,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; samo [s&ocirc;] the [gelouuo] uurm,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">n&acirc;dra thiu f&ecirc;ha,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thar siu iro n&icirc;{d}skepies,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[uuitodes] uu&acirc;nit,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that man iu undar themu uuerode ne mugi</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1880</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">besu&icirc;can an themu s&icirc;{d}e.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Far thiu gi sorgon sculun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that iu thea man ni mugin<span class="f_canusg">| </span>m&ocirc;dgeth&acirc;hti,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuillean [auuardien].<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Uuesat iu so [uuara] uui{d}ar thiu,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uui{d} iro [f&ecirc;cneon d&acirc;diun],<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; man uui{d}ar f&icirc;undun scal.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Than uuesat gi eft an iuuuon d&acirc;diun<span class="f_canusg">| </span>d&ucirc;{b}on gel&icirc;ca,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1885</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hebbead uui{d} erlo gehuene<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ecirc;nfaldan hugi,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">mildean m&ocirc;dse{b}on,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that thar man neg&ecirc;n</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thurh iuuua [d&acirc;di]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>bedrogan ne uuer{d}e,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">besuican thurh iuuua sundea.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[Nu] sculun gi an thana s&icirc;{d} faran,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an that &acirc;rundi:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thar sculun gi ar{b}idies [s&ocirc;] filu</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1890</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">getholon undar theru thiod<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi gethuing s&ocirc; samo</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">manag endi misl&icirc;c,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>huand gi an m&icirc;numu namon</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thea liudi l&ecirc;reat.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Bethiu sculun gi thar l&ecirc;{d}es filu</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fora uueroldcuningun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uu&icirc;teas antf&acirc;han.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Oft sculun gi thar for r&icirc;kea<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thurh thius m&icirc;n rehtun uuord</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1895</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gebundane standen<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi b&ecirc;{d}iu gethologean,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ge hosc ge harmquidi:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>umbi that ne l&acirc;tad gi iuuuan hugi tu&icirc;flon,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">se{b}on su&icirc;candean:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>gi ni thur{b}un an &ecirc;nigun sorgun uuesan</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an [iuuuomu] hugi huergin,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>than [man iu] for [thea] h&ecirc;ri for{d}</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an thene gastseli<span class="f_canusg">| </span>gangan h&ecirc;tid,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1900</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">huat gi im than tegegnes [sculin]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>g&ocirc;doro uuordo,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[sp&acirc;hl&icirc;coro] gesprecan,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>huand iu thiu [sp&ocirc;t] cumid,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">helpe fon himile,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi sprikid the h&ecirc;logo g&ecirc;st,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">mahtig fon iuuuomu munde.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Bethiu [ne andr&acirc;dad] gi iu thero manno n&icirc;{d}</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ne forhteat iro f&icirc;undskepi:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thoh sie hebbean iuuuas ferahes geuuald,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1905</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that sie mugin thene l&icirc;chamon<span class="f_canusg">| </span>l&icirc;{b}u beneotan,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">aslaan mid suerde,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thoh sie theru seolun ne mugun</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuiht auuardean.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Antdr&acirc;dad iu uualdand god,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">forhtead fader iuuuan,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>frummiad gerno</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">is gebodskepi,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>huuand hi ha{b}ad b&ecirc;{d}ies giuuald,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1910</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">liudio l&icirc;{b}es<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi &ocirc;c iro l&icirc;chamon</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gec thero seolon s&ocirc; self:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ef gi iuuua an them s&icirc;{d}e tharot</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">farliosat thurh thesa l&ecirc;ra,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>than m&ocirc;tun gi sie eft an themu liohte godes</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">beforan f&icirc;{d}an,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>huuand sie fader iuuua,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">haldid h&ecirc;lag god<span class="f_canusg">| </span>an himilr&icirc;kea.</h3>
   </td>
  </tr>
</table>

	<td  width="600">
<h1>Heliand</h1>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h2>Fitte XXIII</h2>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="650" colspan="2" >
<p style="color:#996699;">______________________________________________________________________________</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="50"><h6>1915</h6></td>
	<td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;">
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;"><span class="f_ruberi">N</span>e cumat thea alle te himile,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thea [the] h&icirc;r hr&ocirc;pat te mi</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[manno] te mundburd.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Managa sind [thero],</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thea uuilliad alloro dago gehuilikes<span class="f_canusg">| </span>te drohtine hn&icirc;gan,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hr&ocirc;pad thar te helpu<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi huggead an &ocirc;{d}ar,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuirkead uuamd&acirc;di:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ne sind im than thiu uuord fruma,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1920</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ac thea m&ocirc;tun huer{b}an<span class="f_canusg">| </span>an that himiles lioht,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gangan an that godes r&icirc;ki,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thea thes gerne sint,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that sie h&icirc;r gefrummien<span class="f_canusg">| </span>fader alauualdan</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuerc endi uuilleon.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thea ni thur{b}un mid uuordun s&ocirc; f&icirc;lu</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hr&ocirc;pan te helpu,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>huanda the h&ecirc;logo god</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1925</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&ecirc;t alloro manno gehues<span class="f_canusg">| </span>m&ocirc;dgeth&acirc;hti,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuord endi uuilleon,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi gildid im is uuerco l&ocirc;n.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Bethiu sculun gi sorgon,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>than gi an thene s&icirc;{d} [farad],</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hu&ocirc; gi that &acirc;rundi<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[ti] endea [bebrengen].</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Than gi l&icirc;{d}an sculun<span class="f_canusg">| </span>aftar thesumu landskepea,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1930</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&icirc;do aftar thesoro uueroldi,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>al s&ocirc; iu uuegos l&ecirc;diad,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">br&ecirc;d str&acirc;ta te burg,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>simbla [s&ocirc;kiad] gi iu thene bezton [s&acirc;n]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">man undar theru menegi<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi c&ucirc;{d}ead imu iuuuan m&ocirc;{d}se{b}on</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&acirc;run uuordun.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Ef sie than thes uuir{d}ige sint,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[that] sie iuuua g&ocirc;dun uuerc<span class="f_canusg">| </span>gerno [gel&ecirc;stien]</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1935</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">mid hluttru hugi,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[than] gi an themu h&ucirc;se mid im</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuonod an uuilleon<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi [im] uuel l&ocirc;nod,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">geldad im mid g&ocirc;du<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi sie te gode sel{b}on</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuordun geuu&icirc;had<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi seggead im uuissan fri{d}u,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;laga helpa<span class="f_canusg">| </span>he{b}encuninges.</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1940</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Ef sie than s&ocirc; s&acirc;liga<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thurh iro sel{b}oro d&acirc;d</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuer{d}an ni m&ocirc;tun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that sie iuuua uuerc frummien,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">l&ecirc;stien iuuua l&ecirc;ra,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>than gi fan them liudiun s&acirc;n,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">farad fan themu folke,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ndash; [the iuuua fri{d}u huuir{b}id]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[eft] an [iuuuoro] sel{b}oro s&icirc;{d}, &ndash;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi l&acirc;tad sie mid sundiun for{d},</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1945</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">mid balu[uuercun] b&ucirc;an<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi s&ocirc;kiad iu burg &ocirc;{d}ra,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">mikil [manuuerot],<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi ne l&acirc;tad thes melmes uuiht</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">folgan an iuuuom f&ocirc;tun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thanan [the] man iu antf&acirc;han ne uuili,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ac scuddiat it fan iuuuon sc&ocirc;hun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that it im eft te scamu uuer{d}e,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">themu uuerode te geuuitskepie,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that iro uuillio ne d&ocirc;g.</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1950</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Than seggeo ic iu te uu&acirc;run,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; huan s&ocirc; thius uuerold endiad</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">endi the m&acirc;reo dag<span class="f_canusg">| </span>o{b}ar man farid,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that than Sodomoburg,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thiu h&icirc;r thurh sundeon uuar{d}</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[an afgrundi]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ecirc;ldes craftu,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fiuru bifallen,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[that] thiu than ha{b}ad fri{d}u m&ecirc;ran,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1955</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">mildiran mund[burd],<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[than] thea man &ecirc;gin,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">the iu h&icirc;r uui{d}aruuerpat<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi ne uuilliad iuuua uuord frummien.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">S&ocirc; hue s&ocirc; iu [than] antf&acirc;hit<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thurh ferhtan hugi,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thurh mildean m&ocirc;d,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; ha{b}ad m&icirc;nan for{d}</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuilleon geuuarhten<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi [&ocirc;c] uualdand god,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1960</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">antfangan fader iuuuan,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>firiho drohtin,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">r&icirc;kean r&acirc;dge{b}on,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thene the al reht bican.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Uu&ecirc;t uualdand self,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi uuillean l&ocirc;not</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gumono gehuilicumu,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; huat s&ocirc; hi h&icirc;r g&ocirc;des geduot,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thoh hi thurh minnea godes<span class="f_canusg">| </span>manno huilicumu</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1965</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuilleandi farge{b}e<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuatares drinkan,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that hi thurftigumu manne<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thurst geh&ecirc;lie,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">caldes brunnan.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thesa quidi uuer{d}ad uu&acirc;ra,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that eo ne bil&icirc;{b}id,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ne hi thes l&ocirc;n sculi,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fora godes &ocirc;gun<span class="f_canusg">| </span>geld antf&acirc;han,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1970</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">m&ecirc;da managfalde,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; huat s&ocirc; hi is thurh m&icirc;na minnea geduot.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">S&ocirc; hue s&ocirc; [m&icirc;n] than farl&ocirc;gnid<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[liudibarno],</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">heli{d}o for thesoro heriu,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; d&ocirc;m ic [is] an himile s&ocirc; self</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thar uppe far them alouualdan fader<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi for allumu is engilo crafte,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">far theru mikilon menigi.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>S&ocirc; huilic s&ocirc; than eft manno barno</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1975</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an thesoro uueroldi ne uuili<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuordun m&icirc;{d}an,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ac giit far gumskepi,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that he m&icirc;n iungoro s&icirc;,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thene uuilliu ec eft &ocirc;gean<span class="f_canusg">| </span>far [&ocirc;gun godes],</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fora alloro firiho fader,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thar folc manag</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">for thene alouualdon<span class="f_canusg">| </span>alla gangad</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1980</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">re{d}inon uui{d} thene r&icirc;keon.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thar uuilliu ic imu an reht uuesan</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">mildi mundboro,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; huemu s&ocirc; m&icirc;nun h&icirc;r</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuordun h&ocirc;rid<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi thiu uuerc frumid,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thea ic h&icirc;r an thesumu berge uppan<span class="f_canusg">| </span>geboden hebbiu.&raquo;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Habda th&ocirc; te uu&acirc;run<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uualdandes sunu</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1985</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gel&ecirc;rid thea liudi,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>hu&ocirc; sie lof gode</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuirkean scoldin.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; l&ecirc;t hi that uuerod thanan</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an alloro [hal{b}a] gehuilica,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>heriskepi manno</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&icirc;{d}on te sel{d}on.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Habdun sel{b}es [uuord],</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">geh&ocirc;rid he{b}encuninges<span class="f_canusg">| </span>h&ecirc;laga l&ecirc;ra,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1990</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&ocirc; eo te uueroldi sint<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[uuordo endi d&acirc;deo],</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">mancunnies manag<span class="f_canusg">| </span>o{b}ar thesan middilgard</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[spr&acirc;cono] thiu sp&acirc;hiron,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; hue s&ocirc; thiu spel gefrang,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thea thar an themu berge [gesprac]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>barno r&icirc;keast.</h3>
   </td>
  </tr>
</table>

<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h2>Fitte XXIV</h2>

	<td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;">
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;"><span class="f_ruberi">G</span>euu&ecirc;t imu th&ocirc; umbi threa naht aftar thiu<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thesoro thiodo drohtin</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>1995</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an [Galileo land],<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thar he te &ecirc;num g&ocirc;mum uuar{d},</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gebedan that barn godes:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thar scolda man &ecirc;na br&ucirc;d ge{b}an,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">munal&icirc;ca magat.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thar Maria uuas,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">mid iro suni sel{b}o,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&acirc;lig thiorna,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">mahtiges m&ocirc;der.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Managoro drohtin</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2000</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">geng imu th&ocirc; mid is iungoron,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>godes &ecirc;gan barn,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an that h&ocirc;ha h&ucirc;s,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thar [the] heri dranc,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thea Iudeon an themu gastseli:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>he im &ocirc;c at them g&ocirc;mun uuas,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">giac hi thar gec&ucirc;{d}de,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[that] hi habda craft godes,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">helpa fan himilfader,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>h&ecirc;lagna g&ecirc;st,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2005</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uualdandes uu&icirc;sd&ocirc;m.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Uuerod bl&icirc;{d}ode,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&acirc;run thar an luston<span class="f_canusg">| </span>liudi atsamne,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gumon gladm&ocirc;die.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Gengun ambahtman,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">skenkeon mid sc&acirc;lun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>dr&ocirc;gun sk&icirc;rianne uu&icirc;n</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">mid orcun endi mid alofatun;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuas thar erlo dr&ocirc;m</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2010</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fagar an flettea,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>th&ocirc; thar folc undar im</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an them benkeon s&ocirc; bezt<span class="f_canusg">| </span>bl&icirc;{d}sea afh&ocirc;{b}un,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&acirc;run thar an uunneun.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[Th&ocirc;] im thes uu&icirc;nes brast,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">them liudiun thes l&icirc;{d}es:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>is ni uuas farl&ecirc;{b}id uuiht</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">huergin an themu h&ucirc;se,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that for [thene heri] for{d}</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2015</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">skenkeon dr&ocirc;gin,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ac thiu scapu uu&acirc;run</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">l&icirc;{d}es al&acirc;rid.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; ni uuas lang te thiu,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that it s&acirc;n antfunda<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[fr&icirc;o] sc&ocirc;niosta,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Cristes m&ocirc;der:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>geng uui{d} iro kind sprecan,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uui{d} iro sunu sel{b}on,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>sagda im mid uuordun,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2020</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that thea uuerdos th&ocirc; m&ecirc;r<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uu&icirc;nes ne habdun</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">them gestiun te [g&ocirc;mun].<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Siu th&ocirc; gerno bad,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that is the h&ecirc;logo Crist<span class="f_canusg">| </span>helpa geriedi</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">themu uuerode te uuilleon.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; habda [eft] is uuord garu</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">mahtig barn godes<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi uui{d} is m&ocirc;der sprac:</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2025</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;huat ist mi endi thi&raquo;, qua{d} he,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;umbi thesoro manno li{d},</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">umbi theses uuerodes uu&icirc;n?<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Te hu&icirc; sprikis thu thes, uu&icirc;f, s&ocirc; filu,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">manos mi far thesoro menigi?<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Ne sint m&icirc;na noh</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[t&icirc;di] cumana.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Than thoh [gitr&ucirc;oda siu uuel]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an iro hugiskeftiun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>h&ecirc;lag thiorne,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2030</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that is aftar them uuordun<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uualdandes barn,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;leandoro bezt<span class="f_canusg">| </span>helpan uueldi.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">H&ecirc;t th&ocirc; thea ambahtman<span class="f_canusg">| </span>idiso sc&ocirc;niost,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">skenkeon endi scapuuardos,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thea thar scoldun thero scolu thionon,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that sie thes ne uuord ne uuerc<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuiht ne farl&ecirc;tin,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2035</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thes sie the h&ecirc;logo Crist<span class="f_canusg">| </span>h&ecirc;tan uueldi</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">l&ecirc;stean far them liudiun.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>L&acirc;rea st&ocirc;dun thar</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">st&ecirc;nfatu sehsi.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; s&ocirc; stillo geb&ocirc;d</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">mahtig barn godes,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; it thar manno filu</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ne uuissa te uu&acirc;run,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>hu&ocirc; he it mid [is] uuordu gesprac;</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2040</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">he h&ecirc;t thea skenkeon th&ocirc;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>sk&icirc;reas uuatares</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thiu fatu fullien,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi hi thar mid is fingrun th&ocirc;,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">segnade sel{b}o<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&icirc;nun handun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuarhte it te uu&icirc;ne<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi h&ecirc;t is an &ecirc;n uu&ecirc;gi hla{d}en,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">skeppien mid &ecirc;noro sc&acirc;lon,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi th&ocirc; te them skenkeon sprac,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2045</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;t [is] thero gesteo,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>the at them g&ocirc;mun uuas</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">themu h&ecirc;roston<span class="f_canusg">| </span>an hand ge{b}an,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ful mid folmun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>themu the thes folkes thar</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">geuueld aftar themu [uuerde].<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Reht s&ocirc; [hi] thes uu&icirc;nes gedranc,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&ocirc; ni mahte he bem&icirc;{d}an,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ne hi far theru menigi sprac</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2050</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">te themu br&ucirc;digumon,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>qua{d} that simbla that bezte l&icirc;{d}</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">alloro erlo gehuilic<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ecirc;rist scoldi</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ge{b}an at is g&ocirc;mun:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;undar thiu uuir{d}id [thero] gumono hugi</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">auuekid mid uu&icirc;nu,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that sie uuel bl&icirc;{d}od,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">druncan dr&ocirc;mead.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Than mag man thar dragan aftar thiu</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2055</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[l&icirc;htl&icirc;cora] l&icirc;{d}:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; ist thesoro liudeo thau.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Than ha{b}as thu nu uunderl&icirc;co<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuerdskepi th&icirc;nan</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gemarcod far thesoro menigi:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>h&ecirc;tis far thit manno folc</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">alles th&icirc;nes uu&icirc;nes<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that uuirsiste</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">th&icirc;ne ambahtman<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ecirc;rist brengean,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2060</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ge{b}an [at] th&icirc;nun g&ocirc;mun.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Nu sint th&icirc;na gesti sade,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sint th&icirc;ne druhtingos<span class="f_canusg">| </span>druncane su&icirc;{d}o,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">is thit folc [fr&ocirc;m&ocirc;d]:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>nu h&ecirc;tis thu h&icirc;r for{d} dragan</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">alloro l&icirc;{d}o lofsamost,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thero [the ic eo an thesumu liohte gesah]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">huergin hebbean.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Mid thius scoldis thu &ucirc;s hindag &ecirc;r</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2065</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ge{b}on endi g&ocirc;mean:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>than it alloro gumono gehuilic</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gethigedi te thanke.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; uuar{d} thar thegan manag</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">geuuar aftar them uuordun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&icirc;{d}or sie thes uu&icirc;nes gedruncun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that [thar] the h&ecirc;logo Crist<span class="f_canusg">| </span>an themu h&ucirc;se innan</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">t&ecirc;can uuarhte:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>tr&ucirc;odun sie s&icirc;{d}or</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2070</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thiu m&ecirc;r an is mundburd,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that hi [habdi] maht godes,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">geuuald an thesoro uueroldi.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; uuar{d} that s&ocirc; uu&icirc;do c&ucirc;{d}</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">o{b}ar [Galileo land]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Iudeo liudiun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hu&ocirc; thar sel{b}o gededa<span class="f_canusg">| </span>sunu drohtines</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuater te uu&icirc;ne:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that uuar{d} thar uundro &ecirc;rist,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2075</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thero [the] hi thar an Galilea<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Iudeo [liudeon],</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">t&ecirc;cno get&ocirc;gdi.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Ne mag [that] getellean man,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">geseggean te s&ocirc;{d}an,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>huat thar s&icirc;{d}or uuar{d}</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uundres undar themu uuerode,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thar uualdand Crist</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an godes namon<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Iudeo liudeon</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2080</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">allan langan dag<span class="f_canusg">| </span>l&ecirc;ra sagde,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gih&ecirc;t im [he{b}enr&icirc;ki]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi helleo gethuing</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uueride mid uuordun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>h&ecirc;t sie uuara godes,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sinl&icirc;f s&ocirc;kean:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thar is seolono lioht,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">dr&ocirc;m drohtines<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi dagsk&icirc;mon,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2085</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">g&ocirc;d[l&icirc;cnissea] godes;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thar g&ecirc;st manag</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uunod an uuillean,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>the h&icirc;r uuel thenkid,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that he h&icirc;r bihalde<span class="f_canusg">| </span>he{b}encuninges gebod.</h3>
   </td>
  </tr>
</table>
</div>

<h1>Heliand</h1>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h2>Fitte XXV</h2>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
    </td>

  <tr>

    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="50"><h6>&nbsp;</h6></td>
	<td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;">
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;"><span class="f_ruberi">G</span>euu&ecirc;t imu th&ocirc; mid is iungoron<span class="f_canusg">| </span>fan them g&ocirc;mun [for{d}]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Kristus te Capharnaum,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>cuningo r&icirc;keost,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2090</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">te theru m&acirc;reon burg.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Megin samnode,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gumon imu tegegnes,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>g&ocirc;doro [manno]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&acirc;lig ges&icirc;{d}i:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uueldun thiu [is] su&ocirc;tean uuord</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;lag [h&ocirc;rien.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thar] im &ecirc;n hunno quam,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&ecirc;n g&ocirc;d man angegin<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi ina gerno bad</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2095</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">helpan h&ecirc;lagne,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>qua{d} that hi undar is h&icirc;uuiskea</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&ecirc;nna lefna [lamon]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>lango habdi,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">seocan an is sel{d}on:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;s&ocirc; ina &ecirc;nig seggeo ne mag</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">handun geh&ecirc;lien.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Nu is im th&icirc;noro helpono tharf,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fr&ocirc; m&icirc;n the g&ocirc;do.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; sprac im eft that fri{d}ubarn godes</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2100</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&acirc;n aftar thiu<span class="f_canusg">| </span>sel{b}o tegegnes,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">qua{d} that he thar qu&acirc;mi<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi that kind [uueldi]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">nerean [af] theru n&ocirc;di.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; im n&acirc;hor geng</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">the man far theru menigi<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uui{d} s&ocirc; mahtigna</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuordun uuehslan:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;ic thes uuir{d}ig ne bium,&raquo; qua{d} he,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2105</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;h&ecirc;rro the g&ocirc;do,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that thu an m&icirc;n h&ucirc;s cumes,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&ocirc;keas m&icirc;na seli{d}a,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>huand ic bium s&ocirc; sundig man</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">mid uuordun endi mid uuercun.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Ic gel&ocirc;{b}iu that thu geuuald ha{b}as,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that thu ina [hinana] maht<span class="f_canusg">| </span>h&ecirc;lan geuuirkean,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uualdand fr&ocirc; m&icirc;n:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ef thu it mid [th&icirc;nun uuordun] gesprikis,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2110</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">than is s&acirc;n thiu l&ecirc;fh&ecirc;d l&ocirc;sot<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi uuir{d}id is l&icirc;chamo</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;l endi hr&ecirc;ni,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ef thu im th&icirc;na helpa fargi{b}is.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Ic bium mi ambahtman,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>hebbiu mi &ocirc;des gen&ocirc;g,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuelono geuunnen:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thoh ic undar geuueldi s&icirc;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">a{d}alcuninges,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[thoh] hebbiu ic erlo getr&ocirc;st,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2115</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">holde heririncos,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thea mi s&ocirc; geh&ocirc;riga sint,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that sie thes ne uuord ne uuerc<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuiht ne farl&acirc;tad,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thes ic sie an thesumu landskepie<span class="f_canusg">| </span>l&ecirc;stean [h&ecirc;te,]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ac sie farad endi frummiad<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi eft te iro fr&ocirc;han cumad,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">holde te iro h&ecirc;rron.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thoh ic at m&icirc;numu h&ucirc;s &ecirc;gi</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2120</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&icirc;dbr&ecirc;dene uuelon<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi uuerodes gen&ocirc;g,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">heli{d}os hugider{b}ie,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[thoh] ni gidar ic thi s&ocirc; h&ecirc;lagna</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">biddien, barn godes,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that thu an m&icirc;n b&ucirc; gangas,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&ocirc;keas m&icirc;na seli{d}a,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>huand ic s&ocirc; sundig bium,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&ecirc;t m&icirc;na faruurhti.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; sprac eft uualdand Crist,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2125</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">the gumo uui{d} is iungoron,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>qua{d} that hi an Iudeon huergin</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">undar Israheles<span class="f_canusg">| </span>a{b}oron ne fundi</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gemacon thes mannes,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>the io m&ecirc;r te gode</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an themu landskepi<span class="f_canusg">| </span>gel&ocirc;{b}on habdi,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[than] hluttron te himile:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;nu l&acirc;tu ic iu thar h&ocirc;rien t&ocirc;,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2130</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thar ic it iu te uu&acirc;run h&icirc;r<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuordun seggeo,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that noh sculun elitheoda<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[&ocirc;stane] endi [uestane],</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">mancunnies cuman<span class="f_canusg">| </span>manag tesamne,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[h&ecirc;lag folc godes<span class="f_canusg">| </span>an he{b}enr&icirc;ki]:</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thea motun thar an Abrahames<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi an Isaakes s&ocirc; self</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2135</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">endi [&ocirc;c] an Iacobes,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>g&ocirc;doro manno,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">barmun restien<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi b&ecirc;{d}iu gethologean,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuelon endi uuilleon<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi uuonotsam l&icirc;f,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">g&ocirc;d lioht mid gode.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Than scal [Iudeono] filu,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">theses r&icirc;keas suni<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ber&ocirc;{b}ode uuer{d}en,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2140</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[bed&ecirc;lide] sulicoro diur{d}o,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi sculun an dalun thiustron</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an themu alloro ferristan<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ferne liggen.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Thar mag man geh&ocirc;rien<span class="f_canusg">| </span>heli{d}os qu&icirc;{d}ean,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thar sie iro torn manag<span class="f_canusg">| </span>tandon b&icirc;tad;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thar ist [gristgrimmo]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi gr&acirc;dag fiur,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2145</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hard [helleo gethuing],<span class="f_canusg">| </span>h&ecirc;t endi thiustri,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[suart] sinnahti<span class="f_canusg">| </span>sundea te l&ocirc;ne,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uur&ecirc;{d}oro geuurhteo,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; huemu s&ocirc; thes uuilleon ne ha{b}ad,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that he [ina] al&ocirc;sie,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ecirc;r hi thit lioht age{b}e,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuendie fan thesoro uueroldi.<span class="f_canusg">|</span>Nu maht thu thi an th&icirc;nan uuilleon for{d}</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2150</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&icirc;{d}on te sel{d}un;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>than findis thugesundat h&ucirc;s</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">magoiungan man:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>m&ocirc;d is imu an luston,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that barn is geh&ecirc;lid,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; thu b&ecirc;di te mi:</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">it uuir{d}id al s&ocirc; gel&ecirc;stid,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; thu gel&ocirc;{b}on ha{b}as</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an th&icirc;numu hugi hardo.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; sagde he{b}encuninge,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2155</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">the ambahtman<span class="f_canusg">| </span>alouualdon gode</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thanc for thero thiodo,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thes he imu at sulicun thar{b}un halp.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Habda tho gi&acirc;rundid,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>al s&ocirc; he uuelde,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&acirc;ligl&icirc;co:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>giuu&ecirc;t imu an thana s&icirc;{d} thanan,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuende an is uuillean,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thar he uuelon &ecirc;hte,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2160</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">b&ucirc; endi b&ocirc;dlos:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>fand [that] barn gesund,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">kindiungan [man].<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Kristes uu&acirc;run th&ocirc;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuord [gefullot:]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>hi geuuald habda</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">te [t&ocirc;geanna] t&ecirc;can,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; that ni mag gitellien man,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">geahton o{b}ar thesoro er{d}u,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>huat he thurh is &ecirc;nes craft</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2165</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an [thesaro] middilgard<span class="f_canusg">| </span>m&acirc;ri{d}a gefrumide,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uundres geuuarhte,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>huand al an is geuueldi st&acirc;d,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">himil endi er{d}e.<span class="f_canusg">| </span></h3>
   </td>
  </tr>
</table>

<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h2>Fitte XXVI</h2>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
    </td>

  <tr>
