  </tr>
  <tr>
	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="50"><h6>&nbsp;</h6></td>
	<td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;">
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:200px;"><span class="f_canusg">| </span><span class="f_ruberi">T</span>h&ocirc; geuu&ecirc;t imu the h&ecirc;logo Crist</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">for{d}uuardes faren,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[fremide] alomahtig</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">alloro dago gehuilikes,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>drohtin the g&ocirc;do,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2170</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">liudeo barnum leof,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[l&ecirc;rde] mid uuordun</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">godes uuilleon gumun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>habda imu iungorono filu</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">simbla te gis&icirc;{d}un,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&acirc;lig folc godes,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">manno megincraft,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>managoro theodo,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;lag heriskepi,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuas is helpono g&ocirc;d,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2175</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">mannun mildi.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; hi mid theru menigi quam,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">mid thiu brahtmu that barn godes<span class="f_canusg">| </span>te burg theru h&ocirc;hon,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">the neriendo te Naim:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thar scolde is namo uuer{d}en</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">mannun gem&acirc;rid.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; geng mahtig t&ocirc;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">neriendo Crist,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>antat he gin&acirc;hid uuas,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2180</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[h&ecirc;leandero bezt:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>th&ocirc;] s&acirc;hun sie thar &ecirc;n hr&ecirc;o dragan,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[&ecirc;nan] l&icirc;fl&ocirc;san l&icirc;chamon<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thea liudi [f&ocirc;rien],</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[beran] an &ecirc;naru b&acirc;ru<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ucirc;t at [thera] burges dore,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">maguiungan man.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thiu m&ocirc;der aftar geng</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an iro hugi hriuuig<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi handun sl&ocirc;g,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2185</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">carode endi c&ucirc;mde<span class="f_canusg">| </span>iro kindes d&ocirc;{d},</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">idis armscapan;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>it uuas ira [&ecirc;nag] barn:</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">siu uuas iru uuidouua,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ne habda uunnea than m&ecirc;r,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[bi&ucirc;ten] te themu &ecirc;nagun sunie<span class="f_canusg">| </span>al [gel&acirc;ten]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uunnea endi uuillean,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>anttat ina iru uur{d} benam,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2190</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">m&acirc;ri metodogescapu.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Megin folgode,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">burgliudeo gebrac,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thar man ina an [b&acirc;ru] dr&ocirc;g,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">iungan man te gra{b}e.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thar uuar{d} imu the godes sunu,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">mahtig mildi<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi te theru m&ocirc;der sprac,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;t that thiu uuidouua<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uu&ocirc;p farl&ecirc;ti,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2195</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">cara aftar themu kinde:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;thu scalt [h&icirc;r craft sehan],</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uualdandes giuuerc:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thi scal h&icirc;r uuilleo [gestanden],</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fr&ocirc;fra far thesumu folke:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ne tharft thu ferah caron</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">barnes th&icirc;nes.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thuo hie ti thero b&acirc;ron geng</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">iac hie ina sel{b}o anthr&ecirc;n,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>suno drohtines,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2200</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;lagon handon,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi ti them heli{d}e sprak,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hiet ina s&ocirc; alaiungan<span class="f_canusg">| </span>upp astandan,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ar&icirc;san fan theru restun.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thie rinc up asat,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that barn an thero b&acirc;run:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuar{d} im eft an is briost cuman</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thie g&ecirc;st thuru godes craft,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi hie tegegnes sprac,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2205</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">the man uui{d} is m&acirc;gos.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thuo ina eft thero muoder bifalah</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;landi Crist an hand:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>hugi uuar{d} iro te fro{b}ra,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thes uu&icirc;{b}es an uunneon,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>huand iro thar sulic uuilleo gistuod.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Fell siu th&ocirc; te fuotun Cristes<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi thena folco drohtin</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">lo{b}oda for thero liudeo menigi,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>huand hie iro at s&ocirc; liobes ferahe</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2210</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">mundoda uui{d}er metodigisceftie:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>farstuod siu that hie uuas thie mahtigo drohtin,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thie h&ecirc;lago, thie himiles giuualdid,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi that hie mahti gihelpan managon,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">allon irminthiedon.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thuo bigunnun that ahton managa,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that uunder, that under them uueroda giburida,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>qu&acirc;{d}un that uualdand sel{b}o,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">mahtig qu&acirc;mi tharod is menigi uu&icirc;son,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi that hie im s&ocirc; m&acirc;rean sandi</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2215</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&acirc;rsagon an thero [uueroldes r&icirc;ki,]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thie im thar sulican uuilleon frumidi.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Uuar{d} thar thuo erl manag<span class="f_canusg">| </span>egison bifangan,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that folc uuar{d} an forohton:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>gis&acirc;hun thena is ferah &ecirc;gan,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">dages lioht sehan,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thena the &ecirc;r d&ocirc;{d} fornam,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an suhtbeddeon sualt:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thuo uuas im eft gisund after thiu,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2220</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">kindiung aquicot.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thuo uuar{d} that k&ucirc;{d} obar all</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">a{b}aron Israheles.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Reht s&ocirc; thuo &acirc;{b}and quam,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&ocirc; uuar{d} thar all gisamnod<span class="f_canusg">| </span>seokora manno,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">haltaro endi h&acirc;{b}aro,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; huat s&ocirc; thar huergin uuas,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thia l&ecirc;{b}un under them liudeon,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi uur{d}un thar gil&ecirc;dit tuo,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2225</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">cumana te Criste,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thar hie im thuru is craft mikil</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">halp endi sie h&ecirc;lda,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi liet sia eft gihaldana thanan</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuendan an iro uuilleon.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Bethiu scal man is uuerc lo{b}on,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">diuran is d&acirc;di,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>huand hie is drohtin self,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">mahtig mundboro<span class="f_canusg">| </span>manno kunnie,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2230</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">liudeo s&ocirc; huilicon,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; thar gil&ocirc;bit tuo</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an is uuord endi an is uuerc.<span class="f_canusg">| </span></h3>
   </td>
  </tr>
</table>
</div>
<!--  finis contentus  -->

<div class="titulus2">
<p>Heliand</p>
<p>um 830</p>

<div class="contentus">
<table width="650" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
  <tr>
	<td width="50">&nbsp;</td>
	<td  width="600">
<h1>Heliand</h1>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h2>Fitte XXVII</h2>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="650" colspan="2" >
<p style="color:#996699;">______________________________________________________________________________</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="50"><h6>&nbsp;</h6></td>
	<td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;">
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:200px;"><span class="f_canusg">| </span><span class="f_ruberi">T</span>huo uuas thar uuerodes s&ocirc; filo</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">allaro elithiodo [cuman<span class="f_canusg">| </span>te] them &ecirc;ron Cristes,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[te] s&ocirc; mahtiges mundburd.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thuo uuelda hie thar &ecirc;na meri l&icirc;{d}an,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thie godes suno mid is iungron<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ane{b}an Galilealand,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2235</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uualdand &ecirc;nna [uu&acirc;go str&ocirc;m].<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thuo hiet hie that uuerod &ocirc;{d}ar</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">for{d}uuerdes faran,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi hie giuu&ecirc;t im fahora sum</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an &ecirc;nna nacon innan,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>neriendi Crist,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sl&acirc;pan s&icirc;{d}uu&ocirc;rig.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Segel [up] d&acirc;dun</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuederuu&icirc;sa uueros,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>lietun uuind after</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2240</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">manon o{b}ar thena meristr&ocirc;m,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>unthat hie te middean quam,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uualdand mid is uuerodu.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thuo bigan thes uuedares craft,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&ucirc;st up st&icirc;gan,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ucirc;{d}iun uuahsan;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">suang gisuerc an gimang:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thie s&ecirc;u uuar{d} an hruoru,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuan uuind endi uuater;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uueros sorogodun,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2245</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thiu meri uuar{d} s&ocirc; muodag,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ni uu&acirc;nda thero manno nig&ecirc;n</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">lengron l&icirc;{b}es.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thuo [sia] landes uuard</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuekidun mid iro uuordon<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi sagdun im thes uuedares craft,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">b&acirc;dun that im gin&acirc;{d}ig<span class="f_canusg">| </span>neriendi Crist</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uur{d}i uui{d} them uuatare:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;eftha uui sculun hier te uunderqu&acirc;lu</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2250</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sueltan an theson s&ecirc;uue.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Self upp ar&ecirc;s</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thie guodo godes suno<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi te is iungron sprak,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hiet that sia im uuedares giuuin<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuiht ni andr&ecirc;din:</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;te hu&icirc; sind gi s&ocirc; forhta?&raquo; quathie.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;Nis iu noh fast hugi,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gil&ocirc;{b}o is iu te luttil.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Nis nu lang te thiu,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2255</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that thia str&ocirc;mos sculun<span class="f_canusg">| </span>stilrun uuer{d}an</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[gi thit] uuedar uunsam.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Tho hi te [themu] uuinde sprac</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ge te themu s&ecirc;uua s&ocirc; self<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi sie smultro h&ecirc;t</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[b&ecirc;{d}ea] geb&acirc;rean.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Sie gibod l&ecirc;stun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uualdandes uuord:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uueder stillodun,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2260</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fagar uuar{d} [an] fl&ocirc;de.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; [bigan] that folc undar im,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[uuerod uundraian],<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi suma mid [iro] uuordun spr&acirc;kun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">huilic that s&ocirc; mahtigoro<span class="f_canusg">| </span>manno uu&acirc;ri,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that imu s&ocirc; the uuind endi the uu&acirc;g<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuordu h&ocirc;rdin,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[b&ecirc;{d}ea] is gibodskepies.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; habda sie that barn godes</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2265</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ginerid fan theru n&ocirc;di:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>the naco fur{d}or skreid,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[h&ocirc;h hurnidskip];<span class="f_canusg">| </span>heli{d}os [qu&acirc;mun],</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[liudi] te lande,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>sagdun lof gode,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">m&acirc;ridun is megincraft.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Quam thar manno filu</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">angegin [themu] godes [sunie];<span class="f_canusg">| </span>he sie gerno antfeng,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2270</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&ocirc; huene s&ocirc; thar mid [hluttru hugi]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>helpa s&ocirc;hte;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">l&ecirc;rde sie iro gil&ocirc;{b}on<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi iro l&icirc;chamon</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">handun h&ecirc;lde:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>nio the man s&ocirc; hardo ni uuas</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[gis&ecirc;rit] mid suhtiun:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thoh ina Satanases</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">f&ecirc;knea iungoron<span class="f_canusg">| </span>f&icirc;undes craftu</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2275</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">habdin undar handun<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi is hugiskefti,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[giuuit] auuardid,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that he uu&ocirc;diendi</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">f&ocirc;ri undar themu folke,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thoh im simbla [ferh fargaf]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;landeo Crist,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ef he te is handun quam,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">dr&ecirc;f thea diu{b}las thanan<span class="f_canusg">| </span>drohtines craftu,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2280</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&acirc;run uuordun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi im is geuuit fargaf,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">l&ecirc;t ina than h&ecirc;lan<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uui{d}er hetteandun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gaf im uui{d} thie f&icirc;und fri{d}u,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi im for{d} giuu&ecirc;t</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an s&ocirc; [huilic] thero lando,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; im [than] leo{b}ost uuas.</h3>
   </td>
  </tr>
</table>
</div>

BIBLIOTHECA AUGUSTANA

<div class="titulus2">
<p>Heliand</p>
<p>um 830</p>

<div class="contentus">
<table width="650" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
  <tr>
	<td width="50">&nbsp;</td>
	<td  width="600">
<h1>Heliand</h1>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h2>Fitte XXVIII</h2>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="650" colspan="2" >
<p style="color:#996699;">______________________________________________________________________________</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="50"><h6>&nbsp;</h6></td>
	<td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;">
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;"><span class="f_ruberi">S</span>&ocirc; deda the drohtines sunu<span class="f_canusg">| </span>dago gehuilikes</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2285</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[g&ocirc;d uuerk] mid is iungeron,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; neo Iudeon umbi that</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an thea is mikilun craft<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thiu m&ecirc;r ne gel&ocirc;{b}dun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that he alouualdo<span class="f_canusg">| </span>alles uu&acirc;ri,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">landes endi liudio:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thes sie noh l&ocirc;n nimat,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&icirc;dana uuracs&icirc;{d},<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thes sie thar that geuuin dri{b}un</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2290</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uui{d} [sel{b}an] thene [sunu drohtines].<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; he [im] mid is ges&icirc;{d}on giuu&ecirc;t</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">eft an [Galil&aelig;o land],<span class="f_canusg">| </span>godes &ecirc;gan barn,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">f&ocirc;r im te them friundun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thar he af&ocirc;did uuas</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">endi al undar is cunnie<span class="f_canusg">| </span>kindiung auu&ocirc;hs,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">the h&ecirc;lago h&ecirc;leand.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Umbi ina heriskepi,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2295</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">theoda thrungun;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thar uuas thegan manag</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&ocirc; s&acirc;lig undar them ges&icirc;{d}e.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thar dr&ocirc;gun &ecirc;nna seocan man</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">erlos an [iro] armun:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uueldun ina for &ocirc;gun Kristes,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">brengean for that barn godes &ndash; <span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuas im b&ocirc;tono tharf,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that ina geh&ecirc;ldi<span class="f_canusg">| </span>he{b}enes uualdand,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2300</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">manno mundboro &ndash;,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>the uuas &ecirc;r s&ocirc; managan dag</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">li{d}uuuastmon bilamod,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ni mahte is l&icirc;chamon</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[uuiht] geuualdan.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Than uuas thar uuerodes s&ocirc; filu,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that sie ina fora that barn godes<span class="f_canusg">| </span>brengean ni mahtun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gethringan thurh thea thioda,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that sie [s&ocirc;] thurftiges</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2305</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sunnea gesagdin.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; giuu&ecirc;t imu an &ecirc;nna seli innan</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[h&ecirc;leando] Crist;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[huarf] uuar{d} thar umbi,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">megintheodo gemang.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; bigunnun thea man spreken,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">the thene l&ecirc;fna lamon<span class="f_canusg">| </span>lango f&ocirc;rdun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">b&acirc;run mid is beddiu,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>hu&ocirc; sie ina gedr&ocirc;gin fora that [barn godes],</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2310</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[an] that uuerod innan,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thar ina uualdand Crist</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sel{b}o gis&acirc;uui.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; gengun thea ges&icirc;{d}os t&ocirc;,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ocirc;{b}un ina mid iro handun<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi uppan that h&ucirc;s stigun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">slitun thene seli o{b}ana<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi [ina] mid s&ecirc;lun l&ecirc;tun</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an thene rakud innan,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thar the r&icirc;keo uuas,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2315</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">cuningo craftigost.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Reht s&ocirc; he ina [th&ocirc;] kuman gisah</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thurh thes h&ucirc;ses hr&ocirc;st,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; he th&ocirc; an iro hugi farst&ocirc;d,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an thero manno m&ocirc;dse{b}on,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that sie [mikilana] te imu</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gel&ocirc;{b}on habdun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>th&ocirc; he for then liudiun sprak,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">qua{d} that he thene [siakon] man<span class="f_canusg">| </span>sundeono t&ocirc;mean</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2320</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">l&acirc;tan uueldi.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; spr&acirc;kun im eft thea liudi angegin,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[gramharde] Iudeon,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thea thes godes barnes</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuord [aftaruuarodun],<span class="f_canusg">| </span>qu&acirc;{d}un that that ni mahti giuuer{d}en s&ocirc;,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">grimuuerc farge{b}en,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[bi&ucirc;tan] god &ecirc;no,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uualdand thesaro uueroldes.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; habda eft is uuord garu</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2325</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">mahtig barn godes:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;ik gid&ocirc;n that&raquo;, qua{d} he, &laquo;an thesumu [manne] sk&icirc;n,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">the h&icirc;r s&ocirc; siak ligid<span class="f_canusg">| </span>an thesumu seli innan,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[te] uundron giuu&ecirc;gid,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that ik geuuald hebbiu</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sundea te farge{b}anne<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi &ocirc;c seokan man</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">te geh&ecirc;leanne,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; ik ina hr&icirc;nan ni tharf.&raquo;</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2330</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Manoda ina th&ocirc;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>the m&acirc;reo drohtin,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">liggeandean lamon,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>h&ecirc;t ina far them liudiun astandan</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">up aloh&ecirc;lan<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi h&ecirc;t ina an is ahslun niman,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">is bedgiuu&acirc;di te baka;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>he that gibod l&ecirc;ste</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sniumo for [themu gis&icirc;{d}ea]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi geng imu eft gesund thanan,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2335</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;l fan themu h&ucirc;se.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; thes s&ocirc; manag h&ecirc;{d}in man,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uueros uundradun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>qu&acirc;{d}un that imu uualdand self,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">god alomahtig<span class="f_canusg">| </span>farge{b}an habdi</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">m&ecirc;ron mahti<span class="f_canusg">| </span>than elcor &ecirc;nigumu mannes sunie,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">craft endi c&ucirc;sti;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>sie ni uueldun antkennean thoh,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2340</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Iudeo liudi,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that he god uu&acirc;ri,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ne gel&ocirc;{b}dun is l&ecirc;ran,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ac habdun im l&ecirc;{d}an str&icirc;d,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uunnun uui{d}ar is uuordun:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thes sie uuerk hlutun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">l&ecirc;{d}l&icirc;c l&ocirc;ngeld,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi s&ocirc; noh lango sculun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thes sie ni uueldun h&ocirc;rien<span class="f_canusg">| </span>he{b}en[cuninges],</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2345</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Cristes l&ecirc;run,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thea he c&ucirc;{d}de o{b}ar al,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&icirc;do aftar thesaro uueroldi,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi l&ecirc;t sie is uuerk sehan</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">allaro dago gehuilikes,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>is d&acirc;di scauuon,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ocirc;rien is h&ecirc;lag uuord,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>the he te helpu gesprak</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">manno barnun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi s&ocirc; manag mahtigl&icirc;c</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2350</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">t&ecirc;can get&ocirc;gda,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that sie [gitr&ucirc;odin] thiu bet,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gil&ocirc;{b}din [an] is [l&ecirc;ra].<span class="f_canusg">| </span>He s&ocirc; managan l&icirc;chamon</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">balusuhteo [antband<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi] b&ocirc;ta geskeride,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fargaf f&ecirc;giun ferah,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>them the [f&ucirc;sid] uuas</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">heli{d} an hels&icirc;{d}:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[than gideda ina the] h&ecirc;land self,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2355</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Crist thurh is craft mikil<span class="f_canusg">| </span>quican aftar d&ocirc;{d}a,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">l&ecirc;t ina an thesaro uueroldi for{d}<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uunneono neotan.</h3>
   </td>
  </tr>
</table>

<p>Heliand</p>
<p>um 830</p>

<div class="contentus">
<table width="650" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
  <tr>
	<td width="50">&nbsp;</td>
	<td  width="600">
<h1>Heliand</h1>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h2>Fitte XXIX</h2>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="650" colspan="2" >
<p style="color:#996699;">______________________________________________________________________________</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="50"><h6>&nbsp;</h6></td>
	<td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;">
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;"><span class="f_ruberi">S</span>&ocirc; h&ecirc;lde he thea haltun man<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi thea h&acirc;{b}on s&ocirc; self,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">b&ocirc;tta, them thar blinde uu&acirc;run,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>l&ecirc;t sie [that] berhte lioht,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sinsc&ocirc;ni sean,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>sundea l&ocirc;sda,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2360</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gumono grimuuerk.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Ni uuas gio [Iudeono] bethiu,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">l&ecirc;{d}es liudskepies<span class="f_canusg">| </span>gil&ocirc;{b}o thiu betara</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an thene h&ecirc;lagon Crist,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ac habdun im hardene m&ocirc;d,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">su&icirc;{d}o starkan str&icirc;d,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>farstandan ni uueldun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that sie habdun [forfangan]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>f&icirc;undun an uuillean,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2365</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">liudi mid iro gel&ocirc;{b}un.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Ni uuas gio thiu latoro bethiu</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sunu drohtines,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ac he sagde mid uuordun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hu&ocirc; sie [scoldin gehalon]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>himiles r&icirc;ki,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">l&ecirc;rde aftar themu lande,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>habde imu thero liudio s&ocirc; filu</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">giuuenid mid is uuordun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that im uuerod mikil,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2370</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">folc folgoda,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi he im filu sagda,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">be bili{d}iun that barn godes,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thes sie ni mahtun an iro breostun farstandan,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">undarhuggean an iro herton,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ecirc;r it im the h&ecirc;lago Crist</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">o{b}ar that erlo folc<span class="f_canusg">| </span>oponun uuordun</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thurh is sel{b}es craft<span class="f_canusg">| </span>seggean uuelda,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2375</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">m&acirc;rean huat he m&ecirc;nde.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thar ina megin umbi,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thioda thrungun:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuas im tharf mikil</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">te gih&ocirc;rienne<span class="f_canusg">| </span>he{b}encuninges</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&acirc;rfastun uuord.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>He st&ocirc;d imu th&ocirc; bi &ecirc;nes uuatares sta{d}e,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ni uuelde th&ocirc; bi themu gethringe<span class="f_canusg">| </span>o{b}ar that thegno folc</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2380</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an themu lande uppan<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thea l&ecirc;ra c&ucirc;{d}ean,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ac geng imu th&ocirc; the g&ocirc;do<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi is iungaron mid imu,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fri{d}ubarn godes,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>themu fl&ocirc;de n&acirc;hor</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an &ecirc;n skip innan,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi it scalden h&ecirc;t</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">lande r&ucirc;mur,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that ina thea liudi s&ocirc; filu,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2385</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thioda ni thrungi.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>St&ocirc;d thegan manag,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuerod bi themu uuatare,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thar uualdand Crist</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">o{b}ar that liudio folc<span class="f_canusg">| </span>l&ecirc;ra sagde:</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;huat, ik iu seggean mag&raquo;, qua{d} he,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;ges&icirc;{d}os m&icirc;ne,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hu&ocirc; imu &ecirc;n erl bigan<span class="f_canusg">| </span>an er{d}u [s&acirc;ian]</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2390</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[hr&ecirc;ncorni] mid is handun.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Sum it an [hardan] sten</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[o{b}an]uuardan fel,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>er{d}on ni habda,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that it [thar] mahti uuahsan<span class="f_canusg">| </span>eftha [uurteo] gif&acirc;han,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">k&icirc;nan eftha bicl&icirc;{b}en,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ac uuar{d} that corn farloren,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[that thar an theru l&ecirc;ian gilag].<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Sum it eft an land bifel,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2395</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an er{d}un a{d}alcunnies:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>bigan imu aftar thiu</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuahsen uu&acirc;nl&icirc;co<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi uurteo f&acirc;han,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[l&ocirc;d] an lustun:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuas that land s&ocirc; g&ocirc;d,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fr&acirc;nisco gifehod.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Sum it eft bifallen uuar{d}</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an &ecirc;na starca str&acirc;tun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thar st&ocirc;pon gengun,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2400</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hrosso h&ocirc;fslaga<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi heli{d}o [tr&acirc;da];</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[uuar{d} imu thar an er{d}u<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi eft up gigeng],</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">bigan imu an themu uuege uuahsen;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>th&ocirc; it eft thes uuerodes farnam,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thes folkes fard mikil<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi fuglos al&acirc;sun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that [is] themu &ecirc;csan uuiht<span class="f_canusg">| </span>aftar ni m&ocirc;ste</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2405</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuer{d}an te uuillean,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thes thar an thene uueg bifel.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Sum uuar{d} it than bifallen,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thar s&ocirc; filu st&ocirc;dun</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thicchero thorno<span class="f_canusg">| </span>an themu dage;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuar{d} imu thar an er{d}u<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi eft up gigeng,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">k&ecirc;n imu thar endi [cli{b}ode].<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thar [sl&ocirc;gun thar] eft cr&ucirc;d an gimang,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2410</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uueridun imu thene uuastom:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>habda it thes uualdes hlea</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">forana [o{b}arfangan],<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that it ni [mahte] te &ecirc;nigaro frumu uuer{d}en,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ef [it] thea thornos s&ocirc;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thringan [m&ocirc;stun].&raquo;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Th&ocirc; s&acirc;tun endi su&icirc;godun<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ges&icirc;{d}os Cristes,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuordsp&acirc;ha uueros:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuas im uundar mikil,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2415</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">be huilicun bili{d}iun<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that barn godes</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sulic s&ocirc;{d}l&icirc;c spel<span class="f_canusg">| </span>seggean bigunni.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Th&ocirc; bigan is thero erlo<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ecirc;n fr&acirc;goian</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">holdan h&ecirc;rron,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>hn&ecirc;g imu tegegnes</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">tulgo uuer{d}lico:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;huat, thu geuuald ha{b}as&raquo;, [qua{d} he],</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2420</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;ia an [himile ia an er{d}u],<span class="f_canusg">| </span>h&ecirc;lag drohtin,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[uppa endi ni{d}ara],<span class="f_canusg">| </span>bist thu alouualdo</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gumono g&ecirc;sto,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi uui th&icirc;ne iungaron sind,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an [&ucirc;sumu] hugi holde.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>H&ecirc;rro the g&ocirc;do,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ef it th&icirc;n uuilleo s&icirc;,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>l&acirc;t &ucirc;s th&icirc;naro uuordo thar</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2425</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">endi gih&ocirc;rien,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that uui it aftar thi</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">o{b}ar al cristinfolc<span class="f_canusg">| </span>c&ucirc;{d}ean m&ocirc;tin.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Uui uuitun that th&icirc;nun uuordun<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uu&acirc;rl&icirc;c bili{d}i</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">for{d} folgoiad,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi &ucirc;s is firinun tharf,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that uui th&icirc;n uuord endi th&icirc;n uuerk, &ndash;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>huand [it] fan sulicumu geuuittea cumid &ndash;</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2430</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that uui it an thesumu [lande at thi]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>l&icirc;non m&ocirc;tin.&raquo;</h3>
   </td>
  </tr>
</table>
</div>

<h2>Fitte XXX</h2>

  <tr>
	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="50"><h6>&nbsp;</h6></td>
	<td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;">
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;"><span class="f_ruberi">T</span>h&ocirc; im eft tegegnes<span class="f_canusg">| </span>gumono bezta</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">anduuordi gesprak:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;ni m&ecirc;nde ik elcor uuiht&raquo;, [qua{d} he,]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;te bidernienne<span class="f_canusg">| </span>d&acirc;dio m&icirc;naro,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuordo eftha uuerco;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thit sculun gi [uuitan] alle,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2435</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">iungaron m&icirc;ne,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>huand iu farge{b}en ha{b}ad</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uualdand thesaro uueroldes,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that gi uuitan m&ocirc;tun</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an iuuuom hugiskeftiun<span class="f_canusg">| </span>himilisc ger&ucirc;ni;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">them &ocirc;{d}run scal man be bili{d}iun<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that gibod godes</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuordun uu&icirc;sien.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Nu uuilliu ik iu te uu&acirc;run hier</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2440</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">m&acirc;rien, huat ik m&ecirc;nde,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that gi m&icirc;na thiu bet</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">o{b}ar al thit landskepi<span class="f_canusg">| </span>l&ecirc;ra farstandan.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">That s&acirc;d, that ik iu sagda,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that is sel{b}es uuord,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thiu h&ecirc;laga l&ecirc;ra<span class="f_canusg">| </span>he{b}encuninges,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hu&ocirc; man thea m&acirc;rien scal<span class="f_canusg">| </span>o{b}ar [thene] middilgard,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2445</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&icirc;do aftar thesaro uueroldi.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Uueros sind im gihugide,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">man misl&icirc;co:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>sum [sulican] m&ocirc;d dregid,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">harda hugiskefti<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi hr&ecirc;an se{b}on,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that ina ni geuuer{d}od,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that he it be iuuuon uuordun due,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that he [thesa] m&icirc;na l&ecirc;ra for{d}<span class="f_canusg">| </span>l&ecirc;stien uuillie,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2450</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ac uuer{d}ad thar s&ocirc; farlorana<span class="f_canusg">| </span>l&ecirc;ra m&icirc;na,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">godes ambusni<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi iuuuaro gumono uuord</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an themu u{b}ilon manne,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; ik iu &ecirc;r sagda,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that that korn faruuar{d},<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that thar mid k&icirc;{d}un ni mahte</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an themu st&ecirc;ne uppan<span class="f_canusg">| </span>stedihaft uuer{d}an.</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2455</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">S&ocirc; uuir{d}id al farloran<span class="f_canusg">| </span>e{d}ilero spr&acirc;ka,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&acirc;rundi godes,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; huat s&ocirc; man themu u{b}ilon manne</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuordun geuu&icirc;sid,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi [he] an thea uuirson hand,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">undar f&icirc;undo folc<span class="f_canusg">| </span>fard gekiusid,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an godes unuuilean<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi an gramono hr&ocirc;m</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2460</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">endi an fiures [farm].<span class="f_canusg">| </span>For{d} scal he [h&ecirc;tean]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">mid is breosthugi<span class="f_canusg">| </span>br&ecirc;da logna.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Nio gi an thesumu lande thiu l&ecirc;s<span class="f_canusg">| </span>l&ecirc;ra m&icirc;na</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuordun ni uu&icirc;siad:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>is theses uuerodes s&ocirc; filu,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">erlo aftar thesaro er{d}un:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>bist&ecirc;d thar &ocirc;{d}ar man,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2465</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">the is [imu iung] endi glau, &ndash;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi ha{b}ad imu g&ocirc;dan m&ocirc;d &ndash;,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">spr&acirc;kono sp&acirc;hi<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi uu&ecirc;t iuuuaro spello gisk&ecirc;d,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hugid is than an is herton<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi h&ocirc;rid thar mid is &ocirc;run [t&ocirc;]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">su&icirc;{d}o niudl&icirc;co<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi n&acirc;hor st&ecirc;d,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an is breost hledid<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that gibod godes,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2470</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">l&icirc;nod endi l&ecirc;stid:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>is is gil&ocirc;{b}o s&ocirc; g&ocirc;d,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">talod imu, hu&ocirc; he &ocirc;{d}rana<span class="f_canusg">| </span>eft gihuer{b}ie</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">m&ecirc;nd&acirc;digan man,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that is m&ocirc;d draga</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hluttra treuua<span class="f_canusg">| </span>te he{b}encuninge.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Than br&ecirc;did an thes breostun<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that gibod godes,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2475</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thie lu{b}igo gil&ocirc;bo,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; an themu lande duod</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that korn mid k&icirc;{d}un,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thar it [gikund] ha{b}ad</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">endi imu thiu [uur{d}] bihagod<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[endi uuederes gang],</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">regin endi sunne,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that it is reht ha{b}ad.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">S&ocirc; duod thiu godes l&ecirc;ra<span class="f_canusg">| </span>an themu g&ocirc;dun manne</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2480</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">dages endi nahtes,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi [gangid] imu [diu{b}al] fer,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uur&ecirc;{d}a uuihti<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi the uuard godes</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">n&acirc;hor mikilu<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[nahtes endi dages],</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">anttat sie ina brengead,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that thar b&ecirc;{d}iu uuir{d}id</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ia thiu l&ecirc;ra te frumu<span class="f_canusg">| </span>liudio barnun,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2485</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[the] fan is m&ucirc;{d}e cumid,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[iac] uuir{d}id the man gode;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ha{b}ad s&ocirc; giuuehslod<span class="f_canusg">| </span>te [thesaro] uueroldstundu</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">mid is hugiskeftiun<span class="f_canusg">| </span>himilr&icirc;keas gid&ecirc;l,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuelono [thene] m&ecirc;stan:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>farid imu an giuuald godes,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[tionuno t&ocirc;mig].<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Treuua sind s&ocirc; g&ocirc;da</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2490</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gumono gehuilicumu,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; nis [goldes] hord</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gel&icirc;k sulicumu gil&ocirc;{b}on.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Uuesad iuuuaro l&ecirc;rono for{d}</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">mancunnie mildie;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>sie sind s&ocirc; misl&icirc;ka,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">heli{d}os gehugda:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>sum ha{b}ad iro hardan str&icirc;d,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uur&ecirc;{d}an uuillean,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuancolna hugi,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2495</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">is imu f&ecirc;knes ful<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi firinuuerko.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Than biginnid imu thunkean,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>than he undar theru thiodu st&acirc;d</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">endi thar gih&ocirc;rid<span class="f_canusg">| </span>o{b}ar hlust [mikil]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thea godes l&ecirc;ra,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>than thunkid imu, that he sie [gerno for{d}]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">l&ecirc;stien uuillie;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>than biginnid imu thiu [l&ecirc;ra godes]</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2500</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an is hugi hafton,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>anttat imu [than] eft an hand cumid</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">feho te gif&ocirc;rea<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi fremi{d}i scat.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Than farl&ecirc;dead ina<span class="f_canusg">| </span>l&ecirc;{d}a uuihti,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">than he imu farf&acirc;hid<span class="f_canusg">| </span>an fehogiri,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">aleskid thene gil&ocirc;bon:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>than uuas imu that luttil fruma,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2505</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that he it gio an is hertan [gehugda,]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ef he it halden ne uuili.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">That is s&ocirc; the uuastom,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>the an themu uuege began,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">liodan an themu lande:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[th&ocirc;] farnam ina eft thero liudio fard.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">S&ocirc; duot [thea] meginsundeon<span class="f_canusg">| </span>an [thes] mannes hugi</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thea godes l&ecirc;ra,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ef he is ni g&ocirc;mid uuel;</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2510</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">elcor bifelliad sia ina<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ferne te bo{d}me,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an thene h&ecirc;tan hel,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[thar] he he{b}encuninge</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[ni uuir{d}id fur{d}ur te frumu,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ac ina f&icirc;und sculun</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[uu&icirc;tiu giuuaragean.]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Simla gi mid uuordun for{d}</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">l&ecirc;read an thesumu lande:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ik can thesaro liudio hugi,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2515</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&ocirc; misl&icirc;can muodse{b}on<span class="f_canusg">| </span>manno cunnies,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&ocirc; uuanda uu&icirc;sa<span class="f_canusg">| </span>. . . . . . . . . . .</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Sum ha{b}it all te thiu is muod gil&acirc;tan<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi [m&ecirc;r] sorogot,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hu&ocirc; hie that [hord] bihalde,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[than] hu&ocirc; hie he{b}ancuninges</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuilleon giuuirkie.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Bethiu thar uuahsan ni mag</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2520</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that h&ecirc;laga gibod godes,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thoh it thar ahafton mugi,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uurtion biuuerpan,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>huand it thie uuelo thringit.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">S&ocirc; samo s&ocirc; that cr&ucirc;d endi thie thorn<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that corn antf&acirc;hat,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uueriat im thena uuastom,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; duot thie uuelo manne:</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">giheftid is herta,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that hie it gihuggian ni muot,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2525</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thie man an is muode,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thes hie m&ecirc;st bitharf,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hu&ocirc; hie that giuuirkie,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>than lang thie hie an thesaro uueroldi s&icirc;,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that hie ti &ecirc;uuondage<span class="f_canusg">| </span>after muoti</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hebbian thuru is h&ecirc;rren thanc<span class="f_canusg">| </span>himiles r&icirc;ki,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&ocirc; endil&ocirc;san uuelon,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; that ni mah &ecirc;nig man</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2530</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuitan an thesaro uueroldi.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Nio hie s&ocirc; uu&icirc;do ni can</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">te githenkeanne,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thegan an is muode,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that it bihaldan mugi<span class="f_canusg">| </span>herta thes mannes,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that hie that ti uu&acirc;ron uuiti,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>huat uualdand god ha{b}it</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">guodes gigereuuid,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that all geginuuerd st&ecirc;{d}</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2535</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">manno s&ocirc; huilicon,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; ina hier minniot uuel</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">endi sel{b}o te thiu<span class="f_canusg">| </span>is seola gihaldit,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that hie an lioht godes<span class="f_canusg">| </span>l&icirc;{d}an muoti.&raquo;</h3>
   </td>
  </tr>
</table>
</div>

<div class="titulus2">
<p>Heliand</p>
<p>um 830</p>
