<div class="contentus">
<table width="650" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
  <tr>
	<td width="50">&nbsp;</td>
	<td  width="600">
<h1>Heliand</h1>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h2>Fitte XXXI</h2>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="650" colspan="2" >
<p style="color:#996699;">______________________________________________________________________________</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="50"><h6>&nbsp;</h6></td>
	<td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;">
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;"><span class="f_ruberi">S</span>&ocirc; uu&icirc;sda hie thuo mid uuordon,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>stuod uuerod mikil</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">umbi that barn godes,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>geh&ocirc;rdun ina bi bili{d}on filo</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2540</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">umbi thesaro uueroldes giuuand<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuordon tellian;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">quat that im &ocirc;c &ecirc;n a{d}ales man<span class="f_canusg">| </span>an is acker s&acirc;idi</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hluttar hr&ecirc;ncorni<span class="f_canusg">| </span>handon s&icirc;non:</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuolda im thar s&ocirc; uunsames<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuastmes tilian,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fagares fruhtes.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thuo geng thar is f&icirc;ond aftar</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2545</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thuru dernian hugi,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi it all mid dur{d}u o{b}ars&ecirc;u,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">mid uueodo uuirsiston.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thuo uu&ocirc;hsun sia b&ecirc;{d}iu,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ge that corn ge that cr&ucirc;d.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>S&ocirc; qu&acirc;mun gangan</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">is hagastoldos te h&ucirc;s,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>iro h&ecirc;rren sagdun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thegnos iro thiodne<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thr&icirc;stion uuordon:</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2550</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;huat, thu s&acirc;idos hluttar corn,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>h&ecirc;rro thie guodo,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[&ecirc;nfald] an th&icirc;non accar:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>nu ni gisihit &ecirc;nig erlo than m&ecirc;r</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uueodes uuahsan.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Hu&icirc; mohta that giuuer{d}an s&ocirc;?&raquo;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Thuo sprak eft thie a{d}ales man<span class="f_canusg">| </span>them erlon tegegnes,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thiodan uui{d} is thegnos,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>quat that hie it magti undarthenkian uuel,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2555</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that im thar unhold man<span class="f_canusg">| </span>aftar s&acirc;ida,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">f&icirc;ond f&ecirc;cni cr&ucirc;d:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;ne gionsta mi thero fruhtio uuel,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">auuerda mi thena uuastom.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thuo thar eft uuini spr&acirc;kun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">is iungron tegegnes,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>qu&acirc;{d}un that sia thar uueldin gangan tuo,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">cuman mid craftu<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi l&ocirc;sian that cr&ucirc;d thanan,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2560</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">halon it mid iro handon.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thuo sprac im eft iro h&ecirc;rro angegin:</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;ne uuelleo ik, that gi it uuiodon&raquo;, quathie,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;huand gi biuuardon ni mugun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gig&ocirc;mean an iuuuon gange,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thoh gi it gerno ni duan,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ni gi thes cornes te filo,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>k&icirc;{d}o auuerdiat,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">felliat under iuuua fuoti.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>L&acirc;te man sia for{d} hinan</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2565</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">b&ecirc;{d}iu uuahsan,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>und &ecirc;r beuuod cume</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">endi an them felde sind<span class="f_canusg">| </span>fruhti r&icirc;pia,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">aroa an them accare:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>than faran uui thar alla tuo,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">halon it mid &ucirc;ssan handon<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi that hr&ecirc;ncurni lesan</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&ucirc;{b}ro tesamne<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi it an m&icirc;non seli duoian,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2570</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hebbean it thar gihaldan,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that it huergin ni mugi</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuiht auuerdian,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi that uuiod niman,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">bindan it te bur{d}innion<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi uuerpan it an bitar fiur,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">l&acirc;ton it thar haloian<span class="f_canusg">| </span>h&ecirc;ta l&ocirc;gna,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&ecirc;ld unfuodi.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thuo stuod erl manag,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2575</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thegnos thagiandi,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>huat thiodgomo,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">m&acirc;ri mahtig Crist<span class="f_canusg">| </span>m&ecirc;nean uueldi,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">b&ocirc;knien mid thiu bili{d}iu<span class="f_canusg">| </span>barno r&icirc;keost.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">B&acirc;dun th&ocirc; s&ocirc; gerno<span class="f_canusg">| </span>g&ocirc;dan drohtin</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">antl&ucirc;can thea l&ecirc;ra,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that [sia] m&ocirc;stin thea liudi for{d},</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2580</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;laga h&ocirc;rean.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; sprak [im] eft iro h&ecirc;rro angegin,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[m&acirc;ri] mahtig Crist:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;that is&raquo;, qua{d} he, &laquo;mannes sunu:</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ik sel{b}o [bium, that thar] s&acirc;iu,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi sind thesa s&acirc;liga man</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that hluttra hr&ecirc;ncorni,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thea mi h&ecirc;r h&ocirc;read uuel,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuirkiad m&icirc;nan uuillean;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thius uuerold is the akkar,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2585</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thit br&ecirc;da b&ucirc;land<span class="f_canusg">| </span>barno mancunnies;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Satanas [sel{b}o<span class="f_canusg">| </span>is, that thar] s&acirc;id [aftar]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[s&ocirc;] l&ecirc;{d}l&icirc;ca l&ecirc;ra:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ha{b}ad thesaro liudeo s&ocirc; filu,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuerodes auuardid,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that sie uuam [frummead,]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuirkead aftar is uuilleon;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thoh sculun sie h&ecirc;r uuahsen for{d},</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2590</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thea forgriponon gumon,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; samo s&ocirc; thea g&ocirc;dun man,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">anttat m&ucirc;dspelles megin<span class="f_canusg">| </span>o{b}ar man ferid,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">endi thesaro [uueroldes.]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Than is allaro [accaro] gehuilic</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ger&icirc;pod an thesumu r&icirc;kea:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>sculun iro regangiscapu</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">frummien firiho barn.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Than tefarid er{d}a:</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2595</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that is allaro beuuo br&ecirc;dost;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>than kumid the berhto drohtin</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">o{b}ana mid is engilo [craftu,]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi cumad [alle] tesamne</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">liudi, the io thit lioht gis&acirc;un,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi sculun than l&ocirc;n antf&acirc;han</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">u{b}iles endi g&ocirc;des.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Than gangad engilos godes,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;lage he{b}enuuardos,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi [lesat] thea hluttron man</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2600</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sundor tesamne,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi duat sie an sinsc&ocirc;ni,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ocirc;h himiles lioht,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi thea &ocirc;{d}ra an [hellia grund,]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuerpad thea faruuarhton<span class="f_canusg">| </span>an uuallandi fiur;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thar sculun sie gibundene<span class="f_canusg">| </span>bittra logna,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thr&acirc;uuerk tholon,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi thea &ocirc;{d}ra thioduuelon</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2605</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an he{b}enr&icirc;kea,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>hu&icirc;taro sunnon</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[liohtean] gel&icirc;co.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Sulic l&ocirc;n nimad</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uueros [uual]d&acirc;deo.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>S&ocirc; hue s&ocirc; giuuit &ecirc;gi,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gehugdi an is hertan,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ettha gih&ocirc;rien mugi,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">erl mid is &ocirc;run,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; l&acirc;ta imu [thit an innan sorga,]</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2610</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an is m&ocirc;dse{b}on,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>hu&ocirc; he scal an themu m&acirc;reon dage</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uui{d} thene r&icirc;keon god<span class="f_canusg">| </span>an [re{d}iu] standen</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuordo endi uuerko<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[allaro, the] he an thesaro uueroldi giduod.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">That is egisl&icirc;cost<span class="f_canusg">| </span>allaro thingo,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">forhtl&icirc;cost firiho barnun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that sie sculun uui{d} iro fr&acirc;hon mahlien,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2615</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gumon uui{d} thene g&ocirc;dan drohtin:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[than] uueldi gerno gehue uuesan,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">allaro manno gehuilic<span class="f_canusg">| </span>m&ecirc;nes t&ocirc;mig,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sl&icirc;{d}ero sacono.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Aftar thiu scal sorgon &ecirc;r</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">allaro liudeo gehuilic,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ecirc;r he thit lioht [afge{b}e,]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">the [than] &ecirc;gan uuili<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[alungan] t&icirc;r,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2620</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ocirc;h he{b}enr&icirc;ki<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi huldi godes.&raquo;</h3>
   </td>
  </tr>
</table>

	<td  width="600">
<h1>Heliand</h1>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h2>Fitte XXXII</h2>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="650" colspan="2" >
<p style="color:#996699;">______________________________________________________________________________</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="50"><h6>&nbsp;</h6></td>
	<td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;">
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;"><span class="f_ruberi">S</span>&ocirc; gifragn ik that th&ocirc; sel{b}o<span class="f_canusg">| </span>sunu drohtines,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">allaro barno bezt<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[bili{d}eo] sagda,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">huilic thero uu&acirc;ri<span class="f_canusg">| </span>an uueroldr&icirc;kea</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">undar heli{d}cunnie<span class="f_canusg">| </span>himilr&icirc;kie gel&icirc;ch;</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2625</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">qua{d} that oft luttiles huat<span class="f_canusg">| </span>liohtora uur{d}i,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&ocirc; h&ocirc;ho afhuo{b}i,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;so duot himilr&icirc;ki:</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that is simla m&ecirc;ra,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>than is man &ecirc;nig</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&acirc;nie an thesaro uueroldi.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&Ocirc;k is imu that uuerk gel&icirc;ch,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that man an s&ecirc;o innan<span class="f_canusg">| </span>segina uuirpit,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2630</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fisknet an fl&ocirc;d<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi f&acirc;hit b&ecirc;{d}iu,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">u{b}ile endi g&ocirc;de,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>tiuhid up te sta{d}e,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">li{d}od sie te lande,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>lisit aftar thiu</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thea g&ocirc;dun an greote<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi l&acirc;tid thea &ocirc;{d}ra eft an grund faran,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an uu&icirc;dan uu&acirc;g.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>S&ocirc; duod uualdand god</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2635</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an themu m&acirc;reon dage<span class="f_canusg">| </span>menniscono barn:</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">brengid irminthiod,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[alle] tesamne,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">lisit imu than thea hluttron<span class="f_canusg">| </span>an he{b}enr&icirc;ki,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">l&acirc;tid thea fargriponon<span class="f_canusg">| </span>an grund faren</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[hellie fiures.]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Ni uu&ecirc;t heli{d}o [man]</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2640</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thes uu&icirc;ties uui{d}arl&acirc;ga,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thes thar uueros [thiggeat],</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an themu inferne<span class="f_canusg">| </span>irminthioda.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Than hald ni mag thera m&ecirc;dan man<span class="f_canusg">| </span>gimacon f&icirc;{d}en,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ni thes [uuelon ni thes] uuilleon,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thes thar uualdand skerid,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gildid god sel{b}o<span class="f_canusg">| </span>gumono s&ocirc; huilicumu,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2645</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&ocirc; ina h&ecirc;r gihaldid,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that he an he{b}enr&icirc;ki,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an that langsame lioht<span class="f_canusg">| </span>l&icirc;{d}an m&ocirc;ti.&raquo;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">S&ocirc; l&ecirc;rda he th&ocirc; mid listiun.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Than f&ocirc;run thar thea liudi t&ocirc;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">o{b}ar al Galil&aelig;o land<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that godes barn sehan:</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">d&acirc;dun it bi themu uundre,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>huanen imu [mahti sulic] uuord cumen,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2650</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&ocirc; sp&acirc;hl&icirc;co gisprokan,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that he spel [godes]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[gio s&ocirc;] s&ocirc;{d}l&icirc;co<span class="f_canusg">| </span>seggean consti,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&ocirc; [craftigl&icirc;co] gique{d}en:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;he is theses kunnies hinen&raquo;, qu&acirc;{d}un sie,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;the man thurh m&acirc;gskepi:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>h&ecirc;r is is m&ocirc;der mid &ucirc;s,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&icirc;f undar thesumu uuerode.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Huat, uui [the] h&ecirc;r uuitun alle,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2655</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&ocirc; k&ucirc;{d} is &ucirc;s is kuniburd<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi is kn&ocirc;sles [gehuat;]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">auu&ocirc;hs al undar thesumu uuerode:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>huanen scolde imu sulic geuuit cuman,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">m&ecirc;ron mahti,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>than h&ecirc;r &ocirc;{d}ra [man] &ecirc;gin?&raquo;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">S&ocirc; farmunste ina that manno folc<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi [spr&acirc;kun] im gim&ecirc;dlic uuord,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">farhogdun ina s&ocirc; h&ecirc;lagna,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>h&ocirc;rien ni uueldun</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2660</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">is [gibodskepies].<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Ni he thar &ocirc;k bili{d}eo filu</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thurh iro ungil&ocirc;{b}on<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ocirc;gean ni uuelde,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">torhtero t&ecirc;cno,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>huand he uuisse iro tu&icirc;flean hugi,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[iro] uur&ecirc;{d}an uuillean,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that ni uu&acirc;run uueros &ocirc;{d}ra</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&ocirc; grimme under Iudeon,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; uu&acirc;run umbi [Galil&aelig;o land,]</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2665</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&ocirc; hardo gehugide:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; [thar] uuas the h&ecirc;lago Krist,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">giboren that barn godes,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>si ni uueldun is [gibodskepi thoh]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">antf&acirc;han ferhtl&icirc;co,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ac bigan that folc undar im,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">rincos r&acirc;dan,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>hu&ocirc; sie thene r&icirc;keon Krist</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&ecirc;gdin te uundron.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>H&ecirc;tun th&ocirc; iro uuerod cumen,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2670</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ges&icirc;{d}i tesamne:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>sundea uueldun</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an thene godes sunu<span class="f_canusg">| </span>gerno [gitellien]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[uur&ecirc;{d}es] uuilleon;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ni uuas im is uuordo niud,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sp&acirc;haro spello,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[ac] sie bigunnun sprekan undar im,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hu&ocirc; sie ina s&ocirc; craftagne<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[fan] &ecirc;numu cli{b}e uurpin,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2675</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">o{b}ar &ecirc;nna [berges] uual:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uueldun that barn godes</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">li{b}u bil&ocirc;sien.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; he imu mid them liudiun samad</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fr&ocirc;l&icirc;co f&ocirc;r:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ni uuas imu foraht hugi,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&ndash; uuisse that imu ni mahtun<span class="f_canusg">| </span>menniscono barn,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">bi theru godcundi<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Iudeo liudi</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2680</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&ecirc;r is t&icirc;diun uuiht<span class="f_canusg">| </span>teonon gifrummien,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">l&ecirc;{d}aro gil&ecirc;sto &ndash;,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ac he imu mid them liudiun samad</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">st&ecirc;g uppen thene st&ecirc;nholm,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>antthat sie te theru stedi qu&acirc;mun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thar sie ine [fan] themu [uualle ni{d}er]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuerpen hugdun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fellien te foldu,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that he uur{d}i is ferhes l&ocirc;s,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2685</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">is aldres at endie.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; uuar{d} thero erlo hugi,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an themu berge uppen<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[bittra] gith&acirc;hti</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Iu{d}eono tegangen,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that iro &ecirc;nig ni habde s&ocirc; grimmon se{b}on</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ni s&ocirc; uur&ecirc;{d}en uuilleon,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that sie mahtin thene uualdandes sunu,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Krist antkennien;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>he ni uuas [iro] c&ucirc;{d} &ecirc;nigumu,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2690</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that sie ina th&ocirc; undaruuissin.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>S&ocirc; mahte he undar ira uuerode standen</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">endi an iro gimange<span class="f_canusg">| </span>middiumu gangen,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">faren undar iro folke.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>He dede imu thene fri{d}u sel{b}o,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">mundburd uui{d} theru menegi<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi giuu&ecirc;t imu thurh middi thanan</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thes f&icirc;undo folkes,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>f&ocirc;r imu th&ocirc;, thar he uuelde,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2695</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an &ecirc;ne uu&ocirc;stunnie<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uualdandes sunu,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">cuningo craftigost:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>habde thero [custes] giuuald,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">huar [imu] an themu lande<span class="f_canusg">| </span>leo{b}ost uu&acirc;ri</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">te uuesanne an thesaru uueroldi.<span class="f_canusg">| </span></h3>
   </td>
  </tr>
</table>
</div>

	<td  width="600">
<h1>Heliand</h1>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h2>Fitte XXXIII</h2>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="650" colspan="2" >
<p style="color:#996699;">______________________________________________________________________________</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="50"><h6>&nbsp;</h6></td>
	<td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;">
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:200px;"><span class="f_canusg">| </span><span class="f_ruberi">T</span>hann f&ocirc;r imu an uueg &ocirc;{d}ran</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Iohannes mid is iungarun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>godes ambahtman,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2700</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">l&ecirc;rde thea liudi<span class="f_canusg">| </span>langsamane r&acirc;d,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;t that sie frume fremidin,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>firina farl&ecirc;tin,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">m&ecirc;n endi mor{d}uuerk.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>He uuas thar managumu liof</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">g&ocirc;daro gumono.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>He s&ocirc;hte imu th&ocirc; thene Iudeono cuning,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thene heritogon at h&ucirc;s,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>the h&ecirc;ten [&ucirc;uas]</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2705</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[Herodes aftar] is eldiron,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>o{b}arm&ocirc;dig man:</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">b&ucirc;ide imu be theru br&ucirc;di,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thiu &ecirc;r s&icirc;nes br&ocirc;{d}er uuas,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">idis [an &ecirc;hti,]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>anttat he ellior sk&ocirc;c,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuerold uueslode.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; imu that uu&icirc;f ginam</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">the cuning te quenun;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ecirc;r uu&acirc;run iro kind [&ocirc;dan,]</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2710</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">barn be is br&ocirc;{d}er.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; [bigan] imu thea br&ucirc;d lahan</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Iohannes the g&ocirc;do,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>qua{d} that it gode uu&acirc;ri,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uualdande uui{d}erm&ocirc;d,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that it &ecirc;nig uuero frumidi,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that br&ocirc;{d}er br&ucirc;d<span class="f_canusg">| </span>an is bed n&acirc;mi,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hebbie sie imu te h&icirc;uun.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;Ef thu mi h&ocirc;rien uuili,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2715</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gil&ocirc;{b}ien m&icirc;nun l&ecirc;run,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ni scalt thu sie leng &ecirc;gan,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ac m&icirc;{d} ire an th&icirc;numu m&ocirc;de:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ni ha{b}a [thar] sulica minnea t&ocirc;,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ni sundeo thi te su&icirc;{d}o.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; uuar{d} an sorgun hugi</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thes uu&icirc;{b}es aftar them uuordun;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>andr&ecirc;d that he thene uueroldcuning</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[spr&acirc;cono] gesp&ocirc;ni<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi sp&acirc;hun uuordun,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2720</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that he sie farl&ecirc;ti.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Began siu imu th&ocirc; l&ecirc;{d}es filu</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">r&acirc;den an r&ucirc;non,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi ine rinkos h&ecirc;t,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">unsundigane<span class="f_canusg">| </span>erlos f&acirc;han</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">endi [ine an] &ecirc;numu karkerea<span class="f_canusg">| </span>kl&ucirc;starbendiun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">li{d}ocospun [bil&ucirc;can:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>be them liudiun ne] gidorstun</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2725</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[ine] ferahu bil&ocirc;sien,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>huand sie uu&acirc;run imu friund alle,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuissun ine s&ocirc; g&ocirc;den<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi gode uuer{d}en,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[habdun ina for uu&acirc;rsagon,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; sia uuela mahtun.]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Th&ocirc; uur{d}un an themu g&ecirc;rtale<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[Iudeo] cuninges</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">t&icirc;di cumana,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; thar gitald habdun</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2730</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fr&ocirc;de folcuueros,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[th&ocirc;] he gif&ocirc;did uuas,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an lioht cuman.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>S&ocirc; uuas thero liudio thau,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that that [erlo] gehuilic<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ocirc;{b}ean scolde,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Iudeono mid g&ocirc;mun.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; uuar{d} thar an thene gastseli</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">megincraft mikil<span class="f_canusg">| </span>manno gesamnod,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2735</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[heritogono] an that h&ucirc;s,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thar iro h&ecirc;rro uuas</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an is kuningst&ocirc;le.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Qu&acirc;mun managa</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Iudeon an thene gastseli;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuar{d} im thar gladm&ocirc;d hugi,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">bl&icirc;{d}i an iro breostun:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>gis&acirc;hun iro b&acirc;gge{b}on</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuesen an uunneon.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Dr&ocirc;g man uu&icirc;n an flet</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2740</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sk&icirc;ri mid sc&acirc;lun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>skenkeon huur{b}un,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gengun mid goldfatun:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>gaman uuas thar inne</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hl&ucirc;d an thero hallu,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>heli{d}os drunkun.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Uuas thes an lustun<span class="f_canusg">| </span>landes hirdi,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">huat he themu uuerode m&ecirc;st<span class="f_canusg">| </span>te uunniun [gifremidi.]</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2745</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">H&ecirc;t he th&ocirc; gangen for{d}<span class="f_canusg">| </span>g&ecirc;la thiornun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">is br&ocirc;der barn,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thar he an is benki sat</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&icirc;nu giuulenkid,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi th&ocirc; te themu uu&icirc;be sprac;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gr&ocirc;tte sie fora themu gumskepie<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi gerno bad,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that siu thar fora them gastiun<span class="f_canusg">| </span>gaman afh&ocirc;{b}i</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2750</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fagar an flettie:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;l&acirc;t thit folc sehan,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hu&ocirc; [thu] gel&icirc;nod ha{b}as<span class="f_canusg">| </span>liudio menegi</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">te bl&icirc;{d}seanne [an] benkiun;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ef thu mi thera bede [tugi{d}os],</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">m&icirc;n uuord for thesumu uuerode,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>than uuilliu ik it h&ecirc;r te uu&acirc;run <br />[geque{d}en,]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">liahto fora thesun liudiun<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi &ocirc;k gil&ecirc;stien s&ocirc;,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2755</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that ik thi than aftar thiu<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ecirc;ron uuilliu,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&ocirc; hues s&ocirc; thu mi bidis<span class="f_canusg">| </span>for thesun m&icirc;nun b&acirc;guuiniun:</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thoh thu mi thesaro herid&ocirc;mo<span class="f_canusg">| </span>hal{b}aro fergos,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">r&icirc;keas m&icirc;nes,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[thoh gid&ocirc;n ik,] that it &ecirc;nig rinko ni mag</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuordun giuuendien,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi it scal giuuer{d}en s&ocirc;.&raquo;</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2760</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Th&ocirc; uuar{d} thera maga{d} aftar thiu<span class="f_canusg">| </span>m&ocirc;d gihuor{b}en,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hugi aftar iro h&ecirc;rron,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that siu an themu h&ucirc;se innen,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an themu gastseli<span class="f_canusg">| </span>gamen up ahuof,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">al s&ocirc; thero liudio<span class="f_canusg">| </span>landuu&icirc;se gidr&ocirc;g,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thero thiodo thau.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thiu thiorne spilode</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2765</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hr&ocirc;r aftar themu h&ucirc;se:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>hugi uuas an lustun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[managaro] m&ocirc;dse{b}o.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; thiu maga{d} habda</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">githionod te thanke<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thiodcuninge</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">endi allumu themu erlskepie,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[the] thar inne uuas</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">g&ocirc;daro gumono,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>siu uuelde th&ocirc; ira ge{b}a &ecirc;gan,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2770</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thiu maga{d} for theru menegi:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>geng th&ocirc; uui{d} iro m&ocirc;dar sprekan</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">endi fr&acirc;gode sie<span class="f_canusg">| </span>firiuuitl&icirc;co,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hues siu thene [burges] uuard<span class="f_canusg">| </span>biddien scoldi.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Th&ocirc; uu&icirc;sde siu aftar iro uuilleon,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>h&ecirc;t that siu uuihtes than &ecirc;r</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ni gerodi for themu gumskepie,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[bi&ucirc;tan] that man [iru] Iohannes</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2775</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an theru hallu innan<span class="f_canusg">| </span>h&ocirc;{b}id g&acirc;{b}i</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">al&ocirc;sid [af] is l&icirc;chamon.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>That uuas allun them liudiun harm,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">them mannun an iro m&ocirc;de,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>th&ocirc; sie [that] gih&ocirc;rdun thea maga{d} sprekan;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&ocirc; uuas it &ocirc;k themu kuninge:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>he ni mahte is quidi liagan,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">is uuord uuendien:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>h&ecirc;t th&ocirc; is uu&ecirc;panberand</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2780</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gangen fan themu gastseli<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi h&ecirc;t thene [godes] man</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">l&icirc;{b}u bil&ocirc;sien.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; ni uuas lang te thiu,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that man an thea halla<span class="f_canusg">| </span>h&ocirc;{b}id br&acirc;hte</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thes thiodgumon,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi it thar theru thiornun fargaf,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">maga{d} for theru menegi:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>siu dr&ocirc;g it theru m&ocirc;der for{d}.</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2785</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Th&ocirc; uuas &ecirc;ndago<span class="f_canusg">| </span>allaro manno</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thes uu&icirc;soston,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[thero the gio] an thesa uuerold [qu&acirc;mi],</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thero the quene &ecirc;nig<span class="f_canusg">| </span>kind [gib&acirc;ri],</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">idis fan erle,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>l&ecirc;t man simla then [&ecirc;non] biforan,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">the thiu thiorne [gidr&ocirc;g],<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[the] gio thegnes ni uuar{d}</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2790</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&icirc;s an iro uueroldi,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[bi&ucirc;tan] s&ocirc; ine uualdand god</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fan he{b}enuuange<span class="f_canusg">| </span>h&ecirc;lages g&ecirc;stes</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gimarcode mahtig:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>the ni habde [&ecirc;nigan] gimacon huergin</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&ecirc;r nec aftar.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Erlos huur{b}un,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gumon umbi [Iohannen],<span class="f_canusg">| </span>is iungaron managa,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2795</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&acirc;lig ges&icirc;{d}i,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi ine an sande bigr&ocirc;{b}un,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">leo{b}es l&icirc;chamon:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuissun that he lioht godes,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">diurl&icirc;can dr&ocirc;m<span class="f_canusg">| </span>mid is drohtine [samad,]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[up&ocirc;das h&ecirc;m]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ecirc;gan m&ocirc;ste,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&acirc;lig s&ocirc;kean.<span class="f_canusg">| </span></h3>
   </td>
  </tr>
</table>
</div>

<p>um 830</p>

	<td width="50">&nbsp;</td>
	<td  width="600">
<h1>Heliand</h1>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h2>Fitte XXXIV</h2>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="650" colspan="2" >
<p style="color:#996699;">______________________________________________________________________________</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="50"><h6>&nbsp;</h6></td>
	<td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;">
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:200px;"><span class="f_canusg">| </span><span class="f_ruberi">T</span>h&ocirc; geuuitun im thea ges&icirc;{d}os thanen,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2800</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Iohannes giungaron<span class="f_canusg">| </span>gi&acirc;merm&ocirc;de,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;lagferaha:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuas im iro h&ecirc;rron d&ocirc;{d}</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">su&icirc;{d}o an sorgun.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Geuuitun im [s&ocirc;kean th&ocirc;]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an theru uu&ocirc;stunni<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uualdandes sunu,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">craftigana Crist<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi imu k&ucirc;{d} gidedun</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2805</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">g&ocirc;des mannes forgang,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>hu&ocirc; habde the Iudeono kuning</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[manno thene] m&acirc;reostan<span class="f_canusg">| </span>m&acirc;keas eggiun</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ocirc;{b}du bihauuuan:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>he ni uuelde [is &ecirc;nigen] harm spreken,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sunu drohtines;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>he uuisse that thiu seole uuas</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;lag gihalden<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uui{d}er hettiandeon,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2810</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an fri{d}e uui{d}er f&icirc;undun.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; [s&ocirc;] gifr&acirc;gi uuar{d}</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">aftar them [landskepiun]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>l&ecirc;reandero bezt</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an theru uu&ocirc;stunni:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuerod samnode,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[f&ocirc;r folcun t&ocirc;:]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuas im firiuuit mikil</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&icirc;saro uuordo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>imu uuas &ocirc;k uuilleo [s&ocirc; samo,]</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2815</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[sunie] drohtines,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that he sulic ges&icirc;{d}o folc</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an that lioht godes<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ladoian m&ocirc;sti,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuennien mid uuilleon.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Uualdand l&ecirc;rde</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">allan langan dag<span class="f_canusg">| </span>liudi managa,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">elitheodige man,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>anttat an &acirc;{b}and s&ecirc;g</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2820</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sunne te sedle.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; gengun is ges&icirc;{d}os tueli{b}i,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gumon te themu godes barne<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi sagdun iro g&ocirc;dumu h&ecirc;rron,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">mid huilicu ar{b}ediu thar [thea] erlos le{b}din,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>qu&acirc;{d}un that sie is &ecirc;ra bithorftin,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uueros an themu uu&ocirc;steon lande:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;sie ni mugun sie h&ecirc;r mid uuihti anthebbien,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">heli{d}os bi hungres gethuinge.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Nu l&acirc;t thu sie, h&ecirc;rro the g&ocirc;do,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2825</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&icirc;{d}on, thar sie seli{d}a f&icirc;{d}en.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>N&acirc;h sind h&ecirc;r gesetana burgi</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">managa mid meginthiodun:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thar f&icirc;{d}ad sie meti te k&ocirc;pe,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uueros aftar them uu&icirc;keon.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; sprak eft uualdand Crist,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[thioda] drohtin,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>qua{d} that thes &ecirc;niga thurufti ni uu&acirc;rin,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;that sie thurh metil&ocirc;si<span class="f_canusg">| </span>m&icirc;na farl&acirc;tan</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2830</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">leo{b}l&icirc;ca l&ecirc;ra.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Ge{b}ad gi thesun liudiun gin&ocirc;g,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuenniad sie h&ecirc;r mid uuilleon.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; habde [eft] is uuord garu</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Philippus fr&ocirc;d gumo,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>qua{d} that thar s&ocirc; filu uu&acirc;ri</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">manno menigi:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;thoh uui h&ecirc;r te meti habdin</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">garu im te ge{b}anne,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; uui mahtin fargelden m&ecirc;st,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2835</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ef uui h&ecirc;r gisaldin<span class="f_canusg">| </span>silu{b}erscatto</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">tu&ecirc; hund samad,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>tueho uu&acirc;ri is noh than,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that iro &ecirc;nig thar<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ecirc;nes gin&acirc;mi:</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&ocirc; luttic uu&acirc;ri that thesun liudiun.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; sprak eft the landes uuard</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">endi fr&acirc;gode sie<span class="f_canusg">| </span>firiuuitl&icirc;co,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2840</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">manno drohtin,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[huat] sie thar te meti habdin</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[uuistes] geuunnin.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; sprak imu eft mid is uuordun angegin</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Andreas fora them erlun<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi themu alouualdon</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sel{b}umu sagde,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that sie an iro gis&icirc;{d}ie than m&ecirc;r</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">garouues ni habdin,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[&laquo;bi&ucirc;tan] girstin br&ocirc;d</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2845</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">f&icirc;{b}i an &ucirc;saru ferdi<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi fiscos tu&ecirc;ne.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Huat mag that thoh thesaru menigi?&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; sprac [eft] mahtig Krist,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">the g&ocirc;do godes sunu,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi h&ecirc;t that gumono folc</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">skerien endi sk&ecirc;{d}en<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi h&ecirc;t thea scola settien,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">erlos aftar theru [er{d}u],<span class="f_canusg">| </span>irminthioda</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2850</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an grase gruonimu,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi th&ocirc; te is iungarun sprak,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">allaro barno bezt,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>h&ecirc;t imu thiu br&ocirc;d halon</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">endi thea fiscos for{d}.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>That folc stillo b&ecirc;d,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sat ges&icirc;{d}i mikil;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>undar thiu he thurh is sel{b}es craft,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">manno drohtin,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thene meti uu&icirc;hide,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2855</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;lag he{b}encuning,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[endi] mid is handun brak,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gaf it is iungarun for{d},<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi [it] sie undar themu gumskepie [h&ecirc;t]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">dragan endi d&ecirc;lien.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Sie l&ecirc;stun iro drohtines uuord,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">is ge{b}a gerno dr&ocirc;gun<span class="f_canusg">| </span>gumono gihuemu,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;laga helpa.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[It] undar iro handun uu&ocirc;hs,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2860</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">meti manno gihuemu:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>theru meginthiodu uuar{d}</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">l&icirc;f an lustun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thea liudi uur{d}un alle,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sade s&acirc;lig folc,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; huat s&ocirc; thar gisamnod uuas</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fan allun uu&icirc;dun uuegun.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; h&ecirc;t uualdand Krist</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gangen is iungaron<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi h&ecirc;t sie g&ocirc;mien uuel,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2865</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that thiu l&ecirc;{b}a thar<span class="f_canusg">| </span>farloren ni uur{d}i;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;t sie th&ocirc; samnon,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>th&ocirc; thar sade uu&acirc;run</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">mankunnies manag.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thar m&ocirc;ses uuar{d},</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">br&ocirc;des te l&ecirc;{b}u,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that man birilos gilas</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">tueli{b}i fulle:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that uuas t&ecirc;can mikil,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2870</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gr&ocirc;t craft godes,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>huand thar uuas gumono gitald</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&acirc;no uu&icirc;f endi kind,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[uuerodes] atsamme</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">f&icirc;f th&ucirc;sundig.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>That folc al farst&ocirc;d,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thea man an iro m&ocirc;de,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that sie thar mahtigna</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;rron habdun.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; sie he{b}encuning,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2875</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thea liudi lo{b}odun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>qu&acirc;{d}un that gio ni uur{d}i an thit lioht cuman</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&icirc;saro uu&acirc;rsago,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>eftha [that] he giuuald mid gode</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an thesaru middilgard<span class="f_canusg">| </span>m&ecirc;ron habdi,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[&ecirc;nfaldaran] hugi.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Alle gispr&acirc;kun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that he uu&acirc;ri uuir{d}ig<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuelono gehuilikes,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2880</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that he er{d}r&icirc;ki<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ecirc;gan m&ocirc;sti,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&icirc;dene [uueroldst&ocirc;l,]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;nu he sulic geuuit ha{b}ad,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&ocirc; gr&ocirc;te craft mid gode.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thea gumon alle giuuar{d},</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that sie ine gih&ocirc;{b}in<span class="f_canusg">| </span>te h&ecirc;rosten,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gikurin ine te cuninge:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that Kriste ni uuas</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2885</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuihtes uuir{d}ig,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>huand he thit uueroldr&icirc;ki,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">er{d}e endi uphimil<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thurh is &ecirc;nes craft</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sel{b}o giuuarhte<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi s&icirc;{d}or [giheld,]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">land endi [liudskepi],<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ndash; thoh thes &ecirc;nigan gil&ocirc;{b}on ni dedin</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uur&ecirc;{d}e uui{d}ersacon &ndash;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that al an is giuualde st&acirc;d,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2890</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">cuningr&icirc;keo craft<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi [k&ecirc;surd&ocirc;mes],</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">meginthiodo mahal.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Bethiu ni uuelde he thurh thero manno spr&acirc;ka</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hebbian &ecirc;nigan h&ecirc;rd&ocirc;m,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>h&ecirc;lag drohtin,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uueroldkuninges namon;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ni [he] th&ocirc; mid uuordun [str&icirc;d]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[ni afh&ocirc;f] uui{d} that folc fur{d}ur,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ac f&ocirc;r imu th&ocirc;, [thar he uuelde,]</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2895</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an &ecirc;n gebirgi uppan:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>fl&ocirc;h that barn godes</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">g&ecirc;laro gelpquidi<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi is iungaron h&ecirc;t</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">o{b}ar &ecirc;nne s&ecirc;o s&icirc;{d}on<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi im sel{b}o gib&ocirc;d,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">huar sie im eft tegegnes<span class="f_canusg">| </span>gangen scoldin.</h3>
   </td>
  </tr>
</table>

<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h2>Fitte XXXV</h2>

  <tr>
	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="50"><h6>&nbsp;</h6></td>
	<td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;">
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;"><span class="f_ruberi">T</span>h&ocirc; tel&ecirc;t that liuduuerod<span class="f_canusg">| </span>aftar themu lande allumu,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2900</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">tef&ocirc;r folc mikil,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&icirc;{d}or iro fr&acirc;ho giuu&ecirc;t</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an that gebirgi uppan,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>barno r&icirc;keost,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uualdand an is uuilleon.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; te thes uuatares sta{d}e</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">samnodun thea ges&icirc;{d}os Cristes,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>the he imu habde sel{b}o gicorane,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sie tueli{b}i thurh iro treuua g&ocirc;da:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ni uuas im tueho nigiean,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2905</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ne{b}u sie an [that] godes thionost<span class="f_canusg">| </span>gerno uueldin</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">o{b}ar thene s&ecirc;o s&icirc;{d}on.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; l&ecirc;tun [sie su&icirc;{d}ean] str&ocirc;m,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[h&ocirc;h hurnidskip]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>hluttron &ucirc;{d}eon,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sk&ecirc;{d}an [sk&icirc;r] uuater.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Skr&ecirc;d lioht dages,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[sunne] uuar{d} an sedle;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>the [s&ecirc;ol&icirc;{d}andean]</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2910</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">naht [ne{b}ulo] biuuarp;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>n&acirc;{d}idun erlos</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">for{d}uuardes an fl&ocirc;d;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuar{d} thiu fior{d}e tid</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thera nahtes cuman<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ndash; neriendo Crist</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuarode [thea uu&acirc;gl&icirc;{d}and &ndash;:]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>th&ocirc; uuar{d} uuind mikil,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ocirc;h uueder [afha{b}en:]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>hlamodun &ucirc;{d}eon,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2915</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[str&ocirc;m] an [stamne;]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>str&icirc;diun feridun</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thea uueros uui{d}er uuinde,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuas im uur&ecirc;{d} hugi,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">se{b}o sorgono ful:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>sel{b}on ni uu&acirc;ndun</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[lagul&icirc;{d}andea]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>an land cumen</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thurh thes uuederes geuuin.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; gis&acirc;hun sie uualdand Krist</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2920</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an themu s&ecirc;e uppan<span class="f_canusg">| </span>sel{b}un gangan,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">faran an f&acirc;{d}ion:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ni mahte an thene fl&ocirc;d innan,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an thene s&ecirc;o sincan,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>huand ine is sel{b}es craft</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;lag anthabde.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Hugi uuar{d} an forhtun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thero [manno] m&ocirc;dse{b}o:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>andr&ecirc;dun that it im mahtig f&icirc;und</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2925</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">te [gidroge] d&acirc;di.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; sprak im iro drohtin t&ocirc;,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;lag he{b}encuning,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi sagde im that [he] iro h&ecirc;rro uuas</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">m&acirc;ri endi mahtig:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;nu gi m&ocirc;des sculun</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fastes f&acirc;hen;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ne s&icirc; iu forht hugi,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gib&acirc;riad gi baldl&icirc;co:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ik bium that barn godes,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2930</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">is sel{b}es sunu,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>the iu uui{d} thesumu s&ecirc;e scal,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">mundon uui{d} thesan meristr&ocirc;m.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; sprac imu &ecirc;n thero manno angegin</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">o{b}ar bord skipes,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[baruuir{d}ig] gumo,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Petrus [the] g&ocirc;do<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ndash; ni uuelde p&icirc;ne tholon,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuatares uu&icirc;ti &ndash;:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;ef thu it uualdand s&icirc;s&raquo;, qua{d} he,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2935</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;h&ecirc;rro the g&ocirc;do,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; mi an m&icirc;numu hugi thunkit,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[h&ecirc;t] mi than tharod gangan te thi<span class="f_canusg">| </span>o{b}ar thesen ge{b}enes str&ocirc;m,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[drokno] o{b}ar diap uuater,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ef thu m&icirc;n drohtin s&icirc;s,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">managoro mundboro.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; h&ecirc;t ine mahtig Crist</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gangan imu tegegnes.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>He uuar{d} garu s&acirc;no,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2940</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">st&ocirc;p [af] themu stamne<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi str&icirc;diun geng</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">for{d} te is fr&ocirc;ian.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[Thiu] fl&ocirc;d anthabde</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thene man thurh maht godes,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>antat he [imu] an is m&ocirc;de bigan</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">andr&acirc;den diap uuater,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>th&ocirc; he dr&icirc;{b}en gisah</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thene uu&ecirc;g mid uuindu:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uundun ina [&ucirc;{d}eon],</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2945</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ocirc; str&ocirc;m umbihring.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Reht s&ocirc; he th&ocirc; an is hugi tuehode,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&ocirc; uu&ecirc;k imu that uuater under,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi he an thene uu&acirc;g innan,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sank an thene s&ecirc;ostr&ocirc;m,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi [he] hriop s&acirc;n aftar thiu</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[g&acirc;hon] te themu godes sunie<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi gerno bad,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that he ine th&ocirc; [generidi,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>th&ocirc;] he an [n&ocirc;diun] uuas,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2950</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thegan an gethuinge.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thiodo drohtin</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">antfeng ine [mid] is fa{d}mun<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi fr&acirc;gode s&acirc;na,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">te hu&icirc; he [th&ocirc;] getuehodi:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;huat, thu [mahtes] getr&ucirc;oian uuel,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuiten that te uu&acirc;run,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that [thi] uuatares [craft]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an themu s&ecirc;e innen<span class="f_canusg">| </span>th&icirc;nes s&icirc;{d}es ni mahte,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2955</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">lagustr&ocirc;m [gilettien],<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; lango s&ocirc; thu [habdes] gel&ocirc;{b}on te mi</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an th&icirc;numu [hugi] hardo.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Nu uuilliu ik thi an helpun uuesen,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[nerien thi] an thesaru n&ocirc;di&raquo;.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; nam ine alomahtig,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;lag bi handun:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>th&ocirc; uuar{d} imu eft hlutter [uuater]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fast under f&ocirc;tun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi sie an f&acirc;{d}i samad</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2960</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">b&ecirc;{d}ea gengun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>antat sie o{b}ar bord skipes</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">st&ocirc;pun [fan] themu str&ocirc;me,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[endi] an themu stamne gesat</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">allaro barno bezt.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; [uuar{d}] br&ecirc;d uuater,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">str&ocirc;mos gestillid,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi sie te sta{d}e qu&acirc;mun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">lagul&icirc;{d}andea<span class="f_canusg">| </span>an land [samen]</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2965</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thurh [thes] uuateres geuuin,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[sagdun] uualdande thanc,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">diurden [iro] drohtin<span class="f_canusg">| </span>d&acirc;diun endi uuordun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fellun imu te f&ocirc;tun<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi filu spr&acirc;kun</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&icirc;saro uuordo,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>qu&acirc;{d}un that sie uuissin garo,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that he uu&acirc;ri sel{b}o<span class="f_canusg">| </span>sunu drohtines</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2970</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&acirc;r an thesaru uueroldi<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi geuuald habdi</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">o{b}ar middilgard,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi that he [mahti allaro] manno gihues</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ferahe giformon,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[al] s&ocirc; he [im] an themu fl&ocirc;de dede</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uui{d} thes uuatares geuuin.<span class="f_canusg">| </span></h3>
   </td>
  </tr>
</table>
</div>
