  <tr>
	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="50"><h6>&nbsp;</h6></td>
	<td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;">
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:200px;"><span class="f_canusg">| </span><span class="f_ruberi">T</span>h&ocirc; giuu&ecirc;t imu uualdand Crist</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&icirc;{d}on fan themu s&ecirc;e,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>sunu drohtines,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2975</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&ecirc;nag barn godes.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[Elithioda] quam imu,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[gumon] tegegnes:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uu&acirc;run is g&ocirc;dun uuerk</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ferran gefr&acirc;gi,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that he s&ocirc; filu sagde</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&acirc;roro uuordo:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[imu uuas] uuillio mikil,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that he sulic folcskepi<span class="f_canusg">| </span>frummien m&ocirc;sti,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2980</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that sie simla gerno<span class="f_canusg">| </span>gode thionodin,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&acirc;rin geh&ocirc;rige<span class="f_canusg">| </span>he{b}encuninge</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">mankunnies manag.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; giuu&ecirc;t he imu o{b}er thea marka Iudeono,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&ocirc;hte imu Sidono burg,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>habde [ges&icirc;{d}os] mid imu,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">g&ocirc;de iungaron.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thar imu tegegnes quam</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2985</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&ecirc;n idis fan &acirc;{d}rom thiodun;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>siu uuas iru a{d}aligeburdeo,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">cunnies fan Cananeo lande;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>siu bad thene craftagan drohtin,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;lagna, that he iru helpe ger&ecirc;di,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>qua{d} that iru uu&acirc;ri [harm] gistanden,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">soroga [at] iru sel{b}aru dohter,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>qua{d} that siu uu&acirc;ri mid suhtiun bifangen:</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;bedrogan habbiad sie dernea uuihti.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Nu is iro d&ocirc;d at [hendi,]</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2990</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thea uur&ecirc;{d}on habbiad sie geuuitteu benumane.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Nu biddiu ik thi, uualdand fr&ocirc; min,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sel{b}o sunu Dauides,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that [sie] af sulicum suhtiun at&ocirc;mies,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that thu sie s&ocirc; arma<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ecirc;grohtfullo</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuamsca{d}on biuueri.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Ni gaf iru th&ocirc; noh uualdand Crist</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&ecirc;nig anduuordi;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>siu [imu] aftar geng,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>2995</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">folgode fruokno,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>antat siu te is f&ocirc;tun quam,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gr&ocirc;tte ina greatandi.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Giungaron Cristes</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">b&acirc;dun iro h&ecirc;rron,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that he an is hugea mildi</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uur{d}i themu uu&icirc;{b}e.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; habde eft is uuord garu</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sunu drohtines<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi [te] is ges&icirc;{d}un sprak:</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3000</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;&ecirc;rist scal ik Israheles<span class="f_canusg">| </span>a{b}oron uuer{d}en,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">folcskepi te frumu,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that sie ferhtan hugi</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hebbian te iro h&ecirc;rron:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>im is helpono tharf,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thea liudi sind farlorane,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>farl&acirc;ten habbiad</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uualdandes uuord,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that uuerod is getu&icirc;flid,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3005</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">dr&icirc;{b}ad im dernean hugi,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ne uuilliad iro drohtine h&ocirc;rien</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Israhelo erlskepi,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ungil&ocirc;{b}iga sind</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">heli{d}os iro h&ecirc;rron:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thoh scal thanen helpe cumen</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">allun elithiodun.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Agal&ecirc;to bad</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that uu&icirc;f mid iro uuordun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that iru uualdand Krist</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3010</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an is m&ocirc;dse{b}on<span class="f_canusg">| </span>mildi uur{d}i,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that siu iro barnes for{d}<span class="f_canusg">| </span>br&ucirc;kan m&ocirc;sti,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hebbian sie h&ecirc;le.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; sprak iru h&ecirc;rro angegin,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">m&acirc;ri [endi] mahtig:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;nis that&raquo;, qua{d} he, &laquo;mannes reht,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gumono nig&ecirc;num<span class="f_canusg">| </span>g&ocirc;d te gifrummienne</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3015</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that he is barnun<span class="f_canusg">| </span>br&ocirc;des aft&icirc;he,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuernie [im] o{b}ar uuilleon,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[l&acirc;te] sie uu&icirc;ti tholean,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hungar hetigrimmen,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi f&ocirc;die is hundos mid thiu.&raquo;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;Uu&acirc;r is that, uualdand&raquo;, qua{d} siu,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;that thu mid th&icirc;nun uuordun sprikis,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&ocirc;{d}l&icirc;co sagis:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>huat, thoh oft an seli innen</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3020</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">undar iro h&ecirc;rron diske<span class="f_canusg">| </span>huelpos huer{b}ad</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">brosmono fulle<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[theru] fan [themu] biode ni{d}er</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[antfallat] iro fr&ocirc;ian.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; gih&ocirc;rde that fri{d}ubarn godes</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuillean thes uu&icirc;{b}es<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi sprak iru mid is uuordun t&ocirc;:</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;uuela that thu uu&icirc;f ha{b}es<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuillean g&ocirc;den!</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3025</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Mikil is th&icirc;n gil&ocirc;{b}o<span class="f_canusg">| </span>an thea maht godes,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an thene liudio drohtin.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Al [uuir{d}id] gil&ecirc;stid s&ocirc;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">umbi th&icirc;nes barnes l&icirc;f,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; thu b&acirc;di te mi.&raquo;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Th&ocirc; uuar{d} siu s&acirc;n gih&ecirc;lid,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; it the h&ecirc;lago gesprac</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuordun uu&acirc;rfastun:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that uu&icirc;f fagonode,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3030</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thes siu iro barnes for{d}<span class="f_canusg">| </span>br&ucirc;kan m&ocirc;ste;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">habde [iru] giholpen<span class="f_canusg">| </span>h&ecirc;leando Crist,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">habde sie farfangane<span class="f_canusg">| </span>f&icirc;undo [craftu,]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuamsca{d}un biuuerid.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; giuu&ecirc;t imu uualdand for{d},</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">barno that bezte,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc;hte imu burg &ocirc;{d}re,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3035</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thiu s&ocirc; thicco uuas<span class="f_canusg">| </span>mid theru thiodu Iudeono,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">mid s&ucirc;{d}arliudiun giseten.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thar gifragn ik that he is ges&icirc;{d}os gr&ocirc;tte,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">the iungaron the he imu habde be is g&ocirc;de gicorane,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that sie mid imu gerno [geuunodun],</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uueros thurh [is] uu&icirc;son spr&acirc;ka:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;[alle] skal ik iu&raquo;, qua{d} he, &laquo;mid uuordun fr&acirc;gon,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">iungaron m&icirc;ne:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>huat que{d}at these Iudeo liudi,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3040</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">m&acirc;ri meginthioda,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[that] ik manno s&icirc;?&raquo;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Imu anduuordidun fr&ocirc;l&icirc;co<span class="f_canusg">| </span>is friund angegin,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">iungaron s&icirc;ne:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;nis thit Iudeono folc,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">erlos &ecirc;nuuordie:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>sum sagad that thu Elias s&icirc;s,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&icirc;s uu&acirc;rsago,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>the h&ecirc;r [giu uuas lango],</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3045</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">g&ocirc;d undar thesumu gumskepie,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>sum sagad that thu Iohannes s&icirc;s,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">diurl&icirc;c drohtines bodo,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>the h&ecirc;r d&ocirc;pte iu</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuerod an uuatere;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>alle sie mid uuordun sprekad,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that thu &ecirc;nhuilic s&icirc;s<span class="f_canusg">| </span>e{d}ilero manno,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thero uu&acirc;rsagono,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>the h&ecirc;r mid uuordun giu</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3050</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">l&ecirc;rdun these liudi,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi that thu s&icirc;s eft an thit lioht cumen</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">te uu&icirc;seanne thesumu uuerode.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; sprak eft uualdand Krist:</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;hue que{d}ad gi, [that] ik s&icirc;&raquo;, [qua{d} he],<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;iungaron m&icirc;ne,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">lio{b}on liuduueros?&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; te lat ni uuar{d}</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">S&icirc;mon Petrus:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>sprak s&acirc;n angegin</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3055</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&ecirc;no for im allun<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ndash; habde imu ellien g&ocirc;d,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thr&icirc;stea gith&acirc;hti,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuas is theodone hold &ndash;:</h3>
   </td>
  </tr>
</table>
</div>
<!--  finis contentus  -->

<div class="bibliotheca">
BIBLIOTHECA AUGUSTANA
</div>
<div class="titulus1">
<p>&nbsp;</p>
</div>
<div class="titulus2">
<p>Heliand</p>
<p>um 830</p>
</div>
<!--  finis tituli  -->

<!-- contentus -->
<div class="contentus">
<table width="650" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
  <tr>
	<td width="50">&nbsp;</td>
	<td  width="600">
<h1>Heliand</h1>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h2>Fitte XXXVII</h2>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="650" colspan="2" >
<p style="color:#996699;">______________________________________________________________________________</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="50"><h6>&nbsp;</h6></td>
	<td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;">
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;<span class="f_ruberi">T</span>hu bist the [uu&acirc;ro]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uualdandes sunu,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">libbiendes godes,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>the thit lioht gisc&ocirc;p,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Crist cuning &ecirc;uuig:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; uuilliad uui que{d}en alle,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3060</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">iungaron th&icirc;ne,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that thu s&icirc;s god sel{b}o,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;leandero bezt.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; sprac imu eft is h&ecirc;rro angegin:</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;s&acirc;lig bist thu S&icirc;mon&raquo;, qua{d} he, &laquo;sunu [Ionases];<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ni mahtes thu that sel{b}o gehuggean,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gimarcon an th&icirc;nun m&ocirc;dgith&acirc;htiun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ne it ni mahte thi mannes tunge</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuordun geuu&icirc;sien,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ac dede it thi uualdand sel{b}o,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3065</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fader allaro firiho barno,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that thu [s&ocirc;] for{d} gispr&acirc;ki,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&ocirc; diapo bi drohtin th&icirc;nen.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[Diurl&icirc;co] scalt thu thes l&ocirc;n antf&acirc;hen,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hluttro ha{b}as thu an th&icirc;nan h&ecirc;rron gil&ocirc;{b}on,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>hugiskefti sind th&icirc;ne st&ecirc;ne gel&icirc;ca,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&ocirc; fast bist thu s&ocirc; felis the hardo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>h&ecirc;ten sculun [thi] firiho barn</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sancte P&ecirc;ter:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>o{b}ar themu [st&ecirc;ne] scal man m&icirc;nen seli uuirkean,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3070</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;lag h&ucirc;s godes;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thar scal is h&icirc;uuiski t&ocirc;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&acirc;lig samnon:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ni mugun uui{d} them th&icirc;nun su&icirc;{d}eun crafte</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">anthebbien [hellie portun].<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Ik fargi{b}u thi [himilr&icirc;ceas] slutilas,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that thu m&ocirc;st aftar mi<span class="f_canusg">| </span>allun [giuualdan]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">kristinum folke;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>kumad alle te thi</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3075</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gumono g&ecirc;stos;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thu ha{b}e [gr&ocirc;te] giuuald,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">huene thu h&ecirc;r an er{d}u<span class="f_canusg">| </span>eldibarno</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gebinden uuillies:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>themu is b&ecirc;{d}iu giduan,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">himilr&icirc;ki biloken,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi hellie sind imu [opana,]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">brinnandi fiur;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; huene s&ocirc; thu eft antbinden uuili,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3080</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">antheftien is hendi,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>themu is himilr&icirc;ki,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">antloken liohto m&ecirc;st<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi l&icirc;f &ecirc;uuig,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gr&ocirc;ni godes uuang.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Mid sulicaru ik thi ge{b}u uuilliu</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">l&ocirc;non th&icirc;nen gil&ocirc;{b}on.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Ni uuilliu ik, that gi thesun liudiun noh,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">m&acirc;rien thesaru menigi,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that ik bium mahtig Crist,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3085</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">godes [&ecirc;gan] barn.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Mi sculun [Iudeon] noh,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">unsculdigna<span class="f_canusg">| </span>erlos binden,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&ecirc;gean mi te uundrun<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ndash; [d&ocirc;t mi uu&icirc;ties filo &ndash;]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">innan Hierusalem<span class="f_canusg">| </span>g&ecirc;res ordun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&acirc;htien m&icirc;nes aldres<span class="f_canusg">| </span>eggiun scarpun,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3090</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">bil&ocirc;sien mi l&icirc;{b}u.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Ik an thesumu [liohte] scal</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thurh &ucirc;ses drohtines craft<span class="f_canusg">| </span>fan d&ocirc;de astanden</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[an] thriddiumu dage&raquo;.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; uuar{d} thegno bezt</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">su&icirc;{d}o an sorgun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>S&icirc;mon Petrus,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuar{d} imu hugi hriuuig,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi te is h&ecirc;rron sprak</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3095</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">rink an r&ucirc;nun:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;ni scal that r&icirc;ki god&raquo;, qua{d} he,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;uualdand uuillien,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that thu eo sulic uu&icirc;ti mikil</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">githolos undar [thesaru thiod:]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>nis thes tharf nigiean,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;lag drohtin.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; sprak imu eft is h&ecirc;rro angegin,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">m&acirc;ri mahtig Crist<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ndash; uuas imu an is m&ocirc;de hold &ndash;:</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3100</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;huat, thu nu uui{d}eruuard bist&raquo;, qua{d} he,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;uuilleon m&icirc;nes,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thegno bezto!<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Huat, thu thesaro thiodo [canst]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">menniscan [sidu:]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thu ni uu&ecirc;st [the] maht godes,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[the] ik gifrummien scal.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Ik mag thi filu seggean</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&acirc;run uuordun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thar [h&ecirc;r undar thesumu uuerode standad]</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3105</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ges&icirc;{d}os m&icirc;ne,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thea ni m&ocirc;tun suelten &ecirc;r,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">huer{b}en an hinenfard<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ecirc;r sie himiles lioht,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">godes r&icirc;ki sehat.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>C&ocirc;s imu [iungarono] th&ocirc;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&acirc;n aftar thiu<span class="f_canusg">| </span>S&icirc;mon Petrus,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Iacob endi Iohannes,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[thea] gumon tu&ecirc;ne,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3110</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">b&ecirc;{d}ea thea gibr&ocirc;{d}er,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi imu th&ocirc; uppen thene berg giuu&ecirc;t</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sunder mid them ges&icirc;{d}un,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&acirc;lig barn godes,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">mid them thegnun thrim,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thiodo drohtin,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uualdand thesaro uueroldes:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuelde im thar uundres filu,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">t&ecirc;cno t&ocirc;gean,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that sie [gitr&ucirc;odin] thiu bet,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3115</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that he sel{b}o uuas<span class="f_canusg">| </span>sunu drohtines,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;lag he{b}encuning.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; sie [an] h&ocirc;han uuall</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">stigun st&ecirc;n endi berg,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>antat sie te theru stedi qu&acirc;mun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uueros uui{d}er uuolcan,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thar uualdand Krist,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">cuningo craftigost<span class="f_canusg">| </span>gicoren habde,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3120</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that he is godkundi<span class="f_canusg">| </span>iungarun s&icirc;nun</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thurh is &ecirc;nes craft<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ocirc;gean uuelde,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">berhtl&icirc;c bili{d}i.<span class="f_canusg">| </span></h3>
   </td>
  </tr>
</table>
</div>

<div class="bibliotheca">
BIBLIOTHECA AUGUSTANA
</div>
<div class="titulus1">
<p>&nbsp;</p>
</div>
<div class="titulus2">
<p>Heliand</p>
<p>um 830</p>
</div>

<div class="contentus">
<table width="650" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
  <tr>
	<td width="50">&nbsp;</td>
	<td  width="600">
<h1>Heliand</h1>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h2>Fitte XXXVIII</h2>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="650" colspan="2" >
<p style="color:#996699;">______________________________________________________________________________</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="50"><h6>&nbsp;</h6></td>
	<td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;">
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:200px;"><span class="f_canusg">| </span><span class="f_ruberi">T</span>h&ocirc; imu thar te bedu gihn&ecirc;g,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">th&ocirc; uuar{d} imu thar uppe<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ocirc;{d}arl&icirc;cora</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuliti endi giuu&acirc;di:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uur{d}un imu is uuangun liohte,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3125</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">bl&icirc;candi s&ocirc; [thiu berhte sunne]:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; sk&ecirc;n that barn godes,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">liuhte is l&icirc;chamo:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>liomon st&ocirc;dun</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&acirc;namo fan themu uualdandes barne;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuar{d} is geuu&acirc;di s&ocirc; hu&icirc;t</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&ocirc; sn&ecirc;u te sehanne.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; uuar{d} thar seldl&icirc;c thing</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gi&ocirc;gid aftar thiu:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Elias endi Moyses</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3130</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">qu&acirc;mun thar te Criste<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uui{d} s&ocirc; craftagne</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuordun uuehslean.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thar uuar{d} s&ocirc; uunsam spr&acirc;ka,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&ocirc; g&ocirc;d uuord undar gumun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thar the godes sunu</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uui{d} thea m&acirc;rean man<span class="f_canusg">| </span>mahlien uuelde,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&ocirc; bl&icirc;{d}i uuar{d} uppan themu berge:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>sk&ecirc;n that berhte lioht,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3135</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuas thar gard g&ocirc;dlic<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi gr&ocirc;ni [uuang],</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">paradise gel&icirc;c.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Petrus th&ocirc; gimahalde,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">heli{d} hardm&ocirc;dig<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi te is h&ecirc;rron sprac,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gr&ocirc;tte thene godes sunu:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;g&ocirc;d is [it] h&ecirc;r te uuesanne,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ef thu it gikiosan uuili,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Crist alouualdo,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3140</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that man thi h&ecirc;r an thesaru h&ocirc;he<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ecirc;n h&ucirc;s geuuirkea,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">m&acirc;rl&icirc;co gemaco<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi Moysese &ocirc;{d}er</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">endi Eliase thriddea:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thit is &ocirc;das h&ecirc;m,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuelono uunsamost.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Reht s&ocirc; he th&ocirc; that uuord gesprak,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&ocirc; [til&ecirc;t] thiu luft an tu&ecirc;:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>lioht uuolcan [sk&ecirc;n],</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3145</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gl&icirc;tandi gl&icirc;mo,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi thea g&ocirc;dun man</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uulitisc&ocirc;ni beuuarp.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; fan themu uuolcne quam</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;lag stemne godes,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi them heli{d}un thar</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sel{b}o sagde,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that that is sunu uu&acirc;ri,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">libbiendero lio{b}ost:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;an themu mi l&icirc;cod uuel</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3150</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an m&icirc;nun hugiskeftiun.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Themu gi h&ocirc;rien sculun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fulgangad imu gerno.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; ni mahtun thea iungaron Cristes</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thes uuolcnes uuliti<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi uuord godes,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thea is mikilon maht<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thea man antstanden,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ac sie bifellun th&ocirc; for{d}uuardes:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ferhes ni uu&acirc;ndun,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3155</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">lengiron l&icirc;{b}es.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; geng im t&ocirc; the landes uuard,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">behr&ecirc;n sie mid is handun<span class="f_canusg">| </span>h&ecirc;leandero bezt,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;t that sie im ni andr&ecirc;din:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;ni scal iu h&ecirc;r derien eouuiht,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thes gi h&ecirc;r seldl&icirc;kes<span class="f_canusg">| </span>giseen habbiad,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">m&ecirc;riaro thingo.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; eft them mannun uuar{d}</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3160</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hugi at iro herton<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi gih&ecirc;lid m&ocirc;d,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gibade an iro breostun:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>gis&acirc;hun that barn godes</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&ecirc;nna standen,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuas that o{d}er th&ocirc;,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">behliden himiles lioht.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; giuu&ecirc;t imu the h&ecirc;lago Crist</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fan themu berge ni{d}er;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>gib&ocirc;d aftar thiu</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3165</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">iungarun s&icirc;nun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that sie o{b}ar Iudeono folc</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ni sagdin thea gisioni:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;er than ik sel{b}o [h&ecirc;r]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">su&icirc;{d}o diurl&icirc;co<span class="f_canusg">| </span>fan d&ocirc;{d}e astande,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ar&icirc;se fan theru restu:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&icirc;{d}or mugun gi it rekkien for{d},</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">m&acirc;rien o{b}ar middilgard<span class="f_canusg">| </span>managun thiodun</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3170</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&icirc;do aftar thesaru uueroldi.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span></h3>
   </td>
  </tr>
</table>

<h1>Heliand</h1>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h2>Fitte XXXIX</h2>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="650" colspan="2" >
<p style="color:#996699;">______________________________________________________________________________</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="50"><h6>3170</h6></td>
	<td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;">
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:200px;"><span class="f_canusg">| </span><span class="f_ruberi">T</span>h&ocirc; giuu&ecirc;t imu uualdand Crist</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">eft an Galileo land,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc;hte is gadulingos,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">mahtig is m&acirc;go h&ecirc;m,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>sagde thar manages huat</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">berhtero bili{d}eo,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi that barn godes</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">them is s&acirc;ligun ges&icirc;{d}un<span class="f_canusg">| </span>sorgspell ni forhal,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3175</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ac he im openl&icirc;co<span class="f_canusg">| </span>allun sagde,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">them is g&ocirc;dun iungarun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>hu&ocirc; ine scolde that Iudeono folc</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&ecirc;gean te uundrun.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thes uur{d}un thar uu&icirc;se man</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">suu&icirc;{d}o an sorgun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuar{d} im s&ecirc;r hugi,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hriuuig umbi iro herte:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>gih&ocirc;rdun [iro h&ecirc;rron] th&ocirc;,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3180</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uualdandes sunu<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuordun tellien,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">huat he undar [theru] thiodu<span class="f_canusg">| </span>tholoian scolde,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuilliendi undar themu uuerode.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; giuu&ecirc;t imu uualdand Crist,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gumo fan Galilea,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc;hte imu Iudeono burg,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">qu&acirc;mun im te Cafarnaum.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thar fundun sie &ecirc;nan kuninges thegan</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3185</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uulankan undar themu uuerode:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>qua{d} that he uu&acirc;ri giuueldig bodo</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">a{d}alk&ecirc;sures;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>he gr&ocirc;tte aftar thiu</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">S&icirc;mon Petrusen,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>qua{d} that he uu&acirc;ri gisendid tharod,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that he thar gimanodi<span class="f_canusg">| </span>manno gehuiliken</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thero h&ocirc;{b}idscatto,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>the sie te themu ho{b}e scoldin</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3190</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">tinsi gelden:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;nis thes tueho &ecirc;nig</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gumono nigi&ecirc;numu,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ne sie [ina fargelden] s&acirc;n</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">m&ecirc;{d}mo kusteon,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[bi&ucirc;ten] iuuue m&ecirc;ster [&ecirc;no]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[ha{b}ad] it farl&acirc;ten.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Ni scal that l&icirc;con uuel</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">m&icirc;numu h&ecirc;rron,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; man it imu at is ho{b}e k&ucirc;{d}id,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3195</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">a{d}alk&ecirc;sure.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; geng aftar thiu</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">S&icirc;mon Petrus,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuelde it seggian th&ocirc;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;rron s&icirc;numu:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>he uuas is an is hugi [iu than,]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">giuuaro uualdand Crist:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ndash; imu ni mahte uuord &ecirc;nig</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">biholen uuer{d}en,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>he uuisse hugiskefti</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3200</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">manno gehuilikes &ndash;:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>h&ecirc;t th&ocirc; thene is m&acirc;rean thegan,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">S&icirc;mon Petrus<span class="f_canusg">| </span>an thene s&ecirc;o innen</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">angul uuerpen:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;[suliken] s&ocirc; thu thar &ecirc;rist [mugis]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fisk gif&acirc;hen&raquo;, [qua{d} he],<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;s&ocirc; teoh thu thene fan themu fl&ocirc;de te thi,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">antklemmi imu [thea] kinni:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thar maht thu undar them kaflon nimen</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3205</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">guldine scattos,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that thu fargelden maht</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">themu manne te gim&ocirc;dea<span class="f_canusg">| </span>m&icirc;nen endi th&icirc;nen</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">tinseo s&ocirc; huilican,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; he &ucirc;s t&ocirc; s&ocirc;kid.&raquo;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">He [ni] thorfte imu th&ocirc; aftar thiu<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ocirc;{d}aru uuordu</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fur{d}ur gibioden:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>geng fiscari g&ocirc;d,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3210</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">S&icirc;mon Petrus,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuarp an thene s&ecirc;o innen</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">angul an &ucirc;{d}eon<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi up git&ocirc;h</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fisk [an] fl&ocirc;de<span class="f_canusg">| </span>mid is folmun tu&ecirc;m,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">tekl&ocirc;f imu [thea] kinni<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi [undar] them kaflun nam</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">guldine scattos:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>dede al, s&ocirc; imu the godes sunu</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3215</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuordun geuu&icirc;sde.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thar uuas th&ocirc; uualdandes</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">megincraft gim&acirc;rid,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>hu&ocirc; scal [allaro] manno gehuilic</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">su&icirc;{d}o uuilliendi<span class="f_canusg">| </span>is uueroldh&ecirc;rron</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sculdi endi scattos,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thea [imu] giskeride sind,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gerno gelden:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ni scal ine farg&ucirc;mon eouuiht,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3220</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ni farmuni ine an is m&ocirc;de,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ac uuese imu [mildi an is hugi,]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thiono imu thiol&icirc;co:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>an thiu mag he thiodgodes</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuillean geuuirkean<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi &ocirc;k is uueroldh&ecirc;rron </h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">huldi habbien.<span class="f_canusg">| </span></h3>
   </td>
  </tr>
</table>
</div>
<!--  finis contentus  -->

<div class="titulus2">
<p>Heliand</p>
<p>um 830</p>

<div class="contentus">

  <tr>
	<td width="50">&nbsp;</td>
	<td  width="600">
<h1>Heliand</h1>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h2>Fitte XL</h2>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="650" colspan="2" >
<p style="color:#996699;">______________________________________________________________________________</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="50"><h6>&nbsp;</h6></td>
	<td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;">
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:200px;"><span class="f_canusg">| </span><span class="f_ruberi">S</span>&ocirc; l&ecirc;rde the h&ecirc;lago Crist</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thea is g&ocirc;don iungaron:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;ef &ecirc;nig gumono uui{d} iu&raquo;, qua{d} he,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3225</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;sundea geuuirkea,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>than nim thu ina sundar te thi,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thene rink an r&ucirc;na<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi imu is [r&acirc;d] saga,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&icirc;si imu mid uuordun.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Ef imu [than] thes [uuer{d}] ne s&icirc;,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that he thi gih&ocirc;rie,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>hala [thi] thar [&ocirc;{d}ara] t&ocirc;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">g&ocirc;daro gumono,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi lah imu is grimmun uuerc,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3230</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sak ina s&ocirc;{d}uuordun.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Ef imu than is sundea aftar thiu,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[l&ocirc;suuerc] ni l&ecirc;{d}on,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[giduo] it &ocirc;{d}run liudiun c&ucirc;{d},</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">m&acirc;ri it than for menegi<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi l&acirc;t manno filu</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuiten is faruurhti:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[&ocirc;{d}o beginnad] imu than is uuerk tregan,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an [is] hugi hreuuen,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>than [he] it gih&ocirc;rid heli{d}o filu,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3235</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[ahton] eldibarn<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi imu is u{b}ilon d&acirc;d</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[uueread] mid uuordun.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Ef he than &ocirc;k uuendien ne uuili,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ac [farm&ocirc;dat] sulica menegi,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>than l&acirc;t thu thene man faren,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ha{b}a ina than far h&ecirc;{d}inen<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi l&acirc;t ina thi an th&icirc;numu hugi l&ecirc;{d}en,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">m&icirc;{d} is an th&icirc;numu m&ocirc;de,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ne s&icirc; that imu eft mildi god,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3240</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;r he{b}encuning<span class="f_canusg">| </span>helpe farl&icirc;he,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fader allaro firiho barno.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; fr&acirc;gode Petrus,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">allaro thegno bezt<span class="f_canusg">| </span>theodan s&icirc;nan:</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;hu&ocirc; oft scal ik them mannun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>the uui{d} mi habbiad</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">l&ecirc;{d}uuerk giduan,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>leo{b}o drohtin,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3245</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">scal ik im si{b}un s&icirc;{d}un<span class="f_canusg">| </span>iro sundea [al&acirc;ten,]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uur&ecirc;{d}aro uuerko,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ecirc;r [than] ik is &ecirc;niga [uur&ecirc;ka] frummie,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">l&ecirc;{d}es te l&ocirc;ne?&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; sprak eft the landes uuard,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">angegin the godes sunu<span class="f_canusg">| </span>g&ocirc;dumu thegne:</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;ni seggiu ik thi fan si{b}uniun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; thu sel{b}o sprikis,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3250</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">mahlis mid th&icirc;nu m&ucirc;{d}u,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ik duom thi m&ecirc;ra thar t&ocirc;:</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">si{b}un s&icirc;{d}un si{b}untig<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; scalt thu sundea gehuemu,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">l&ecirc;{d}es al&acirc;ten:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; uuilliu ik thi te l&ecirc;run ge{b}en</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuordun uu&acirc;rfastun.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Nu ik thi sulica giuuald fargaf,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that thu m&icirc;nes h&icirc;uuiskes<span class="f_canusg">| </span>h&ecirc;rost uu&acirc;ris,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3255</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">manages mannkunnies,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>nu scalt thu im mildi uuesen,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">liudiun l&icirc;{d}i.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; thar te themu l&ecirc;reande quam</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&ecirc;n iung man angegin<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi fr&acirc;gode [Iesu] Crist:</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;m&ecirc;ster the g&ocirc;do&raquo;, qua{d} he,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;huat scal ik [manages] duan,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[an thiu the] ik he{b}enr&icirc;ki<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[gehalan] m&ocirc;ti?&raquo;</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3260</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Habde imu &ocirc;duuelon<span class="f_canusg">| </span>allen geuunnen,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">m&ecirc;{d}omhord manag,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thoh he mildean hugi</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">b&acirc;ri an is breostun.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; sprak imu that barn godes:</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;huat qui{d}is thu umbi [g&ocirc;don?]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>nis that gumono &ecirc;nig</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">bi&ucirc;tan the &ecirc;no,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>the thar al gesc&ocirc;p,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3265</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuerold endi uunnea.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Ef thu is uuillean ha{b}as,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that thu an lioht godes<span class="f_canusg">| </span>l&icirc;{d}an m&ocirc;tis,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">than scalt thu bihalden<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thea h&ecirc;lagon l&ecirc;ra,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[the] thar an themu aldon<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ecirc;uua gebiudid,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that thu man ni slah,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ni thu m&ecirc;nes ni sueri,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3270</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">farlegarnessi farl&acirc;t<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi luggi geuuitskepi,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">str&icirc;d endi stulina;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ne uuis thu te stark an hugi,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ne n&icirc;{d}in ne hatul,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ni n&ocirc;dr&ocirc;f ni [fremi;]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">a{b}unst alla farl&acirc;t;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuis th&icirc;nun eldirun g&ocirc;d,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fader endi m&ocirc;der,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi th&icirc;nun [friundun] hold,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3275</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">them n&acirc;histun gin&acirc;{d}ig.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Than thu [thi] giniodon m&ocirc;st</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[himilo r&icirc;keas,]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ef thu it bihalden uuili,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fulgangan godes l&ecirc;run.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; sprak eft the iungo man</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;al hebbiu ik s&ocirc; gil&ecirc;stid&raquo;, qua{d} he,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;s&ocirc; thu mi l&ecirc;ris nu,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuordun uu&icirc;sis,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; ik is eo uuiht ni farl&ecirc;t</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3280</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fan m&icirc;nero kindiski.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; bigan ina Crist sehan</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an mid is &ocirc;gun:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;&ecirc;n is thar noh nu&raquo;, qua{d} he,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;uuan thero uuerko:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ef thu is uuilleon ha{b}as,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that thu [thurhfremid]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thionon m&ocirc;tis</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;rron th&icirc;numu,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>than scalt thu that th&icirc;n hord nimen,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3285</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">scalt th&icirc;nan &ocirc;duuelon<span class="f_canusg">| </span>allan farc&ocirc;pien,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">diurie m&ecirc;{d}mos,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi d&ecirc;lien h&ecirc;t</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">armun mannun:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>than ha{b}as [thu] aftar thiu</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hord an himile;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>cum thi than gihalden te mi,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">folgo thi m&icirc;naro ferdi:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>than ha{b}as thu fri{d}u s&icirc;{d}ur.&raquo;</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3290</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Th&ocirc; uur{d}un Kristes [uuord]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>kindiungumu manne</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">su&icirc;{d}o an sorgun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuas imu s&ecirc;r hugi,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">m&ocirc;d umbi herte:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>habde m&ecirc;{d}mo filu,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuelono geuunnen;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuende imu eft thanen,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuas imu un&ocirc;{d}o<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[innan] breostun,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3295</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an is se{b}on su&acirc;ro.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Sah imu aftar th&ocirc;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Krist alouualdo,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>qua{d} it th&ocirc;, thar he uuelde,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">te them [is] iungarun geginuuardun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that uu&acirc;ri an godes r&icirc;ki</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">un&ocirc;{d}i &ocirc;dagumu manne<span class="f_canusg">| </span>up te cumanne:</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;&ocirc;{d}ur mag man olbundeon,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thoh he s&icirc; unmet gr&ocirc;t,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3300</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thurh n&acirc;{d}lan gat,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thoh [it] s&icirc; naru su&icirc;{d}o,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&acirc;ftur thurhsl&ocirc;pien,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>than mugi cuman thiu siole te himile</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thes [&ocirc;dagan] mannes,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>the h&ecirc;r al ha{b}ad</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">giuuendid an thene uueroldscat<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuilleon s&icirc;nen,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">m&ocirc;dgith&acirc;hti,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi ni hugid umbi thie maht godes.&raquo;</h3>
   </td>
  </tr>
</table>
</div>

  <tr>
	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="50"><h6>3305</h6></td>
	<td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;">
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;"><span class="f_ruberi">I</span>mu [anduuordiade<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ecirc;rthungan] gumo,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">S&icirc;mon Petrus,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi seggean bad</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">leo{b}an h&ecirc;rron:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;huat sculun uui thes te l&ocirc;ne nimen&raquo;, qua{d} he,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;g&ocirc;des te gelde,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thes uui thurh th&icirc;n iungard&ocirc;m</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&ecirc;gan endi er{b}i<span class="f_canusg">| </span>al farl&ecirc;tun</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3310</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ho{b}os endi h&icirc;uuiski<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi thi te h&ecirc;rron gicurun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">folgodun th&icirc;naru ferdi:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>huat scal &ucirc;s [thes] te frumu uuer{d}en,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[langes] te l&ocirc;ne?&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Liudeo drohtin</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sagde im th&ocirc; [sel{b}o]:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;than ik sittien kumu&raquo;, qua{d} he,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;an thie mikilan maht<span class="f_canusg">| </span>an themu m&acirc;rean dage,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3315</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thar ik allun scal<span class="f_canusg">| </span>irminthiodun</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[d&ocirc;mos] ad&ecirc;lien,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>than m&ocirc;tun gi mid iuuuomu drohtine thar</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sel{b}on sittien<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi m&ocirc;tun thera saca uualdan:</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">m&ocirc;tun gi Israhelo<span class="f_canusg">| </span>e{d}ilifolcun</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ad&ecirc;lien aftar iro d&acirc;diun:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; m&ocirc;tun gi thar gidiuride uuesen.</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3320</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Than seggiu ik iu te uu&acirc;ran:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; hue s&ocirc; that an thesaru uueroldi giduot,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that he thurh m&icirc;na minnea<span class="f_canusg">| </span>m&acirc;go gesidli</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">liof farl&ecirc;tid,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thes scal hi h&ecirc;r l&ocirc;n niman</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">tehan s&icirc;{d}un tehinfald,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ef he it mid treuuon duot,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">mid hluttru hugi.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>O{b}ar that ha{b}ad he &ocirc;k himiles lioht,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3325</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">open &ecirc;uuig l&icirc;f.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Bigan imu th&ocirc; aftar thiu</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">allaro barno bezt<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ecirc;n bili{d}i seggian,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">qua{d} that thar &ecirc;n &ocirc;dag man<span class="f_canusg">| </span>an &ecirc;rdagun</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[uu&acirc;ri] undar themu uuerode:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[&laquo;the] habde uuelono gen&ocirc;g,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sinkas gisamnod<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi imu simlun uuas</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3330</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">garu mid goldu<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi mid godouuebbiu,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fagarun fratahun<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi imu so filu habde</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">g&ocirc;des an is gardun<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi imu [at] g&ocirc;mun sat</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">allaro dago gehuilikes:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>habde imu diurl&icirc;c l&icirc;f,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">bl&icirc;tzea an is benkiun.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Than uuas thar eft &ecirc;n biddiendi man,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3335</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gil&ecirc;{b}od an is l&icirc;chamon,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Lazarus uuas he h&ecirc;ten,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">lag imu dago gehuilikes<span class="f_canusg">| </span>at them durun foren,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thar he thene &ocirc;dagan man<span class="f_canusg">| </span>inne uuisse</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an is gestseli<span class="f_canusg">| </span>g&ocirc;me thiggean,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sittien [at] sumble,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi he simlun b&ecirc;d</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3340</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">giarmod thar &ucirc;te:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ni m&ocirc;ste thar in cuman,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ne he ni mahte gebiddien,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that man imu thes br&ocirc;des tharod</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gidragan uueldi,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thes thar fan themu diske ni{d}er</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">antfel undar iro f&ocirc;ti:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ni mahte imu thar &ecirc;nig [fruma] uuer{d}en</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fan themu h&ecirc;roston, [the] thes h&ucirc;ses giuueld,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[bi&ucirc;tan] that thar</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gengun [is hundos t&ocirc;,]</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3345</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">likkodun is l&icirc;kuundon,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thar he liggiandi</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hungar tholode;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ni quam imu thar te helpu uuiht</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fan themu r&icirc;keon manne.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; gifragn ik that ina is reganogiscapu,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thene armon man<span class="f_canusg">| </span>is &ecirc;ndago</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[gimanoda mahtiun su&icirc;{d},]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that he manno dr&ocirc;m</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3350</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">age{b}en scolde.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Godes engilos</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">antfengun is ferh<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi l&ecirc;ddun ine for{d} thanen,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that sie an Abrahames barm<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thes armon mannes</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">siole gisettun:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thar m&ocirc;ste he simlun for{d}</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuesen an uunniun.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; qu&acirc;mun &ocirc;k uurdegiscapu,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3355</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">themu &ocirc;dagan man<span class="f_canusg">| </span>orlaghu&icirc;le,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that he thit lioht farl&ecirc;t:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>l&ecirc;{d}a uuihti</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">besinkodun is siole<span class="f_canusg">| </span>an thene suarton hel,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[an] that fern innen<span class="f_canusg">| </span>f&icirc;undun te uuillean,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">begr&ocirc;{b}un ine an gramono h&ecirc;m.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thanen mahte he thene g&ocirc;dan scauuon,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3360</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Abraham gesehen,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thar he uppe uuas</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">l&icirc;{b}es an lustun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi Lazarus sat</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">bl&icirc;{d}i an is barme,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>berht l&ocirc;n antfeng</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">allaro is arm&ocirc;dio,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi lag the &ocirc;dago man</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;to an theru helliu,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>hriop up thanen:</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3365</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;fader Abraham&raquo;, qua{d} he,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;mi is firinun tharf,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that thu mi an th&icirc;numu m&ocirc;dse{b}on<span class="f_canusg">| </span>mildi uuer{d}es,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">l&icirc;{d}i an thesaru lognu:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>sendi mi Lazarus herod,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that he m&icirc; gef&ocirc;rea<span class="f_canusg">| </span>an thit fern innan</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">caldes uuateres.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Ik h&ecirc;r quic brinnu</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3370</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;to an thesaru helliu:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>nu is mi th&icirc;naro helpono tharf,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that he mi aleskie<span class="f_canusg">| </span>mid is lutticon fingru</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">tungon m&icirc;ne,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>nu siu t&ecirc;kan ha{b}ad,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">u{b}il ar{b}edi.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[Inuuidr&acirc;do,]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">l&ecirc;{d}aro spr&acirc;ka,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>alles is mi nu thes l&ocirc;n cumen.&raquo;</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3375</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Imu [anduuordiade] th&ocirc; Abraham<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ndash; that uuas aldfader &ndash;:</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;gehugi thu an th&icirc;numu herton&raquo;, qua{d} he,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;huat thu habdes iu</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuelono an uueroldi.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Huat, thu thar alle th&icirc;ne uunnea farsliti,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">g&ocirc;des an gardun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; huat s&ocirc; thi gi{b}i{d}ig for{d}</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuer{d}en [scolde.]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Uu&icirc;ti tholode</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3380</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Lazarus an themu liohte,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>habde thar l&ecirc;{d}es filu,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&icirc;teas an uueroldi.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Bethiu scal he nu [uuelon] &ecirc;gan,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">libbien an lustun:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thu scalt thea logna tholan,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">brinnendi fiur:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ni mag is thi &ecirc;nig b&ocirc;te kumen</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hinana te helliu:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>it ha{b}ad the h&ecirc;lago god</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3385</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&ocirc; [gifastnod] mid is fa{d}mun:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ni mag thar faren &ecirc;nig</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thegno thurh that thiustri:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>it is h&ecirc;r s&ocirc; thikki undar &ucirc;s.&raquo;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Th&ocirc; sprac eft Abrahame<span class="f_canusg">| </span>the erl tegegnes</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fan theru h&ecirc;tan hell<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi helpono bad,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that he Lazarus<span class="f_canusg">| </span>an liudio dr&ocirc;m</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3390</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sel{b}on sandi:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;that he geseggea thar</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">br&ocirc;{d}arun m&icirc;nun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>hu&ocirc; ik h&ecirc;r brinnendi</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thr&acirc;uuerk tholon;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>si [thar] undar theru [thiodu] sind,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">si f&icirc;{b}i undar themu folke:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ik an forhtun bium,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that sie im thar faruuirkien,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that sie sculin &ocirc;k an thit uu&icirc;ti te mi,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3395</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an s&ocirc; gr&acirc;dag fiur.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; imu eft tegegnes sprak</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Abraham aldfader,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>qua{d} that sie thar &ecirc;o godes</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an themu landskepi,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>liudi habdin,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Moyseses gib&ocirc;d<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi thar managaro t&ocirc;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&acirc;rsaguno uuord:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;ef sie is uuillige sind,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3400</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that sie that bihalden,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>than ni thur{b}un sie an [thea] hell innen,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an that fern faren,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ef sie [gefrummiad] s&ocirc;,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&ocirc; thea gebiodad,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[the thea] b&ocirc;k lesat</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">them liudiun te [l&ecirc;run.]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Ef sie thes than ni uuilliad l&ecirc;stien uuiht,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thanne ni h&ocirc;riad sie &ocirc;k<span class="f_canusg">| </span>themu the [hinan] ast&acirc;d,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3405</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">man fan d&ocirc;{d}e.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>L&acirc;te man sie an iro m&ocirc;dse{b}on</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sel{b}on keosen,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>hue{d}er im su&ocirc;tiera thunkie</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">te giuuinnanne,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; lango s&ocirc; sie an thesaru uueroldi sind,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that sie eft u{b}il ettha g&ocirc;d<span class="f_canusg">| </span>aftar habbien.&raquo;</h3>
   </td>
  </tr>
</table>
</div>

<h2>Fitte XLII</h2>

	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="650" colspan="2" >
