    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="50"><h6>&nbsp;</h6></td>
	<td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;">
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;"><span class="f_ruberi">S</span>&ocirc; l&ecirc;rde he th&ocirc; thea liudi<span class="f_canusg">| </span>liohton uuordon,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3410</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">allaro barno bezt,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi bili{d}i sagde</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">manag mankunnie<span class="f_canusg">| </span>mahtig drohtin,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">qua{d} that imu [&ecirc;n] s&acirc;lig gumo<span class="f_canusg">| </span>samnon bigunni</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">man an morgen,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;endi im m&ecirc;da gih&ecirc;t,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">the h&ecirc;rosto thes h&icirc;uuiskeas,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>su&icirc;{d}o [holdl&icirc;c l&ocirc;n&raquo;],</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3415</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">quat that hie iro allaro gihuem<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ecirc;nna g&acirc;{b}i</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">silofrinna scat.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;Thuo samnodun managa</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uueros an is uu&icirc;ngardon,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ndash; endi hie im uuerc bifalah &ndash;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&acirc;dro an &ucirc;htan.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Sum quam thar &ocirc;c an undorn tuo,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sum quam thar an middian dag,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>man te them uuerke,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3420</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sum quam thar te n&ocirc;nu,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thuo uuas thiu nigu{d}a t&icirc;d</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sumarlanges dages;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>sum thar &ocirc;c s&icirc;{d}or quam</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an thia elliftun t&icirc;d.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thuo geng thar &acirc;{b}and tuo,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sunna ti sedle.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thuo hie sel{b}o gib&ocirc;d</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">is ambahtion,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>erlo drohtin,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3425</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that man thero [manno] gihuem<span class="f_canusg">| </span>is meoda forguldi,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">them erlon ar{b}idl&ocirc;n;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>hiet thiem at &ecirc;rist ge{b}an.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thia [thar at] lezt uu&acirc;run,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>liudi cumana,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uueros te them [uuerke,]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi mid is uuordon gib&ocirc;d,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that man them mannon<span class="f_canusg">| </span>iro mieda forguldi</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3430</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">alles at aftan,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>them thar qu&acirc;mun at &ecirc;rist tuo</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuillendi te them uuerke.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Uu&acirc;ndun sia su&icirc;{d}o,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that man im m&ecirc;ra l&ocirc;n<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[gimacod] habdi</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uui{d} [iro] ara{b}edie:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>than man im allon gaf,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">them liudeon gil&icirc;co.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>L&ecirc;{d} uuas that su&icirc;{d}o,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3435</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">allon them ando,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>them thar qu&acirc;mun at &ecirc;rist tuo:</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;uui qu&acirc;mun hier an moragan&raquo;, qu&acirc;{d}un sia,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;endi tholodun hier manag te dage</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ara{b}iduuerco,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>hu&icirc;lon unmet h&ecirc;t,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sc&icirc;nandia sunna:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>nu ni gi{b}is thu &ucirc;s scattes than m&ecirc;r,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thie thu them &ocirc;{d}ron duos,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thia hier &ecirc;na hu&icirc;la</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3440</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&acirc;ron an th&icirc;non uuerke.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thuo habda eft is uuord garo</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thie h&ecirc;rrosto thes h&icirc;uuiskes,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>quat [that] hie im ni habdi gih&ecirc;tan than m&ecirc;r</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuer{d}es uui{d} iro uuerke:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;huat, ik giuuald hebbiu&raquo;, quathie,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;that ik iu allon gil&icirc;co muot<span class="f_canusg">| </span>l&ocirc;n forgeldan,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">iuues uuerkes uuer{d}.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Than uualdandi Crist</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3445</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">m&ecirc;nda im thoh m&ecirc;ra thing,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thoh hie o{b}ar that manno folc</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fan them uu&icirc;ngardon s&ocirc;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuordon spr&acirc;ki,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hu&ocirc; thar unefno<span class="f_canusg">| </span>erlos qu&acirc;mun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uueros te them uuerke.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>S&ocirc; sculun fan thero uueroldi duon</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">manncunnies barn<span class="f_canusg">| </span>an that m&acirc;rio lioht,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3450</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gumon an godes uuang:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>sum biginnit ina giriuuan s&acirc;n</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an is kindiski,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ha{b}it im [gicoranan] muod,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuilleon guodan,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uueroldsaca m&icirc;{d}it,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">farl&acirc;tit is lusta;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ni mag ina is l&icirc;khamo</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an unspuod forspanan:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>sp&acirc;hi{d}a l&icirc;not,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3455</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[godes] &ecirc;u,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>gramono forl&acirc;tit,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uur&ecirc;{d}aro uuillion,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>duot im s&ocirc; te is uueroldi for{d},</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">l&ecirc;stit s&ocirc; an theson liohte,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ant[that] im is l&icirc;{b}es cumit,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">aldres &acirc;{b}and;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>giuu&icirc;tit im than [upuuegos:</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thar] uuir{d}it im is ara{b}edi<span class="f_canusg">| </span>all gil&ocirc;not,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3460</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fargoldan mid guodu<span class="f_canusg">| </span>an godes r&icirc;kie.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">That m&ecirc;ndun thia uuuruhteon,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thia an them uu&icirc;ngardon</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&acirc;dro an &ucirc;hta<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ar{b}idl&icirc;co</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuerc bigunnun<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi thuruuuonodun for{d},</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">erlos unt &acirc;{b}and.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Sum thar &ocirc;c an undern quam,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3465</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">habda thuo farmerrid,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[thia] moraganstunda</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thes daguuerkes forduolon;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; duot doloro filo,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gim&ecirc;daro manno:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>dr&icirc;{b}it im misl&icirc;c thing</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gerno an is iugu{d}i,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ndash; ha{b}it im gelpquidi</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">l&ecirc;{d}a [gil&icirc;not]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi l&ocirc;suuord manag &ndash;,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3470</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">antthat is kindiski<span class="f_canusg">| </span>farcuman uuir{d}it,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that ina after is iugu{d}i<span class="f_canusg">| </span>godes anst manot</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">bl&icirc;{d}i an is brioston;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>f&acirc;hit im te beteron than</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuordon endi uuercon,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>l&ecirc;dit im is uuerold mid thiu,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">is aldar ant thena endi:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>cumit im alles l&ocirc;n</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3475</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an godes r&icirc;kie,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>g&ocirc;daro uuerko.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Sum mann thann midfiri<span class="f_canusg">| </span>m&ecirc;n farl&acirc;tid,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">su&acirc;ra sundiun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>f&acirc;hit im an s&acirc;lig thing,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">biginnit im thuru godes craft<span class="f_canusg">| </span>guodaro uuerco,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">buotit balospr&acirc;ka,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>l&acirc;tit im is [bittrun] d&acirc;d</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3480</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an is hugie hreuuan;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>cumit im thiu helpa fon gode,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that im gil&ecirc;stid thie gil&ocirc;{b}o,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; lango s&ocirc; im is l&icirc;f uuarod;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">farit im for{d} mid thiu,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>antf&acirc;hit is mieda,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">guod l&ocirc;n at gode;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ni sindun &ecirc;niga ge{b}a beteran.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Sum biginnit thann &ocirc;c fur{d}or,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>than hie ist fruodot m&ecirc;r,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3485</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">is aldares afheldit,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ndash; than biginnat im is u{b}ilon uuerc</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">l&ecirc;{d}on an theson liohte,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>than ina l&ecirc;ra godes</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gimanod an is muode:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuir{d}it im mildera hugi,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thurugengit im mid guodu<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi geld nimit,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ocirc;h himilr&icirc;ki,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>than hie hinan uuendit,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3490</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuir{d}it im is mieda s&ocirc; sama,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[s&ocirc; them man]nun uuar{d},</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thea thar te n&ocirc;nu dages,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>an thea nigunda t&icirc;d,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an thene uu&icirc;ngardon<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuirkean qu&acirc;mun.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Sum uuir{d}id than s&ocirc; su&icirc;{d}o gefr&ocirc;dot,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; he ni uuili is sundea b&ocirc;tien,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ac he &ocirc;kid sie mid u{b}ilu gehuilicu,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>antat imu is &acirc;{b}and n&acirc;hid,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3495</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">is [uuerold] endi is uunnea farsl&icirc;tid;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>than beginnid he imu [uu&icirc;ti andr&ecirc;den],</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[is sundeon uuer{d}ad imu] sorga an m&ocirc;de:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>gehugid [huat] he sel{b}o gefrumide</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">grimmes than [lango], the he m&ocirc;ste is [iugu{d}eo] neoten;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ni mag than mid &ocirc;{d}ru g&ocirc;du gib&ocirc;tien</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thea d&acirc;di, thea he s&ocirc; der{b}ea gefrumide,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ac he slehit allaro dago gehuilikes</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an is breost mid b&ecirc;{d}iun handun<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi uu&ocirc;pit sie mid bittrun trahnun,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3500</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hl&ucirc;do he sie mid hofnu k&ucirc;mid,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>bidid thene h&ecirc;lagon drohtin</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">mahtigne, that he imu mildi uuer{d}e:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ni l&acirc;tid [imu] s&icirc;{d}or is m&ocirc;d gitu&icirc;flien;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&ocirc; &ecirc;grohtful is, the thar alles geuueldid:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>he ni uuili &ecirc;nigumu irmin[manne]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">faruuernien uuillean s&icirc;nes;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>fargi{b}id imu uualdand sel{b}o</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;lag [himilr&icirc;ki:]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>than is imu giholpen s&icirc;{d}ur.</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3505</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Alle sculun sie thar &ecirc;ra antf&acirc;hen,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thoh sie tharod te &ecirc;naru t&icirc;di</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ni kumen, that [kunni manno],<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thoh uuili imu the craftigo drohtin,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gil&ocirc;non allaro liudio<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[s&ocirc; huilicumu], s&ocirc; h&ecirc;r is gil&ocirc;{b}on antf&acirc;hit:</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[&ecirc;n] himilr&icirc;ki<span class="f_canusg">| </span>gi{b}id he allun theodun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">mannun te m&ecirc;du.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>That m&ecirc;nde mahtig Krist,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3510</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">barno that bezte,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>th&ocirc; he that bili{d}i sprak,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hu&ocirc; thar te them uu&icirc;ngardun<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uurhteon qu&acirc;min,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">man misl&icirc;co:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thoh nam is m&ecirc;de gehue</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fulle te [is] fr&ocirc;ian.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>S&ocirc; sculun firiho barn</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">at gode sel{b}umu<span class="f_canusg">| </span>geld antf&acirc;hen,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3515</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">su&icirc;{d}o leo{b}l&icirc;c l&ocirc;n,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thoh sie sume [s&ocirc;] late uuer{d}an.</h3>
   </td>
  </tr>
</table>
</div>
<!--  finis contentus  -->

BIBLIOTHECA AUGUSTANA
</div>

<div class="titulus2">
<p>Heliand</p>
<p>um 830</p>
</div>
<!--  finis tituli  -->

<!-- contentus -->
<div class="contentus">
<table width="650" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
  <tr>
	<td width="50">&nbsp;</td>
	<td  width="600">
<h1>Heliand</h1>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h2>Fitte XLIII</h2>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="650" colspan="2" >
<p style="color:#996699;">______________________________________________________________________________</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="50"><h6>&nbsp;</h6></td>
	<td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;">
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;"><span class="f_ruberi">H</span>&ecirc;t imu th&ocirc; thea is g&ocirc;dan<span class="f_canusg">| </span>iungaron n&acirc;hor</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">tueli{b}i gangan<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ndash; thea uu&acirc;run imu triuuuiston</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">man o{b}ar er{d}u &ndash;,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>sagde im mahtig [sel{b}o]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&ocirc;{d}ers&icirc;{d}u,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>huilic imu [thar ar{b}edi]</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3520</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">t&ocirc;uuard uu&acirc;run:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;thes ni mag &ecirc;nig tueho uuer{d}en&raquo;, qua{d} he.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Qua{d} that sie th&ocirc; te Hierusalem<span class="f_canusg">| </span>an that Iudeono folc</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">l&icirc;{d}an scoldin:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;thar uuir{d}id all gil&ecirc;stid s&ocirc;,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gefrumid undar themu folke,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; it an furndagun</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&icirc;se man be mi<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuordun gespr&acirc;kun.</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3525</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Thar sculun mi farc&ocirc;pon<span class="f_canusg">| </span>undar thea craftigon thiod,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">heli{d}os te theru h&ecirc;ri;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thar uuer{d}at m&icirc;na hendi [gebundana,]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fa{d}mos uuer{d}ad mi thar gefastnod;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>filu scal ik thar githoloian,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hoskes gih&ocirc;rien<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi harmquidi,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">bismerspr&acirc;ka<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi bih&ecirc;tuuord manag;</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3530</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sie uu&ecirc;geat mi te uundron<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uu&acirc;pnes eggiun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">bil&ocirc;siad mi l&icirc;{b}u:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ik te thesumu liohte scal</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thurh drohtines craft<span class="f_canusg">| </span>fan d&ocirc;{d}e astanden</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an thriddeon dage.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Ni quam ik undar thesa theoda [herod]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">te [thiu,] that m&icirc;n eldibarn<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ar{b}ed habdin,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3535</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that mi thionodi thius thiod:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ni uuilliu ik is sie thiggien nu,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fergon thit folcskepi,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ac ik scal imu te frumu uuer{d}en,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">theonon imu theol&icirc;co<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi for alla thesa theoda ge{b}en</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">seole m&icirc;ne.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Ik uuilliu sie sel{b}o nu</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">l&ocirc;sien mid m&icirc;nu l&icirc;{b}u,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thea h&ecirc;r lango bidun,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3540</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">mankunnies manag,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>m&icirc;nara helpa.&raquo;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">F&ocirc;r imu th&ocirc; for{d}uuardes<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ndash; habde imu [fasten] hugi,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">bl&icirc;{d}ean an is breostun<span class="f_canusg">| </span>barn drohtines &ndash;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[uuelda] im te Hierusalem<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Iudeo folkes</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuilleon uu&icirc;san:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>he conste thes uuerodes s&ocirc; garo</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3545</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hetigrimmen hugi<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi [hardan] str&icirc;d,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uur&ecirc;{d}an uuilleon.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Uuerod s&icirc;{d}ode</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">furi Hierichoburg;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuas the godes sunu,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">mahtig undar [thero menigi.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thar s&acirc;tun tu&ecirc;nie] man bi uuege,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">blinde uu&acirc;run sie b&ecirc;{d}ie:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuas im b&ocirc;tono tharf,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3550</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that sie geh&ecirc;ldi<span class="f_canusg">| </span>he{b}enes uualdand,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">huand sie s&ocirc; lango<span class="f_canusg">| </span>liohtes tholodun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">managa hu&icirc;la.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Sie gih&ocirc;rdun th&ocirc; that megin faren</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">endi fr&acirc;godun s&acirc;n<span class="f_canusg">| </span>firiuuitl&icirc;co</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[reginiblindun,]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>huilic thar r&icirc;ki man</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3555</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">undar themu folcskepi<span class="f_canusg">| </span>furista uu&acirc;ri,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;rost an h&ocirc;{b}id.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; sprac im &ecirc;n heli{d} angegin,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">qua{d} that thar Hiesu Crist<span class="f_canusg">| </span>fan [Galilealande,]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;leandero bezt<span class="f_canusg">| </span>h&ecirc;rost uu&acirc;ri,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">f&ocirc;ri mid is folcu.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; uuar{d} fr&acirc;hm&ocirc;d hugi</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3560</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">b&ecirc;{d}iun them blindun mannun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>th&ocirc; sie that barn godes</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuissun under themu uuerode:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>hreopun im th&ocirc; mid iro uuordun t&ocirc;,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hl&ucirc;do te themu h&ecirc;lagon Criste,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>b&acirc;dun that he im helpe ger&ecirc;di:</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;drohtin Dauides sunu:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuis &ucirc;s mid th&icirc;nun d&acirc;diun mildi,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">neri &ucirc;s af thesaru n&ocirc;di,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; thu gin&ocirc;ge d&ocirc;s</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3565</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">manno kunnies:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thu bist managun g&ocirc;d,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hilpis endi h&ecirc;lis.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Tho bigan im that heli{d}o folc</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuerien mid uuordun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that sie an uualdand Krist</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&ocirc; hl&ucirc;do ni hriopin.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Si ni uueldun [im] h&ocirc;rien te thiu,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ac sie simla m&ecirc;r endi m&ecirc;r<span class="f_canusg">| </span>o{b}ar that manno folc</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3570</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hl&ucirc;do hreopun.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>H&ecirc;leand gest&ocirc;d,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">allaro barno bezt,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>h&ecirc;t sie [th&ocirc;] brengien te imu,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">l&ecirc;dien thurh thea liudi,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>sprak im listiun t&ocirc;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[mildl&icirc;co] for theru menegi:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;huat uuilliad [git] m&icirc;naro h&ecirc;r&raquo;, qua{d} he,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;helpono [habbien?&raquo;]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Sie b&acirc;dun ina h&ecirc;lagna,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3575</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that he im ira &ocirc;gon<span class="f_canusg">| </span>opana gid&acirc;di,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">farliuui theses liohtes,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that sie liudio dr&ocirc;m,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">suikle sunnun [sc&icirc;n]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>gisehen m&ocirc;stin,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uulitisc&ocirc;nie uuerold.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Uualdand frumide,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hr&ecirc;n sie th&ocirc; mid is handun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>dede is helpe thar t&ocirc;,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3580</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that them blindun th&ocirc;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>b&ecirc;{d}ium uur{d}un</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&ocirc;gon gioponod,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that sie er{d}e endi himil</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thurh craft godes<span class="f_canusg">| </span>antkiennien mahtun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">lioht endi liudi.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; sagdun sie lof gode,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">diurdun [&ucirc;san drohtin,]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thes sie dages liohtes</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3585</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">br&ucirc;can m&ocirc;stun:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>geuuitun im b&ecirc;{d}ie mid imu,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">folgodun is ferdi:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuas im thiu fruma gi{b}i{d}ig,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">endi &ocirc;k uualdandes uuerk<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uu&icirc;do gek&ucirc;{d}id,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">managun gim&acirc;rid.<span class="f_canusg">| </span></h3>
   </td>
  </tr>
</table>
</div>
<!--  finis contentus  -->

<!--  titulus  -->
<div class="bibliotheca">
BIBLIOTHECA AUGUSTANA
</div>
<div class="titulus1">
<p>&nbsp;</p>
</div>
<div class="titulus2">
<p>Heliand</p>
<p>um 830</p>
</div>
<!--  finis tituli  -->

<!-- contentus -->
<div class="contentus">
<table width="650" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
  <tr>
	<td width="50">&nbsp;</td>
	<td  width="600">
<h1>Heliand</h1>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h2>Fitte XLIV</h2>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="650" colspan="2" >
<p style="color:#996699;">______________________________________________________________________________</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="50"><h6>&nbsp;</h6></td>
	<td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;">
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:200px;"><span class="f_canusg">| </span><span class="f_ruberi">T</span>har uuas s&ocirc; mahtigl&icirc;c</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">bili{d}i gib&ocirc;knid,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thar the blindon man</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3590</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">bi themu uuege s&acirc;tun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uu&icirc;ti tholodun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">liohtes l&ocirc;se:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that m&ecirc;nid thoh liudio barn,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">al mancunni,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>hu&ocirc; sie mahtig god</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an themu anaginne<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thurh is &ecirc;nes craft</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sinh&icirc;un tu&ecirc;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>sel{b}o giuuarhte,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3595</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Adam endi &Ecirc;van:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>fargaf im upuuegos,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[himilo r&icirc;ki;]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ac th&ocirc; uuar{d} im the hatola te n&acirc;h,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">f&icirc;und mid f&ecirc;knu<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi mid firinuuerkun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">bisu&ecirc;k sie mid sundiun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that sie sinsc&ocirc;ni,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">lioht farl&ecirc;tun:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uur{d}un an l&ecirc;{d}aron stedi,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3600</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an thesen middilgard<span class="f_canusg">| </span>man faruuorpen,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">tholodun h&ecirc;r an thiustriu<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[thiodar{b}edi,]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uunnun uuracs&icirc;{d}os,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuelon thar{b}odun:</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">farg&acirc;tun godes r&icirc;kies,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>gramon theonodun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">f&icirc;undo barnun;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>sie guldun is im mid [fiuru] l&ocirc;n</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3605</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an theru h&ecirc;ton helliu.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Bethiu uu&acirc;run siu an iro hugi blinda</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an thesaru middilgard,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>menniscono barn,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">huand siu [ine] ni antkiendun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>craftagne god,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">himilisken h&ecirc;rron,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thene [the] sie mid is handun gisc&ocirc;p,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">giuuarhte an is uuillion.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thius uuerold uuas th&ocirc; s&ocirc; farhuer{b}id,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3610</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">bithuungen an thiustrie,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>an thiodar{b}idi,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an d&ocirc;{d}es dalu:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&acirc;tun im th&ocirc; bi theru drohtines str&acirc;tun</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">i&acirc;marm&ocirc;de,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>godes helpe bidun:</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">siu ni mahte im [th&ocirc;] &ecirc;r uuer{d}en,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ecirc;r than uualdand god</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an thesan middilgard,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>mahtig drohtin,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3615</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">is sel{b}es sunu<span class="f_canusg">| </span>sendien [uueldi]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that he lioht antluki<span class="f_canusg">| </span>liudio barnun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">oponodi im &ecirc;uuig l&icirc;f,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that sie thene [alouualdon</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">mahtin] antkennien uuel,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>craftagna [god.]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&Ocirc;k mag ik giu [gitellien,]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>of gi thar t&ocirc; uuilliad</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3620</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">huggien endi h&ocirc;rien,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that gi thes h&ecirc;liandes [mugun]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">craft antkennien,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>hu&ocirc; is kumi uur{d}un</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an thesaru middilgard<span class="f_canusg">| </span>managun te [helpu,]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ia huat he mid them d&acirc;diun<span class="f_canusg">| </span>drohtin sel{b}o</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">manages m&ecirc;nde,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ia behuiu thiu m&acirc;rie burg</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3625</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Hiericho h&ecirc;tid,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[thiu] thar an Iudeon [st&acirc;d]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gimacod mid m&ucirc;run:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thiu is aftar themu m&acirc;nen [ginemnid],</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">aftar themu [torhten] tungle:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>he ni mag is t&icirc;di bem&icirc;{d}en,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ac he dago gehuilikes<span class="f_canusg">| </span>duod [&ocirc;{d}erhue{d}er,]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuanod ohtho uuahsid.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>S&ocirc; d&ocirc;d an thesaro uueroldi h&ecirc;r,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3630</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an thesaru middilgard<span class="f_canusg">| </span>menniscono barn:</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">farad endi folgod,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>fr&ocirc;de ster{b}ad,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuer{d}ad eft iunga<span class="f_canusg">| </span>aftar kumane,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uueros auuahsane,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>unttat sie eft uurd farnimid.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">That m&ecirc;nde that barn godes,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>th&ocirc; he fon theru burgi f&ocirc;r,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3635</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">the g&ocirc;do fan Hiericho,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that ni mahte &ecirc;r uuer{d}en gumono barnun</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thiu [blindia] gib&ocirc;tid,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that sie that berhte lioht,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gis&acirc;hin sinsc&ocirc;ni,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ecirc;r than he sel{b}o h&ecirc;r</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an thesaru middilgard<span class="f_canusg">| </span>menniski antfeng,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fl&ecirc;sk [endi] l&icirc;chamon.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; uur{d}un thes firiho barn</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3640</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[giuuar] an thesaru uueroldi,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>the h&ecirc;r an uu&icirc;tie &ecirc;r,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&acirc;tun an sundiun<span class="f_canusg">| </span>gisiunies l&ocirc;se,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">tholodun an thiustrie,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ndash; sie afs&ocirc;{b}un that uuas [thesaru thiod] kuman</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;leand te helpu<span class="f_canusg">| </span>fan he{b}enr&icirc;kie,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Crist allaro cuningo best;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>sie mahtun is antkennien s&acirc;n,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3645</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gif&ocirc;lien is fardio.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; sie [s&ocirc;] filu hriopun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">the man te themu mahtigon gode,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that im mildi aftar thiu</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uualdand uur{d}i.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Than uueridun [im] su&icirc;{d}o</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thia su&acirc;run sundeon,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>the sie im &ecirc;r [sel{b}on] gid&acirc;dun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[lettun] sie thes gil&ocirc;bon.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Sie ni mahtun them liudiun [thoh]</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3650</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">biuuerien iro uuilleon,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ac sie [an] uualdand god</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hl&ucirc;do hriopun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>antat he im iro h&ecirc;li fargaf,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that sie sinl&icirc;f<span class="f_canusg">| </span>gisehen [m&ocirc;stin,]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">open &ecirc;uuig lioht<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi an faren</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an thiu berhtun b&ucirc;.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>That m&ecirc;ndun thea blindun man,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3655</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">the thar bi Hierichoburg<span class="f_canusg">| </span>te themu godes barne</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hl&ucirc;do hriopun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that he im iro h&ecirc;li farlihi,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">liohtes an thesumu l&icirc;{b}e:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>than [im thea liudi] s&ocirc; filu</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uueridun mid uuordun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thea thar an themu uuege f&ocirc;run</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">biforen endi bihinden:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; d&ocirc;t thea firinsundeon</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3660</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an thesaru middilgard<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[mankunnie.]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">H&ocirc;riad nu hu&ocirc; thie blindun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&icirc;{d}ur im gib&ocirc;tid uuar{d},</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that sie sunnun lioht<span class="f_canusg">| </span>gesehen m&ocirc;stun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hu&ocirc; si th&ocirc; d&acirc;dun:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>geuuitun im [mid iro] drohtine samad,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">folgodun is ferdi,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>spr&acirc;kun filu uuordo</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3665</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">themu landes hirdie te lo{b}e:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; d&ocirc;d im noh liudio barn</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&icirc;do aftar thesaru uueroldi,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&icirc;{d}ur im uualdand [Crist]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">geliuhte mid is l&ecirc;run<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi im l&icirc;f &ecirc;uuig,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">godes r&icirc;ki [fargaf]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>g&ocirc;dun mannun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ocirc;h himiles lioht<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi is helpe thar t&ocirc;,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3670</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&ocirc; huemu s&ocirc; that giuuerkod,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that he m&ocirc;ti themu is uuege folgon.</h3>
   </td>
  </tr>
</table>
</div>

<p>um 830</p>

<table width="650" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
  <tr>
	<td width="50">&nbsp;</td>
	<td  width="600">
<h1>Heliand</h1>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h2>Fitte XLV</h2>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="650" colspan="2" >
<p style="color:#996699;">______________________________________________________________________________</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="50"><h6>&nbsp;</h6></td>
	<td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;">
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[<span class="f_ruberi">T</span>h&ocirc; n&acirc;hide]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>neriendo Crist,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">the g&ocirc;do te Hierusalem.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Quam imu thar tegegnes filu</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuerodes an uuilleon<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuel huggendies,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">antfengun ina fagaro<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi imu biforen [streidun]</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3675</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thene uueg mid iro giuu&acirc;diun<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi mid uurtiun s&ocirc; same,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">mid berhtun bl&ocirc;mun<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi mid b&ocirc;mo t&ocirc;gun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that feld mid fagaron palmun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>al s&ocirc; is fard geburide,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that the godes sunu<span class="f_canusg">| </span>gangan uuelde</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">te theru m&acirc;rean burg.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Huarf ina megin umbi</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3680</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[liudio] an lustun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi lofsang [ah&ocirc;f]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that uuerod an uuilleon:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>sagdun uualdande thank,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thes thar sel{b}o quam<span class="f_canusg">| </span>sunu Dauides</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&icirc;son thes uuerodes.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; gesah uualdand Krist</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">the g&ocirc;do te Hierusalem,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>gumono bezta,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3685</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">bl&icirc;can thene [burges] uual<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi b&ucirc; Iudeono,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ocirc;ha horn[seli]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi &ocirc;k that h&ucirc;s godes,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">allaro uu&icirc;ho [uunsamost].<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; uuel imu an innen</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hugi [uui{d}] is herte:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>th&ocirc; ni mahte that h&ecirc;lage barn</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&ocirc;pu auu&icirc;sien,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>sprak th&ocirc; uuordo filu</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3690</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hriuuigl&icirc;co &ndash;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuas imu is hugi s&ecirc;reg &ndash;:</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;uu&ecirc; uuar{d} thi, Hierusalem&raquo;, qua{d} he,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;thes thu te uu&acirc;run ni [uu&ecirc;st]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thea [uurdegiskefti],<span class="f_canusg">| </span>the thi noh giuuer{d}en sculun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hu&ocirc; thu noh [uuir{d}is behabd]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>heries craftu</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">endi thi bisittiad<span class="f_canusg">| </span>sl&icirc;{d}m&ocirc;de man,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3695</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">f&icirc;und mid folcun.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Than ni ha{b}as thu fri{d}u huergin,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">mundburd mid mannun:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>l&ecirc;diad thi h&ecirc;r manage t&ocirc;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ordos endi eggia,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>orlegas [uuord,]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">farfioth th&icirc;n folcskepi<span class="f_canusg">| </span>fiures liomon,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">these [uu&icirc;ki] auu&ocirc;stiad,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuallos h&ocirc;ha</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3700</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">felliad [te foldun:]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ni afst&acirc;d is felis nigiean,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">st&ecirc;n o{b}ar &ocirc;{d}rumu,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ak uuer{d}ad thesa stedi uu&ocirc;stia</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">umbi Hierusalem<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Iudeo liudeo,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">huand sie ni antkenniad,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that im kumana sind</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">iro t&icirc;di t&ocirc;uuardes,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ac sie habbiad im tu&icirc;flien hugi,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3705</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ni uuitun that iro uu&icirc;sad<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uualdandes craft.&raquo;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Giuu&ecirc;t imu th&ocirc; mid theru menegi<span class="f_canusg">| </span>manno drohtin</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an thea berhton burg.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>S&ocirc; th&ocirc; that barn godes</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">innan Hierusalem<span class="f_canusg">| </span>mid thiu gumono folcu,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[s&ecirc;g] mid thiu ges&icirc;{d}u,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>th&ocirc; uuar{d} [thar] allaro sango m&ecirc;st,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3710</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hl&ucirc;d stemnie [afha{b}en]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>h&ecirc;lagun uuordun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">lo{b}odun thene landes uuard<span class="f_canusg">| </span>liudio menegi,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">barno that bezte;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thiu burg uuar{d} an hr&ocirc;ru,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that folc uuar{d} an forhtun<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi fr&acirc;godun s&acirc;n,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hue that uu&acirc;ri,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that thar mid [thiu uuerodu] quam,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3715</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">mid theru mikilon menegi.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; sprak im &ecirc;n man angegin,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">qua{d} that thar [Hiesu] Crist<span class="f_canusg">| </span>fan Galileo lande,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fan Nazarethburg<span class="f_canusg">| </span>neriand qu&acirc;mi,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuitig uu&acirc;rsago<span class="f_canusg">| </span>themu uuerode te helpu.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Th&ocirc; uuas them Iudiun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>the imu &ecirc;r grame uu&acirc;run,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3720</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">unholde an hugi,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>harm an m&ocirc;de,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that imu thea [liudi s&ocirc; filu]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>lofsang uuarhtun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">diurdun iro drohtin.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; gengun dolm&ocirc;de,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that sie uui{d} uualdand Crist<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuordun spr&acirc;kun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">b&acirc;dun that he that ges&icirc;{d}i<span class="f_canusg">| </span>su&icirc;gon h&ecirc;ti,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3725</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">letti thea liudi,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that sie imu lof s&ocirc; filu</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuordun ni uuarhtin:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;it is thesumu uuerode l&ecirc;{d}&raquo;, qu&acirc;{d}un sie,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;thesun burgliudiun.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; sprak eft that barn godes:</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;ef gi sie amerriad&raquo;, qua{d} he,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;that h&ecirc;r ni [m&ocirc;tin] manno barn</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uualdandes craft<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuordun diurien,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3730</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">than sculun it hr&ocirc;pen thoh<span class="f_canusg">| </span>harde st&ecirc;nos</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">for thesumu folcskepi,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>felisos starka,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&ecirc;r than it eo bel&icirc;{b}e,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[ne{b}o] man is lof [spreke]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&icirc;do aftar thesaru [uueroldi.&raquo;]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; he an thene uu&icirc;h innen,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">geng an that godes h&ucirc;s:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>fand thar Iudeono filu,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3735</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">misl&icirc;ke man,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>manage atsamne,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thea im thar c&ocirc;pstedi<span class="f_canusg">| </span>gikoran habdun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">mangodun im thar mid manages hu&icirc;:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>muniterias s&acirc;tun</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an themu uu&icirc;he innan,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>habdun iro uuesl gidago</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">garu te ge{b}anne.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>That uuas themu godes barne</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3740</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">al an andun:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>dr&ecirc;f sie ut thanen</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">r&ucirc;mo fan themu rakude,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>qua{d} that uu&acirc;ri rehtara d&acirc;d,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that thar te bedu f&ocirc;rin<span class="f_canusg">| </span>barn Israheles</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;endi an thesumu m&icirc;numu h&ucirc;se<span class="f_canusg">| </span>helpono [biddean,]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[that sia sigidrohtin<span class="f_canusg">| </span>sundiono tuomie,]</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3745</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">than h&ecirc;r [theo{b}as an]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thingstedi halden,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thea faruuarhton uueros<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuehsal dr&icirc;{b}an,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">unreht &ecirc;nfald.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Ne gi &ecirc;niga &ecirc;ra ni uuitun</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">theses godes h&ucirc;ses,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Iudeo liudi.&raquo;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">S&ocirc; r&ucirc;mde he th&ocirc; endi rekode,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>r&icirc;ki drohtin,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3750</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that h&ecirc;laga h&ucirc;s<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi an helpun uuas</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">managumu mankunnie,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>them the is mikilon craft</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[ferrene] gefrugnun<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi thar gifaran qu&acirc;mun</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">o{b}ar langan uueg.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Uuar{d} thar l&ecirc;f so manag,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">halt gih&ecirc;lid<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi h&acirc;f s&ocirc; same,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3755</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">blindun gib&ocirc;tid.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>S&ocirc; dede that barn godes</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuilliendi [themu] uuerode,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>huand al an is giuueldi st&ecirc;d</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">umbi thesaro liudio l&icirc;f<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi &ocirc;k umbi thit land s&ocirc; same.</h3>
   </td>
  </tr>

<h1>Heliand</h1>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h2>Fitte XLVI</h2>
<p>&nbsp;</p>

  </tr>
  <tr>
	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="50"><h6>&nbsp;</h6></td>
	<td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;">
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;"><span class="f_ruberi">S</span>t&ocirc;d imu th&ocirc; fora themu uu&icirc;he<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uualdandeo Crist,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">liof landes uuard,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi imu thero liudio hugi,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3760</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">iro uuilleon aftaruuarode:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>gisah uuerod mikil</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an that m&acirc;rie h&ucirc;s<span class="f_canusg">| </span>m&ecirc;{d}mos f&ocirc;rien,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ge{b}on mid goldu<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi mid goduuuebbiu,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">diuriun fratahun.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>That al drohtin [Crist]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuarode uu&icirc;sl&icirc;co.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; quam thar &ocirc;k &ecirc;n uuidouua t&ocirc;,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3765</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">idis armscapen,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi te themu alaha geng</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">endi siu an that [tresurh&ucirc;s]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>tu&ecirc;ne legde</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&ecirc;r&icirc;ne scattos:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuas iru &ecirc;nfald hugi,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuillean g&ocirc;des.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; sprak uualdand Crist,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">the [gumo] uui{d} is giungaron,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>qua{d} [that] siu thar ge{b}a br&acirc;hti</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3770</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">m&ecirc;ron mikilu<span class="f_canusg">| </span>than elcor &ecirc;nig mannes sunu:</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;ef h&ecirc;r &ocirc;daga man&raquo;, qua{d} he,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;&ecirc;ra br&acirc;htun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">m&ecirc;{d}omhord manag,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>sie l&ecirc;tun im [m&ecirc;r] at h&ucirc;s</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuelona geuunnen.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Ni dede thius uuidouua s&ocirc;,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ac siu te thesumu alahe gaf<span class="f_canusg">| </span>al that siu habde</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3775</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuelono geuunnen,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; [siu] iru uuiht ni [farl&ecirc;t]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">g&ocirc;des an iro gardun.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Bethiu sind ira ge{b}a m&ecirc;ron,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uualdande uuer{d}a,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>huand siu it mid sulicumu [uuilleon] dede</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">te thesumu godes h&ucirc;se.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thes scal siu geld niman,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">su&icirc;{d}o langsam l&ocirc;n,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thes siu sulican gil&ocirc;{b}on ha{b}ad.&raquo;</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3780</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">S&ocirc; gifragn ik that thar an themu uu&icirc;he<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[uualdandeo] Crist</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">allaro dago gehuilikes,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>drohtin manno,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&icirc;sde mid uuordun.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>St&ocirc;d ine uuerod umbi,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gr&ocirc;t folc Iudeono,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>gih&ocirc;rdun is g&ocirc;dan uuord,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">su&ocirc;tea seggian.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Sum s&ocirc; s&acirc;lig uuar{d}</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3785</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">manno undar theru menegi,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that it bigan an is m&ocirc;d hladen;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">l&icirc;nodun im thea l&ecirc;ra,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>the the landes uuard</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">al be bili{d}iun [sprak,]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>barn drohtines.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Sumun uu&acirc;run eft so l&ecirc;{d}a<span class="f_canusg">| </span>l&ecirc;ra Cristes,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uualdandes uuord:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuas im uui{d}erm&ocirc;d hugi</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3790</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">allun them, the an themu heriskepi<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[h&ecirc;rost] uu&acirc;run,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">furiston an themu folke:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>f&acirc;res hugdun</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uur&ecirc;{d}a mid iro uuordun &ndash;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>habdun im uui{d}ersakon</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gihaloden te helpu,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thes h&ecirc;roston man,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Erodeses thegan,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>the thar anduuard st&ocirc;d</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3795</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uur&ecirc;{d}es uuillean,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that he iro uuord o{b}arh&ocirc;rdi &ndash;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ef sie ina forfengin,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that sie ina than feteros an,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thea liudi li{d}obendi<span class="f_canusg">| </span>leggien m&ocirc;stin,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sundea l&ocirc;san.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; gengun im thea ges&icirc;{d}os t&ocirc;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[bittra gihugde],<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that sie uui{d} that barn godes,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3800</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uur&ecirc;{d}a uui{d}ersakon<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuordun spr&acirc;kun:</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;huat, thu bist &ecirc;osago&raquo;, qu&acirc;{d}un sie,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;allun thiodun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&icirc;sis uu&acirc;res s&ocirc; filu:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>nis thi [uuer{d}] eouuiht</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">te bim&icirc;{d}anne<span class="f_canusg">| </span>manno ni&ecirc;numu</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">umbi is r&icirc;kid&ocirc;m,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ne{b}o thu simlun that reht sprikis</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3805</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">endi an thene godes uueg<span class="f_canusg">| </span>gumono ges&icirc;{d}i</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">l&ecirc;dis mid thinun l&ecirc;run:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ni mag thi laster man</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">f&icirc;{d}an undar thesumu folke.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Nu uui thi fr&acirc;gon sculun.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">r&icirc;ki thiodan,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>huilic reht ha{b}ad</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">the k&ecirc;sur fan R&ucirc;mu,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>the imu te thesumu [kunnie] herod</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3810</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">tinsi s&ocirc;kid<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi gitald ha{b}ad,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">huat uui imu gelden [sculin]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>g&ecirc;ro gehuilikes</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[h&ocirc;{b}idscatto.]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Saga huat thi thes an [th&icirc;numu] hugi thunkea:</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">is it reht the nis?<span class="f_canusg">| </span>R&acirc;d for th&icirc;nun</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">landm&ecirc;gun uuel:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ucirc;s is th&icirc;naro [l&ecirc;rono] tharf.&raquo;</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3815</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Sie uueldun that he it antqu&acirc;{d}i:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>than mahte he thoh antkennien uuel</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">iro [uur&ecirc;{d}on] uuilleon:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;te hu&icirc; gi uu&acirc;rlogon&raquo;, qua{d} he,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;fandot m&icirc;n s&ocirc; fr&ocirc;kno?<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Ni scal iu that te frumu uuer{d}en,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that gi dreogerias<span class="f_canusg">| </span>darnungo [nu]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuilliad mi farf&acirc;hen.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>H&ecirc;t he th&ocirc; for{d} dragan</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3820</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">te scauuonne the scattos,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;the gi sculdige sind</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an that geld [ge{b}en].&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Iudeon dr&ocirc;gun</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[&ecirc;nna] silu{b}rinna for{d}:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&acirc;hun manage t&ocirc;,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hu&ocirc; he uuas gemunitod:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuas an middien sk&icirc;n</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thes k&ecirc;sures bili{d}i<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ndash; that mahtun sie antkennien uuel &ndash;,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3825</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">iro h&ecirc;rron h&ocirc;{b}idm&acirc;l.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; fr&acirc;gode [sie] the h&ecirc;lago Crist,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">aftar huemu thiu gel&icirc;cnessi<span class="f_canusg">| </span>gilegid uu&acirc;ri.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Sie qu&acirc;{d}un that it uu&acirc;ri<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uueroldk&ecirc;sures</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fan R&ucirc;muburg,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[&laquo;thes] the alles theses r&icirc;kes ha{b}ad</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">geuuald an thesaru uueroldi.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;Than uuilliu ik iu te uu&acirc;run [h&ecirc;r]&raquo;, <br />qua{d} he,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3830</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[&laquo;sel{b}o] seggian,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that gi imu s&icirc;n ge{b}ad,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uueroldh&ecirc;rron is geuunst,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi uualdand gode</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">selliad, that thar s&icirc;n ist:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that sculun iuuua seolon uuesen,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gumono g&ecirc;stos.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; uuar{d} thero Iudeono hugi</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">geminsod an themu mahle:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ni mahtun the m&ecirc;nsca{d}on</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3835</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuordun geuuinnen,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; iro uuilleo geng,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that sie ina farfengin,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>huand imu that fri{d}ubarn godes</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuardode uui{d} the uur&ecirc;{d}on<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi im uu&acirc;r angegin,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&ocirc;{d}spel sagde,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thoh sie ni uu&acirc;rin s&ocirc; s&acirc;lige te thiu,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that sie it s&ocirc; [farfengin],<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; it iro fruma uu&acirc;ri.</h3>
   </td>
  </tr>
</table>
