	<td width="50">&nbsp;</td>
	<td  width="600">
<h1>Heliand</h1>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h2>Fitte XLVII</h2>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="650" colspan="2" >
<p style="color:#996699;">______________________________________________________________________________</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="50"><h6>3840</h6></td>
	<td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;">
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;"><span class="f_ruberi">S</span>ie ni uueldun it thoh farl&acirc;ten,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ac h&ecirc;tun thar l&ecirc;dien for{d}</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&ecirc;n uu&icirc;f for themu uuerode,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thiu habde uuam gefrumid,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">unreht &ecirc;nfald:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thiu idis uuas bifangen</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an farlegarnessi,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuas iro l&icirc;{b}es scolo,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that sie firiho barn<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ferahu bin&acirc;min,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3845</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&ecirc;htin iro aldres:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; uuas an iro &ecirc;u gescri{b}en.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Sie bigunnun ina th&ocirc; fr&acirc;gon,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[fruokne] liudi,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uur&ecirc;{d}a mid iro uuordun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>huat sie scoldin themu uu&icirc;{b}e duan,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hue{d}er sie sie quelidin,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>the sie sie quica l&ecirc;tin,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[the] huat he umbi sulica d&acirc;di<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ad&ecirc;lien uueldi:</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3850</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;thu uu&ecirc;st, hu&ocirc; thesaru menegi&raquo;, qu&acirc;{d}un sie,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;Moyses gib&ocirc;d</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&acirc;run uuordun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that allaro uu&icirc;{b}o gehuilic</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an farlegarnessi<span class="f_canusg">| </span>l&icirc;{b}es faruuarhti</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">endi that sie than auurpin<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uueros mid handun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">starkun st&ecirc;nun:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>nu maht thu sie sehan standen h&ecirc;r</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3855</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an sundiun bifangan:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>saga huat thu [is] uuillies.&raquo;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Uueldun ine [thea] uui{d}ersakon<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuordun farf&acirc;hen,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ef he that giqu&acirc;{d}i,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that sie sie quica l&ecirc;tin,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fri{d}odi ira ferahe,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>than [uueldi] that folc Iudeono</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[que{d}en,] that he iro aldiron<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ecirc;o uui{d}ersagdi,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3860</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thero liudio landreht;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ef he sie than h&ecirc;ti l&icirc;{b}u binimen,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thea maga{d} fur theru menegi,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>than [uueldin sie que{d}en,] that he s&ocirc; mildiene hugi</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ni b&acirc;ri an is breostun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; scoldi habbien barn godes:</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uueldun sie s&ocirc; hue{d}eres<span class="f_canusg">| </span>h&ecirc;lagne Crist</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thero uuordo geuu&icirc;tnon,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[s&ocirc;] he thar for themu uuerode gespr&acirc;ki,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3865</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ad&ecirc;ldi te d&ocirc;me.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Than uuisse drohtin Krist</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thero manno s&ocirc; garo<span class="f_canusg">| </span>m&ocirc;dgith&acirc;hti,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">iro uur&ecirc;{d}on uuilleon;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>th&ocirc; he te themu uuerode sprak,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">te allun them erlun:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;s&ocirc; huilik s&ocirc; iuuuar &acirc;no s&icirc;&raquo;, qua{d} he,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;[sl&icirc;{d}ea sundeon],<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; [ganga] iru sel{b}o t&ocirc;</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3870</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">endi sie at &ecirc;rist<span class="f_canusg">| </span>erl mid is handun</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[st&ecirc;n ana uuerpe].&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>S&ocirc; st&ocirc;dun Iudeon,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">th&acirc;htun endi thagodun:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ni mahte thegan nigiean</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uui{d} them uuordquidi<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[uui{d}ersaca] finden:</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gehugde manno gehuilic<span class="f_canusg">| </span>m&ecirc;ngith&acirc;hti,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3875</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">is sel{b}es sundea:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ni uuas iro s&ocirc; sikur &ecirc;nig,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that he bi [themu uuorde]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>themu uu&icirc;{b}e gedorsti</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">st&ecirc;n an uuerpen,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ac l&ecirc;tun sie standen thar</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[&ecirc;nan] thar inne<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi im &ucirc;t thanen</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gengun gramharde<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Iudeo liudi,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3880</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&ecirc;n aftar &ocirc;{d}rumu,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>antat iro thar &ecirc;nig ni uuas</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thes f&icirc;undo folkes,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>the iro ferhes [th&ocirc;],</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">theru idis aldar[lago]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&acirc;htien uueldi.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Th&ocirc; gifragn ik that sie fr&acirc;gode<span class="f_canusg">| </span>fri{d}ubarn godes,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">allaro gumono [bezt]:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;huar [qu&acirc;mun thit] Iudeono folc&raquo;, qua{d} he,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3885</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;thine uui{d}ersakon,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thea thi h&ecirc;r uur&ocirc;gdun te mi?</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Ne sie thi hiudu uuiht<span class="f_canusg">| </span>harmes ne [gid&acirc;dun],</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thea liudi l&ecirc;{d}es,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>the thi uueldun l&icirc;{b}u beniman,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&ecirc;gean te uundrun?&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; sprak imu eft that uu&icirc;f angegin,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">qua{d} that iru thar nioman<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thurh thes neriandan</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3890</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;laga helpa<span class="f_canusg">| </span>harm ne gifrumidi</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuammes te l&ocirc;ne.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; sprak eft uualdand Crist,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">drohtin manno:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;ne ik thi geth [ni] deriu neouuiht&raquo;, qua{d} he,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;ac gang thi h&ecirc;l hinen,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>l&acirc;t thi an th&icirc;numu hugi sorga,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that thu nio s&icirc;{d} aftar thius<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[sundig] ni uuer{d}es.&raquo;</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3895</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Habde iru th&ocirc; giholpen<span class="f_canusg">| </span>h&ecirc;lag barn godes,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gefri{d}ot iro ferahe.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Than st&ocirc;d that folc Iudeono</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">u{b}iles anm&ocirc;d<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; fan &ecirc;ristan,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uur&ecirc;{d}es uuillean,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>hu&ocirc; sie uuordheti</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uui{d} that fri{d}ubarn godes<span class="f_canusg">| </span>frummien m&ocirc;stin.</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3900</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Habdun thea liudi an tu&ecirc;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>mid iro gil&ocirc;{b}on gifangan:</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuas thiu smale [thioda]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&icirc;nes uuillean</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gernora mikilu,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thes godes barnes uuord</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">te gefrummienne,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; im iro fr&acirc;ho gib&ocirc;d:</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[r&ocirc;modun te rehta<span class="f_canusg">| </span>bet than] thie r&icirc;keon man,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3905</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">habdun ina far [iro] h&ecirc;rron<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ia far he{b}encuning,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[fulgengun] imu gerno.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; giuu&ecirc;t imu the godes sunu</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an thene uu&icirc;h innan:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>huarf ina uuerod umbi,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">meginthiodo gimang.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>He an middien st&ocirc;d,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">l&ecirc;rde thea liudi<span class="f_canusg">| </span>liohtun uuordun,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3910</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hl&ucirc;dero stemnun:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuas hlust mikil,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thagode thegan manag,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi he theru thiod gib&ocirc;d,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&ocirc; hue s&ocirc; thar mid thurstu<span class="f_canusg">| </span>bithuungan uu&acirc;ri,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;s&ocirc; ganga imu herod drincan te mi&raquo;, qua{d} he,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;dago gehuilikes</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[su&ocirc;ties] brunnan.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Ik mag [seggian iu],</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3915</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&ocirc; hue s&ocirc; h&ecirc;r gil&ocirc;{b}id te mi<span class="f_canusg">| </span>liudio barno</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fasto undar thesumu folke,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that imu than flioten sculun</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fan is l&icirc;chamon<span class="f_canusg">| </span>libbiendi fl&ocirc;d,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[irnandi] uuater,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ahospring mikil,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">kumad thanen quica brunnon.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thesa quidi uuer{d}ad uu&acirc;ra,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3920</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">liudiun gil&ecirc;stid,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; huemu s&ocirc; h&ecirc;r gil&ocirc;{b}id te mi.&raquo;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Than m&ecirc;nde mid thiu uuataru<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[uualdandeo] Crist,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;r he{b}encuning<span class="f_canusg">| </span>h&ecirc;lagna g&ecirc;st,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hu&ocirc; thene firiho barn<span class="f_canusg">| </span>antf&acirc;hen scoldin,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">lioht endi [listi<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi] l&icirc;f &ecirc;uuig,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3925</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[h&ocirc;h he{b}enr&icirc;ki]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi huldi godes.</h3>
   </td>
  </tr>
</table>

<div class="titulus2">
<p>Heliand</p>
<p>um 830</p>

<div class="contentus">
<table width="650" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
  <tr>
	<td width="50">&nbsp;</td>
	<td  width="600">
<h1>Heliand</h1>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h2>Fitte XLVIII</h2>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="650" colspan="2" >
<p style="color:#996699;">______________________________________________________________________________</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="50"><h6>&nbsp;</h6></td>
	<td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;">
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;"><span class="f_ruberi">U</span>ur{d}un th&ocirc; thea liudi<span class="f_canusg">| </span>umbi thea l&ecirc;ra Cristes,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">umbi thiu uuord an geuuinne:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>st&ocirc;dun uulanca man,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">g&ecirc;lm&ocirc;de Iudeon,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>spr&acirc;kun gelp mikil,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">habdun it im te hosca,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>qua{d}un that sie mahtin gih&ocirc;rien uuel,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3930</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that imu mahlidin fram<span class="f_canusg">| </span>m&ocirc;daga uuihti,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">unholde &ucirc;t:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;nu he an [a{b}u] l&ecirc;rid&raquo;, qu&acirc;{d}un sie,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;uuordu gehuilicu.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; sprak eft that uuerod &ocirc;{d}ar:</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;ni thur{b}un gi thene l&ecirc;riand lahan&raquo;, qu&acirc;{d}un sie:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;kumad l&icirc;{b}es uuord</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[mahtig] fan is m&ucirc;de;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>he [uuirkid] manages huat,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3935</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uundres an thesaru uueroldi:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>nis that uur&ecirc;{d}aro d&acirc;d,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">f&icirc;undo craftes:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>nio it than te sulicaru frumu [ni uur{d}i,]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ac it gegnungo<span class="f_canusg">| </span>fan gode alouualdon,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">kumid fan is crafte.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>That mugun gi antkennien uuel</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an them is uu&acirc;run uuordun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that he giuuald ha{b}ad</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3940</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">alles o{b}ar er{d}u.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; uueldun ina the andsacon thar</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an stedi f&acirc;hen<span class="f_canusg">| </span>eftha st&ecirc;n ana uuerpen,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ef sie im thero manno<span class="f_canusg">| </span>menigi ni andr&ecirc;din,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ni forhtodin that folcskepi.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; sprak that fri{d}ubarn godes:</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;ik t&ocirc;giu iu g&ocirc;des s&ocirc; filu&raquo;, qua{d} he,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;fan gode sel{b}umu,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3945</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuordo endi uuerko:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>nu uuilliad gi mi uu&icirc;tnon h&ecirc;r</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thurh iuuuan starkan hugi,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>st&ecirc;n ana uuerpen,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">bil&ocirc;sien mi l&icirc;{b}u.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; spr&acirc;kun imu eft thea liudi angegin,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uur&ecirc;{d}a uui{d}ersakon:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;ne uui it be th&icirc;nun uuerkun ni duat&raquo;, <br />[qu&acirc;{d}un sie,]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;that uui thi aldres t&ocirc;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&acirc;htien uuilliad,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3950</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ac uui duat it be th&icirc;nun uuordun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>huand thu sulik uu&acirc;h sprikis,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">huand thu thic s&ocirc; m&acirc;ris<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi sulic m&ecirc;n sagis,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gihis for theson Iudeon,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that thu s&icirc;s god sel{b}o,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">mahtig drohtin,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi bist thi thoh man s&ocirc; uui,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">cuman fan theson cunnie.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Crist alouualdo</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3955</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ne uuolda thero Iudeono thuo leng<span class="f_canusg">| </span>gelpes h&ocirc;rian,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uur&ecirc;{d}aro uuillion,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ac hie im af them uu&icirc;he fuor</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">o{b}ar Iordanes str&ocirc;m;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>habda iungron mid im,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thia is s&acirc;ligun gis&icirc;{d}os,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thia im simlon mid im</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuillion uuonodun:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>suohta uuerod &ocirc;{d}er,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3960</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">deda thar s&ocirc; hie giuuonoda,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>drohtin sel{b}o,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">l&ecirc;rda thia liudi:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>gil&ocirc;{b}da thie uuolda</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an is [h&ecirc;lagun uuord].<span class="f_canusg">| </span>That scolda [sinnon uuel]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">manno s&ocirc; huilicon,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; that an is muod ginam.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Thuo gifrang ik that thar te Criste<span class="f_canusg">| </span>cumana uur{d}un</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3965</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">bodon fan Bethaniu<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi sagdun them barne godes,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that sia an that &acirc;rundi tharod<span class="f_canusg">| </span>idisi sendin,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Maria endi Martha,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>maga{d} fr&icirc;l&icirc;ca,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">su&icirc;{d}o uunsama uu&icirc;f;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thia uuissa hie b&ecirc;{d}ia,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&acirc;run im gisuester tu&acirc;,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thia hie sel{b}o &ecirc;r</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3970</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">minnioda an is muode<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thuru iro mildian hugi,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thiu uu&icirc;f thuru iro uuillion guodan.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[Sia im te uu&acirc;ron thuo]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">anbudun fon Bethaniu,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that iro bruo{d}er uuas</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Lazarus legarfast<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi that sia is l&icirc;{b}es ni uu&acirc;ndun;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">b&acirc;dun that tharod qu&acirc;mi<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Crist alouualdo</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3975</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;lag te helpu.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Reht s&ocirc; hie sia gih&ocirc;rda thuo</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">seggian fan s&ocirc; siecon,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; sprak hie s&acirc;n angegin,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">qua{d} that Lazaruses<span class="f_canusg">| </span>legar ni uu&acirc;ri</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">giduan im te d&ocirc;{d}e,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;ac thar scal drohtines lof&raquo;, quathie,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;gifrumid uuer{d}an:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>nis it im te &ocirc;{d}ron fr&ecirc;son giduan.&raquo;</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3980</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Uuas im thar thuo sel{b}o<span class="f_canusg">| </span>suno drohtines</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">tu&acirc; naht endi dagas.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thiu t&icirc;d uuas [thuo gen&acirc;hit],</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that hie eft te Hierusalem<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Iudeo liudeo</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&icirc;son uuelda,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; hie giuuald habda.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Sagda thuo is gis&icirc;{d}on<span class="f_canusg">| </span>suno drohtines,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3985</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that hie eft o{b}ar [Iordan]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Iudeo liudi</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">suokean uuelda.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thuo spr&acirc;cun im s&acirc;n angegin</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">iungron s&icirc;na:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;te hu&icirc; [bist] thu s&ocirc; gern tharod&raquo;, qua{d}un sia,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;fro m&icirc;n, te faranne?<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Ni that nu furn ni uuas,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that sia thik th&icirc;nero uuordo<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uu&icirc;tnon hogdun,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3990</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uueldun thi mid [st&ecirc;non starcan auuerpan?<span class="f_canusg">| </span>nu thu eft undar thia str&icirc;digun thioda]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fundos te faranne,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thar ist f&icirc;ondo ginuog,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">erlos o{b}armuoda?&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thuo [&ecirc;n thero tueli{b}io,]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Thuomas gim&acirc;lda<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ndash; uuas im githungan mann,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[diurl&icirc;c] drohtines thegan &ndash;:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;ne sculun uui im thia d&acirc;d lahan&raquo;, quathie,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>3995</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;ni uuernian uui im thes uuillien,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ac uuita im uuonian mid,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thuoloian mid [&ucirc;sson] thiodne:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that ist thegnes cust,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that hie mid is fr&acirc;hon samad<span class="f_canusg">| </span>fasto gistande,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">d&ocirc;ie [mid] im thar an duome.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Duan &ucirc;s alla s&ocirc;,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">folgon im te thero ferdi:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ni l&acirc;tan &ucirc;se fera uui{d} thiu</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4000</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuihtes uuir{d}ig,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ne{b}a uui an them uuerode mid im,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">d&ocirc;ian mid &ucirc;son drohtine.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Than l&ecirc;{b}ot &ucirc;s thoh duom after,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[guod uuord] for gumon.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>S&ocirc; uur{d}un thuo iungron Cristes,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">erlos a{d}alborana<span class="f_canusg">| </span>an &ecirc;nfalden hugie,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;rren [te] uuillien.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thuo sagda h&ecirc;lag Crist</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4005</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sel{b}o is gis&icirc;{d}on<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that asl&acirc;pan uuas</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Lazarus fan them legare,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;ha{b}it thit lioht age{b}an,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ansue{b}it ist an selmon.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Nu uui an thena s&icirc;{d} faran</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">endi ina auuekkian,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that hie muoti eft thesa uuerold sehan,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">libbiandi lioht:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[than] uuir{d}it iuuua gil&ocirc;{b}o after thiu</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4010</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">for{d}uuerd gifestid.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thuo giuu&ecirc;t hie im o{b}ar thia fluod thanan,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thie guodo godes suno,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>anthat hie mid is iungron quam</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thar te Bithaniu,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>barn drohtines</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sel{b}o mid is gis&icirc;{d}on,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thar thia gisuester tu&acirc;,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Maria endi Martha<span class="f_canusg">| </span>an muodkaron</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4015</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&ecirc;raga s&acirc;tun.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Uuas thar gisamnot filo</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fan Hierusalem<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Iudeo liudo,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[thia thiu] uu&icirc;f uueldun<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuordun fruo{b}rean,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that sie s&ocirc; ni [karodin]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>kindiungas d&ocirc;{d},</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Lazaruses farlust.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>S&ocirc; th&ocirc; the landes uuard</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4020</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">geng an [thiu] gardos,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; uur{d}un thes [godes] barnes</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">kumi thar gik&ucirc;{d}id,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that he s&ocirc; craftig uuas</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">bi theru burg &ucirc;ten.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; im b&ecirc;{d}iun uuas,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">them uu&icirc;{b}un sulik uuillio,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that sie im uualdand [t&ocirc;],</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that fri{d}ubarn godes,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>farandien uuissun.</h3>
   </td>
  </tr>

<h2>Fitte XLIX</h2>

  <tr>
	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="50"><h6>4025</h6></td>
	<td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;">
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;"><span class="f_ruberi">T</span>h&ocirc; them uu&icirc;bun uuas<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuilleono m&ecirc;sta</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">cumi drohtines<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi Cristes uuord</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">te gih&ocirc;rienne.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Heo{b}andi geng</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Martha [m&ocirc;dkarag]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uui{d} s&ocirc; mahtigne</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuordun uuehslan<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi uui{d} uualdand sprak</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4030</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an iro hugi hriuuig:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;thar thu mi, h&ecirc;rro m&icirc;n&raquo;, qua{d} siu,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;neriendero bezt,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>n&acirc;hor uu&acirc;ris,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;leand the g&ocirc;do,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>than ni thorfti ik [nu] sulic harm tholon,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">bittra breostkara,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>than ni uu&acirc;ri nu m&icirc;n br&ocirc;{d}er d&ocirc;d,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Lazarus fan thesumu liohte,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ac he [imu mahti] libbien for{d}</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4035</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ferahes gefullid.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Ik thoh, fr&ocirc; m&icirc;n, te thi</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">liohto gil&ocirc;{b}iu,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>l&ecirc;riandero bezt,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&ocirc; hues s&ocirc; thu biddien uuili<span class="f_canusg">| </span>berhton drohtin,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that he it thi s&acirc;n fargi{b}id,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>god alomahtig,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">giuuer{d}ot th&icirc;nan uuillean.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; sprak eft uualdand Krist</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4040</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">theru idis [anduuordi:]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;ni l&acirc;t thu thi an innan thes&raquo;, qua{d} he,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;th&icirc;nan se{b}on suerkan:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ik thi seggian mag</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&acirc;run uuordun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that thes nis giuuand &ecirc;nig,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[ne{b}u] th&icirc;n br&ocirc;{d}er scal<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thurh gibod godes,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thurh drohtines craft<span class="f_canusg">| </span>fan d&ocirc;{d}e astanden</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4045</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an is l&icirc;chamon.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;All hebbiu ik gil&ocirc;{b}on s&ocirc;&raquo;, qua{d} siu,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;that it s&ocirc; giuuer{d}en scal,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; huan s&ocirc; thius uuerold endiod</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">endi the m&acirc;reo dag<span class="f_canusg">| </span>o{b}ar man ferid,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that he than fan er{d}u scal<span class="f_canusg">| </span>up astanden</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an themu [d&ocirc;mes] daga,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>than uuer{d}ad fan d&ocirc;{d}e quica</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4050</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thurh maht godes<span class="f_canusg">| </span>mankunnies gehuilic,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ar&icirc;sad fan restu.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; sagde [r&icirc;keo] Krist</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">theru idis alomahtig<span class="f_canusg">| </span>oponun uuordun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that he sel{b}o uuas<span class="f_canusg">| </span>sunu [drohtines],</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[b&ecirc;{d}iu ia l&icirc;f ia lioht]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>liudio [barnon]</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4055</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">te astandanne:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;nio the [ster{b}en] ni scal,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">l&icirc;f farliosen,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>the h&ecirc;r gil&ocirc;{b}id te mi:</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thoh ina eldibarn<span class="f_canusg">| </span>er{d}u bithekkien,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">diapo bidel{b}en,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>nis he d&ocirc;d thiu m&ecirc;r:</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that fl&ecirc;sk is bifolhen,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that ferah is gihalden,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4060</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">is thiu siola gisund.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; sprak imu eft s&acirc;n angegin</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that uu&icirc;f mid iro uuordun:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;ik gil&ocirc;{b}iu that thu the uu&acirc;ro bist&raquo;, qua{d} siu,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;[Krist godes sunu:]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that mag man antkennien uuel,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuiten an th&icirc;nun uuordun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that thu giuuald ha{b}es</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thurh thiu h&ecirc;lagon giscapu<span class="f_canusg">| </span>himiles endi er{d}un.&raquo;</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4065</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Th&ocirc; gefragn ik that [thar thero idisio quam]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ocirc;{d}ar gangan</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Maria m&ocirc;dkarag:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>gengun iro managa aftar</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Iudeo [liudi.]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; siu themu godes barne</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sagde s&ecirc;ragm&ocirc;d,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>huat iru te sorgun gist&ocirc;d</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an iro hugi harmes:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>hofnu k&ucirc;mde</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4070</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Lazaruses farlust,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>lia{b}es mannes,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">griat gornundi,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>antat themu godes barne</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hugi uuar{d} gihr&ocirc;rid:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>h&ecirc;te trahni</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&ocirc;pu [auuellun],<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi th&ocirc; te them uu&icirc;{b}un sprac,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;t ina th&ocirc; l&ecirc;dien,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thar Lazarus uuas</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4075</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">foldu bifolhen.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Lag thar &ecirc;n felis bio{b}an,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hard st&ecirc;n behliden.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; h&ecirc;t the h&ecirc;lago Crist</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">antl&ucirc;can thea [l&ecirc;ia,]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that he m&ocirc;sti that l&icirc;k sehan,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hr&ecirc;o scauuoien.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; ni mahte [an] iro hugi m&icirc;{d}an</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[Martha] for theru menegi,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uui{d} mahtigne sprak:</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4080</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;fr&ocirc; m&icirc;n the g&ocirc;do&raquo;, qua{d} siu,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;ef man thene felis nimid,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thene st&ecirc;n antl&ucirc;kid,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>than uu&acirc;niu ik that thanen stank kume,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">unsu&ocirc;ti suek,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>huand ik thi seggian mag</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&acirc;run uuordun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that thes nis giuuand &ecirc;nig,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[that] he thar nu bifolhen uuas<span class="f_canusg">| </span>fiuuuar naht endi dagos</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4085</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an themu er{d}gra{b}e.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Anduuordi gaf</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uualdand themu uu&icirc;be:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;huat, [ni] sagde ik thi te uu&acirc;run [&ecirc;r]&raquo;, qua{d} he,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;ef thu gil&ocirc;{b}ien uuili,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>than nis nu lang te thiu,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[that] thu h&ecirc;r antkennien scalt<span class="f_canusg">| </span>craft drohtines,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">the mikilon maht godes?&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; gengun manage t&ocirc;,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4090</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">afh&ocirc;{b}un harden st&ecirc;n.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; sah the h&ecirc;lago Crist</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">up mid is &ocirc;gun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ocirc;lat sagde</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">themu the these uuerold gisc&ocirc;p,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;thes thu m&icirc;n uuord gih&ocirc;ris&raquo;, [qua{d} he],</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[&laquo;sigidrohtin sel{b}o;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ik uu&ecirc;t that thu s&ocirc; simlun duos,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ac ik duom it be thesumu gr&ocirc;ton<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Iudeono folke,]</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4095</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that sie that te uu&acirc;run uuitin,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that thu mi an [these] uuerold [sendes]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thesun liudiun te l&ecirc;run.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; he te Lazaruse hriop</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">starkaru stemniu<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi h&ecirc;t ina [standen up]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ia fan themu gra{b}e gangan.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; uuar{d} the g&ecirc;st kumen</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an thene l&icirc;chamon:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[he] bigan is li{d}i hr&ocirc;rien,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4100</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">antuuarp undar themu giuu&ecirc;die:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuas imo [s&ocirc;] beuunden th&ocirc; noh,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an hr&ecirc;obeddion bihelid.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>H&ecirc;t imu helpen th&ocirc;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uualdandeo Krist.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Uueros gengun t&ocirc;,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">antuundun that geuu&acirc;di.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[Uu&acirc;num] up ar&ecirc;s</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Lazarus te thesumu liohte:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuas imu is l&icirc;f farge{b}en,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4105</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that he is [aldarlagu]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ecirc;gan [m&ocirc;sti],</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fri{d}u for{d}uuardes.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; fagonadun b&ecirc;{d}ea,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Maria endi Martha:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ni mag that man &ocirc;{d}rumu</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">giseggian te s&ocirc;{d}e,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>hu&ocirc; thea gesuester tu&ocirc;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[mendiodun] an iro m&ocirc;de.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Maneg uundrode</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4110</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Iudeo liudio,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>th&ocirc; sie ina fan themu gra{b}e s&acirc;hun</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&icirc;{d}on gesunden,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thene the &ecirc;r suht farnam</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">endi sie bidul{b}un<span class="f_canusg">| </span>diapo undar [er{d}u]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">l&icirc;{b}es l&ocirc;sen:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>th&ocirc; m&ocirc;ste imu libbien for{d}</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;l an h&ecirc;mun.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>S&ocirc; mag he{b}enkuninges,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4115</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thiu mikile maht godes<span class="f_canusg">| </span>manno gehuilikes</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ferahe giformon<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi [uui{d}] f&icirc;undo n&icirc;{d}</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;lag helpen,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; huemu s&ocirc; he is huldi fargi{b}id.</h3>
   </td>
  </tr>
</table>

	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="50"><h6>&nbsp;</h6></td>
	<td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;">
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;"><span class="f_ruberi">T</span>h&ocirc; uuar{d} thar s&ocirc; managumu manne<span class="f_canusg">| </span>m&ocirc;d aftar Kriste,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gihuor{b}en hugiskefti,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&icirc;{d}or sie is h&ecirc;lagon uuerk</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4120</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sel{b}on gis&acirc;hun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>huand eo &ecirc;r sulic ni uuar{d}</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uunder an uueroldi.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Than uuas eft thes uuerodes s&ocirc; filu,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[s&ocirc;] m&ocirc;dstarke man:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ni uueldon [the] maht godes</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">antkennien k&ucirc;{d}l&icirc;co,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ac sie uui{d} is craft mikil</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uunnun mid iro uuordun:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uu&acirc;run im uualdandes</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4125</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">l&ecirc;ra so l&ecirc;{d}a:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc;htun [im] liudi &ocirc;{d}ra</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an Hierusalem,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thar Iudeono uuas</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[h&ecirc;ri] handmahal<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi h&ocirc;{b}idstedi,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gr&ocirc;t gumskepi<span class="f_canusg">| </span>grimmaro thioda.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Sie k&ucirc;{d}dun im [th&ocirc;] Kristes uuerk,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>qu&acirc;{d}un that sie [quican] s&acirc;hin</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4130</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thene erl mid iro &ocirc;gun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>the an er{d}u uuas,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">foldu bifolhen<span class="f_canusg">| </span>fiuuuar naht endi dagos,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">d&ocirc;d bidol{b}en,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>antat he ina mid is d&acirc;diun sel{b}o,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">mid is uuordun auuekide,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that he [m&ocirc;sti] these uuerold sehan.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Th&ocirc; uuas that s&ocirc; [uui{d}eruuard]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uulankun mannun,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4135</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Iudeo liudiun:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>h&ecirc;tun iro gumskepi th&ocirc;,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuerod samnoian<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi huuar{b}os f&acirc;hen,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">meginthioda gimang,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>an mahtigna Krist</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">riedun an [runun:]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;nis that r&acirc;d &ecirc;nig&raquo;, qu&acirc;{d}un sie,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;that uui that githoloian:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuili thesaro thioda te filu</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4140</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gil&ocirc;{b}ien aftar is l&ecirc;run.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Than &ucirc;s [liudi] farad,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an eoridfolc,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuer{d}at [&ucirc;sa] o{b}arh&ocirc;{b}dun</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">rinkos fan R&ucirc;mu.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Than uui theses r&icirc;kies sculun</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">l&ocirc;se libbien<span class="f_canusg">| </span>eftha uui sculun &ucirc;ses l&icirc;{b}es tholon,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">heli{d}os &ucirc;saro h&ocirc;{b}do.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; sprak thar &ecirc;n [gih&ecirc;rod] man</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4145</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[o{b}ar huarf uuero],<span class="f_canusg">| </span>the uuas thes uuerodes th&ocirc;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an [theru burg innan]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>biscop thero liudio</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&ndash; Kaiphas uuas he h&ecirc;ten;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>habdun ina gicoranen te thiu</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an [theru g&ecirc;rtalu]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Iudeo liudi,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that he thes godes h&ucirc;ses<span class="f_canusg">| </span>g&ocirc;mien [scoldi],</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4150</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuardon thes uu&icirc;hes &ndash;:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;mi thunkid uunder mikil&raquo;, qua{d} he,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;m&acirc;ri thioda,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ndash; gi kunnun manages gisk&ecirc;{d} &ndash;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hu&icirc; gi that te uu&acirc;run ni uuitin,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuerod Iudeono,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that h&ecirc;r is betera r&acirc;d<span class="f_canusg">| </span>barno gehuilicumu,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that man h&ecirc;r &ecirc;nne man<span class="f_canusg">| </span>aldru bil&ocirc;sie</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4155</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">endi that he thurh iuuua d&acirc;di<span class="f_canusg">| </span>dr&ocirc;reg ster{b}e,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">for [thesumu] folcskepi<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ferah farl&acirc;te,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">than al thit liuduuerod<span class="f_canusg">| </span>farloren uuer{d}e.&raquo;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Ni uuas it thoh is uuillean,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that he s&ocirc; uu&acirc;r gesprak,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&ocirc; for{d} for themu folke,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>frume mankunnies</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4160</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gim&ecirc;nde for theru menegi,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ac it quam imu fan theru maht godes</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thurh is h&ecirc;lagan h&ecirc;d,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>huand he that h&ucirc;s godes</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thar an Hierusalem<span class="f_canusg">| </span>bigangan scolde,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuardon thes uu&icirc;hes:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>bethiu he s&ocirc; uu&acirc;r gisprak,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">biscop thero liudio,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>hu&ocirc; scoldi that barn [godes]</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4165</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">alla irminthiod<span class="f_canusg">| </span>mid is &ecirc;nes [ferhe,]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">mid is l&icirc;{b}u al&ocirc;sien:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that uuas allaro thesaro liudio r&acirc;d,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">huand he gihalode mid thiu<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[h&ecirc;{d}ina liudi,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uueros] an is uuilleon<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uualdandio Crist.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Th&ocirc; uur{d}un &ecirc;nuuordie<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[o{b}arm&ocirc;die] man,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4170</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuerod Iudeono,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi an iro huar{b}e gispr&acirc;kun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">m&acirc;ri thioda,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that sie im ni l&ecirc;tin iro m&ocirc;d tuehon:</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&ocirc; hue s&ocirc; ina undar themu folke<span class="f_canusg">| </span>finden mahti,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that [ina] s&acirc;n gifengi<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi for{d} br&acirc;hti</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an thero thiodo thing;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>qu&acirc;{d}un that sie ni mahtin githoloian [leng],</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4175</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that sie the &ecirc;no man<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[s&ocirc; alla uueldi,]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuerod faruuinnen.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Than uuisse uualdand Krist</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thero manno s&ocirc; garo<span class="f_canusg">| </span>m&ocirc;dgith&acirc;hti,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hetigrimmon hugi,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>huand imu ni uuas biholen eouuiht</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an thesaru middilgard:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>he ni uuelde th&ocirc; an thie [menigi] innen</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4180</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&icirc;{d}ur openl&icirc;co,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>under that erlo folc,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gangan under thea Iudeon:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>b&ecirc;d the godes sunu</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thero torohteon [t&icirc;d,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>the] imu t&ocirc;uuard uuas,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that he far thesa thioda<span class="f_canusg">| </span>tholoian uuelde,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">far thit uuerod uu&icirc;ti:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuisse imu sel{b}o</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4185</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that dagthingi garo.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; giuu&ecirc;t imu &ucirc;se drohtin for{d}</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">endi imu th&ocirc; an Effrem<span class="f_canusg">| </span>alouualdo Krist</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an theru h&ocirc;hon burg<span class="f_canusg">| </span>h&ecirc;lag drohtin</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uunode [mid is uuerodu,]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>antat he an is uuillean huarf</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">eft te Bethania<span class="f_canusg">| </span>brahtmu thiu mikilun,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4190</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">mid thiu is g&ocirc;dum gumscepi.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[Iudeon bispr&acirc;kun that]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuordu gehuilicu,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>th&ocirc; sie imu sulic uuerod mikil</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">folgon gis&acirc;hun:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;nis frume &ecirc;nig&raquo;, qu&acirc;{d}un sie,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;&ucirc;ses r&icirc;kies gir&acirc;di,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thoh uui reht sprekan,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ni [th&icirc;hit] &ucirc;ses thinges uuiht:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[thius] thiod uuili</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4195</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuendien after is uuillean;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>imu all thius uuerold folgot,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">liudi bi them is l&ecirc;run,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that uui imu l&ecirc;{d}es uuiht</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[for] thesumu folcscepi<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[gifrummien] ni m&ocirc;tun.&raquo;</h3>
   </td>
  </tr>

	<td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;">
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;"><span class="f_ruberi">G</span>iuu&ecirc;t imu th&ocirc; that barn godes<span class="f_canusg">| </span>innan Bethania</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sehs [nahtun &ecirc;r,]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>than thiu samnunga</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4200</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thar an Hierusalem<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Iudeo liudio</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an [them] uu&icirc;hdagun<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuer{d}en [scolde,]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that sie scoldun [haldan]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thea h&ecirc;lagon t&icirc;di,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Iudeono pascha.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>B&ecirc;d the godes sunu,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[mahtig] under theru menegi:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuas thar manno craft,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4205</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuerodes bi them is uuordun.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thar gengun [ina] tu&ecirc; uu&icirc;f umbi,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Maria endi Martha,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>mid mildiu hugi,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thionodun imu theol&icirc;co.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thiodo drohtin</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gaf im langsam l&ocirc;n:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[l&ecirc;t] sea l&ecirc;{d}es gihues,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sundeono sikora,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi sel{b}o gib&ocirc;d,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4210</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that sea an fri{d}e f&ocirc;rin<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uui{d}er f&icirc;undo n&icirc;{d},</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thea idisa mid is orlo{b}u g&ocirc;du:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>habdun iro ambahtscepi</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">biuuendid an is uuilleon.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; giuu&ecirc;t imu uualdand Krist</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">for{d} mid thiu folcu,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>firiho drohtin,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">innan Hierusalem,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thar Iudeono uuas</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4215</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hetel&icirc;c hardburi,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thar sie thea h&ecirc;lagon t&icirc;d</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuarodun [at] themu uu&icirc;he.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Uuas thar uuerodes s&ocirc; filu,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">craftigaro kunnio,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thie ni uueldun Cristes [uuord]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gerno [h&ocirc;rien]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ni te themu godes barne</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an iro m&ocirc;dse{b}on<span class="f_canusg">| </span>minnie [ni] habdun,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4220</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ac uu&acirc;run im s&ocirc; uur&ecirc;{d}a<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uulanka [thioda,]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">m&ocirc;deg mankunni,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>habdun im mor{d}hugi,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">inuuid an innan:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>an a{b}uh farfengun</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Kristes l&ecirc;re,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uueldun ina craftigna</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&icirc;tnon thero uuordo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ac uuas thar uuerodes s&ocirc; filu,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4225</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[umbi] erlscepi<span class="f_canusg">| </span>antlangana dag,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">habde ine thiu smale thiod<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thurh is su&ocirc;tiun uuord</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuerodu biuuorpen,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that ine thie uui{d}ersakon</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">under themu folcscepi<span class="f_canusg">| </span>f&acirc;hen ne gidorstun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ac mi{d}un is bi theru menegi.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Than st&ocirc;d mahtig Krist</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4230</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an themu uu&icirc;he innan,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>sagde uuord manag</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">firiho barnun te frumu.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Uuas thar folc umbi</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">allan langan dag,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>antat [thiu liohte] giuu&ecirc;t</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sunne te sedle.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; te seli{d}un f&ocirc;r</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">mancunnies manag.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Than uuas thar &ecirc;n m&acirc;ri berg</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4235</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">bi theru burg &ucirc;ten,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>the uuas br&ecirc;d endi h&ocirc;h,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gr&ocirc;ni endi sc&ocirc;ni:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>h&ecirc;tun ina Iudeo [liudi]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Oliueti bi namon.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thar imu up giuu&ecirc;t</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">neriendeo Krist,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; [ina] thiu naht bifeng,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuas imu thar mid is iungarun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; ine thar Iudeono [&ecirc;nig]</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4240</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ni uuisse ti uu&acirc;run,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>huand he an themu uu&icirc;he st&ocirc;d,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">liudio drohtin,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; lioht &ocirc;stene quam,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">antfeng that folcscepi<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi [im] filu sagde</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&acirc;roro uuordo,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; nis an thesaru uueroldi &ecirc;nig,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an thesaru [middilgard]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>manno s&ocirc; sp&acirc;hi,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4245</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">liudio barno nig&ecirc;n,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that thero l&ecirc;rono mugi</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">endi gitellien,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[the he] thar [an themu] alahe gisprak,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uualdand an themu uu&icirc;he,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi [simlun] mid is uuordun [gib&ocirc;d],</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that sie [sie] gereuuidin<span class="f_canusg">| </span>te godes r&icirc;kie,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">allaro manno gehuilic,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that sie [m&ocirc;stin] an themu m&acirc;reon daga</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4250</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">iro drohtines<span class="f_canusg">| </span>diuri{d}a antf&acirc;hen.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Sagde im huat sie it sundiun frumidun<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi simlun gib&ocirc;d,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that sie thea [aleskidin;]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>h&ecirc;t sie lioht godes</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">minnion an iro m&ocirc;de,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>m&ecirc;n farl&acirc;ten,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[a{b}oha] o{b}arhugdi,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ocirc;dm&ocirc;di niman,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4255</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hla{d}en that an iro [hertan;]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>qua{d} that im than uu&acirc;ri he{b}enr&icirc;ki,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">garu g&ocirc;do [m&ecirc;st.]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; uuar{d} thar gumono s&ocirc; filu</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">giuuendid aftar is uuillion,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&icirc;{d}ur sie that uuord godes</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;lag gih&ocirc;rdun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>he{b}encuninges,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">antkendun craft mikil,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>kumi drohtines,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4260</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;rron helpe,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ia that he{b}enr&icirc;ki uuas,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[neriendi] gin&acirc;hid<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi n&acirc;{d}a godes</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">manno barnun.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Sum s&ocirc; m&ocirc;deg uuas</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Iudeo folkes,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>habdun grimman hugi,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[sl&icirc;{d}m&ocirc;den se{b}on<span class="f_canusg">| </span>. . . . . . . . . . . .,]</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4265</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ni uueldun is uuorde [gil&ocirc;{b}ien],<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ac habdun im geuuin mikil</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uui{d} thea Cristes craft:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[kumen ni m&ocirc;stun]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thea liudi thurh l&ecirc;{d}en str&icirc;d,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that sie gil&ocirc;{b}on te imu</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fasto gifengin;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ni uuas im thiu frume gi{b}i{d}ig,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that sie he{b}enr&icirc;ki<span class="f_canusg">| </span>habbien m&ocirc;stin.</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4270</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Geng imu th&ocirc; the godes sunu<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi is iungaron mid imu,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uualdand fan themu uu&icirc;he,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>all s&ocirc; is uuillio geng,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">iac imu uppen thene berg gist&ecirc;g<span class="f_canusg">| </span>barn drohtines:</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sat imu thar mid is ges&icirc;{d}un<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi im sagde filu</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&acirc;roro uuordo.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>S&icirc; bigunnun im th&ocirc; umbi thene uu&icirc;h sprekan,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4275</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thie [gumon] umbi that godes h&ucirc;s,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>qu&acirc;{d}un that ni uu&acirc;ri g&ocirc;dl&icirc;cora</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">alah o{b}ar er{d}u<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[thurh] erlo hand,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thurh mannes giuuerk<span class="f_canusg">| </span>mid megin[craftu]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">rakud arihtid.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; the r&icirc;kio sprak,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;r he{b}encuning<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ndash; h&ocirc;rdun the &ocirc;{d}ra &ndash;:</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4280</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;ik mag iu [gitellien&raquo;,] qua{d} he,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;that noh uuir{d}id thiu t&icirc;d kumen,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that is afstanden ni scal<span class="f_canusg">| </span>st&ecirc;n o{b}ar &ocirc;{d}rumu,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ac it fallid ti foldu<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi [fiur] nimid,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gr&acirc;dag logna,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thoh it nu s&ocirc; g&ocirc;dl&icirc;c s&icirc;,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&ocirc; uu&icirc;sl&icirc;co giuuarht,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi s&ocirc; d&ocirc;d all thesaro uueroldes giscapu,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4285</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">tegl&icirc;did gr&ocirc;ni uuang.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; gengun imu is iungaron t&ocirc;,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fr&acirc;godun ina s&ocirc; stillo:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;hu&ocirc; lango scal standen noh&raquo;, qu&acirc;{d}un sie,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;thius uuerold an uunniun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ecirc;r than that giuuand kume,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that the lasto dag<span class="f_canusg">| </span>liohtes sk&icirc;ne</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thurh uuolcanskion,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>eftho huan is [th&icirc;n eft] uu&acirc;n kumen</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4290</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an [thene] middilgard,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>manno cunnie</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[te ad&ecirc;lienne,]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>d&ocirc;dun endi quikun?</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fr&ocirc; m&icirc;n the g&ocirc;do,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ucirc;s is thes firiuuit mikil,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uualdandeo Krist,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>huan [that] giuuer{d}en sculi.&raquo;</h3>
   </td>
  </tr>

<h2>Fitte LII</h2>
