	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="50"><h6>&nbsp;</h6></td>
	<td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;">
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;"><span class="f_ruberi">T</span>h&ocirc; im anduuordi<span class="f_canusg">| </span>alouualdo Krist</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4295</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[g&ocirc;dl&icirc;c] fargaf<span class="f_canusg">| </span>them gumun sel{b}o:</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;that ha{b}ad s&ocirc; bidernid&raquo;, qua{d} he,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;drohtin the g&ocirc;do</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">iac s&ocirc; hardo [farholen]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>himilr&icirc;kies fader,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uualdand thesaro uueroldes,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; that uuiten ni mag</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&ecirc;nig [mannisc barn,]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>huan thiu m&acirc;rie t&icirc;d</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4300</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">giuuir{d}id an thesaru uueroldi,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ne it &ocirc;k te uu&acirc;ran ni kunnun</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">godes engilos,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thie for imu [geginuuarde]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">simlun sindun:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>sie [it] &ocirc;k [giseggian] ni mugun</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">te uu&acirc;ran mid iro uuordun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[huan that] giuuer{d}en sculi,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that he uuillie an thesan middilgard,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>mahtig drohtin,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4305</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">firiho fandon.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Fader uu&ecirc;t [it] &ecirc;no</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;lag [fan] himile:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>elcur is it biholen allun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">quikun endi d&ocirc;dun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>huan is kumi uuer{d}ad,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Ik mag iu thoh gitellien,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>huilic [h&ecirc;r] t&ecirc;can biforan</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">giuuer{d}ad uunderl&icirc;c,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ecirc;r [than] he an these uuerold kume</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4310</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an themu m&acirc;reon daga:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that uuir{d}id h&ecirc;r &ecirc;r an themu m&acirc;non sk&icirc;n</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">iac an theru sunnon s&ocirc; same;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>gisuerkad siu b&ecirc;{d}iu,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">mid [finistre] uuer{d}ad bifangan;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>fallad sterron,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hu&icirc;t he{b}en[tungal],<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi hrisid er{d}e,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">bi{b}od [thius] br&ecirc;de uuerold<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ndash; uuir{d}id sulicaro b&ocirc;kno filu &ndash;:</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4315</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">grimmid the gr&ocirc;to s&ecirc;o,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuirkid thie ge{b}enes str&ocirc;m</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[egison] mid is &ucirc;{d}iun<span class="f_canusg">| </span>er{d}b&ucirc;andiun.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Than [thorrot] thiu thiod<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thurh that gethuing mikil,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">folc thurh thea forhta:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>than nis fri{d}u huergin,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ac uuir{d}id uu&icirc;g s&ocirc; maneg<span class="f_canusg">| </span>o{b}ar these uuerold alla</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4320</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hetel&icirc;c [afhaben,]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi heri [l&ecirc;did]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">kunni o{b}ar [&ocirc;{d}ar:]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuir{d}id kuningo giuuin,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">meginfard mikil:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuir{d}id managoro [qualm,]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">open urlagi<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ndash; that is egisl&icirc;c thing,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that io sulik mor{d} sculun<span class="f_canusg">| </span>man afhebbien &ndash;,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4325</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuir{d}id uu&ocirc;l s&ocirc; mikil<span class="f_canusg">| </span>o{b}ar these uuerold alle,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">manster{b}ono m&ecirc;st,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[thero] the gio an thesaru middilgard</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">suulti thurh suhti:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>liggiad seoka man,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">driosat endi d&ocirc;iat<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[endi] iro dag endiad,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fulliad mid iro ferahu;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ferid unmet gr&ocirc;t</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4330</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hungar hetigrim<span class="f_canusg">| </span>o{b}ar heli{d}o barn,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">metig&ecirc;deono m&ecirc;st:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>nis that minniste</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thero uu&icirc;teo an thesaru uueroldi,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>the [h&ecirc;r] giuuer{d}en [sculun]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&ecirc;r [d&ocirc;mes] dage.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>S&ocirc; huan s&ocirc; gi thea d&acirc;di [gisehan]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">giuuer{d}en an thesaru uueroldi,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; mugun gi [than] te uu&acirc;ran farstanden,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4335</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that than the lazto dag<span class="f_canusg">| </span>liudiun n&acirc;hid</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">m&acirc;ri te mannun<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi maht godes,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">himilcraftes [hr&ocirc;ri]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi thes h&ecirc;lagon kumi,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">drohtines mid is diuri{d}un.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Huat, gi thesaro d&acirc;deo mugun</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">bi thesun b&ocirc;mun<span class="f_canusg">| </span>bili{d}i antkennien:</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4340</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">than sie brustiad endi bl&ocirc;iat<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi bladu t&ocirc;geat,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">l&ocirc;f [antl&ucirc;kad,]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>than uuitun liudio barn,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that than is s&acirc;n after thiu<span class="f_canusg">| </span>sumer gin&acirc;hid</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuarm endi uunsam<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi uueder sc&ocirc;ni.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">S&ocirc; [uuitin] gi &ocirc;k bi thesun t&ecirc;knun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[the] ik iu talde h&ecirc;r,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4345</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">huan the lazto dag<span class="f_canusg">| </span>liudiun n&acirc;hid.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Than seggio ik iu te uu&acirc;ran,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that &ecirc;r thit uuerod ni m&ocirc;t,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">tefaran thit folcscepi,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ecirc;r than [uuer{d}e] gefullid s&ocirc;,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[m&icirc;nu] uuord giuu&acirc;rod.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Noh giuuand kumid</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">himiles endi er{d}un,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi steid m&icirc;n h&ecirc;lag uuord</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4350</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fast [for{d}uuardes]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi uuir{d}id al gefullod s&ocirc;,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gil&ecirc;stid an thesumu liohte,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; ik for thesun liudiun gespriku.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Uuacot gi [uuarl&icirc;co]:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>iu is uuiscumo</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[duomdag] the m&acirc;reo<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi iuuues drohtines craft,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thiu mikilo [meginstrengi]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi thiu m&acirc;rie t&icirc;d,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4355</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">giuuand thesaro uueroldes.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Fora thiu gi uuardon sculun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that he iu sl&acirc;pandie<span class="f_canusg">| </span>an [suefrestu]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">f&acirc;rungo ni bif&acirc;he<span class="f_canusg">| </span>an firinuuercun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">m&ecirc;nes fulle.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>M&ucirc;tspelli cumit</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an thiustrea naht,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>al s&ocirc; thiof ferid</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4360</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">darno mid is d&acirc;diun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; kumid the dag mannun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">the lazto theses liohtes,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; it &ecirc;r these liudi ni uuitun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&ocirc; samo s&ocirc; thiu fl&ocirc;d deda<span class="f_canusg">| </span>an furndagun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[the] thar mid lagustr&ocirc;mun<span class="f_canusg">| </span>liudi farteride</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">bi N&ocirc;eas t&icirc;diun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[bi&ucirc;tan] that ina neride god</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4365</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">mid is h&icirc;uuiskea,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>h&ecirc;lag drohtin,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uui{d} thes fl&ocirc;des [farm]:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; uuar{d} &ocirc;k that fiur kuman</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;t fan himile,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that thea h&ocirc;hon burgi</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">umbi [Sodomo land]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>suart logna bifeng</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">grim endi gr&acirc;dag,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that thar [n&ecirc;nig gumono] ni ginas</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4370</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">bi&ucirc;tan Loth &ecirc;no:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ina antl&ecirc;ddun thanen</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">drohtines engilos<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi is dohter tu&acirc;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an [&ecirc;nan] berg uppen:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that [&ocirc;{d}ar al] brinnandi fiur,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ia land ia liudi<span class="f_canusg">| </span>logna farteride:</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&ocirc; f&acirc;rungo uuar{d} that fiur kumen,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; uuar{d} &ecirc;r [the] fl&ocirc;d s&ocirc; samo:</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4375</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&ocirc; uuir{d}id the lazto dag.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>For thiu scal allaro liudio gehuilic</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[thenkean] fora themu thinge;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thes is tharf mikil</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">manno gehuilicumu:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>bethiu l&acirc;tad [iu] an iuuuan m&ocirc;d sorga.</h3>
   </td>
  </tr>
</table>
</div>

<div class="titulus2">
<p>Heliand</p>
<p>um 830</p>

<div class="contentus">
<table width="650" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
  <tr>
	<td width="50">&nbsp;</td>
	<td  width="600">
<h1>Heliand</h1>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h2>Fitte LIII</h2>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="650" colspan="2" >
<p style="color:#996699;">______________________________________________________________________________</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="50"><h6>&nbsp;</h6></td>
	<td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;">
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;"><span class="f_ruberi">H</span>uand s&ocirc; huan s&ocirc; that geuuir{d}id,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that uualdand Krist,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">m&acirc;ri mannes sunu<span class="f_canusg">| </span>mid theru maht godes,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4380</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">kumit mid thiu craftu<span class="f_canusg">| </span>kuningo r&icirc;keost</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sittean an is sel{b}es maht<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi samod mid imu</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">alle thea engilos,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>the thar uppa sind</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;laga an himile,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>than sculun tharod heli{d}o barn,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">elitheoda kuman<span class="f_canusg">| </span>alla tesamne</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4385</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">libbeandero liudio,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; [huat s&ocirc;] io an thesumu liohte uuar{d}</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">firiho af&ocirc;did.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thar he themu folke scal,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">allumu mankunnie<span class="f_canusg">| </span>m&acirc;ri drohtin</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ad&ecirc;lien aftar iro d&acirc;diun.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Than sk&ecirc;{d}id he thea farduanan man,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thea faruuarhton uueros<span class="f_canusg">| </span>an thea uuinistron hand:</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4390</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&ocirc; duot he &ocirc;k thea s&acirc;ligon<span class="f_canusg">| </span>an thea su&icirc;{d}eron half;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[gr&ocirc;tid] he than thea g&ocirc;dun<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi im tegegnes sprikid:</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;kumad gi&raquo;, [qui{d}id he], &laquo;thea thar gikorene sindun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi antf&acirc;had thit craftiga r&icirc;ki,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[that] g&ocirc;de, that [thar] gigereuuid stendid,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that thar uuar{d} gumono barnun</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">giuuarht fan thesaro uueroldes endie:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>iu ha{b}ad geuu&icirc;hid sel{b}o</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4395</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fader allaro firiho barno:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>gi m&ocirc;tun [thesaro frumono] neotan,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[geuualdon] theses [uu&icirc;don] r&icirc;keas,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>huand gi oft m&icirc;nan uuilleon [frumidun],</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fulgengun mi gerno<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi uu&acirc;run mi iuuuaro ge{b}o mildie,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">than ik bithuungan uuas<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thurstu endi hungru,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">frostu bifangan<span class="f_canusg">| </span>eftho [an] feteron lag,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4400</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">biklemmid an karkare:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>oft uur{d}un mi [kumana] tharod</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">helpa fan iuuun handun:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>gi uu&acirc;run mi an iuuuomu hugi mildie,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&icirc;sodun m&icirc;n uuer{d}lico.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Than sprikid imu eft that uuerod angegin:</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;fr&ocirc; m&icirc;n the g&ocirc;do&raquo;, que{d}at sie,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;huan uu&acirc;ri thu bifangan s&ocirc;,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">bethuungan an sulicun thara{b}un,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; thu fora thesaru thiod telis,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4405</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">mahtig m&ecirc;nis?<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Huan gisah thi man &ecirc;nig</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">bethuungen an sulicun thara{b}un?<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Huat, thu ha{b}es allaro thiodo giuuald</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">iac s&ocirc; samo thero m&ecirc;{d}mo,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thero the io manno barn</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">geuunnun an thesaro uueroldi.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Than sprikid im eft uualdand god:</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;s&ocirc; huat s&ocirc; gi d&acirc;dun&raquo;, qui{d}it he,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;an iuuues drohtines namon,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4410</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">g&ocirc;des farg&acirc;{b}un<span class="f_canusg">| </span>an godes &ecirc;ra</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">them mannun, the h&ecirc;r minniston sindun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[thero] nu undar thesaru menegi [standad]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">endi thurh &ocirc;dm&ocirc;di<span class="f_canusg">| </span>arme [uu&acirc;run]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[uueros, huand] sie m&icirc;nan uuilleon [fremidun]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ndash; s&ocirc; huat s&ocirc; gi im iuuuaro uuelono farg&acirc;{b}un,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gid&acirc;dun thurh [diuri{d}a],<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that antfeng iuuua drohtin sel{b}o,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4415</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thiu helpe quam te he{b}encuninge.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Bethiu uuili iu the h&ecirc;lago drohtin</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">l&ocirc;non [iuuuan] gil&ocirc;{b}on:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>gi{b}id iuu l&icirc;f &ecirc;uuig.&raquo;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Uuendid ina than uualdand<span class="f_canusg">| </span>an thea uuinistron hand,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[drohtin] te them farduanun mannun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>sagad im that sie sculin thea d&acirc;d antgelden,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thea man iro [m&ecirc;ngiuuerk:]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;nu gi fan [mi] sculun&raquo;, qui{d}it he.</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4420</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;faran s&ocirc; forfl&ocirc;cane<span class="f_canusg">| </span>an that fiur &ecirc;uuig,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that thar gigareuuid uuar{d}<span class="f_canusg">| </span>godes andsacun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">f&icirc;undo folke<span class="f_canusg">| </span>be firinuuerkun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">huand gi mi ni hulpun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>than mi hunger endi thurst</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[uu&ecirc;gde] te uundrun<span class="f_canusg">| </span>eftha ik geuu&acirc;dies l&ocirc;s</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4425</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">geng i&acirc;merm&ocirc;d,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuas mi gr&ocirc;tun tharf,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">than ni habde ik thar &ecirc;nige helpe,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>than ik geheftid uuas,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an li{d}okospun bilokan,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>eftha mi legar bifeng,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">su&acirc;ra suhti:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>than ni uueldun gi m&icirc;n siokes thar</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&icirc;son mid uuihti:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ni uuas iu uuer{d} eouuiht,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4430</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that gi m&icirc;n gehugdin.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Bethiu gi an hellie sculun</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">tholon an thiustre.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Than sprikid imu eft thiu thiod angegin:</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;uuola uualdand god&raquo;, que{d}ad sie,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;hu&icirc; uuilt thu s&ocirc; uui{d} thit uuerod sprekan,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">mahlien uui{d} these menegi?<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Huan uuas thi [io] manno tharf,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gumono g&ocirc;des?<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Huat, sie it al be th&icirc;nun ge{b}un [&ecirc;gun],</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4435</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[uuelon an thesaro] uueroldi&raquo;.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Than sprikid eft uualdand god:</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;than gi thea armostun&raquo;, qui{d}id he,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;eldibarno,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">manno thea minniston<span class="f_canusg">| </span>an iuuuomu m&ocirc;dse{b}on</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">heli{d}os farhugdun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>l&ecirc;tun sea iu an iuuuomu hugi l&ecirc;{d}e,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">bed&ecirc;ldun sie iuuuaro diur{d}a,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>than d&acirc;dun gi [iuuuana drohtin] s&ocirc; sama,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4440</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[giuuernidun imu] iuuuaro uuelono:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>bethiu ni uuili iu uualdand god,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">antf&acirc;hen fader [iuuua],<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ac gi an that fiur sculun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an thene diopun d&ocirc;{d},<span class="f_canusg">| </span>diu{b}lun thionon,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uur&ecirc;{d}un uui{d}ersakun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>huand gi s&ocirc; [uuarhtun] biforan.&raquo;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Than aftar them [uuordun<span class="f_canusg">| </span>sk&ecirc;{d}it] that uuerod an tu&ecirc;,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4445</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thea g&ocirc;dun endi thea u{b}ilon:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>farad thea fargriponon man</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an thea h&ecirc;tan hel<span class="f_canusg">| </span>hriuuigm&ocirc;de,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thea faruuarhton uueros,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uu&icirc;ti antf&acirc;hat,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">u{b}il endil&ocirc;s.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>L&ecirc;did up thanen</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;r he{b}encuning<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thea hluttaron theoda</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4450</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an that langsame lioht:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thar is l&icirc;f &ecirc;uuig,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gigareuuid godes r&icirc;ki<span class="f_canusg">| </span>g&ocirc;daro thiado.&raquo;</h3>
   </td>
  </tr>
</table>
</div>

<h1>Heliand</h1>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h2>Fitte LIV</h2>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="650" colspan="2" >
<p style="color:#996699;">______________________________________________________________________________</p>

<p>&nbsp;</p>
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="50"><h6>&nbsp;</h6></td>
	<td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;">
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;"><span class="f_ruberi">S</span>&ocirc; gefragn ik that them rinkun tho<span class="f_canusg">| </span>r&icirc;ki drohtin</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">umbi thesaro uueroldes giuuand<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuordun talde,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hu&ocirc; thiu for{d} ferid,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>than [lango] the sie firiho barn</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4455</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ardon m&ocirc;tun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ia hu&ocirc; siu an themu endie scal</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">tegl&icirc;den endi tegangen.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>He sagde &ocirc;k is iungarun thar</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&acirc;run uuordun:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;huat, gi uuitun alle&raquo;, qua{d} he,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;that nu o{b}ar tu&acirc; naht sind<span class="f_canusg">| </span>t&icirc;di kumana,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Giudeono pascha,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that sie sculun iro gode thionon,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4460</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uueros an themu uu&icirc;he.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thes nis geuuand &ecirc;nig,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[that] thar uuir{d}id mannes sunu<span class="f_canusg">| </span>te theru meginthiodu</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">craftag fark&ocirc;pot<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi an [cr&ucirc;ce aslagan,]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">tholod thiadqu&acirc;la.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; uuar{d} thar thegan manag</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sl&icirc;{d}m&ocirc;d gisamnod,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[s&ucirc;{d}arliudio,]</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4465</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Iudeono gumscepi,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thar sie scoldun iro gode thionon.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Uur{d}un &ecirc;osagon<span class="f_canusg">| </span>alle kumane,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an huuarf uueros,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>the sie th&ocirc; uu&icirc;sostun</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">undar theru menegi<span class="f_canusg">| </span>manno [taldun,]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">craftag kuniburd.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thar Caiphas uuas,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4470</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">biscop thero liudio.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Sie r&ecirc;dun th&ocirc; an that barn godes,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hu&ocirc; sie ina asluogin<span class="f_canusg">| </span>sundea l&ocirc;san,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[qu&acirc;{d}un] that sie ina an themu h&ecirc;lagon daga<span class="f_canusg">| </span>hr&icirc;nen ni scoldin</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">undar thero manno menegi,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;that ni uuer{d}e thius meginthioda,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">heli{d}os an hr&ocirc;ru,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>huand ina thit heriscepi uuili</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4475</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">farstanden mid str&icirc;du.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Uui s&ocirc; stillo sculun</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fr&ecirc;son is ferahes,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that [thit] folc Iudeono</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an thesun uu&icirc;hdagun<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uur&ocirc;ht ni afhebbien.&raquo;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Th&ocirc; geng imu thar I&ucirc;das for{d},<span class="f_canusg">| </span>iungaro Kristes,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&ecirc;n thero tueli{b}io,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[thar] that a{d}ali sat,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4480</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Iudeono gumscepi;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>qua{d} that he is im g&ocirc;dan r&acirc;d</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">seggian mahti:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;huat uuilliad gi mi sellien h&ecirc;r&raquo;, qua{d} he,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;m&ecirc;{d}mo te m&ecirc;du,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ef ik iu thene man gi{b}u</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&acirc;no uu&icirc;g endi &acirc;no uur&ocirc;ht?&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; uuar{d} thes uuerodes hugi,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thero liudio an lustun:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;ef thu uuili gil&ecirc;stien s&ocirc;&raquo;, qu&acirc;{d}un sie,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4485</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;th&icirc;n uuord giuu&acirc;ron,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>than thu giuuald ha{b}es,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">huat thu at thesaru thiodu<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thiggean uuillies</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">g&ocirc;daro m&ecirc;{d}mo.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; gih&ecirc;t imu that gumscepi thar</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an is sel{b}es d&ocirc;m<span class="f_canusg">| </span>silu{b}arscatto</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thr&icirc;tig atsamne,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi he te theru thiodu gisprak</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4490</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">dere{b}eun uuordun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that he g&acirc;{b}i is drohtin [uui{d}] thiu.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Uuende ina th&ocirc; fan themu uuerode:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuas im uur&ecirc;{d} hugi,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">talode im s&ocirc; treul&ocirc;s,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>huan &ecirc;r uur{d}i imu thiu t&icirc;d kuman,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that he ina mahti faruu&icirc;sien<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uur&ecirc;{d}aro thiodo,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">f&icirc;undo folke.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Than uuisse that fri{d}ubarn godes,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4495</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&acirc;r uualdand Krist,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that he these uuerold scolde,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">age{b}en these gardos<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi s&ocirc;kien imu godes r&icirc;ki,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gifaren is [fadero{d}il.]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; ni gisah &ecirc;nig firiho [barno]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">m&ecirc;ron minnie,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>than he th&ocirc; te them mannun ginam,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">te them is g&ocirc;dun iungaron:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>g&ocirc;me uuarhte,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4500</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sette sie su&acirc;sl&icirc;co<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi im sagde filu</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&acirc;roro uuordo.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Skr&ecirc;d uuester dag,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sunne te sedle.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; he sel{b}o gib&ocirc;d,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uualdand mid is uuordun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>h&ecirc;t im uuater dragan</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hluttar te handun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi r&ecirc;s th&ocirc; the h&ecirc;lago Crist,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4505</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">the g&ocirc;do [at] them g&ocirc;mun<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi thar is iungarono thu&ocirc;g</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">f&ocirc;ti mid is folmun<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi suarf sie mid is fanon aftar,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">druknide sie diurl&icirc;ca.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; uui{d} is [drohtin] sprak</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">S&icirc;mon Petrus:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;ni thunkid mi thit [s&ocirc;mi] thing&raquo;, qua{d} he,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;fr&ocirc; m&icirc;n the g&ocirc;do,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that thu m&icirc;ne f&ocirc;ti thuahes</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4510</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">mid them th&icirc;nun h&ecirc;lagun handun.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; sprak imu eft is h&ecirc;rro angegin,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uualdand mid is uuordun:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;ef thu is uuillean ni ha{b}es&raquo;, qua{d} he,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;te antf&acirc;hanne,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that ik th&icirc;ne f&ocirc;ti thuahe</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thurh sulica minnea,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; ik thesun &ocirc;{d}run mannun h&ecirc;r</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">d&ocirc;m thurh diur{d}a,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>than ni ha{b}es thu [&ecirc;nigan] d&ecirc;l mid mi</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4515</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an he{b}enr&icirc;kea.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Hugi uuar{d} th&ocirc; giuuendid</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">S&icirc;mon Petruse:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;thu ha{b}a thi sel{b}o giuuald&raquo;, [qua{d} he],</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4517</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;fro m&icirc;n the g&ocirc;do,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[f&ocirc;to] endi hando</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4517b</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">endi m&icirc;nes h&ocirc;{b}des s&ocirc; sama,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[handun th&icirc;nun,]</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4518</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thiadan, te thuahanne,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>te thiu thak ik m&ocirc;ti th&icirc;na for{d}</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">huldi hebbian<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi he{b}enr&icirc;kies</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4520</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sulic gid&ecirc;li,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; thu mi, drohtin, uuili</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">farge{b}en thurh th&icirc;na g&ocirc;di.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Iungaron Kristes,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thene ambahtscepi<span class="f_canusg">| </span>erlos tholodun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thegnos mid [githuldeon,]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; huat s&ocirc; im iro [thiodan] dede,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[mahtig] thurh thea minnea,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi m&ecirc;nde imu al m&ecirc;ra thing</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4525</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">firihon te gifrummienne.<span class="f_canusg">| </span></h3>
   </td>
  </tr>
</table>
</div>

<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h2>Fitte LV</h2>

    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="50"><h6>4525</h6></td>
	<td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;">
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:200px;"><span class="f_canusg">| </span><span class="f_ruberi">F</span>ri{d}ubarn godes</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">geng imu th&ocirc; eft gisittien<span class="f_canusg">| </span>under that ges&icirc;{d}o folc</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">endi [im] sagda filu langsamna r&acirc;d.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Uuar{d} eft lioht kuman,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">morgen te mannun.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Mahtigne Crist</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gr&ocirc;ttun is iungaron<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi fr&acirc;godun, huar sie is g&ocirc;ma th&ocirc;</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4530</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an themu uu&icirc;hdage<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuirkien scoldin,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">huar he uueldi halden<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thea h&ecirc;lagon t&icirc;di</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sel{b}o mid is ges&icirc;{d}un.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; he sie s&ocirc;kien h&ecirc;t,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thea gumon Hierusalem:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;s&ocirc; gi than gangan [kumad&raquo;,] qua{d} he,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;an thea burg innan<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ndash; thar is braht mikil,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4535</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">meginthiodo gimang &ndash;,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thar mugun gi [&ecirc;nan] man sehan</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an is handun dragen<span class="f_canusg">| </span>hluttres uuatares</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[ful mid] folmun.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Themu gi folgon sculun</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an s&ocirc; huilike gardos,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; gi ina gangan [gisehat,]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ia gi than themu h&ecirc;rron,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>the thie ho{b}os &ecirc;gi,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4540</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sel{b}on seggiad,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that ik iu [sende] tharod</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">te gigaruuuenne m&icirc;na g&ocirc;ma.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Than t&ocirc;gid he iu &ecirc;n g&ocirc;dl&icirc;c h&ucirc;s,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ocirc;han soleri,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>the is bihangen al</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fagarun fratahun.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thar gi frummien sculun</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuerdscepi m&icirc;nan.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thar bium ik uuiskumo</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4545</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sel{b}o mid m&icirc;nun ges&icirc;{d}un.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; uur{d}un s&acirc;n aftar thiu</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thar te Hierusalem<span class="f_canusg">| </span>iungaron Kristes</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">for{d}uuard an ferdi,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>fundun all s&ocirc; he sprak</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuordt&ecirc;can uu&acirc;r:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ni uuas thes giuuand &ecirc;nig.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Thar gereuuidun sie thea g&ocirc;ma.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Uuar{d} the godes sunu,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4550</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;lag drohtin<span class="f_canusg">| </span>an that h&ucirc;s cuman,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thar sie the landuu&icirc;se<span class="f_canusg">| </span>l&ecirc;stien scoldun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fulgangan godes gibode,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>al s&ocirc; Iudeono uuas</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&ecirc;o endi aldsidu<span class="f_canusg">| </span>an &ecirc;rdagun.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Giuu&ecirc;t imu th&ocirc; an themu &acirc;{b}ande<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[alouualdand] Krist</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4555</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an thene seli sittien;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>h&ecirc;t thar is ges&icirc;{d}os te imu</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">tueli{b}i gangan,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thea im gitriuuiston</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an iro m&ocirc;dse{b}on<span class="f_canusg">| </span>manno uu&acirc;run</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">bi uuordun endi bi uu&icirc;sun:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuisse imu sel{b}o</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">iro hugiskefti<span class="f_canusg">| </span>h&ecirc;lag drohtin.</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4560</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Gr&ocirc;tte sie th&ocirc; o{b}ar them g&ocirc;mun:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;gern bium ik su&icirc;{d}o&raquo;, qua{d} he,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;that ik samad mid iu<span class="f_canusg">| </span>sittien m&ocirc;ti,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">g&ocirc;mono neoten,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Iudeono pascha</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">d&ecirc;lien mid iu s&ocirc; diuriun.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Nu ik iu iuuues drohtines scal</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuilleon seggian,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that ik an thesaro uueroldi ni m&ocirc;t</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4565</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">mid mannun m&ecirc;r<span class="f_canusg">| </span>m&ocirc;ses anb&icirc;ten</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fur{d}ur mid firihun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ecirc;r than gifullod uuir{d}id</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[himilo r&icirc;ki].<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Mi is an handun nu</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&icirc;ti endi uunderqu&acirc;le,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thea ik for thesumu uuerode scal,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">tholon [for thesaru thiodu].&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>S&ocirc; he th&ocirc; s&ocirc; te them thegnun sprak,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4570</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;lag drohtin,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; uuar{d} imu is hugi dr&ocirc;{b}i,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuar{d} imu gisuorken se{b}o,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi eft te [them] ges&icirc;{d}un sprac,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">the g&ocirc;do te them is iungarun:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;huat, ik iu godes r&icirc;ki&raquo;, qua{d} he,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;gih&ecirc;t himiles lioht,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi gi mi holdl&icirc;co</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">iuuuan theganskepi.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Nu ni uuilliat gi [athengean] s&ocirc;,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4575</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ak uuenkeat thero uuordo.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Nu seggiu ik iu te uu&acirc;ran h&ecirc;r,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that uuili iuuuar tueli{b}io &ecirc;n<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[treuuana su&icirc;kan],</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuili mi farc&ocirc;pon<span class="f_canusg">| </span>undar thit kunni Iudeono,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gisellien uui{d}er silu{b}re,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi [uuili] imu thar sinc niman,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">diurie m&ecirc;{d}mos,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi ge{b}en is drohtin uui{d} thiu,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4580</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">holdan h&ecirc;rran.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>That imu thoh te harme scal,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuer{d}an te uu&icirc;tie;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>be that he thea [uurdi farsihit]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">endi he thes ar{b}edies<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi scauuot,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">than uu&ecirc;t he that te uu&acirc;ran,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that imu uu&acirc;ri [uu&ocirc;{d}iera thing],</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">betera mikilu,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that he gio giboran ni uur{d}i</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4585</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">libbiendi te thesumu liohte,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>than he that l&ocirc;n nimid,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">u{b}il ar{b}edi<span class="f_canusg">| </span>inuuidr&acirc;do.&raquo;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Th&ocirc; bigan thero erlo gehuilic<span class="f_canusg">| </span>te &ocirc;{d}rumu scauuon,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sorgondi sehan;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuas im s&ecirc;r hugi,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hriuuig umbi iro herta:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>gih&ocirc;rdun iro h&ecirc;rron th&ocirc;</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4590</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gornuuord sprekan.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thea gumon sorgodun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">huilican he thero [tueli{b}io te thiu]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>tellien uueldi,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sculdigna [sca{d}on,]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that he habdi thea scattos thar</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gethingod [at] theru thiod.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Ni uuas thero thegno &ecirc;nigumu</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sulikes inuuiddies<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ocirc;{d}i te [gehanne],</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4595</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[m&ecirc;ngith&acirc;htio<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ndash; antsuok thero] manno gehuilic &ndash;,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uur{d}un alle an forhtun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>fr&acirc;gon ne gidorstun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&ecirc;r than th&ocirc; geb&ocirc;knide<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[baruuir{d}ig] gumo,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">S&icirc;mon Petrus<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ndash; ne gidorste it sel{b}o sprekan &ndash;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">te Iohanne themu g&ocirc;don:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>he uuas themu godes barne</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4600</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an them dagun<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thegno lio{b}ost,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">m&ecirc;st an minniun<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi m&ocirc;ste thar [th&ocirc;] an thes mahtiges Kristes</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">barme restien<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi an is breostun lag,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hlinode mid is [h&ocirc;{b}du:]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thar nam he s&ocirc; manag h&ecirc;lag ger&ucirc;ni,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">diapa gith&acirc;hti,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi th&ocirc; te is drohtine sprac,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4605</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">began ina th&ocirc; fr&acirc;gon:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;hue scal that, fr&ocirc; m&icirc;n, uuesen&raquo;, qua{d} he,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;that thi farc&ocirc;pon uuili,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>cuningo r&icirc;keost,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">undar th&icirc;naro f&icirc;undo folc?<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&Ucirc;s uu&acirc;ri thes firiuuit mikil,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uualdand, te uuitanne.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; habde eft is uuord garu</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;leando Crist:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;seh thi, huemu ik h&ecirc;r an hand ge{b}e</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4610</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">m&icirc;nes m&ocirc;ses for thesun mannun:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>the ha{b}ed m&ecirc;n[gith&acirc;ht],</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[birid bittran hugi];<span class="f_canusg">| </span>the scal mi an banono geuuald,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">f&icirc;undun bifelhen,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thar man m&icirc;nes ferhes scal,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">aldres &acirc;htien.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Nam he th&ocirc; aftar thiu</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thes m&ocirc;ses for them mannun<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi gaf is themu m&ecirc;nsca{d}en,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4615</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Iudase an hand<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi imu tegegnes sprac</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sel{b}o for them is ges&icirc;{d}un<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi ina sniumo h&ecirc;t</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">faran fan themu is folke:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;frumi s&ocirc; thu thenkis&raquo;, qua{d} he,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;d&ocirc; that thu duan scalt:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thu ni maht bidernien leng</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuilleon th&icirc;nan.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thiu uurd is at handun,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4620</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thea t&icirc;di sind nu gin&acirc;hid.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>S&ocirc; th&ocirc; the treulogo</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that m&ocirc;s antfeng<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi mid is m&ucirc;{d}u anb&ecirc;t,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&ocirc; afgaf ina th&ocirc; thiu godes craft,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>gramon in geuuitun</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an thene l&icirc;chamon,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>l&ecirc;{d}a uuihti,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuar{d} imu Satanas<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ecirc;ro bitengi,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4625</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hardo umbi is herte,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&icirc;{d}ur ine thiu helpe godes</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">farl&ecirc;t an thesumu liohte.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>S&ocirc; is [thena] liudio uu&ecirc;,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">the s&ocirc; undar thesumu [himile scal<span class="f_canusg">| </span>h&ecirc;rron] uuehslon.</h3>
   </td>
  </tr>
</table>
</div>

	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="50"><h6>&nbsp;</h6></td>
	<td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;">
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;"><span class="f_ruberi">G</span>iuu&ecirc;t imu th&ocirc; &ucirc;t thanen<span class="f_canusg">| </span>inuuideas gern</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Iudas gangan:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>habde imu grimmen hugi</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4630</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thegan uui{d} is thiodan.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Uuas th&ocirc; iu thiustri naht,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">su&icirc;{d}o gisuorken.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Sunu drohtines</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuas ima [at] them g&ocirc;mun for{d}<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi is iungarun [thar]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uualdand uu&icirc;n endi br&ocirc;d<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uu&icirc;hide b&ecirc;{d}iu,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;lagode he{b}encuning,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>mid is handun brak,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4635</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gaf it undar them is iungarun<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi gode thancode,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sagde them &ocirc;lat,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[the] thar al gisc&ocirc;p,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuerold endi uunnea,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi sprak uuord manag:</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;gil&ocirc;{b}iot gi thes liohto&raquo;, [qua{d} he],<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;that thit is m&icirc;n l&icirc;chamo</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">endi m&icirc;n bl&ocirc;d s&ocirc; same:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>gi{b}u ik iu h&ecirc;r b&ecirc;{d}iu samad</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4640</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">etan endi drinkan.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thit ik an er{d}u scal</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ge{b}an endi geotan<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi iu te godes r&icirc;kie</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">l&ocirc;sien mid m&icirc;nu l&icirc;chamen<span class="f_canusg">| </span>an l&icirc;f &ecirc;uuig,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an that himiles lioht.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Gihuggeat gi simlun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that gi [thiu fulgangan],<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thiu ik an thesun g&ocirc;mun d&ocirc;n;</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4645</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">m&acirc;riad thit [for] menegi:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thit is mahtig thing,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">mid thius sculun gi iuuuomu drohtine<span class="f_canusg">| </span>diuri{d}a frummien,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">habbiad thit m&icirc;n te gihugdiun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>h&ecirc;lag bili{d}i,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that it eldibarn<span class="f_canusg">| </span>aftar l&ecirc;stien,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuaron an thesaru uueroldi,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that that uuitin alle,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4650</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">man o{b}ar thesan middilgard,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that it is thurh m&icirc;na minnea giduan</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;rron te huldi.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Gehuggiad gi [simlun,]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hueo ik iu h&ecirc;r gebiudu,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that gi iuuuan br&ocirc;{d}erskepi</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fasto [frummiad:]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>habbiad ferhtan hugi,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">minniod iu an iuuuomu m&ocirc;de,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that that manno barn</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4655</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">o{b}ar irminthiod<span class="f_canusg">| </span>alle farstanden,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that gi [sind] gegnungo<span class="f_canusg">| </span>iungaron m&icirc;ne.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&Ocirc;k scal ik iu c&ucirc;{d}ien,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>hu&ocirc; h&ecirc;r uuili craftag f&icirc;und,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hetteand herugrim,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>umbi iuuuan hugi niusien,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[Satanas sel{b}o:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>he cumid] iuuuaro seolono herod</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4660</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fr&ocirc;kno fr&ecirc;son.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Simlun gi fasto te gode</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">berad iuuua breost[gith&acirc;ht]:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ik scal an iuuuaru bedu standen,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that [iu] ni mugi the m&ecirc;nsca{d}o<span class="f_canusg">| </span>m&ocirc;d getu&icirc;flean;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ik [full&ecirc;stiu iu] uui{d}er themu f&icirc;unde.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&Ocirc;k quam he herod giu fr&ecirc;son m&icirc;n,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thoh imu is uuilleon h&ecirc;r<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuiht ne gist&ocirc;di,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4665</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">lio{b}es an [themu m&icirc;numu] l&icirc;chamon.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Nu [ni] uuilliu ik iu leng helen,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">huat iu h&ecirc;r nu sniumo scal<span class="f_canusg">| </span>te sorgu gistanden:</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gi sculun mi gesu&icirc;kan,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ges&icirc;{d}os m&icirc;ne,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">iuuues theganscepies,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ecirc;r than thius thiustrie naht</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">liudi farl&icirc;{d}a<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi eft lioht cume,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4670</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">morgan te [mannun].&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; uuar{d} m&ocirc;d gumon</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">su&icirc;{d}o gisuorken<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi s&ecirc;r hugi,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hriuuig umbi iro herte<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi iro h&ecirc;rron uuord</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">su&icirc;{d}o an sorgun.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>S&icirc;mon Petrus th&ocirc;,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thegan uui{d} is thiodan<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thr&icirc;st[uuordun] sprac</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4675</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">bi huldi uui{d} is h&ecirc;rron:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;thoh thi all thit heli{d}o folc&raquo;, quathie,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;gisu&icirc;can th&icirc;na gis&icirc;{d}os,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thoh ik sinnon mid thi</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">at allon thara{b}on<span class="f_canusg">| </span>tholoian uuilliu.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Ik biun garo sinnon,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ef mi god l&acirc;ti{d},</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that ik an th&icirc;non full&ecirc;stie<span class="f_canusg">| </span>fasto gistande;</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4680</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thoh sia thi an carcaries<span class="f_canusg">| </span>cl&ucirc;stron hardo,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thesa liudi bil&ucirc;can,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thoh ist mi luttil tueo,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ne ik an them bendion mid thi<span class="f_canusg">| </span>b&icirc;dan uuillie,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">liggian mid thi [s&ocirc;] lie{b}en;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ef sia th&icirc;nes l&icirc;{b}es thann</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thuru eggia n&icirc;{d}<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&acirc;htian [uuilliad,]</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4685</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fr&ocirc; m&icirc;n thie guodo,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ik gi{b}u m&icirc;n ferah furi thik</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an uu&acirc;pno spil:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>nis mi uuer{d} iouuiht</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">te bim&icirc;{d}anne,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; lango s&ocirc; mi m&icirc;n uuarod</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hugi endi handcraft.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thuo sprak im eft is h&ecirc;rro angegin:</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;huat, thu thik biuu&acirc;nis&raquo;, [quathie,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;uuissaro] treuuono,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4690</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thr&icirc;stero thingo:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thu ha{b}is thegnes hugi,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuillion guodan.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Ik mah thi seggian, hu&ocirc; it thoh giuuer{d}an scal,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that thu uuir{d}is s&ocirc; uu&ecirc;kmuod,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thoh thu nu ni uu&acirc;nies s&ocirc;,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that thu th&icirc;nes thiadnes te naht<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thr&icirc;uuo farl&ocirc;gnis</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&ecirc;r hanocr&acirc;di<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi qui{d}is, thak ik th&icirc;n h&ecirc;rro ni s&icirc;,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4695</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ac thu farmanst m&icirc;na mundburd.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thuo sprac eft thie man angegin:</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;ef it gio an uueroldi&raquo;, quathie,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;giuuer{d}an muosti,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that ik samad midi thi<span class="f_canusg">| </span>sueltan muosti,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">d&ocirc;ian diurl&icirc;co,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thann ne uuur{d}i gio thie dag cuman,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that ik th&icirc;n farl&ocirc;gnidi,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>lie{b}o drohtin,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4700</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gerno for theson Iu{d}eon.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thuo qu&acirc;{d}un alla thia iungron s&ocirc;,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that sia thar an them [thingon mid im]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>tholian uueldin.</h3>
   </td>
  </tr>
</table>
</div>

<p>Heliand</p>
<p>um 830</p>
