<table width="650" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
  <tr>
	<td width="50">&nbsp;</td>
	<td  width="600">
<h1>Heliand</h1>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h2>Fitte LVII</h2>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="650" colspan="2" >
<p style="color:#996699;">______________________________________________________________________________</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="50"><h6>&nbsp;</h6></td>
	<td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;">
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;"><span class="f_ruberi">T</span>huo im eft mid is uuordon gib&ocirc;d<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uualdand sel{b}o,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;r he{b}ancuning,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that sia im ni lietin iro hugi tu&icirc;flian,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hiet that sia ni [uueldin] . . . (?)<span class="f_canusg">| </span>diopa gith&acirc;hti:</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4705</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;ne druo{b}ie iuuua herta<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thuru iuuues drohtines uuord,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ne forohteat te filo:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ic scal fader &ucirc;san</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sel{b}an suokean<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi iu sendian scal</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fan he{b}anr&icirc;kie<span class="f_canusg">| </span>h&ecirc;lagna g&ecirc;st:</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thie scal iu eft gifruofrean<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi te frumu uuer{d}an,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4710</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">manon iu thero mahlo,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thie ik iu manag hebbiu</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuordon giuu&icirc;sid.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Hie gi{b}it iu giuuit an briost,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">lustsama l&ecirc;ra,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that gi l&ecirc;stian for{d}</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thiu uuord endi thiu uuerc,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thia ik iu an thesaro uueroldi gib&ocirc;d.&raquo;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Ar&ecirc;s im thuo the r&icirc;keo<span class="f_canusg">| </span>an themo racode innan,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4715</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">neriendo Crist<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi giuu&ecirc;t im [nahtes thanan]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sel{b}o mid is gis&icirc;{d}on:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[s&ecirc;rago] gengun</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">su&icirc;{d}o gornondia<span class="f_canusg">| </span>iungron Cristes,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hriuuigmuoda.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thuo hie im an thena h&ocirc;han giuu&ecirc;t</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Oliuetiberg:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thar uuas hie upp giuuno</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4720</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gangan mid is iungron.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>That uuissa Iudas uuell,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">baloh&ucirc;dig man,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>huand hie uuas oft an them berege mid im.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Thar gruotta thie godes suno<span class="f_canusg">| </span>i&ucirc;gron s&icirc;na:</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;gi sind nu s&ocirc; druo{b}ia&raquo;, quathie,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;nu gi m&icirc;nan d&ocirc;{d} uuitun;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">nu gornon{d} gi endi griotand,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi thesa Iu{d}eon sind an luston,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4725</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">mendit [thius] menigi,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>sindun an iro muode fr&acirc;ha,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thius uuerold ist an uuunnion.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thes uuir{d}it thoh giuuand cuman</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sniumo tulgo:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>than uuir{d}it im s&ecirc;r hugi,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">than morniat sia an iro m&ocirc;de,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi gi mendian sculun</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">after te &ecirc;uuondage,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>huand gio endi ni cumi{d},</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4730</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">iuuues uuell&icirc;{b}es giuuand:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>bethiu ne thur{b}un iu thius uuerc tregan,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hreuuan m&icirc;n hinfard,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>huand thanan scal thiu helpa cuman</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gumono barnon.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thuo hiet hie is iungron thar</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">b&icirc;dan uppan themo berge,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>qua{d} that hie ti bedu uueldi</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an thiu holmcli{b}u<span class="f_canusg">| </span>h&ocirc;hor st&icirc;gan;</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4735</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hiet thuo thria mid im<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thegnos gangan,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Iacobe endi Iohannese<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi thena guodan Petruse,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thr&icirc;stmuodian thegan.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thuo sia mid iro thiedne samad</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gerno gengun.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thuo hiet sia thie godes suno</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an berge uppan<span class="f_canusg">| </span>te bedu hn&icirc;gan,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4740</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hiet sia god gruotian,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>gerno biddian,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that he im thero costondero<span class="f_canusg">| </span>craft farst&ocirc;di,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uur&ecirc;{d}aro uuilleon,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that im the [uui{d}ersaco,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ni mahti] the m&ecirc;nsca{d}o<span class="f_canusg">| </span>m&ocirc;d gitu&icirc;flean,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">iak imu th&ocirc; sel{b}o gihn&ecirc;g<span class="f_canusg">| </span>sunu drohtines</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4745</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">craftag an kniobeda,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>kuningo r&icirc;keost,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">for{d}uuard te foldu:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>fader alothiado</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">g&ocirc;dan gr&ocirc;tte,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>gorn[uuordun] sprac</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hriuuigl&icirc;co:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuas imu is hugi dr&ocirc;{b}i,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">bi theru menniski<span class="f_canusg">| </span>m&ocirc;d gihr&ocirc;rid,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4750</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">is fl&ecirc;sk uuas an forhtun:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>fellun imo trahni,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">dr&ocirc;p is diurl&icirc;c su&ecirc;t,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>al s&ocirc; dr&ocirc;r kumid</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuallan fan uundun.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Uuas an geuuinne th&ocirc;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an themu godes barne<span class="f_canusg">| </span>the g&ecirc;st endi the l&icirc;chamo:</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&ocirc;{d}ar uuas [f&ucirc;sid]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>an [for{d}uuegos,]</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4755</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">the g&ecirc;st an godes r&icirc;ki,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ocirc;{d}ar gi&acirc;mar st&ocirc;d,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">l&icirc;chamo Cristes:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ni uuelde [thit] lioht age{b}en,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ac [dro{b}de] for themu d&ocirc;{d}e.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[Simla] he [hreop] te drohtine for{d}</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thiu m&ecirc;r aftar thiu<span class="f_canusg">| </span>mahtigna gr&ocirc;tte,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ocirc;han himilfader,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>h&ecirc;lagna god,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4760</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uualdand mid is uuordun:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;ef nu uuer{d}en ni mag&raquo;, qua{d} he,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;mankunni generid,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ne s&icirc; that ik m&icirc;nan ge{b}e</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">lio{b}an l&icirc;chamon<span class="f_canusg">| </span>for liudio barn</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">te uu&ecirc;geanne te uundrun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>it s&icirc; than th&icirc;n uuilleo s&ocirc;,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ik uuilliu is than gicoston:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ik nimu thene kelik an hand,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4765</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">drinku ina thi te [diur{d}u,]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>drohtin fr&ocirc; m&icirc;n,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">mahtig mundboro.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Ni seh thu m&icirc;nes h&ecirc;r</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fl&ecirc;skes gif&ocirc;ries.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Ik fullon scal</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuilleon th&icirc;nen:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thu ha{b}es geuuald o{b}ar al.&raquo;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Giuu&ecirc;t imu th&ocirc; gangen,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thar he [&ecirc;r] is iungaron l&ecirc;t</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4770</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">b&icirc;dan uppan themu berge;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>fand sie that barn godes</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sl&acirc;pen sorgandie:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuas im s&ecirc;r hugi,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thes sie fan iro drohtine<span class="f_canusg">| </span>d&ecirc;lien scoldun.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">S&ocirc; sind that [m&ocirc;dthraca<span class="f_canusg">| </span>manno] gehuilicumu,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that he farl&acirc;ten scal<span class="f_canusg">| </span>lia{b}ane h&ecirc;rron,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4775</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[afge{b}en] thene s&ocirc; g&ocirc;dene.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; he te is iungarun sprak,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[uuahte] sie uualdand<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi uuordun gr&ocirc;tte:</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;hu&icirc; uuilliad gi s&ocirc; sl&acirc;pen?&raquo; qua{d} he;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;ni mugun samad mid mi</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuacon &ecirc;ne t&icirc;d?<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thiu uurd is [at] handun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that it s&ocirc; gigangen scal,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; it god fader</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4780</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[gimarcode] mahtig.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Mi nis an m&icirc;numu m&ocirc;de tueho:</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">m&icirc;n g&ecirc;st is garu<span class="f_canusg">| </span>an godes uuillean,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">f&ucirc;s te faranne:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>m&icirc;n fl&ecirc;sk is an sorgun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">letid [mik] m&icirc;n l&icirc;chamo:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>l&ecirc;{d} is imu su&icirc;{d}o</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&icirc;ti te tholonne.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Ik thoh uuillean scal</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4785</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">m&icirc;nes fader [gefrummien.]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Hebbiad gi fasten hugi.&raquo;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Giuu&ecirc;t imu th&ocirc; eft thanan<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ocirc;{d}ers&icirc;{d}u</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an thene berg uppen<span class="f_canusg">| </span>te bedu gangan,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">m&acirc;ri drohtin,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi thar s&ocirc; manag gisprac</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">g&ocirc;doro uuordo.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Godes engil quam</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4790</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;lag fan himile,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>is hugi fastnode,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">beldide te them bendiun.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>He uuas an theru bedu [simla]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">for{d} an fl&icirc;te<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi is fader gr&ocirc;tte,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uualdand mid is uuordun:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;ef it nu uuesen ni mag&raquo;, qua{d} he,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;m&acirc;ri drohtin,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ne{b}u ik for thit manno folc</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4795</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thiodqu&acirc;le tholoie,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ik an th&icirc;nan scal</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuillean [uuonian.&raquo;]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Giuu&ecirc;t imu th&ocirc; eft thanen</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&ocirc;kean is ges&icirc;{d}os:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>fand sie sl&acirc;pandie,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gr&ocirc;tte sie g&acirc;hun.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Geng imu eft thanen</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thriddeon s&icirc;{d}u te bedu<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi sprak thiodkuning</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4800</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">al thiu sel{b}on uuord,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>sunu drohtines,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">te themu alouualdon fader,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; he &ecirc;r dede,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">manode mahtigna<span class="f_canusg">| </span>manno frumana</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">su&icirc;{d}o niudl&icirc;co<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[neriando] Crist,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">geng imu th&ocirc; [eft] te them is iungarun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>gr&ocirc;tte sie s&acirc;no:</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4805</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;sl&acirc;pad gi endi [restiad&raquo;,] qua{d} he.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;Nu uuir{d}id sniumo herod</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">cuman mid craftu,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>the mi farc&ocirc;pot ha{b}ad,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[sundea l&ocirc;san] gisald.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Ges&icirc;{d}os Cristes</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuacodun th&ocirc; aftar them uuordun<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi gis&acirc;hun th&ocirc; that uuerod kuman</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an thene berg uppen<span class="f_canusg">| </span>brahtmu thiu mikilon,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4810</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uur&ecirc;{d}a uu&acirc;panberand.<span class="f_canusg">| </span></h3>
   </td>
  </tr>
</table>
</div>

<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h2>Fitte LVIII</h2>

    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="50"><h6>4810</h6></td>
	<td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;">
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:200px;"><span class="f_canusg">| </span><span class="f_ruberi">U</span>u&icirc;sde im Iudas,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gramh&ucirc;dig man;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Iudeon aftar sigun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">f&icirc;undo folcscepi;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>dr&ocirc;g man fiur an gimang,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">logna an liohtfatun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>l&ecirc;dde man faklon</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[brinnandea] fan burg,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thar sie an thene berg [uppan]</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4815</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">stigun mid str&icirc;du.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thea stedi uuisse Judas uuel,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">huar he thea liudi t&ocirc;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>l&ecirc;dean scolde.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Sagde imu th&ocirc; te t&ecirc;kne,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>th&ocirc; sie thar t&ocirc; f&ocirc;run</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">themu [folke] biforan,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>te thiu that sie ni farfengin thar,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">erlos &ocirc;{d}ren man:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;ik gangu imu at &ecirc;rist t&ocirc;&raquo;, qua{d} he,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4820</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;cussiu ine endi quaddiu:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that is Crist sel{b}o.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Thene gi f&acirc;hen sculun<span class="f_canusg">| </span>folco craftu,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">binden [ina] uppan themu berge<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi [ina] te burg hinan</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">l&ecirc;dien undar thea liudi:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>he is l&icirc;{b}es ha{b}ad</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">mid [is] uuordun faruuerkod.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Uuerod s&icirc;{d}ode th&ocirc;,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4825</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">antat sie te Criste<span class="f_canusg">| </span>kumane uur{d}un,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[grim folc] Iudeono,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thar he mid is iungarun st&ocirc;d,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">m&acirc;ri drohtin:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>b&ecirc;d metodogiscapu,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">torhtero t&icirc;deo.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; geng imu treul&ocirc;s man,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Iudas tegegnes<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi te themu godes barne</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4830</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hn&ecirc;g mid is h&ocirc;{b}du<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi is h&ecirc;rron quedde,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">custe ina craftagne<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi is quidi l&ecirc;ste,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&icirc;sde ina themu uuerode,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>al s&ocirc; he &ecirc;r mid uuordun geh&ecirc;t.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">That tholode al mid githuldiun<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thiodo drohtin,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uualdand thesara uueroldes<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi sprak imu mid is uuordun t&ocirc;,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4835</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fr&acirc;gode ine fr&ocirc;kno:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;behu&icirc; kumis thu s&ocirc; mid thius folcu te mi,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">behu&icirc; l&ecirc;dis thu mi s&ocirc; these liudi t&ocirc;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[endi mi te] thesare l&ecirc;{d}an thiode</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">farc&ocirc;pos mid th&icirc;nu kussu<span class="f_canusg">| </span>under thit kunni Iudeono,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">meldos mi te thesaru menegi?&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Geng imu th&ocirc; uui{d} thea man sprekan,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uui{d} that uuerod &ocirc;{d}ar<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi sie mid [is] uuordun fragn,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4840</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">huene sie mid thiu ges&icirc;{d}iu<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc;kean qu&acirc;min</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&ocirc; niudlico an naht,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;so gi [uuillean] n&ocirc;d frummien</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">manno huilicumu.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; sprak imu eft thiu menegi angegin,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">qu&acirc;{d}un that im h&ecirc;leand thar<span class="f_canusg">| </span>an themu holme uppan</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">geuu&icirc;sid uu&acirc;ri,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;the thit giuuer frumid</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4845</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Iudeo liudiun<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi [ina] godes sunu</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sel{b}on h&ecirc;tid.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Ina qu&acirc;mun uui s&ocirc;kean herod,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[uueldin] ina gerno bigeten:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>he is fan Galileo lande,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fan Nazarethburg.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>S&ocirc; im th&ocirc; the neriendio Crist</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sagde te s&ocirc;{d}an,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that he it sel{b}o uuas,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4850</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&ocirc; uur{d}un th&ocirc; an forhtun<span class="f_canusg">| </span>folc Iudeono,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uur{d}un underbadode,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that sie under bac fellun</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">alle [efno s&acirc;n,]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>er{d}e gis&ocirc;htun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uui{d}er[uuardes] that uuerod:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ni [mahte] that uuord godes,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thie stemnie antstandan:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uu&acirc;run thoh s&ocirc; str&icirc;dige man,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4855</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ahliopun eft up an themu holme,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>hugi fastnodun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">bundun briostgith&acirc;ht,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>gibolgane gengun</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">n&acirc;hor mid n&icirc;{d}u,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>anttat sie thene neriendion Crist</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuerodo biuurpun.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>St&ocirc;dun uu&icirc;se man,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[su&icirc;{d}o gornundie<span class="f_canusg">| </span>giungaron Kristes]</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4860</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[biforan] theru dere{b}eon d&acirc;di<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi te iro drohtine [spr&acirc;kun:]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;uu&acirc;ri it [nu] th&icirc;n uuillio&raquo;, qu&acirc;{d}un sie,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;uualdand fr&ocirc; m&icirc;n,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[that sie &ucirc;s h&ecirc;r an speres ordun<span class="f_canusg">| </span>spildien m&ocirc;stin]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&acirc;pnun uunde,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>than ni uu&acirc;ri &ucirc;s uuiht s&ocirc; g&ocirc;d,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&ocirc; that uui h&ecirc;r for &ucirc;sumu drohtine<span class="f_canusg">| </span>d&ocirc;an m&ocirc;stin</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4865</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[beni{d}iun] bl&ecirc;ka&raquo;.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; gibolgan uuar{d}</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">snel suerdthegan,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>S&icirc;mon Petrus,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuell imu innan hugi,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that he ni mahte &ecirc;nig uuord sprekan:</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&ocirc; harm uuar{d} imu an is hertan,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that man is h&ecirc;rron thar</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">binden [uuelde.]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; he gibolgan geng,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4870</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">su&icirc;{d}o thr&icirc;stm&ocirc;d thegan<span class="f_canusg">| </span>for is thiodan [standen,]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hard for is h&ecirc;rron:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ni uuas imu is hugi tu&icirc;fli,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[bl&ocirc;th] an is breostun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ac he is bil at&ocirc;h,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">suerd bi s&icirc;du,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[sl&ocirc;g] imu tegegnes</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an thene [furiston] f&icirc;und<span class="f_canusg">| </span>folmo crafto,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4875</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that th&ocirc; Malchus uuar{d}<span class="f_canusg">| </span>m&acirc;keas eggiun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an thea su&icirc;{d}aron half<span class="f_canusg">| </span>suerdu gim&acirc;lod:</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thiu hlust uuar{d} imu farhauuan,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>he uuar{d} an that h&ocirc;{b}id uund,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that imu herudr&ocirc;rag<span class="f_canusg">| </span>hlear endi &ocirc;re</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">beniuundun brast:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>bl&ocirc;d aftar sprang,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4880</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuell fan uundun.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; uuas an is uuangun scard</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">the furisto thero f&icirc;undo.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; st&ocirc;d that folc an r&ucirc;m:</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">andr&ecirc;dun im thes billes biti.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; sprak that barn godes</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sel{b}o te S&icirc;mon Petruse,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>h&ecirc;t that he is suerd [dedi]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">skarp an sk&ecirc;{d}ia:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;ef ik uui{d} thesa scola uueldi&raquo;, qua{d} he,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4885</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;uui{d} theses uuerodes geuuin<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uu&icirc;gsaca frummien,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">than manodi ik thene m&acirc;reon<span class="f_canusg">| </span>mahtigne god,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;lagne fader<span class="f_canusg">| </span>an himilr&icirc;kea,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that he mi s&ocirc; managan engil herod<span class="f_canusg">| </span>o{b}ana sandi</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&icirc;ges s&ocirc; uu&icirc;sen,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; ni [mahtin] iro uu&acirc;panthreki</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4890</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">man ad&ocirc;gen:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>iro ni st&ocirc;di gio sulic megin samad,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">folkes gifastnod,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that im iro ferh aftar thiu</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuer{d}en [mahti].<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Ac it ha{b}ad uualdand god,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">alomahtig fader<span class="f_canusg">| </span>an &ocirc;{d}ar gimarkot,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that uui githoloian sculun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; huat s&ocirc; &ucirc;s [thius thioda] t&ocirc;</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4895</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">bittres brengit:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ni sculun &ucirc;s belgan uuiht,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uur&ecirc;{d}ean uui{d} iro geuuinne;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>huand s&ocirc; hue s&ocirc; uu&acirc;pno n&icirc;{d},</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">grimman [g&ecirc;rheti<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuili] gerno frummien,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">he suiltit imu [eft]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>suerdes eggiun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[d&ocirc;it] im [bidr&ocirc;regan]:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uui mid &ucirc;sun d&acirc;diun ni sculun</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4900</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuiht auuerdian.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Geng [he] th&ocirc; te themu uundon [manne],</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[legde] mid listiun<span class="f_canusg">| </span>l&icirc;k tesamne,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ocirc;{b}iduundon,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that siu s&acirc;n gih&ecirc;lid uuar{d},</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thes billes biti,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi sprak that barn godes</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uui{d} that uur&ecirc;{d}e uuerod:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;mi thunkid uunder mikil&raquo;, qua{d} he,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4905</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;ef gi mi l&ecirc;{d}es uuiht<span class="f_canusg">| </span>l&ecirc;stien uueldun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hu&icirc; gi mi [th&ocirc;] ni [fengun,]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>than ik undar iuuuomu folke st&ocirc;d,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an themu uu&icirc;he innan<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi thar uuord manag</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&ocirc;{d}l&icirc;c sagde.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Than uuas sunnon sk&icirc;n,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">diurlic [dages lioht,]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>than ni uueldun gi mi d&ocirc;an eouuiht</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4910</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">l&ecirc;{d}es an thesumu liohte,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi nu l&ecirc;diad mi iuua liudi t&ocirc;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an thiustrie naht,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>al s&ocirc; man thio{b}e d&ocirc;t,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">than man thene f&acirc;han uuili<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi he is ferhes ha{b}ad</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">faruuerkot, uuamsca{d}o.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Uuerod Iudeono</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gripun th&ocirc; an thene godes sunu,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>grimma thioda,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4915</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hatandiero h&ocirc;p,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>huur{b}un ina umbi</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">m&ocirc;dag manno folc<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ndash; m&ecirc;nes ni s&acirc;hun &ndash;,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">heftun herubendiun<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[handi] tesamne,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fa{d}mos mid fitereun.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Im ni uuas [sulicaro] firinqu&acirc;la</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">tharf te githolonne,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thiodar{b}edies,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4920</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">te uuinnanne sulic uu&icirc;ti,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ac he it thurh thit uuerod deda,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">huand he liudio barn<span class="f_canusg">| </span>l&ocirc;sien uuelda,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">halon fan helliu<span class="f_canusg">| </span>an himilr&icirc;ki,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an thene uu&icirc;don uuelon:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>bethiu he thes uuiht ne bisprak,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thes sie imu thurh inuuidn&icirc;{d}<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ocirc;gean uueldun.</h3>
   </td>
  </tr>
</table>

	<td  width="600">
<h1>Heliand</h1>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h2>Fitte LIX</h2>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="650" colspan="2" >
<p style="color:#996699;">______________________________________________________________________________</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="50"><h6>4925</h6></td>
	<td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;">
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;"><span class="f_ruberi">T</span>h&ocirc; uur{d}un thes s&ocirc; malsce<span class="f_canusg">| </span>m&ocirc;dag folc Iudeono,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thiu h&ecirc;ri uuar{d} thes s&ocirc; hr&ocirc;meg,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thes sie thena [h&ecirc;lagon] Krist</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[an li{d}obendion<span class="f_canusg">| </span>l&ecirc;dian muostun],</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[f&ocirc;rian] an fitereun.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thie f&icirc;und eft geuuitun</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fan themu berge te burg.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Geng that barn godes</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4930</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">undar themu heriscepi<span class="f_canusg">| </span>handun gebunden,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">dr&ucirc;{b}ondi te dale.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Uu&acirc;run imu thea is diurion th&ocirc;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[ges&icirc;{d}os] gesuikane,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>al s&ocirc; he im &ecirc;r sel{b}o gisprak:</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ni uuas it thoh be &ecirc;nigaru bl&ocirc;{d}i,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that sie that barn godes,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[lio{b}en] farl&ecirc;tun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ac it uuas s&ocirc; lango biforen</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4935</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&acirc;rsagono uuord,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that it [scoldi] giuuer{d}en s&ocirc;:</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">bethiu ni mahtun sie is bem&icirc;{d}an.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Than aftar theru menegi gengun</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Iohannes endi Petrus,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thie gumon tu&ecirc;ne,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">folgodun ferrane:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuas im firiuuit mikil,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">huat thea grimmon Iudeon<span class="f_canusg">| </span>themu godes barne,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4940</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[uueldin] iro drohtine d&ocirc;en.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; sie te dale qu&acirc;mun</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fan themu berge te burg,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thar iro biscop uuas,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">iro uu&icirc;hes uuard,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thar l&ecirc;ddun ina uulanke man,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">erlos undar ederos.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thar uuas &ecirc;ld mikil,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fiur an fr&icirc;dho{b}e<span class="f_canusg">| </span>themu folke tegegnes,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4945</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">geuuarht for themu uuerode:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thar gengun sie im uuermien t&ocirc;,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[Iudeo] liudi,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>l&ecirc;tun thene godes sunu</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">b&icirc;don an bendiun.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Uuas thar braht mikil,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">g&ecirc;lm&ocirc;digaro galm.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Iohannes uuas &ecirc;r</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">themu h&ecirc;roston c&ucirc;{d}:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>bethiu m&ocirc;ste he an thene hof innan</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4950</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thringan mid theru thioda.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>St&ocirc;d allaro thegno bezto,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Petrus thar &ucirc;te:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ni l&ecirc;t ina [the] portun uuard</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">folgon is fr&ocirc;en,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ecirc;r it at is friunde abad,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Iohannes at &ecirc;numu Iudeon,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that man ina gangan l&ecirc;t</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">for{d} an thene fr&icirc;dhof.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thar quam im &ecirc;n f&ecirc;kni uu&icirc;f</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4955</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gangan tegegnes,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thiu &ecirc;nas Iudeon uuas,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">iro theodanes thiuu,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi th&ocirc; te themu thegne sprac</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">maga{d} [unuu&acirc;nl&icirc;c]:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;huat, thu mahtis man uuesan&raquo;, qua{d} siu,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;giungaro fan Galilea,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thes the thar genouuer st&ecirc;d</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fa{d}mun gifastnod.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; an forhtun uuar{d}</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4960</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">S&icirc;mon Petrus s&acirc;n,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[slac] an is m&ocirc;de,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">qua{d} that he thes uu&icirc;{b}es<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuord ni bikonsti</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ni thes theodanes<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thegan ni uu&acirc;ri:</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">m&ecirc;{d} is th&ocirc; for theru menegi,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>qua{d} that he thena man ni antkendi:</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;ni sind mi th&icirc;ne [quidi] k&ucirc;{d}e&raquo;, qua{d} he;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuas imu thiu craft godes,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4965</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[the] herdislo fan themu hertan.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Huara{b}ondi geng</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">for{d} undar themu folke,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>antat he te themu fiure quam;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[giuu&ecirc;t] ina th&ocirc; uuarmien.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thar im &ocirc;k &ecirc;n uu&icirc;f bigan</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">felgian firinspr&acirc;ka:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;h&ecirc;r mugun gi&raquo;, qua{d} siu, &laquo;an iuuuan f&icirc;und sehan:</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thit is gegnungo<span class="f_canusg">| </span>giungaro Kristes,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4970</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">is sel{b}es ges&icirc;{d}.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; gengun imu s&acirc;n aftar thiu</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">n&acirc;hor n&icirc;{d}huata<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi ina niudl&icirc;co</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fr&acirc;godun f&icirc;undo barn,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>huilikes he folkes uu&acirc;ri:</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&raquo;ni bist thu thesoro burgliudio&raquo;, [qu&acirc;{d}un sie];<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;that mugun uui [an th&icirc;numu gib&acirc;rie gisehan],</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an th&icirc;nun uuordun endi an th&icirc;naru uu&icirc;son,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that thu theses uuerodes ni bist,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4975</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ac thu bist galil&ecirc;isk man.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>He ni uuelda thes th&ocirc; gehan eouuiht,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ac st&ocirc;d th&ocirc; endi str&icirc;dda<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi starkan &ecirc;{d}</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">su&icirc;{d}l&icirc;co gesu&ocirc;r,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that he thes ges&icirc;{d}es ni uu&acirc;ri.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Ni habda is uuordo geuuald:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>it scolde giuuer{d}en s&ocirc;,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&ocirc; it the gemarcode,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>the mankunnies</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4980</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">faruuardot an thesaru uueroldi.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; quam imu &ocirc;k an themu [uuar{b}e] t&ocirc;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thes mannes m&acirc;guuini,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>the he &ecirc;r mid is [m&acirc;keo] giheu,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">suerdu thiu scarpon,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>qua{d} that he ina s&acirc;hi thar</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an themu berge uppan,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;thar uui an themu b&ocirc;mgardon</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;rron [th&icirc;numu]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>hendi bundun,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4985</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fastnodun is folmos.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>He th&ocirc; thurh forhtan hugi</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">forl&ocirc;gnide thes is [lio{b}es] h&ecirc;rron,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>qua{d} that he uueldi uuesan thes <br />l&icirc;{b}es scolo,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ef it mahti &ecirc;nig thar<span class="f_canusg">| </span>irminmanno</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">giseggian te s&ocirc;{d}an,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that he thes ges&icirc;{d}es uu&acirc;ri,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">folgodi theru ferdi.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; uuar{d} an thena formon s&icirc;{d}</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4990</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hanocr&acirc;d [afha{b}en].<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; sah the h&ecirc;lago Crist,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[barno that bezte,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thar he gebunden st&ocirc;{d}],</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sel{b}o te S&icirc;mon Petruse,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>sunu drohtines</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">te themu erle o{b}ar is ahsla.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; uuar{d} imu an innan s&acirc;n,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">S&icirc;mon Petruse<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ecirc;r an is m&ocirc;de,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>4995</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">harm an is hertan<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi is hugi dr&ocirc;{b}i,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">su&icirc;{d}o uuar{d} imu an sorgun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that he &ecirc;r sel{b}o gesprak:</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gihugde thero uuordo th&ocirc;,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>the imu [&ecirc;r] uualdand Krist</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sel{b}o sagda,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that he an theru suartan naht</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&ecirc;r hanocr&acirc;di<span class="f_canusg">| </span>is h&ecirc;rron [scoldi]</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5000</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thr&icirc;uuo farl&ocirc;gnien.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thes thram imu [an] innan m&ocirc;d</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">bittro an is breostun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi geng imu th&ocirc; gibolgan thanen</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">the man fan theru menigi<span class="f_canusg">| </span>an m&ocirc;dkaru,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">su&icirc;{d}o an sorgun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi is sel{b}es uuord,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuamscefti uueop,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>antat imu uuallan qu&acirc;mun</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5005</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thurh thea hertcara<span class="f_canusg">| </span>h&ecirc;te trahni,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">bl&ocirc;dage fan is breostun.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>He ni uu&acirc;nde that he is mahti gib&ocirc;tien uuiht,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">firin[uuerco] fur{d}ur<span class="f_canusg">| </span>eftha te is fr&acirc;hon kuman,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;rron huldi:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>nis &ecirc;nig heli{d}o [s&ocirc;] ald,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that [io] mannes sunu<span class="f_canusg">| </span>m&ecirc;r gis&acirc;hi</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5010</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">is sel{b}es uuord<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ecirc;rur hreuuan,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">karon eftha k&ucirc;mien:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;uuola crafteg god&raquo;, qua{d} he,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that ik hebbiu mi s&ocirc; foruuerkot,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; ik m&icirc;naro uueroldes ni tharf</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&ocirc;lat seggean.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Ef ik nu te aldre scal</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">huldeo th&icirc;naro<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi he{b}enr&icirc;keas,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5015</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">theoden, tholoian,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>than ni tharf mi thes &ecirc;nig thanc uuesan,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">lio{b}o drohtin,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[that] ik io te thesumu liohte quam.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Ni bium ik nu thes uuir{d}ig,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uualdand fr&ocirc; m&icirc;n,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that ik under th&icirc;ne iungaron<span class="f_canusg">| </span>gangan m&ocirc;ti,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thus sundig under th&icirc;ne ges&icirc;{d}os:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ik iro sel{b}o scal</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5020</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">m&icirc;{d}an an m&icirc;numu m&ocirc;de,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>nu ik mi sulic m&ecirc;n gesprac.&raquo;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">S&ocirc; gornode<span class="f_canusg">| </span>gumono bezta,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hrau [im] s&ocirc; hardo,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that [he] habde is h&ecirc;rren th&ocirc;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">leo{b}es farl&ocirc;gnid.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Than ni thur{b}un thes liudio barn,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uueros uundroian,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>behu&icirc; it uueldi god,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5025</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that s&ocirc; lio{b}en man<span class="f_canusg">| </span>l&ecirc;{d} gist&ocirc;di,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that he s&ocirc; h&ocirc;nl&icirc;co<span class="f_canusg">| </span>h&ecirc;rron s&icirc;nes</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thurh thera [thiuun] uuord,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thegno snellost,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">farl&ocirc;gnide s&ocirc; lio{b}es:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>it uuas al bi thesun liudiun giduan,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">firiho barnun te [frumu.]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>He uuelde ina te furiston d&ocirc;an,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5030</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;rost o{b}ar is h&icirc;uuiski,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>h&ecirc;lag drohtin:</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">l&ecirc;t ina gekunnon,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>huilike craft ha{b}et</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">the mennisca m&ocirc;d<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&acirc;no [the] maht godes;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">l&ecirc;t ina gesundion,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that he s&icirc;{d}or thiu bet</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">liudiun gil&ocirc;{b}di,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>hu&ocirc; liof is [thar]</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5035</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">manno [gihuilicumu,]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>than he m&ecirc;n gefrumit,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that man ina al&acirc;te<span class="f_canusg">| </span>l&ecirc;{d}es thinges,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sacono endi sundeono,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; im th&ocirc; sel{b}o dede</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[he{b}enr&icirc;ki] god<span class="f_canusg">| </span>harmgeuurhti.</h3>
   </td>
  </tr>

<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;"><span class="f_ruberi">B</span>e thiu [nis] mannes b&acirc;g<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[mikilun bither{b}i,]</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5040</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[hagustaldes] hr&ocirc;m:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ef imu thiu helpe godes</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gesu&icirc;kid thurh is [sundeo,]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>than is imu s&acirc;n aftar thiu</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">breosthugi bl&ocirc;{d}ora,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thoh he &ecirc;r bih&ecirc;t spreca,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hr&ocirc;mie fan is [hildi]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi fan is handcrafti,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">the man fan is megine.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>That uuar{d} thar an themu m&acirc;reon sk&icirc;n,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5045</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thegno bezton,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>th&ocirc; imu is thiodanes gisu&ecirc;k</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;lag helpe.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Bethiu ni scoldi hr&ocirc;mien man</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">te su&icirc;{d}o fan imu sel{b}on,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>huand imu thar su&icirc;kid oft</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&acirc;n endi uuilleo,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ef imu uualdand god,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;r he{b}enkuning<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[herte] ni sterkit.</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5050</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Than b&ecirc;d allaro barno bezt,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>bendi tholode</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thurh mancunni.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Huur{b}un ina managa umbi</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[Iudeono] liudi,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>spr&acirc;cun gelp mikil,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hafdun ina te hosca,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thar he giheftid st&ocirc;d,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">tholode [gethuldiun,]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; huat s&ocirc; imu thiu thiod deda,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5055</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">liudi l&ecirc;{d}es.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; uuar{d} eft lioht cuman,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">morgan te mannun.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Manag samnoda</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">heri Iudeono:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>habdun im hugi uul{b}o,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">inuuid an innan.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Uuar{d} thar &ecirc;osago</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an morgant&icirc;d<span class="f_canusg">| </span>manag gisamnod</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5060</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">irri endi &ecirc;nhard,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>inuuideas gern,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uur&ecirc;{d}es uuillean.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Gengun im an huarf samad</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">rinkos an r&ucirc;na,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>bigunnun im r&acirc;dan th&ocirc;,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hu&ocirc; sie [geuu&icirc;sadin]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>mid uu&acirc;rl&ocirc;sun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">mannun [m&ecirc;ngeuuitun]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>an mahtigna Crist</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5065</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">te giseggianne sundea<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thurh is sel{b}es uuord,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that sie ina than te uunderqu&acirc;lu<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uu&ecirc;gean m&ocirc;stin,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ad&ecirc;lien te d&ocirc;{d}e.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Sie ni mahtun an themu dage finden</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&ocirc; uur&ecirc;{d} geuuitscepi,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that sie imu uu&icirc;ti bethiu</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ad&ecirc;lien [gidorstin]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>eftha d&ocirc;{d} frummien,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5070</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">l&icirc;{b}u bil&ocirc;sien.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; qu&acirc;mun thar at laztan for{d}</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an thena huarf uuero<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uu&acirc;rl&ocirc;se man</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">tu&ecirc;ne gangan<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi bigunnun im tellien an,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">qu&acirc;{d}un that sie ina sel{b}on<span class="f_canusg">| </span>seggian gih&ocirc;rdin,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that he mahti teuuerpen<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thena uu&icirc;h godes,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5075</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">allaro h&ucirc;so h&ocirc;host<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi thurh is handmegin,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thurh is &ecirc;nes craft<span class="f_canusg">| </span>up arihtien</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an thriddion daga,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; is [elcor] ni thorfti beth&icirc;han man.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">He thagoda endi tholoda:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ni sprak imu io thiu thiod s&ocirc; filu,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thea liudi mid luginun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that he it mid l&ecirc;{d}un angegin</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5080</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuordun uur&acirc;chi.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; thar undar themu uuerode ar&ecirc;s</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">baluhugdig man,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>biscop thero liudio,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">the furisto thes folkes<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi fr&acirc;gode Krist</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">iac ina be imu sel{b}on bisu&ocirc;r<span class="f_canusg">| </span>su&icirc;{d}on &ecirc;{d}un,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gr&ocirc;tte ina an godes namon<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi gerno bad,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5085</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that he im that gisagdi,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ef he sunu uu&acirc;ri</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thes libbiendies [godes]:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;thes thit lioht gesc&ocirc;p,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Krist cuning &ecirc;uuig.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Uui ni mugun is antkiennien uuiht</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ne an th&icirc;nun uuordun ni an th&icirc;nun uuerkun.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; sprak imu eft the uu&acirc;ro angegin,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">the g&ocirc;do godes sunu:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;thu qui{d}is it for thesun Iudeon nu,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5090</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&ocirc;{d}l&icirc;co segis,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that ik it sel{b}o bium.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Thes ni gil&ocirc;{b}iad mi these liudi:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ni uuilliad mi forl&acirc;tan bethiu;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ni sind im m&icirc;n uuord uuir{d}ig.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Nu seggiu ik iu te uu&acirc;run thoh,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that gi noh sculun sittien gisehan<span class="f_canusg">| </span>an [the] su&icirc;{d}aron half godes</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">m&acirc;rean mannes sunu,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>an megincrafte</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5095</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thes alouualden fader,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi thanan eft kuman</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an himiluuolcnun herod<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi allumu heli{d}o cunnie</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">mid is uuordun ad&ecirc;lien,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>al s&ocirc; iro geuurhti sind.&raquo;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Tho balg ina [the] biscop,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>habde bittren hugi,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uur&ecirc;{d}ida [uui{d}] themu [uuorde]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi is giuu&acirc;di sl&ecirc;t,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5100</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">brak for is breostun:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;nu ni thur{b}un gi b&icirc;dan leng&raquo;, qua{d} he,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;thit uuerod geuuitscepies,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>nu im [sulic] uuord farad,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">m&ecirc;nspr&acirc;ca fan is m&ucirc;{d}e.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>That gih&ocirc;rid [h&ecirc;r nu] manno filu,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">rinko an thesumu rakude,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that he ina s&ocirc; r&icirc;kean telit,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gihid that he god s&icirc;.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Huat uuilliad gi Iudeon thes</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5105</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ad&ecirc;lien te d&ocirc;me?<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Is he d&ocirc;{d}es [nu]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuir{d}ig be sulicun uuordun?&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span></h3>
   </td>
  </tr>
</table>

<h2>Fitte LXI</h2>
