  <tr>
	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="50"><h6>&nbsp;</h6></td>
	<td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;">
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:200px;"><span class="f_canusg">| </span><span class="f_ruberi">T</span>hat uuerod al gesprac,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">folc Iudeono,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that he uu&acirc;ri [thes] ferhes scolo,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&icirc;ties s&ocirc; uuir{d}ig.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Ni uuas it thoh be is geuurhtiun gid&ocirc;en,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that ine thar an Hierusalem<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Iudeo liudi,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5110</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sunu drohtines<span class="f_canusg">| </span>sundea l&ocirc;sen</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ad&ecirc;ldun te d&ocirc;{d}e.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; uuas thero d&acirc;dio hr&ocirc;m</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Iudeo liudiun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>huat sie themu godes [barne mahtin]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[s&ocirc; haftemu] m&ecirc;st,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>harmes gefrummien.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Beuurpun ina th&ocirc; mid [uuerodu]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi ina an is uuangon sl&ocirc;gun,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5115</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an is hleor mid iro handun<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ndash; al uuas imu that te hosce gid&ocirc;en &ndash;,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">felgidun imu firinuuord<span class="f_canusg">| </span>f&icirc;undo menegi,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">bismerspr&acirc;ka.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>St&ocirc;d that barn godes</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fast under f&icirc;undun:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uu&acirc;run imu [is] fa{d}mos gebundene,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[tholode] githuldiun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; huat s&ocirc; imu thiu [thioda] t&ocirc;</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5120</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">bittres br&acirc;hte:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ni balg ina neouuiht</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uui{d} thes uuerodes geuuin.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; n&acirc;mon ina uur&ecirc;{d}e man</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&ocirc; gibundanan,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that barn godes,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">endi ina th&ocirc; l&ecirc;ddun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thar [thero] liudio uuas,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">there thiade thingh&ucirc;s.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thar thegan manag</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5125</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">huur{b}un umbi iro heritogon.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thar uuas iro h&ecirc;rron bodo</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fan R&ucirc;muburg,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thes the th&ocirc; thes r&icirc;keas giuueld:</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">kumen uuas he fan themu k&ecirc;sure,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>gisendid uuas he undar that cunni Iudeono</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">te rihtiene that r&icirc;ki,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuas thar r&acirc;dge{b}o:</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Pilatus uuas he h&ecirc;ten;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>he uuas fan Ponteo lande</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5130</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">cn&ocirc;sles kennit.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Habde imu craft mikil,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an themu thingh&ucirc;se<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[thiod] gisamnod,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an huarf uueros;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uu&acirc;rl&ocirc;se man</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ag&acirc;{b}un th&ocirc; thena godes sunu,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Iudeo liudi,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">under f&icirc;undo folc,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>qu&acirc;{d}un that he uu&acirc;ri thes ferhes scolo,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5135</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that man ina uu&icirc;tnodi<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uu&acirc;pnes eggiun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">scarpun sc&ucirc;run.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[Ni] uuelde thiu scole Iudeono</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thringan an that thingh&ucirc;s,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ac thiu thiod &ucirc;te st&ocirc;d,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">mahlidun thanen uui{d} thea menegi:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ni uueldun an that gimang faren,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[an] elilandige man,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that sie thar unreht uuord,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5140</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an themu dage der{b}ies uuiht<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ad&ecirc;lian ne gih&ocirc;rdin,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ac qu&acirc;{d}un that sie [im] s&ocirc; [hluttro<span class="f_canusg">| </span>h&ecirc;laga t&icirc;di],</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[uueldin iro pascha halden].<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Pilatus antfeng</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">at them uuamsca{d}un<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uualdandes barn,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sundea l&ocirc;sen.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; an sorgun uuar{d}</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5145</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Iudases hugi,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>th&ocirc; he age{b}an gisah</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">is drohtin te d&ocirc;{d}e,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>th&ocirc; bigan imu thiu d&acirc;d aftar thiu</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an is hugea hreuuan,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that he habde is h&ecirc;rron &ecirc;r</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[sundea l&ocirc;sen] gisald.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Nam imu th&ocirc; [that] silu{b}ar an hand,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thr&icirc;tig scatto,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that man imu &ecirc;r uui{d} is thiodane gaf,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5150</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">geng imu th&ocirc; te them Iudiun<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi im is grimmon d&acirc;d,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sundeon sagde,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi im that silu{b}ar b&ocirc;d</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gerno te [age{b}anne:]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;ik hebbiu it s&ocirc; griol&icirc;co&raquo;, qua{d} he,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;[mines] drohtines<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[dr&ocirc;ru] gic&ocirc;pot,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&ocirc; ik uu&ecirc;t that it mi ni th&icirc;hit.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thiod Iudeono</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5155</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ni uueldun it th&ocirc; antf&acirc;han,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ac h&ecirc;tun ina for{d} aftar thiu</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">umbi sulica sundea<span class="f_canusg">| </span>sel{b}on ahton,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">huat he uui{d} is fr&acirc;hon<span class="f_canusg">| </span>gefrumid habdi:</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;thu s&acirc;hi thi [sel{b}o thes&raquo;,] qua{d}un sie;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;huat uuili thu thes [nu] s&ocirc;ken te &ucirc;s?</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Ne uu&icirc;t thu that thesumu uuerode!&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; giuu&ecirc;t imu eft thanan</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5160</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Iudas gangan<span class="f_canusg">| </span>te themu godes uu&icirc;he</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">su&icirc;{d}o an sorgun<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi that silu{b}ar uuarp</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an thena alah innan,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ne gidorste it &ecirc;gan leng;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">f&ocirc;r imu th&ocirc; s&ocirc; an forhtun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; ina f&icirc;undo barn</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">m&ocirc;dage manodun:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>habdun [thes] mannes hugi</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5165</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gramon under[gripanen],<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuas imu god abolgan,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that he imu sel{b}on th&ocirc;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&icirc;mon uuarhte,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hn&ecirc;g th&ocirc; an herus&ecirc;l<span class="f_canusg">| </span>an hinginna,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuarag an uurgil<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi uu&icirc;ti gec&ocirc;s,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hard [hellie gethuing,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>h&ecirc;t] endi thiustri,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5170</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">diap d&ocirc;{d}es dalu,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>huand he &ecirc;r umbi is drohtin su&ecirc;k.</h3>
   </td>
  </tr>
</table>
</div>

BIBLIOTHECA AUGUSTANA

<div class="titulus2">
<p>Heliand</p>
<p>um 830</p>
</div>
<!--  finis tituli  -->

<!-- contentus -->
<div class="contentus">
<table width="650" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
  <tr>
	<td width="50">&nbsp;</td>
	<td  width="600">
<h1>Heliand</h1>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h2>Fitte LXII</h2>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="650" colspan="2" >
<p style="color:#996699;">______________________________________________________________________________</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="50"><h6>&nbsp;</h6></td>
	<td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;">
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;"><span class="f_ruberi">T</span>han b&ecirc;d that barn godes<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ndash; bendi tholode</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an themu thingh&ucirc;se &ndash;,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>huan &ecirc;r thiu thiod under im,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">erlos &ecirc;nuuordie<span class="f_canusg">| </span>alle uur{d}in,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">huat sie imu [than] te ferahqu&acirc;lu<span class="f_canusg">| </span>frummian uueldin.</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5175</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Th&ocirc; thar an them benkiun ar&ecirc;s<span class="f_canusg">| </span>bodo k&ecirc;sures</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fan R&ucirc;muburg<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi geng imu uui{d} that r&icirc;ki Iudeono</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">m&ocirc;dag mahlien,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thar thiu menigi st&ocirc;d</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">aftar themu ho{b}e huar{b}on:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ni uueldun an that h&ucirc;s kuman</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an themu paschadage.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Pilatus bigan</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5180</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fr&ocirc;kno fr&acirc;gon<span class="f_canusg">| </span>o{b}ar that folc Iudeono,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">mid huiu the man habdi<span class="f_canusg">| </span>mor{d}es gisculdit,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&icirc;ties giuuerkot:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;be hu&icirc; gi imu s&ocirc; uur&ecirc;{d}e sind,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an iuuuomu hugea h&ocirc;tie?&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Sie qu&acirc;{d}un that he im habdi harmes s&ocirc; filu,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">l&ecirc;{d}es gil&ecirc;stid:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;ni g&acirc;{b}in ina thesa liudi thi,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5185</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thar sie ina &ecirc;r biforan<span class="f_canusg">| </span>u{b}ilan ni uuissin,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuordun faruuarhten.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>He ha{b}at theses uuerodes s&ocirc; filu</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">farl&ecirc;did mid is l&ecirc;run<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ndash; endi thesa liudi merrid,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">d&ocirc;it im iro hugi tu&icirc;flien &ndash;,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that uui ni m&ocirc;tun te themu ho{b}e k&ecirc;sures</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">tinsi gelden;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that mugun uui ina gitellien an</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5190</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">mid uu&acirc;ru geuuitscepi.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>He sprikid &ocirc;k uuord mikil,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">qui{d}it that he Crist s&icirc;,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>kuning o{b}ar thit r&icirc;ki,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">begihit ina s&ocirc; gr&ocirc;tes.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; im [eft] tegegnes sprak</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">bodo k&ecirc;sures:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;ef he s&ocirc; barl&icirc;co&raquo;, qua{d} he,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;under thesaru menigi<span class="f_canusg">| </span>m&ecirc;nuuerk frumid,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5195</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">antf&acirc;had ina than eft under iuuue folcscepi,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ef he s&icirc; is ferhes scolo,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">endi imu s&ocirc; ad&ecirc;liad,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ef he s&icirc; d&ocirc;{d}es uuer{d},</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&ocirc; it an iuuuaro aldrono<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ecirc;o gebiode.&raquo;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Sie qu&acirc;{d}un th&ocirc;, that sie ni m&ocirc;stin<span class="f_canusg">| </span>manno nig&ecirc;numu</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an [thea] h&ecirc;lagon t&icirc;d<span class="f_canusg">| </span>te [handbanon],</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5200</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[uuer{d}en mid uu&acirc;pnun<span class="f_canusg">| </span>an themu uu&icirc;hdage.]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Th&ocirc; uuende ina fan themu uuerode<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uur&ecirc;{d}hugdig man,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thegan k&ecirc;sures,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[the] o{b}ar thea thioda uuas</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">bodo fan [R&ucirc;muburg] &ndash;:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>h&ecirc;t imu th&ocirc; that barn godes</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">n&acirc;hor gangan<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi [ina] niudl&icirc;co,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5205</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fr&acirc;goda fr&ocirc;kno,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ef he o{b}ar that folc kuning</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thes uuerodes uu&acirc;ri.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; habde eft is uuord garu</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sunu drohtines:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;hue{d}er thu that fan thi sel{b}umu sprikis&raquo;, qua{d} he,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;the it thi &ocirc;{d}re h&ecirc;r<span class="f_canusg">| </span>erlos sagdun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">qu&acirc;{d}un umbi m&icirc;nan kuningduom?&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; sprak eft [the] k&ecirc;sures bodo</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5210</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uulank endi uur&ecirc;{d}m&ocirc;d,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thar he uui{d} uualdand Krist</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">re{d}iode an them rakude:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;ni bium ik theses r&icirc;kies hinan&raquo;, qua{d} he,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;Giudeo liudio,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ni gadoling th&icirc;n,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thesaro manno m&acirc;guuini,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ac mi thi thius menigi bifalah,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ag&acirc;{b}un thi th&icirc;na gadulingos [mi],<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Iudeo liudi,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5215</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[haftan] te handun.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Huat ha{b}as thu harmes giduan,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that thu s&ocirc; [bittro] scalt<span class="f_canusg">| </span>bendi tholoian,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">qualm undar th&icirc;numu kunnie?&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; sprak [imu eft Krist] angegin,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;lendero bezt,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thar he giheftid st&ocirc;d</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an themu rakude innan:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;nis m&icirc;n r&icirc;ki hinan&raquo;, qua{d} he,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5220</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;fan thesaru uueroldstundu.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Ef it [thoh] uu&acirc;ri s&ocirc;,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">than uu&acirc;rin s&ocirc; starkm&ocirc;de<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uui{d}er str&icirc;dhugi,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uui{d}er grama thioda<span class="f_canusg">| </span>iungaron m&icirc;ne,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&ocirc; man mi ni g&acirc;{b}i<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Iudeo liudiun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hettendiun an hand<span class="f_canusg">| </span>an herubendiun</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5225</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">te uu&ecirc;geanne te uundrun.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Te thiu uuar{d} ik an thesaru uueroldi giboran,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that ik geuuitscepi [giu]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uu&acirc;res thinges</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">mid m&icirc;nun kumiun k&ucirc;{d}di.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>That mugun antkennien uuel</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">the uueros, the sind fan uu&acirc;re kumane:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>the mugun m&icirc;n uuord farstanden,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gil&ocirc;{b}ien m&icirc;nun l&ecirc;run.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; ni mahte lasteres uuiht</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5230</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an them barne godes<span class="f_canusg">| </span>bodo k&ecirc;sures,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">findan [f&ecirc;knea] uuord,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that he is ferhes bethiu</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sculdig uu&acirc;ri.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; geng he im eft uui{d} thea scola Iudeono</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">m&ocirc;dag mahlien<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi theru menigi sagde</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">o{b}ar hlust mikil,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that he an themu hafton manne</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5235</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sulica firinspr&acirc;ka<span class="f_canusg">| </span>finden ni mahti</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[for them folcscipie],<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; he uu&acirc;ri is ferhes scolo,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">d&ocirc;{d}es uuir{d}ig.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Than st&ocirc;dun dolm&ocirc;de</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Iudeo liudi<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi thane godes sunu</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuordun uur&ocirc;gdun:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>qu&acirc;{d}un that he giuuer &ecirc;rist</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5240</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">begunni an [Galileo lande,]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;endi o{b}ar Iudeon f&ocirc;r</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">heroduuardes thanan,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>hugi tu&icirc;flode,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">manno m&ocirc;dse{b}on,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; he is mor{d}es uuer{d},</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that man ina [uu&icirc;tnoie]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uu&acirc;pnes eggiun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ef eo [man] mid sulicun d&acirc;diun mag<span class="f_canusg">| </span>d&ocirc;{d}es gesculdien.&raquo;</h3>
   </td>
  </tr>
</table>
</div>

<h1>Heliand</h1>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h2>Fitte LXIII</h2>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="650" colspan="2" >

    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="50"><h6>5245</h6></td>
	<td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;">
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;"><span class="f_ruberi">S</span>&ocirc; uur&ocirc;gdun ina mid uuordun<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuerod Iudeono</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thurh h&ocirc;tean hugi.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Th&ocirc; the heritogo,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sl&icirc;{d}m&ocirc;dig man<span class="f_canusg">| </span>seggian gih&ocirc;rde,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fan huilicumu kunnie [uuas]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Krist af&ocirc;did,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">manno the bezto:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>he uuas fan theru m&acirc;rean thiadu,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5250</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">the [g&ocirc;do] fan [Galilealande;]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thar uuas gumscepi</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">e{d}iliero manno;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Erodes biheld [thar]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">craftagne kuningd&ocirc;m,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; ina imu the k&ecirc;sur [fargaf],</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">the r&icirc;keo fan R&ucirc;mu,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that he thar rehto gehuilic</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gefrumidi undar themu folke<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi fri{d}u l&ecirc;sti,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5255</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">d&ocirc;mos ad&ecirc;ldi.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>He uuas &ocirc;k an themu dage sel{b}o</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an Hierusalem<span class="f_canusg">| </span>mid is gumscepi,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">mid is uuerode [at] themu uu&icirc;he:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; uuas iro uu&icirc;se than,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that sie thar [thia h&ecirc;lagun t&icirc;d<span class="f_canusg">| </span>haldan] scoldun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">pascha Iudeono.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Pilatus gib&ocirc;d th&ocirc;,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5260</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that thena hafton man<span class="f_canusg">| </span>heli{d}os n&acirc;min</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&ocirc; gibundanan,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that barn godes,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[h&ecirc;t] that sie ina Erodese,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>erlos br&acirc;htin</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">haften te handun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>huand he fan is heriscepi uuas,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fan is uuerodes geuuald.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Uu&icirc;gand frumidun</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5265</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">iro h&ecirc;rron uuord:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>h&ecirc;lagne Krist</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">f&ocirc;rdun an fiteriun<span class="f_canusg">| </span>for thena folctogun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">allaro barno bezt,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thero the io giboren uur{d}i</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an liudio lioht;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>an li{d}ubendiun geng,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">antat sie ina br&acirc;htun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thar he an is benkia sat,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5270</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">cuning Erodes:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>umbihuarf ina craft uuero,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[uulanke uu&icirc;gandos]:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuas im uuilleo mikil,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that [sie] thar [sel{b}on] Crist<span class="f_canusg">| </span>gisehan m&ocirc;stin:</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&acirc;ndun that he im sum t&ecirc;kan thar<span class="f_canusg">| </span>t&ocirc;gean scoldi,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">m&acirc;ri endi mahtig,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; he managun dede</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5275</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thurh is godcundi<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Iudeo liudeon.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Fr&acirc;goda ina thuo thie folccuning<span class="f_canusg">| </span>firiuuitl&icirc;co</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">managon uuordon,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuolda is muodse{b}on</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">for{d} undarfindan,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>huat hie te frumu mohti</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">mannon gimarcon.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Than stuod mahtig Crist,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5280</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thagoda endi tholoda:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ne uuolda them thiedcuninge,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Erodese ne is erlon<span class="f_canusg">| </span>antsu&ocirc;r ge{b}an</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuordo nig&ecirc;non.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Than stuod thiu uur&ecirc;{d}a thiod,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Iudeo liudi<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi thena godes suno</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuurrun endi uuruogdun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>anthat im uuar{d} thie uueroldcuning</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5285</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an is huge huoti<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi all is heriscipi,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">farmuonstun ina an iro muode:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ne antkendun maht godes,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">himiliscan h&ecirc;rron,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ac uuas im iro hugi thiustri,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">baluuues giblandan.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Barn drohtines</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">iro [uur&ecirc;{d}un] uuerc,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuord endi d&acirc;di</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5290</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thuru &ocirc;muodi<span class="f_canusg">| </span>all githoloda,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&ocirc; huat s&ocirc; sia im tionono [thuo]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>tuogian uuoldun.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Sia hietun im thuo te hoske<span class="f_canusg">| </span>hu&icirc;t giuu&acirc;di</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">umbi is li{d}i leggian,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thiu m&ecirc;r hie uur{d}i them liudion thar,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[iungron] te gamne.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Iudeon faganodun,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5295</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thuo sia ina te hosce<span class="f_canusg">| </span>hebbian gis&acirc;hun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">erlos o{b}armuoda.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thuo senda ina eft thanan</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Erodes se cuning<span class="f_canusg">| </span>an that &ocirc;{d}er folc;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[al&ecirc;dian] hiet ina lungra mann,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi lastar spr&acirc;cun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[felgidun] im firinuuord,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thar hie an feteron geng</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5300</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">bihlagan mid hoscu:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ni uuas im hugi tu&icirc;fli,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ne{b}a hie it thuru &ocirc;dmuodi<span class="f_canusg">| </span>all githoloda;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ne uuelda iro u{b}ilun uuord<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[idugl&ocirc;non],</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hosc endi harmquidi.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thuo br&acirc;htun sia ina eft an that h&ucirc;s innan,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an thia palencea uppan,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thar Pilatus uuas</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5305</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an thero thingstedi.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thegnos ag&acirc;{b}un</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">barno that besta<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[banon] te handon</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sundil&ocirc;sian,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; hie sel{b}o gic&ocirc;s:</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuelda manno barn<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[mor{d}es] atuomian,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">nerian af n&ocirc;di.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Stuodun n&icirc;{d}huata,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5310</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Iudeon far them gastselie:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>habdun sia [gramono] barn,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thia scola farscundid,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that sia ne bescri{b}un iouuiht</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">grimmera d&acirc;dio.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thuo giuu&ecirc;t im gangan tharod</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thegan k&ecirc;sures<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uui{d} thia thiod sprecan,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hard heritogo:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;huat, gi mi thesan haftan mann&raquo;, quathie,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5315</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;an thesan seli sendun<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi sel{b}on anbudun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that hie iuuues uuerodes s&ocirc; filo<span class="f_canusg">| </span>auuerdit habdi,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">farl&ecirc;did mid is l&ecirc;ron.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Nu ik mid theson liudon ni mag,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">findan mid thius folku,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that hie is ferahes s&icirc;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">furi thesaro scolu sculdig.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Sc&icirc;n uuas that hiudu:</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5320</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Erodes mohta,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thie iuuuan &ecirc;o bican,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">iuuuaro liudo landreht,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>hie ni mahta is l&icirc;{b}es gifr&ecirc;son,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that hie hier thuru &ecirc;niga sundia te dage<span class="f_canusg">| </span>sueltan scoldi,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">l&icirc;f farl&acirc;tan.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Nu uuilliu ik ina for theson liudion hier</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">githr&ocirc;on mid thingon,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thr&icirc;stion uuordun,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5325</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">buotian im is briosthugi,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>l&acirc;tan ina br&ucirc;can for{d}</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ferahes [mid] firion.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Folc Iudeono</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hreopun thuo alla samad<span class="f_canusg">| </span>hl&ucirc;dero stemnu,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hietun fl&icirc;tl&icirc;co<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ferahes &acirc;htian</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Crist mid qualmu<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi an cr&ucirc;ci slahan,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5330</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&ecirc;gian te uuundron:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;hie mid is uuordon ha{b}it</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">d&ocirc;{d}es gisculdid:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>sagit that hie drohtin s&icirc;,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gegnungo godes suno.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>That hie ageldan scal,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">inuuidspr&acirc;ca,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; is an &ucirc;son &ecirc;uue giscri{b}an,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that man sulica firinquidi<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ferahu c&ocirc;po.&raquo;</h3>
   </td>
  </tr>

<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h2>Fitte LXIV</h2>
<p>&nbsp;</p>

  <tr>
	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="50"><h6>5335</h6></td>
	<td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;">
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;"><span class="f_ruberi">T</span>huo uuar{d} thie an forahton,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thie thes folkes giuueld,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">mikilon an is muode,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thuo hie gih&ocirc;rda thia man sprecan,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that sia ina sel{b}on<span class="f_canusg">| </span>seggian gih&ocirc;rdin,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gehan fur them gumscipe,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that hie uu&acirc;ri godes suno.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Thuo huarf im eft thie heritogo<span class="f_canusg">| </span>an that h&ucirc;s innan</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5340</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">te thero thingstedi,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thr&icirc;stion uuordon</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gruotta thena godes suno<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi fr&acirc;goda, huat hie gumono uu&acirc;ri:</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;huat bist thu manno?&raquo; quathie.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;Te hu&icirc; thu mi s&ocirc; th&icirc;nan muod hilis,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">dernis diopgith&acirc;ht?<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Uu&ecirc;st thu that it all an m&icirc;non duome st&ecirc;d</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">umbi th&icirc;nes l&icirc;{b}es gilagu?<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Mi [thi] hebbiat thesa liudi farge{b}an,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5345</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuerod Iudeono,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thak ik giuualdan muot</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&ocirc; thik te spildianne<span class="f_canusg">| </span>an speres orde,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&ocirc; ti quellianne an cr&ucirc;cium,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; quican l&acirc;tan,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&ocirc; hue{d}er s&ocirc; mi sel{b}on<span class="f_canusg">| </span>suotera thunkit</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">te gifrummianne mid m&icirc;nu folcu.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thuo sprac eft that fri{d}ubarn godes:</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5350</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;uu&ecirc;st thu that te uu&acirc;ron&raquo;, quathie,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;that thu giuuald o{b}ar mik</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hebbian ni mohtis,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ne uu&acirc;ri that it thi h&ecirc;lag god</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sel{b}o farg&acirc;{b}i?<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&Ocirc;c hebbeat thia sundeono m&ecirc;r,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thia mik thi bifulhun<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thuru f&icirc;ondscipi,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gisaldun an s&icirc;mon haftan.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thuo uuelda ina [s&icirc;{d}] after thiu</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5355</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gramh&ucirc;dig man<span class="f_canusg">| </span>gerno farl&acirc;tan,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thegan k&ecirc;sures,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thar hie is ha{b}di for thero thioda giuuald;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ac sia uueridun im thena uuillion<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuordu gihuilicu,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">kunni Iudeono:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;ne bist thu&raquo;, qu&acirc;{d}un sia, &laquo;thes k&ecirc;sures friund,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">th&icirc;non h&ecirc;rren hold,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ef thu ina hinan l&acirc;tis</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5360</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&icirc;{d}on gisundon:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that thi noh te soragan mag,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuer{d}an te uu&icirc;te,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>huand s&ocirc; hue s&ocirc; sulic uuord sprikit,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">aha{b}i{d} ina s&ocirc; h&ocirc;ho,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>qui{d}it that hie hebbian mugi</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">cuningduomes namon,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ne s&icirc; that ina im thie k&ecirc;sur ge{b}e,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hie uuirrid im is uueruldr&icirc;ki<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi is uuord farhugid,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5365</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">farman ina an is muode.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Bethiu scalt thu sulic m&ecirc;n uurekan,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[hoscuuord manag,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ef thu umbi th&icirc;nes h&ecirc;rren ruokis],</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">umbi th&icirc;nes fr&ocirc;hon friundscipi,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>than scalt thu ina thiu ferhu beniman.&raquo;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Thuo gih&ocirc;rda thie heritogo<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thia hieri Iu{d}eono</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thr&ecirc;gian [far is] thiodne;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thuo hie [far] thero thingstedi geng</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5370</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sel{b}o gisittian,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thar gisamnod [uuas]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[s&ocirc; mikil huarf] uuerodes,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>hiet uualdand Crist</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">l&ecirc;dian for thia liudi.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Langoda Iudeon,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">huan &ecirc;r sia that h&ecirc;laga barn<span class="f_canusg">| </span>hangon gis&acirc;uuin,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">quelan an cr&ucirc;cie;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>sia qu&acirc;{d}un that sia cuning &ocirc;{d}ran</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5375</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ne ha{b}din undar iro heriscipie,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ne{b}an thena h&ecirc;ran k&ecirc;sar</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fan R&ucirc;muburg:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;thie ha{b}it hier r&icirc;ki o{b}er &ucirc;s.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Bethiu ni scalt thu thesan farl&acirc;tan;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>hie ha{b}it &ucirc;s s&ocirc; filo l&ecirc;{d}es gisprokan,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">farduan ha{b}it hie im mid is d&acirc;dion.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Hie scal d&ocirc;{d} tholon,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&icirc;ti endi uundarqu&acirc;la.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Uuerod Iudeono</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5380</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&ocirc; manag misl&icirc;c thing<span class="f_canusg">| </span>an mahtigna Crist</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sagdun te sundiun.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Hie su&icirc;gondi stuod</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thuru &ocirc;{d}muodi,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ne antuuordida [niouuiht]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uui{d} iro uur&ecirc;{d}un uuord:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuolda thesa uuerold alla</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">l&ocirc;sian mid is l&icirc;{b}u:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>bithiu liet hie ina thia l&ecirc;{d}un thiod</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5385</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&ecirc;gian te uundron,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>all s&ocirc; iro uuillio geng:</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ni uuolda im opanl&icirc;co<span class="f_canusg">| </span>allon c&ucirc;{d}ian</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Iudeo liudeon,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that hie uuas god sel{b}o;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">huand uuissin sia that te uu&acirc;ron,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that hie sulica giuuald ha{b}di</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">o{b}ar theson middilgard,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>than uur{d}i im iro muodse{b}o</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5390</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gibl&ocirc;{d}it an iro brioston:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thann ne gidorstin sia that barn godes</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">handon anthr&icirc;nan:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thann ni uuur{d}i he{b}anr&icirc;ki,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">antlocan liohto m&ecirc;st<span class="f_canusg">| </span>liudio barnon.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Bethiu m&ecirc;{d} hie is s&ocirc; an is muode,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ne l&ecirc;t that manno folc</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuitan, huat sia uuarahtun.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thiu uurd n&acirc;hida thuo,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5395</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">m&acirc;ri maht godes<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi middi dag,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that sia thia ferahqu&acirc;la<span class="f_canusg">| </span>frummian scoldun.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Than lag thar &ocirc;c an bendion<span class="f_canusg">| </span>an thero burg innan</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&ecirc;n ruof reginsca{d}o,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thie habda under them r&icirc;ke s&ocirc; filo</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">mor{d}es gir&acirc;dan<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi manslahta gifrumid,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5400</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuas m&acirc;ri meginthiof:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ni uuas thar is gimaco huergin;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuas thar &ocirc;c bi [s&icirc;non<span class="f_canusg">| </span>sundion] giheftid,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Barrabas uuas hie h&ecirc;tan;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>hie after them burgion uuas</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thuru is m&ecirc;nd&acirc;di<span class="f_canusg">| </span>manogon gic&ucirc;{d}id.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Than uuas landuu&icirc;sa<span class="f_canusg">| </span>liudio Iudeono,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5405</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that sia i&acirc;ro gihuem<span class="f_canusg">| </span>an godes minnia</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an them h&ecirc;lagon dage<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ecirc;nna haftan mann</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">abiddian scoldun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that im iro burges uuard,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">iro folctogo<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ferah farg&acirc;{b}i.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Thuo bigan thie heritogo<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thia h&ecirc;ri Iudeono,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5410</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that folc fr&acirc;goian,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thar sia im fora stuodun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hue{d}eron sia thero tueio<span class="f_canusg">| </span>tuomian uueldin,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ferahes biddian:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;thia hier an feteron sind</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">haft undar theson heriscipie?&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thiu h&ecirc;ri Iudeono</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">habdun thuo thia aramun man<span class="f_canusg">| </span>alla gispanana,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5415</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that sia themo landsca{d}en<span class="f_canusg">| </span>l&icirc;f ab&acirc;din,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">githingodin them thio{b}e,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thie oft an thiustria naht</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuam giuuarahta,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi uualdand Crist</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">quelidin an cr&ucirc;cie.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thuo uuar{d} that c&ucirc;{d} o{b}ar all,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[hu&ocirc; thiu thiod ha{b}da duomos ad&ecirc;lid.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thuo scoldun sia thia d&acirc;d frummian,]</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5420</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[h&acirc;han] that h&ecirc;laga barn.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>That uuar{d} them heritogen</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&icirc;{d}or te sorgon,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that hie thia saca uuissa,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that sia thuru n&icirc;{d}scipi<span class="f_canusg">| </span>neriendon Crist,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hatoda thiu h&ecirc;ri,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi hie im h&ocirc;rda te thiu,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuarahta iro uuillion:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thes hie uu&icirc;ti antfeng,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5425</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">l&ocirc;n an theson liohte<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi lang after,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[uu&ocirc;i s&icirc;{d}or] uuann,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&icirc;{d}or hie thesa uuerold agaf.</h3>
   </td>
  </tr>
</table>

</div>
<div class="titulus1">

</div>
<div class="titulus2">
<p>Heliand</p>
<p>um 830</p>

<div class="contentus">
<table width="650" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
  <tr>
	<td width="50">&nbsp;</td>
	<td  width="600">
<h1>Heliand</h1>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h2>Fitte LXV</h2>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="650" colspan="2" >
<p style="color:#996699;">______________________________________________________________________________</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="50"><h6>&nbsp;</h6></td>
	<td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;">
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;"><span class="f_ruberi">T</span>huo uuar{d} thas thie uur&ecirc;{d}o giuuaro,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuamsca{d}ono m&ecirc;st,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Satanas sel{b}o,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thuo thiu seola quam</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Iudases an grund<span class="f_canusg">| </span>grimmaro helliun &ndash;</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5430</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thuo uuissa hie te uu&acirc;ren,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that that uuas uualdand Crist,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">barn drohtines,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that thar gibundan stuod;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuissa thuo te uu&acirc;ron,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that hie uuelda thesa uuerold alla</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">mid is henginnia<span class="f_canusg">| </span>hellia githuinges,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">liudi al&ocirc;sian<span class="f_canusg">| </span>an lioht godes.</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5435</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">That uuas Satanase<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ecirc;r an muode,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">tulgo harm an is hugie:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuelda is helpan thuo,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that im liudio barn<span class="f_canusg">| </span>l&icirc;f ne bin&acirc;min,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ne quelidin an cr&ucirc;cie,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ac hie uuelda, that hie quic li{b}di,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">te thiu that firio barn<span class="f_canusg">| </span>fernes ne uuur{d}in,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5440</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sundiono sicura.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[Satanas giuu&ecirc;t im thuo,]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thar thes heritogen<span class="f_canusg">| </span>h&icirc;uuiski uuas</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an thero burg innan.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Hie thero is br&ucirc;di bigann,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thera idis opanl&icirc;co<span class="f_canusg">| </span>unhiuri f&icirc;ond</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuunder t&ocirc;gian,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that sia an uuordhelpon</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5445</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Criste uu&acirc;ri,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that hie muosti quicc libbian,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">drohtin manno<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ndash; hie uuas iu than te d&ocirc;{d}e giscerid &ndash;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuissa that te uu&acirc;ron,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that hie im scoldi thia giuuald biniman,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that hie sia o{b}ar thesan middilgard<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; mikila ni ha{b}di,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">o{b}ar uu&icirc;da uuerold.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>That uu&icirc;f uuar{d} thuo an forahton,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5450</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">su&icirc;{d}o an sorogon,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thuo iru thiu gisiuni qu&acirc;mun</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thuru thes dernien [d&acirc;d]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>an dages liohte,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an heli{d}helme bihelid.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thuo siu te iru h&ecirc;rren anb&ocirc;d,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that uu&icirc;f mid iro uuordon<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi im te uu&acirc;ren hiet</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sel{b}on seggian,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>huat iro thar te gisiunion quam</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5455</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thuru thena h&ecirc;lagan mann,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi im helpan bad,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">formon is ferhe:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;ik hebbiu hier s&ocirc; filo thuru ina</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">seldl&icirc;kes giseuuan,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; ik uu&ecirc;t, that thia sundiun sculun</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">allaro erlo gihuem<span class="f_canusg">| </span>u{b}ilo gith&icirc;han,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&ocirc; im fruocno tuo<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ferahes &acirc;hti{d}.&raquo;</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5460</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Thie segg uuar{d} thuo an [s&icirc;{d}e],<span class="f_canusg">| </span>antat hie sittian fand</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thena heritogon<span class="f_canusg">| </span>an huara{b}e innan</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an them st&ecirc;nuuege,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thar thiu str&acirc;ta uuas</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">felison gifuogid.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thar hie te is fr&ocirc;hon geng,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sagda im thes uu&icirc;{b}es uuord.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thuo uuar{d} im [uur&ecirc;{d}] hugi,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5465</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">them heritogen,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ndash; huara{b}oda an innan &ndash;,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gibl&ocirc;{d}it briostgith&acirc;ht:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuas im b&ecirc;{d}ies uu&ecirc;,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gie that sea ina sluogin<span class="f_canusg">| </span>sundia l&ocirc;san,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gie it bi them liudion thuo<span class="f_canusg">| </span>forl&acirc;tan ne gidorsta</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thuru thes uuerodes uuord.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Uuar{d} im giuuendid thuo</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5470</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hugi an herten<span class="f_canusg">| </span>after thero h&ecirc;ri Iudeono,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">te uuerkeanne iro uuillion:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ne uuardoda im nieuuiht</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thia su&acirc;run sundiun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thia hie im thar thuo sel{b}o gideda.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Hiet im thuo te is handon dragan<span class="f_canusg">| </span>hluttran brunnion,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuatar an [uu&ecirc;gie],<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thar hie furi them uuerode sat,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5475</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thu&ocirc;g ina thar for thero thioda<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thegan k&ecirc;sures,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hard heritogo<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi thuo fur thero h&ecirc;ri sprac,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">qua{d} that hie ina thero sundiono thar<span class="f_canusg">| </span>sicoran d&acirc;di,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uur&ecirc;{d}ero uuerco:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;ne uuilliu ik thes uuihtes plegan&raquo;, quathie,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;umbi thesan h&ecirc;lagan mann,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ac [hleotad] gi thes alles,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5480</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gie uuordo gie uuerco,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thes gi im h&ecirc;r te uu&icirc;tie giduan.&raquo;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Thuo hreop all saman<span class="f_canusg">| </span>heriscipi Iudeono,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thiu mikila menigi,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>qu&acirc;{d}un that sia uueldin umbi thena man plegan</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">dera{b}oro d&acirc;dio:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;fare is dr&ocirc;r o{b}ar &ucirc;s,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">is bluod endi is bane{d}i<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi o{b}ar &ucirc;sa barn s&ocirc; samo,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5485</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">o{b}ar &ucirc;sa a{b}aron thar after &ndash;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uui uuilliat is alles plegan&raquo;, qua{d}un sia,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;umbi thena slegi sel{b}on, &ndash;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ef uui thar &ecirc;niga sundia giduan!&raquo;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Age{b}an uuar{d} thar thuo furi them Iudeon<span class="f_canusg">| </span>allaro gumono besta</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hettendion an hand,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>an herubendion</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">narauo gin&ocirc;did,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thar ina n&icirc;{d}huata,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5490</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">f&icirc;ond antfengun:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>folc ina [umbihuarf],</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">m&ecirc;nsca{d}ono megin.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Mahtig drohtin</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">tholoda githuldion,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; huat s&ocirc; im thiu thioda deda.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Sia hietun ina thuo fillian,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ecirc;r than sia im ferahes tuo,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">aldres &acirc;htin,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi im undar is &ocirc;gun spiuuun,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5495</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">dedun im that te hoske,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that sia mid iro handon sl&ocirc;gun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uueros an is uuangun<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi im is giuu&acirc;di bin&acirc;mun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">r&ocirc;{b}odun ina thia [reginsca{d}on],<span class="f_canusg">| </span>r&ocirc;des lacanes</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">dedun im eft &ocirc;{d}er an<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thuru unhuldi;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hietun thuo h&ocirc;{b}idband<span class="f_canusg">| </span>hardaro thorno</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5500</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[uuundron] uuindan<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi an uualdand Crist</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sel{b}on settean,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi gengun im thia gis&icirc;{d}os tuo,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">queddun ina an cuninguu&icirc;su<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi thar an knio fellun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hnigun im mid iro h&ocirc;{b}du:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>all uuas im that te hoske giduan,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thoh hie it all githolodi,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thiodo drohtin,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5505</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[mahtig] thuru thia minnia<span class="f_canusg">| </span>manno cunnies.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Hietun sia thuo uuirkian<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uu&acirc;pnes eggion</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">heli{d}os mid iro handon<span class="f_canusg">| </span>hardes b&ocirc;mes</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[craftiga] cr&ucirc;ci<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi hietun sia Cristan thuo,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&acirc;lig barn godes<span class="f_canusg">| </span>sel{b}on fuorian,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5510</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">dragan hietun sia &ucirc;san drohtin,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thar hie [bedr&ocirc;ragad scolda]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sueltan sundiono l&ocirc;s.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>S&icirc;{d}odun Iudeon,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uueros an uuillon,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>l&ecirc;ddun uualdand Crist,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">drohtin te d&ocirc;{d}e.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thar mohta man thuo dere{b}i thing</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">harml&icirc;c gih&ocirc;rian:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>hio{b}andi thar after</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5515</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gengun uu&icirc;f mid uu&ocirc;pu,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uueros gnornodun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thia fan Galilea<span class="f_canusg">| </span>mid im gangan qu&acirc;mun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">folgodun o{b}ar ferruuegos:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuas im iro fr&ocirc;hon d&ocirc;{d}</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">su&icirc;{d}o an soragan.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thuo hie sel{b}o sprak,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">barno that besta<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi under bac besah,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5520</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hiet that sia ni uu&ecirc;pin:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;ni tharf iu uuiht tregan&raquo;, quathie,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;m&icirc;nero hinferdio,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ac gi mid hofnu mugun</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">iuuua uur&ecirc;{d}an uuerc<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uu&ocirc;pu c&ucirc;mian,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">tornon trahnon.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Noh uuir{d}i{d} thiu t&icirc;d cuman,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that thia [muoder thes]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>mendendia sind,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5525</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">br&ucirc;di Iudeono,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>them gio barn ni uuar{d}</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&ocirc;dan an aldre.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Than gi iuuua inuuid sculun</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">grimmo angeldan;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>than gi s&ocirc; gerna sind,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that iu hier bihl&icirc;dan<span class="f_canusg">| </span>h&ocirc;ha bergos,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">diopo bedel{b}an;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>d&ocirc;{d} uu&acirc;ri iu than allon</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5530</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">lio{b}era an theson lande<span class="f_canusg">| </span>than sulic liudio qualm</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">te githolianne,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; hier than thesaro thioda cumid.&raquo;</h3>
   </td>
  </tr>
</table>

<div class="bibliotheca">

</div>
<div class="titulus1">

<div class="titulus2">
<p>Heliand</p>
<p>um 830</p>
