<!-- contentus -->
<div class="contentus">
<table width="650" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
  <tr>
	<td width="50">&nbsp;</td>
	<td  width="600">
<h1>Heliand</h1>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h2>Fitte LXVI</h2>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="650" colspan="2" >
<p style="color:#996699;">______________________________________________________________________________</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="50"><h6>&nbsp;</h6></td>
	<td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;">
<h4><img src="hel_hf66.jpg" width="350" height="392"></h4>
<h2 style="text-align:center;letter-spacing:0pt;">Kreuzigung (Irland, um 1100)</h2>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;"><span class="f_ruberi">T</span>huo sia thar an griete<span class="f_canusg">| </span>galgon rihtun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an them felde uppan<span class="f_canusg">| </span>folc Iudeono,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">b&ocirc;m an berege,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi thar an that barn godes</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5535</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">quelidun an cr&ucirc;cie:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>sl&ocirc;gun cald &icirc;sarn,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">niuua naglos<span class="f_canusg">| </span>n&icirc;{d}on scarpa</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hardo mid hamuron<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thuru is hendi endi [thuru is] fuoti,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">bittra bendi:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>is bl&ocirc;d ran an er{d}a,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">dr&ocirc;r fan &ucirc;son drohtine.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Hie ni uuelda thoh thia d&acirc;d uurecan</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5540</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">grimma an them Iudeon,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ac hie [thes] god fader</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">mahtigna bad,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that hie ni uu&acirc;ri them manno folke,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">them uuerode thiu [uur&ecirc;{d}ra]:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;huand sia ni uuitun, huat sia [duot]&raquo;, quathie.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Thuo thia uu&icirc;gandos<span class="f_canusg">| </span>giuu&acirc;di Cristes,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[drohtines] d&ecirc;ldun, dere{b}ia [man],<span class="f_canusg">| </span>. . . . .</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5545</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thes r&icirc;ken gir&ocirc;bi.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thia rincos ni mahtun</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">umbi [thena sel{b}on] . . .<span class="f_canusg">| </span>samuuurdi gesprecan,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&ecirc;r sia an iro huara{b}e<span class="f_canusg">| </span>hl&ocirc;tos uuurpun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">huilic iro scoldi hebbian<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thia h&ecirc;lagun p&ecirc;da,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">allaro giuu&acirc;dio uunsamost.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thes uuerodes hirdi</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5550</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hiet thuo, the heritogo,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>o{b}ar them h&ocirc;{b}de [sel{b}es]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[Cristes an] cr&ucirc;ce scr&icirc;{b}an,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that that uu&acirc;ri cuning Iudeono,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Iesus fan Nazarethburh,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thie thar neglid stuod</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an niuuon galgon<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thuru n&icirc;{d}scipi,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an b&ocirc;min treo.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thuo b&acirc;dun thia liudi</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5555</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that uuord uuendian,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>qu&acirc;{d}un that hie im s&ocirc; an is uuilleon spr&acirc;ki,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sel{b}o sagdi,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that hie habdi thes gis&icirc;{d}es giuuald,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">cuning uu&acirc;ri o{b}ar Iudeon.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thuo sprac eft thie k&ecirc;sures bodo,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hard heritogo:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;it ist iu s&ocirc; o{b}ar is h&ocirc;{b}de giscri{b}an,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&icirc;sl&icirc;co giuuritan,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; ik it nu uuendian ni mag.&raquo;</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5560</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">D&acirc;dun thuo thar te uu&icirc;tie<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[uuerod] Iudeono</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">tu&ecirc;na fartalda man<span class="f_canusg">| </span>an tu&acirc; hal{b}a</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Cristes an cr&ucirc;ci:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>lietun sia qualm tholon</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an them uuaragtreuue<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuerco te l&ocirc;ne,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">l&ecirc;{d}aro d&acirc;dio.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thia liudi spr&acirc;cun</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5565</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hoscuuord manag<span class="f_canusg">| </span>h&ecirc;lagon Criste,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">grottun ina mid gelpu:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&acirc;uuun allaro gumono then beston</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">quelan an themo cr&ucirc;cie:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;ef thu s&icirc;s cuning o{b}ar all&raquo;, qu&acirc;{d}un sia,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;suno drohtines,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; thu ha{b}is sel{b}o [gisprocan],</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">neri thik fan thero n&ocirc;di<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi n&icirc;{d}es atuomi,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5570</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gang thi h&ecirc;l herod;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>than uuelliat an thik heli{d}o barn,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thesa liudi gil&ocirc;{b}ian.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Sum imo &ocirc;k lastar sprac</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">su&icirc;{d}o g&ecirc;lhert Iudeo,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thar hie fur them galgon stuod:</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;uuah uuar{d} thesaro uueroldi&raquo;, quathie,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;ef thu iro scoldis giuuald &ecirc;gan.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Thu sagdas that thu mahtis an &ecirc;non dage<span class="f_canusg">| </span>all teuuerpan</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5575</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that h&ocirc;ha h&ucirc;s<span class="f_canusg">| </span>he{b}ancuninges,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">st&ecirc;nuuerco m&ecirc;st<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi eft standan giduon</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an thriddion dage,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; is elcor ni thorfti bith&icirc;han mann</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">theses folkes fur{d}or.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>S&icirc;nu hu&ocirc; thu nu gifastnod st&ecirc;s,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">su&icirc;{d}o gis&ecirc;rid:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ni maht thi sel{b}on uuiht</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5580</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">balouues gibuotian.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thuo thar &ocirc;c an them bendion sprac</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thero theo{b}o &ocirc;{d}er,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>all s&ocirc; hie thia thioda gih&ocirc;rda,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uur&ecirc;{d}on uuordon<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ndash; ne uuas is uuillio guod,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thes thegnes gith&acirc;ht &ndash;:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;ef thu s&icirc;s thiodcuning&raquo;, quathie,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;Crist, godes suno,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>gang thi thann fan them cr&ucirc;ce ni{d}er,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5585</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sl&ocirc;pi thi fan them s&icirc;mon<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi &ucirc;s samad allon</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hilp endi h&ecirc;li.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Ef thu s&icirc;s he{b}ancuning,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uualdand thesaro uueroldes,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>giduo it than an th&icirc;non uuercon sc&icirc;n,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">m&acirc;ri thik fur thesaro menigi.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thuo sprac thero manno &ocirc;{d}er</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an thero henginna,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thar hie giheftid stuod,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5590</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuan uuunderqu&acirc;la:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;behu&icirc; uuilt thu sulic uuord sprecan,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gruotis ina mid gelpu?<span class="f_canusg">| </span>st&ecirc;s thi hier an galgen haft,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[gibr&ocirc;can] an b&ocirc;me.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Uuit hier b&ecirc;{d}ia tholod</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&ecirc;r thuru unca sundiun:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>is unc unkero sel{b}ero d&acirc;d</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuor{d}an te uu&icirc;tie.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Hie st&ecirc;d hier uuammes l&ocirc;s,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5595</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">allaro sundiono sicur,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; hie sel{b}o gio</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">firina ni gifrumida,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>botan that hie thuru theses folkes ni{d}</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuillendi an thesaro uueruldi<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uu&icirc;ti antf&acirc;hid.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Ik uuilliu thar gil&ocirc;{b}ian tuo&raquo;, quathie,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;endi uuilliu thena landes uuard,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thena godes suno<span class="f_canusg">| </span>gerno biddian,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5600</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that thu m&icirc;n gihuggies<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi an helpun s&icirc;s,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">r&acirc;dendero best,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>than thu an th&icirc;n r&icirc;ki cumis:</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uues mi than gin&acirc;{d}ig.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thuo sprak im eft neriendo Crist</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuordon tegegnes:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;ik seggiu thi te uu&acirc;ron hier&raquo;, quathie,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;that thu noh hiudu m&ocirc;st<span class="f_canusg">| </span>an himilr&icirc;ke</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5605</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[mid mi samad<span class="f_canusg">| </span>sehan lioht godes,]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an themo paradyse,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thoh thu nu an sulicoro p&icirc;nu s&icirc;s.&raquo;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Than stuod thar &ocirc;c Maria,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>muoder Cristes,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">bl&ecirc;c under them b&ocirc;me,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>gisah iro barn tholon,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuinnan uuunderqu&acirc;la.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&Ocirc;c uu&acirc;run thar uu&icirc;f mid iro</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5610</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an s&ocirc; mahtiges<span class="f_canusg">| </span>minnia cumana &ndash;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">than stuod thar &ocirc;c Iohannes,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>iungro Cristes,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hriuui undar is h&ecirc;rren,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuas im is hugi s&ecirc;rag &ndash;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[dr&ucirc;{b}odun fur] them d&ocirc;{d}e.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thar sprac drohtin Crist</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">mahtig te thero muoder:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;nu ik thi hier m&icirc;nemo scal</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5615</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">iungron befelhan,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>them [thie] hier geginuuard st&ecirc;d:</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuis thi an is gis&icirc;{d}ie samad:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thu scalt ina furi suno hebbian.&raquo;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Gr&ocirc;tta hie thuo Iohannes,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[hiet] that hie iru fulgengi uuell,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">minniodi sia s&ocirc; [mildo],<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; man is muoder scal,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">idis unuuamma.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thuo hie sia an is &ecirc;ra antfeng</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5620</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thuru hluttran hugi,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; im is h&ecirc;rro gib&ocirc;d.</h3>
   </td>
  </tr>
</table>

	<td width="50">&nbsp;</td>
	<td  width="600">
<h1>Heliand</h1>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h2>Fitte LXVII</h2>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="650" colspan="2" >

    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="50"><h6>&nbsp;</h6></td>
	<td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;">
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;"><span class="f_ruberi">T</span>huo uuar{d} thar an middian dag<span class="f_canusg">| </span>mahti t&ecirc;can,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuundarl&icirc;c giuuaraht<span class="f_canusg">| </span>o{b}ar [thesan] uuerold [allan,]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thuo man thena godes suno<span class="f_canusg">| </span>an thena galgon huof,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Crist an that cr&ucirc;ci:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thuo uuar{d} it c&ucirc;{d} o{b}ar all,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5625</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hu&ocirc; thiu sunna uuar{d} gisuorkan:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ni mahta suigli lioht</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sc&ocirc;ni gisc&icirc;nan,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ac [sia] scado farfeng,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thimm endi thiustri<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi [s&ocirc; githrusmod ne{b}al].</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[Uuar{d}] allaro dago druo{b}ost,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>duncar su&icirc;{d}o</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">o{b}ar [thesan] uu&icirc;dun uueruld,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; lango s&ocirc; uualdand Crist</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5630</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">qual an themo cr&ucirc;cie,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>cuningo r&icirc;kost,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ant nuon dages.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thuo thie ne{b}al tiscr&ecirc;d,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that gisuerc uuar{d} thuo tesuungan,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>bigan sunnun lioht</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;dron an himile.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thuo hreop upp te gode</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">allaro cuningo craftigost,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thuo hie an themo cr&ucirc;cie stuod</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5635</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fa{d}mon gifastnot:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;fader alomahtig&raquo;, quathie,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;te hu&icirc; thu mik s&ocirc; farlieti,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>lie{b}o drohtin,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;lag he{b}ancuning,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi th&icirc;na helpa dedos,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fullisti s&ocirc; ferr?<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Ik [standu] under theson f&icirc;ondon hier</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[uundron] giuu&ecirc;gid.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Uerod Iudeono</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5640</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hl&ocirc;gun is im thuo te hosce:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>gih&ocirc;rdun thena h&ecirc;lagun Crist,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">drohtin furi them d&ocirc;{d}e<span class="f_canusg">| </span>drincan biddian,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">qua{d} that ina thurstidi.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thiu thioda ne latta,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uur&ecirc;{d}a uui{d}arsacon:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuas im uuilleo mikil,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">huat sia im bittres [tuo]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>bringan mahtin.</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5645</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Habdun im unsu&ocirc;ti<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ecid endi galla</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gimengid thia m&ecirc;nhuaton;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>stuod &ecirc;nn mann garo,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">su&icirc;{d}o sculdig sca{d}o,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thena habdun sia giscerid te thiu,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">farspanan mid spr&acirc;con,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that hie sia en &ecirc;na spunsia nam,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">l&icirc;{d}o thes l&ecirc;{d}osten,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>druog it an [&ecirc;non] langan scafte,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5650</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gibundan an &ecirc;non b&ocirc;me<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi deda it them barne godes,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">mahtigon te m&ucirc;{d}e.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Hie ankenda iro mirkiun d&acirc;di,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gifuolda iro f&ecirc;gnes:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>fur{d}or [ni uuelda</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">is s&ocirc;] bittres anb&icirc;tan,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ac hreop that barn godes</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hl&ucirc;do te them himiliscon fader:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;ik an thina hendi [befilhu&raquo;,] quathie,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5655</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;m&icirc;non g&ecirc;st an godes uuillion;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>hie ist nu garo te thiu,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">f&ucirc;s te faranne.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Firio drohtin</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gihn&ecirc;gida thuo is h&ocirc;{b}id,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>h&ecirc;lagon &acirc;{d}om</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">liet fan themo l&icirc;khamen.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>S&ocirc; thuo thie landes uuard</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sualt an them s&icirc;mon,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; uuar{d} s&acirc;n after thiu</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5660</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uundart&ecirc;can giuuaraht,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[that] thar uualdandes d&ocirc;{d}</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[unque{d}andes] s&ocirc; filo<span class="f_canusg">| </span>antkennian scolda,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[gifuolian] is &ecirc;ndagon:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>er{d}a bi{b}oda,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hrisidun thia h&ocirc;hun bergos,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>harda st&ecirc;nos clu{b}un,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">felisos after them felde,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi that [f&ecirc;ha lacan] tebrast</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5665</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an middion an tu&ecirc;,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that &ecirc;r managan dag</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an themo uu&icirc;he innan<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuundron gistriunid</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;l hangoda<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ndash; ni muostun heli{d}o barn,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thia liudi scauuon,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>huat under themo lacane uuas</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;lages behangan:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thuo mohtun an that hor{d} sehan</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5670</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Iudeo liudi &ndash;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>gra{b}u uuur{d}un giopanod</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">d&ocirc;dero manno,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi sia thuru drohtines craft</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an iro l&icirc;chamon<span class="f_canusg">| </span>libbiandi astuodun</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">upp fan er{d}u<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi uur{d}un gi&ocirc;gida thar</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">mannon te m&acirc;r{d}u.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>That uuas s&ocirc; mahtig thing,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5675</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that thar [Cristes] d&ocirc;{d}<span class="f_canusg">| </span>antkennian scoldun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&ocirc; filo thes gifuolian,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[thie] gio mid firihon ne sprac</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuord an thesaro uueroldi.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Uuerod Iudeono</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&acirc;uuun seldl&icirc;c thing,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ac uuas im iro sl&icirc;{d}i hugi</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&ocirc; farhardod an iro herten,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that thar io s&ocirc; h&ecirc;lag ni uuar{d}</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5680</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">t&ecirc;can git&ocirc;gid,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that sia tr&ucirc;odin thiu bat</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an thia Cristes craft,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that hie cuning o{b}ar all,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thes uuerodes uu&acirc;ri.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Suma sia thar mid iro uuordon gispr&acirc;cun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thia thes hr&ecirc;uues thar<span class="f_canusg">| </span>huodian scoldun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that that uu&acirc;ri te uu&acirc;ren<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uualdandes suno,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5685</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">godes gegnungo,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that thar an them galgon sualt,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">barno that besta.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Sl&ocirc;gun an iro briost filo</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&ocirc;piandero uu&icirc;{b}o:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuas im thiu uuunderqu&acirc;la</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">harm an iro herten<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi iro h&ecirc;rren d&ocirc;{d}</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">su&icirc;{d}o an sorogon.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Than uuas sido Iudeono,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5690</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that sia thia [haftun thuru thena h&ecirc;lagon dag]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>hangon ni [lietin]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">lengerun hu&icirc;la,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[than] im that l&icirc;f scri{d}i,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thiu seola besunki:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>sl&icirc;{d}muoda mann</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gengun im mid n&icirc;{d}scipiu n&acirc;hor,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thar [s&ocirc; beneglida stuodun]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">theo{b}os tu&ecirc;na,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>tholodun b&ecirc;{d}ia</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5695</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">qu&acirc;la bi Criste:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uu&acirc;run im quica noh than,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">untthat sia thia grimmun<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Iudeo liudi</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">b&ecirc;non bebr&acirc;con,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that sia b&ecirc;{d}ia samad</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">l&icirc;f [farlietun,]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>suohtun im lioht &ocirc;{d}er.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Sia ni thorftun drohtin Crist<span class="f_canusg">| </span>d&ocirc;{d}es b&ecirc;dian</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5700</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fur{d}or mid &ecirc;nigon firinon:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>fundun ina gifaranan thuo iu:</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">is seola uuas gisendid<span class="f_canusg">| </span>an suo{d}an uueg,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an langsam lioht,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>is li{d}i cuolodun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that fera uuas af them [fl&ecirc;ske.]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thuo geng im &ecirc;n thero f&icirc;ondo tuo</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an n&icirc;{d}hugi,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>druog negilid sper</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5705</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hard an is handon,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>mid heruthrummeon stac,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">liet uu&acirc;pnes ord<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuundun sn&icirc;{d}an,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that an sel{b}es uuar{d}<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&icirc;du Cristes</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">antlocan is l&icirc;chamo.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thia liudi gis&acirc;uun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that thanan bluod endi uuater<span class="f_canusg">| </span>b&ecirc;{d}iu sprungun,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5710</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuellun fan thero uuundun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>all s&ocirc; is uuillio geng</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">endi hie habda [gimarcod &ecirc;r]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>manno cunnie,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">firiho barnon te frumu:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thuo uuas it all gifullid s&ocirc;.</h3>
   </td>
  </tr>
</table>

<p>um 830</p>

<h1>Heliand</h1>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h2>Fitte LXVIII</h2>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
    </td>

<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="50"><h6>&nbsp;</h6></td>
	<td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;">
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;"><span class="f_ruberi">S</span>&ocirc; thuo gis&ecirc;gid uuar{d}<span class="f_canusg">| </span>se{d}le n&acirc;hor</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;dra sunna<span class="f_canusg">| </span>mid he{b}antunglon</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5715</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an them druo{b}en dage,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thuo geng im &ucirc;ses drohtines thegan</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&ndash; uuas im glau gumo,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>iungro Cristes</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">managa hu&icirc;la,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; it thar manno filo</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ne uuissa te uu&acirc;ron,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>huand hie it mid is uuordon hal</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Iudeono gumscipie:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Ioseph uuas hie h&ecirc;tan,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5720</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">darnungo uuas hie &ucirc;ses drohtines iungro:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>hie ni uuelda thero farduanun thiod</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">folgon te &ecirc;nigon firinuuercon,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ac hie b&ecirc;d im under them folke Iudeono,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;lag himilo r&icirc;kies &ndash;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>hie geng im thuo uui{d} thena heritogon mahlian,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thingon uui{d} thena thegan k&ecirc;sures,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thigida ina gerno,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that hie muosti al&ocirc;sian<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thena l&icirc;khamon</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5725</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Cristes fan themo cr&ucirc;cie,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thie thar giquelmid stuod,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thes guoden fan them galgen<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi an graf leggian,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">foldu bifelahan.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Im ni uuelda thie folctogo thuo</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuernian thes uuillien,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ac im giuuald fargaf,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that hie s&ocirc; muosti gifrummian.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Hie giuu&ecirc;t im thuo for{d} thanan</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5730</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gangan te them galgon,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thar hie [uuissa that godes barn,]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hr&ecirc;o hangondi<span class="f_canusg">| </span>h&ecirc;rren s&icirc;nes,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">nam ina thuo [an] thero niuuun ruodun<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi ina fan naglon atuomda,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">antfeng ina mid is fa{d}mon,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; man is fr&ocirc;hon scal,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">lio{b}es l&icirc;chamon,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi ina an l&icirc;ne biuuand,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5735</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">druog ina diurl&icirc;co<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ndash; s&ocirc; uuas thie drohtin uuer{d} &ndash;,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thar sia thia stedi ha{b}dun<span class="f_canusg">| </span>an &ecirc;non st&ecirc;ne innan</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">handon gihauuuan,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thar gio heli{d}o barn</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gumon ne bigruo{b}on.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thar sia [that godes barn]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">te iro landuu&icirc;su,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>l&icirc;co h&ecirc;lgost</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5740</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">foldu bifulhun<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi mid &ecirc;nu felisu belucun</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">allaro gra{b}o guodl&icirc;cost.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Griotandi s&acirc;tun</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">idisi [armscapana],<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thia that all fors&acirc;uun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thes gumen grimman d&ocirc;{d}.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Giuuitun [im] thuo gangan thanan</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&ocirc;piandi uu&icirc;f<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi uuara n&acirc;mun,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5745</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[hu&ocirc; sia eft te them gra{b}e]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>gangan mahtin:</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ha{b}dun im farseuuana<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[soroga] ginuogia,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">mikila muodkara:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Maria uu&acirc;run sia h&ecirc;tana,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">idisi armscapana.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thuo uuar{d} &acirc;{b}and cuman,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">naht mid neflu.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Ni{d}folc [Iudeono]</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5750</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[uuar{d}] an moragan eft,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>menigi gisamnod,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">. . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . </h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">rekidun an r&ucirc;non:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;huat, thu uu&ecirc;st, hu&ocirc; thit r&icirc;ki uuas</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thuru thesan &ecirc;nan man<span class="f_canusg">| </span>all gitu&icirc;flid,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuerod giuuorran:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>nu ligid hie uuundon siok,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">diopa bidol{b}an.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Hie sagda [simnen, that hie scoldi fan d&ocirc;{d}e astandan]</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5755</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[an thriddian dage.]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thius thiod gil&ocirc;{b}it te filo,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thit uuerod after is uuordon.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Nu thu hier uuardon h&ecirc;t,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">o{b}ar them gra{b}e g&ocirc;mian,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that ina is iungron thar</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ne farstelan an themo st&ecirc;ne<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi seggian than, that hie astandan s&icirc;,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">r&icirc;ki fan raston:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>than uuir{d}it thit rinco folc</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5760</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">m&ecirc;r gimerrid,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ef sia [it] biginnat m&acirc;rian hier.&raquo;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Thuo uuur{d}un thar giscerida<span class="f_canusg">| </span>fan thero scolu Iudeono</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uueros te thero uuahtu:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>giuuitun im mid iro giuu&acirc;pnion tharod<a name="5764">&nbsp;</a></h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">te them gra{b}e gangan,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thar sia scoldun thes godes barnes</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hr&ecirc;uues huodian.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Uuar{d} thie h&ecirc;lago dag</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5765</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Iudeono fargangan.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Sia o{b}ar themo gra{b}e s&acirc;tun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uueros an thero uuahtun<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[uu&acirc;namon] nahton,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">bidun undar iro bordon,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>huan &ecirc;r thie berehto dag</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">o{b}ar middilgard<span class="f_canusg">| </span>mannon qu&acirc;mi,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">liudon te liohte.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thuo ni uuas lang te thiu,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5770</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that thar uuar{d} thie g&ecirc;st cuman<span class="f_canusg">| </span>be godes crafte,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&acirc;lag &acirc;{d}om<span class="f_canusg">| </span>undar thena hardon st&ecirc;n</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an [thena] l&icirc;chamon.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Lioht uuas thuo giopanod</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">firio barnon te frumu:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuas fercal manag</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">antheftid fan [helldoron]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi te himile uueg</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5775</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">giuuaraht fan thesaro uueroldi.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Uu&acirc;nom upp astuod</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fri{d}ubarn godes,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>fuor im thuo thar hie uuelda,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&ocirc; thia uuardos thes<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuiht ni afsuo{b}un,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">derbia liudi,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>huan hie fan them d&ocirc;{d}e astuod,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ar&ecirc;s fan thero rastun.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Rincos s&acirc;tun</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5780</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">umbi that graf &ucirc;tan,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Iudeo liudi,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">scola mid iro scildion.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Scr&ecirc;d for{d}uuardes</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">suigli sunnun [lioht.]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>S&icirc;{d}odun idisi</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">te them gra{b}e gangan,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>gumcunnies uu&icirc;f,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Mariun munil&icirc;ca:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>habdun m&ecirc;{d}mo filo</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5785</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gisald uui{d}er sal{b}um,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>silu{b}res endi goldes,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuer{d}es uui{d}er uuurtion,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; sia mahtun auuinnan m&ecirc;st,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that sia thena l&icirc;chamon<span class="f_canusg">| </span>lio{b}es h&ecirc;rren,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">suno drohtines,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>sal{b}on muostin,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuundun [uuritanan.]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thiu uu&icirc;f soragodun</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5790</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an iro se{b}on su&icirc;{d}o,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi suma spr&acirc;cun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">huie im thena gr&ocirc;tan st&ecirc;n<span class="f_canusg">| </span>fan themo gra{b}e scoldi</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gihuere{b}ian an hal{b}a,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>the sia o{b}ar that hr&ecirc;o s&acirc;uuun</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thia liudi leggian,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thuo sia thena l&icirc;chamon thar</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">befulhun an themo felise.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>S&ocirc; thiu fr&icirc; ha{b}dun</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5795</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gegangan te them gardon,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that sia te them gra{b}e mahtun</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gisehan sel{b}on,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thuo thar su&ocirc;gan quam</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">engil thes alouualdon<span class="f_canusg">| </span>o{b}ana fan radure,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">faran an fe{d}erhamon,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that all thiu folda [an scian,]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thiu er{d}a dunida<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi thia erlos uuur{d}un</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5800</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an uu&ecirc;kan hugie,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuardos Iu{d}eono,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">bifellun bi them forahton:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ne uu&acirc;ndun ira fera &ecirc;gan,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">l&icirc;f langerun hu&icirc;l.<span class="f_canusg">| </span></h3>
   </td>
  </tr>
</table>
</div>

<div class="titulus2">
<p>Heliand</p>
<p>um 830</p>

<table width="650" border="0" cellspacing="0" cellpadding="0">
  <tr>
	<td width="50">&nbsp;</td>
	<td  width="600">
<h1>Heliand</h1>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h2>Fitte LXIX</h2>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="650" colspan="2" >
<p style="color:#996699;">______________________________________________________________________________</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="50"><h6>&nbsp;</h6></td>
	<td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;">
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:200px;"><span class="f_canusg">| </span><span class="f_ruberi">L</span>&acirc;gun [tha] uuardos,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thia gis&icirc;{d}os s&acirc;mquica:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&acirc;n upp ahl&ecirc;d</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thie gr&ocirc;to st&ecirc;n fan them gra{b}e,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; ina thie godes engil</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5805</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gihueri{b}ida an hal{b}a,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi im uppan them hl&ecirc;uue gisat</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">diurl&icirc;c drohtines bodo.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Hie uuas an is d&acirc;dion gel&icirc;c,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an is ansiunion,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; huem s&ocirc; ina [muosta] undar is &ocirc;gon scauuon,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&ocirc; [bereht] endi s&ocirc; bl&icirc;{d}i<span class="f_canusg">| </span>all s&ocirc; [blicsmun] lioht;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuas im is giuu&acirc;di<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[uuintarcaldon]</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5810</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[sn&ecirc;uue gil&icirc;cost.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thuo s&acirc;uun sia ina sittian thar,]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thiu uu&icirc;f uppan them giuuendidan st&ecirc;ne,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi im fan them uulitie [qu&acirc;mun,]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">them idison sulica egison [tegegnes:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>all uuur{d}un fan them grurie</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thiu fr&icirc; an forahton mikilon,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>fur{d}or ne gidorstun</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">te themo gra{b}e gangan,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ecirc;r sia thie godes engil],</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5815</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[uualdandes] bodo<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuordon gruotta,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">qua{d} that hie iro &acirc;rundi<span class="f_canusg">| </span>all bicunsti,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuerc endi uuillion<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi thero uu&icirc;{b}o hugi,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hiet that sia im ne andr&ecirc;din:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;ik uu&ecirc;t that gi iuuuan drohtin suokat,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">neriendon Crist<span class="f_canusg">| </span>fan Nazarethburg,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5820</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thena thi hier quelidun<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi an cr&ucirc;ci sl&ocirc;gun</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Iudeo liudi<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi an graf lagdun</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[sundil&ocirc;sian].<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Nu nist hie sel{b}o hier,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ac hie ist astandan iu,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi sind thesa stedi l&acirc;rea,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thit graf an theson griote.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Nu mugun gi gangan herod</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5825</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">n&acirc;hor mikilu<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ndash; ik uu&ecirc;t that is iu ist niud sehan</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an theson st&ecirc;ne innan &ndash;:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>hier sind noh thia stedi sc&icirc;na,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thar is l&icirc;chamo lag.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Lungra fengun</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gibada an iro brioston<span class="f_canusg">| </span>bl&ecirc;ca idisi,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uulitisc&ocirc;ni uu&icirc;f:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuas im uuilspell mikil</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5830</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">te gih&ocirc;rianne,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that im fan iro [h&ecirc;rren] sagda</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">engil thes alouualden.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Hiet sia eft thanan</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fan them gra{b}e gangan<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi faran te them iungron Cristes,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">seggian them is gis&icirc;{d}on<span class="f_canusg">| </span>suo{d}on uuordon,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that iro drohtin uuas<span class="f_canusg">| </span>fan d&ocirc;{d}e astandan.</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5835</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Hiet &ocirc;c an sundron<span class="f_canusg">| </span>S&icirc;mon Petruse</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuillspell mikil<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuordon c&ucirc;{d}ian,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">cumi drohtines,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>gie that Crist [sel{b}o]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[uuas an] Galileo land,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;thar ina eft is iungron sculun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gisehan is [gis&icirc;{d}os],<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; hie im &ecirc;r sel{b}o gisprac</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5840</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&acirc;ron uuordon.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Reht s&ocirc; thuo thiu uu&icirc;f thanan</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gangan uueldun,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; stuodun im tegegnes thar</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">engilos tu&ecirc;na<span class="f_canusg">| </span>an alahu&icirc;ton</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&acirc;namon giuu&acirc;dion<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi spr&acirc;cun [im] mid iro uuordon tuo</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;lagl&icirc;co:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>hugi uuar{d} gibl&ocirc;{d}id</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5845</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">then idison an egison:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ne mahtun an thia engilos godes</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">bi themo uulite scauuon:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuas im thiu uu&acirc;nami te strang,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">te su&icirc;{d}i te sehanne.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thuo spr&acirc;cun im s&acirc;n angegin</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uualdandes bodun<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi thiu uu&icirc;f fr&acirc;godun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">te hu&icirc; sia Cristan tharod<span class="f_canusg">| </span>quican mid d&ocirc;don,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5850</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">suno drohtines<span class="f_canusg">| </span>suokian qu&acirc;min</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ferahes fullan;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;nu gi ina ni findat hier</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an theson st&ecirc;ngra{b}e,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ac hie ist astandan [nu]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an is l&icirc;chamen:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thes gi gil&ocirc;{b}ian sculun</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">endi gihuggian thero uuordo,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>the hie iu te uu&acirc;ron oft</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5855</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sel{b}o sagda,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thann hie an iuuuon gis&icirc;{d}e uuas</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an [Galilealande,]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>hu&ocirc; hie scoldi gige{b}an uuer{d}an,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gisald sel{b}o<span class="f_canusg">| </span>an sundigaro manno,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[hettiandero] hand,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>h&ecirc;lag drohtin,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that sia ina quelidin<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi an cr&ucirc;ci [sl&ocirc;gin,]</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5860</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">d&ocirc;dan gid&acirc;din<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi that hie scoldi thuru drohtines craft</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an thriddion dage<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thioda te uuillion</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">libbiandi astandan.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Nu ha{b}it hie all gil&ecirc;stid s&ocirc;,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gifrumid mid firihon:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&icirc;liat gi nu for{d} hinan,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gangat g&acirc;hl&icirc;co<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi duot it them is iungron c&ucirc;{d}.</h3>
   </td>
  </tr>
</table>

	<td width="50">&nbsp;</td>
	<td  width="600">
<h1>Heliand</h1>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h2>Fitte LXX</h2>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="650" colspan="2" >
<p style="color:#996699;">______________________________________________________________________________</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="50"><h6>5865</h6></td>
	<td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;">
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;"><span class="f_ruberi">H</span>ie ha{b}it sia iu furfarana<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi ist im for{d} hinan</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an Galileo land,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thar ina eft is iungron sculun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gisehan is gis&icirc;{d}os.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thuo uuar{d} [s&acirc;n] after thiu</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">them uui{b}on an uuillon,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that sia gih&ocirc;rdun sulic uuord sprecan,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">c&ucirc;{d}ian thia craft godes<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ndash; uu&acirc;run im s&ocirc; acumana thuo noh</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5870</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gie s&ocirc; forahta gefrumida &ndash;:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>giuuitun im for{d} thanan</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fan them gra{b}e gangan<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi sagdun them iungron Cristes</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[seldl&icirc;c] gisiuni,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thar sia sorogondi</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">bidun sulikero buota.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thuo uuur{d}un &ocirc;c an thia burg [cumana]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Iudeono uuardos,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thia o{b}ar themo gra{b}e s&acirc;tun</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5875</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">alla [langa] naht<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi thes l&icirc;chamen thar,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">huodun [thes] hr&ecirc;uues.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Sia sagdun thero h&ecirc;ri Iudeono,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">huilica im thar anduuarda<span class="f_canusg">| </span>egison qu&acirc;mun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">seldl&icirc;c gisiuni,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>sagdun mid uuordon,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">al s&ocirc; it giduan uuas<span class="f_canusg">| </span>an thero drohtines craft,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5880</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ni mi{d}un an iro muode.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thuo budun im m&ecirc;{d}mo filo</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Iudeo liudi,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>gold endi silu{b}ar,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">saldun im sinc manag,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[te thiu that] sia it ni sagdin for{d},</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ne m&acirc;ridin thero menigi:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;ac que{d}at that iu m&ocirc;{d}i hugi</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ansue{b}idi mid sl&acirc;pu<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi that thar qu&acirc;min [is] gis&icirc;{d}os tuo,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5885</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">farst&acirc;lin ina an them st&ecirc;ne.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Simnen uuesat gi an str&icirc;de mid thiu,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">for{d} an fl&icirc;te:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ef it uuir{d}it them folctogen c&ucirc;{d},</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uui gihelpat iu uui{d} thena h&ecirc;rrosten,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that hie iu harmes uuiht,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">l&ecirc;{d}es ni gil&ecirc;stid.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thuo n&acirc;mun sia an them liudon filo</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[diurero m&ecirc;{d}mo,]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>d&acirc;dun all s&ocirc; sia bigunnun</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5890</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&ndash; ne giuueldun iro uuillion &ndash;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[d&acirc;dun s&ocirc; uu&icirc;do] c&ucirc;{d}</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">them liudon after them lande,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that sia sulica lugina uuoldun</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ahebbian be than h&ecirc;lagan drohtin.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thann uuas eft gih&ecirc;lid hugi</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">iungron Cristes,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thuo sia gih&ocirc;rdun thiu guodun uu&icirc;f</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">m&acirc;rian thia maht godes;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thuo uu&acirc;run sia an iro muode fr&acirc;ha,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5895</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gie im te them gra{b}e b&ecirc;{d}ia,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Iohannes endi Petrus</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">runnun o{b}astl&icirc;co:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuar{d} &ecirc;r [cuman]</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Iohannes thie guodo,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi im o{b}ar them gra{b}e gistuod,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">antat thar s&acirc;n after quam<span class="f_canusg">| </span>S&icirc;mon Petrus,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">erl ellanruof<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi im thar in giuu&ecirc;t</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5900</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an that graf gangan:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>gisah thar thes godes barnes,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hr&ecirc;ogiuu&acirc;di<span class="f_canusg">| </span>h&ecirc;rren s&icirc;nes</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">l&icirc;nin liggian,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>mid thiu uuas &ecirc;r thie l&icirc;chamo</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fagaro bifangan;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>lag thie fano sundar,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">mit them uuas that h&ocirc;{b}id bihelid<span class="f_canusg">| </span>h&ecirc;lages Cristes,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5905</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">r&icirc;kies drohtines,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thann hie an thesaro rastu uuas.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Thuo geng im &ocirc;c Iohannes<span class="f_canusg">| </span>an that graf innan</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sehan seldl&icirc;c thing;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuar{d} im s&acirc;n after thiu</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">antlocan is gil&ocirc;{b}o,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>[that hie uuissa,] that scolda eft an thit lioht cuman</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">is drohtin diurl&icirc;co,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>fan d&ocirc;{d}e astandan</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5910</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">upp fan er{d}u.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thuo giuuitun im eft thanan</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Iohannes endi Petrus,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi qu&acirc;mun thia iungron Cristes,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thia gis&icirc;{d}os tesamne.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Than stuod s&ecirc;ragmuod</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&ecirc;n thera idiso<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ocirc;{d}ers&icirc;{d}u</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">griotandi o{b}ar them gra{b}e,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuas iro [i&acirc;mar muod &ndash;]</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5915</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Maria uuas that Magdalena &ndash;,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuas iro muodgith&acirc;ht,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[se{b}o] mit [sorogon] giblandan,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ne uuissa huarod siu s&ocirc;kian scolda</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thena h&ecirc;rron, thar iro uu&acirc;run at thia helpa gilanga.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Siu ni mohta thuo hofnu auu&icirc;san,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that uu&icirc;f ni mahta uu&ocirc;p forl&acirc;tan:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ne uuissa huarod siu sia uuendian scolda;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gimerrid uu&acirc;run iro thes muodgith&acirc;hti.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thuo gisah siu thena [mahtigan thar]</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5920</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[Criste standan,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thuoh siu ina c&ucirc;{d}l&icirc;co]</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5920b</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[antkennian ni mohti,]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ecirc;r than hie ina c&ucirc;{d}ian uuelda,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5921</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">seggian that hie it sel{b}o uu&acirc;ri.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Hie fr&acirc;goda huat siu s&ocirc; s&ecirc;ro biuuiepi,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&ocirc; harmo mid h&ecirc;ton trahnin.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Siu qua{d}, that siu umbi iro h&ecirc;rron ni uuissi</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">te uu&acirc;ren, huarod hie uuer{d}an scoldi:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;ef thu ina mi giuu&icirc;san mohtis,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fr&ocirc; m&icirc;n, ef ik thik fr&acirc;gon gidorsti,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ef thu ina hier an theson felise gin&acirc;mis,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5925</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&icirc;si ina mi mid uuordon th&icirc;non:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>than uu&acirc;ri mi allaro uuilliono m&ecirc;sta,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that ik ina sel{b}o gis&acirc;hi.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Sia ni uuissa, [that] sia thie suno drohtines</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gruotta mid g&ocirc;daro spr&acirc;cun:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>siu uu&acirc;nda that it thie gardari uu&acirc;ri,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">hofuuard h&ecirc;rren s&icirc;nes.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thuo gruotta sia thie h&ecirc;lago drohtin,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">bi namen neriendero best:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>siu geng im thuo n&acirc;hor sniumo,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5930</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that uu&icirc;f mid uuillion guodan,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>antkenda iro uualdand sel{b}an,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[m&icirc;{d}an] siu is thuru thia minnia ni uuissa:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuelda ina mid iro [mundon] gr&icirc;pan,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thiu [f&ecirc;hmia] an thena folko drohtin,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>no{b}an that iro fri{d}ubarn godes</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuerida mid uuordon s&icirc;non,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>qua{d} that siu ina mid uuihti ni m&ocirc;sti</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">handon anthr&icirc;nan:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;ik ni st&ecirc;g noh&raquo;, quathie, &laquo;te them himiliscon fader;</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5935</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ac &icirc;li thu nu ofstl&icirc;co<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi them erlon c&ucirc;{d}i,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">bruo{d}ron m&icirc;non,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that ik &ucirc;ser b&ecirc;{d}ero fader,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">[alauualdan]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>iuuuan endi m&icirc;nan,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">suo{d}fastan god<span class="f_canusg">| </span>suokean uuilliu.&raquo;</h3>
   </td>
  </tr>
</table>
</div>

<div class="titulus2">
<p>Heliand</p>
<p>um 830</p>
