	<td width="50">&nbsp;</td>
	<td  width="600">
<h1>Heliand</h1>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<h2>Fitte LXXI</h2>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="650" colspan="2" >
<p style="color:#996699;">______________________________________________________________________________</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
<p>&nbsp;</p>
    </td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
	<td style="vertical-align:top;" width="50"><h6>&nbsp;</h6></td>
	<td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;">
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;"><span class="f_ruberi">T</span>hat uu&icirc;f uuar{d} thuo an uuunnon,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that siu muosta sulican uuillion c&ucirc;{d}ian,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5940</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">seggian fan im gisundon:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuar{d} s&acirc;n garo</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thiu idis an that &acirc;rundi<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi them erlon br&acirc;hta,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuillspel uueron,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that siu uualdand Crist</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gisundan gis&acirc;uui,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi sagda hu&ocirc; [he] iru sel{b}o gib&ocirc;d</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">torohtero t&ecirc;cno.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Sia ni uueldun gitr&ucirc;oian thuo noh</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5945</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thes uu&icirc;bes uuordon,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that siu sulic uuillspel br&acirc;hte</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gegnungo fan themo godes [suno],<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ac sia s&acirc;tun im i&acirc;mormuoda,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">heli{d}os [hriuonda.]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thuo uuar{d} thie h&ecirc;lago Crist</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">eft opanl&icirc;co<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&ocirc;{d}ers&icirc;{d}u,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">drohtin git&ocirc;gid,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&icirc;{d}or hie fan d&ocirc;{d}e astuod,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5950</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">than uu&icirc;{b}on an uuillion,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that hie im thar an uuege muotta.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Quedda sia c&ucirc;{d}l&icirc;co,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi sia te is kneohon hnigun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">fellun im t&ocirc; fuoton.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Hie h&ecirc;t that sia forahtan hugi</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">ne b&acirc;rin an iro brioston:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;ac gi m&icirc;non bruo{d}ron sculun</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thesa quidi c&ucirc;{d}ian,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>that sia cuman after mi</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5955</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an Galileo land;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thar ik im eft tegegnes biun.&raquo;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Than fuorun im &ocirc;k fan Hierusalem<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thero iungrono tu&ecirc;na</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">an them sel{b}on daga<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&acirc;n [an] morgan,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">erlos an iro &acirc;rundi:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uueldun im te Emaus</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">that castel suocan.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thuo bigunnun im quidi managa</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5960</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">under them uueron uuahsan,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>thar sia after them uuege fuorun,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">them heli{d}on umbi iro h&ecirc;rron.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Thuo quam im thar thie h&ecirc;lago tuo</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">gangandi godes suno.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Sia ni mahtun ina garol&icirc;co</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">antkennan craftigna:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>hie ni uuelda ina thuo noh c&ucirc;{d}ian te im;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uuas im thoh an iro gis&icirc;{d}ie samad<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi fr&acirc;goda, umbi huilica sia saca spr&acirc;kin:</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5965</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;hu&icirc; gangat gi s&ocirc; gornondia?&raquo; quathie.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;Ist inc i&acirc;mer hugi,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">se{b}o soragono full.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Sia spr&acirc;cun im s&acirc;n angegin,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thia erlos anduurdi:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>&laquo;te hu&icirc; thu thes [&ecirc;scos s&ocirc;]&raquo;, qu&acirc;{d}un sia;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">&laquo;bist thi fan Hierusalem<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Iudeono folcas</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">. . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . .<span class="f_canusg">| </span>. . . . . . . . . . . . . </h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">h&ecirc;lagumu g&ecirc;ste<span class="f_canusg">| </span>fan he{b}enuuange,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5970</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">mid them gr&ocirc;tun godes craft.&raquo;<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Nam is iungaron th&ocirc;,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">erlos g&ocirc;de,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>l&ecirc;dda sie &ucirc;t thanan,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">antat he sie br&acirc;hte<span class="f_canusg">| </span>an Bethania;</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thar h&ocirc;f he is hendi up<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi h&ecirc;legoda sie alle,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&icirc;hida sie mid is uuordun.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Giuu&ecirc;t imo up thanan,</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5975</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">s&ocirc;hta imo that h&ocirc;ha himilo r&icirc;ki<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi thena is h&ecirc;lagon st&ocirc;l:</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">sitit imo [thar]<span class="f_canusg">| </span>an thea su&icirc;{d}ron half godes,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">alomahtiges fader<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi thanan all gesihit</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uualdandeo Crist,<span class="f_canusg">| </span>s&ocirc; huat s&ocirc; thius uuerold beha{b}et.</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">Th&ocirc; an theru sel{b}on stedi<span class="f_canusg">| </span>ges&icirc;{d}os g&ocirc;de</h3>
</td></tr><tr><td width="50" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h6>5980</h6></td><td width="600" style="text-align:left;vertical-align:baseline;"><h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">te bedu fellun<span class="f_canusg">| </span>endi im eft te burg thanan</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">thar te Hierusalem<span class="f_canusg">| </span>iungaron Cristes</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">f&ocirc;run faganondi:<span class="f_canusg">| </span>uuas im fr&acirc;hmod hugi,</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">uu&acirc;run im thar at themu uu&icirc;he.<span class="f_canusg">| </span>Uualdandes craft</h3>
<h3 style="text-align:left;text-indent:0px;">. . . . . . . . . . . . . . .<span class="f_canusg">| </span> . . . . . . . . . . . . . . . </h3>
   </td>
  </tr>
</table>
</div>
